K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-3: lha ma yin mgul phreng dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-4: lha ma yin skar phreng gi grong khyer na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-6: nags tshal na gnas pa de dag thams cad yi mug cing byin nyams la bzhin ngo tsha nas khyim du phyir lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-8: lha ma yin bdag cag rnams kyis lha rnams thub par ma nus la byin nyams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-9: gang gi tshe bdag cag gis lha rnams pham par byed nus zhig gu zhes de skad smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-10: lha ma yin mgul phreng dag gis sgra gcan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-11: lha ma yin gyi dbang po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-12: 'di ltar slad kyis yun mi ring bar bdag cag gis lha rnams pham par bgyid par rngo thogs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-13: nan tan mdzad du gsol zhes smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-15: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis lha ma yin mgul phreng dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-16: lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dag la 'di ltar ngas yun mi ring bar lha dag dbang po dang bcas te thub par bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-17: snying las chung ngur 'khod cig ces smras so; ;sgra gcan las lha ma yin mgul phreng dag gis de skad thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-18: de nas yid rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:28b-19: rang gi gnas su zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-0: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par @29a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-1: smin pa shes pa des lha ma yin gyi grong khyer skar phreng zhes bya ba la brtags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-2: phyi rol la'ang so sor rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-3: mgul phreng zhes bya ba dag gis gzhan phyi rol gyi tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-4: nags tshal rnam pa du yod snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-5: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-6: lha ma yin mgul phreng zhes bya ba dag gi tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-12: padma'i rdzing rnams kyis dpag tshad khri phrag sum stong du gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-15: ngur pa dag gis mdzes par byas shing nye bar brgyan la kun tu sdug par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-16: kun nas nyams dga' ba spro zhing rab tu dga' la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-17: rtag tu mang ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-18: de na tshal chen po bdun yod pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-25: ti na di kun dga' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-27: de dag ni lha ma yin mgul phreng dag gi skye bo gnas pa'i tshal chen po dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-28: sa de dag kyang lha ma yin rtag tu dga' ba rnams kyis gang ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29a-29: lha ma yin las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa rnams gnas par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-0: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha ma yin mgul phreng dag gi @29b las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-1: mgul phreng dag las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-3: phyi rol pa gang gis gtan pa dang bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-5: skyon dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin byas shing bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-6: bca' ba rab tu mang po dag bshams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-7: tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ma byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-8: sems kyis ma bsgoms pa'i sbyin pa ngan pa sbyin pa de byin pa de ni lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dud 'gro'i 'gro ba lha ma yin mgul phreng rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur la; sbyin pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-10: mchog rnams kyis bde ba tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-13: rgyu dang mthun par 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-14: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-15: las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa gang gis brtan pa dag lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal srid byed snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:29b-17: rkun ma gzhan gyi nor rdzas kyis 'tsho ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-0: sems pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi rol pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba gcig la zas kyis tshim par byin pa'i las des lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal srid byed @30a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-2: de nas yang dge slong de lha ma yin mgul phreng zhes bya ba'i tshe la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-3: lha ma yin mgul phreng gi tshe'i tshad ji srid du thub snyam nas; des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-5: mi rnams kyi lo drug brgya gang yin pa de dag ni lha ma yin mgul phreng rnams kyis nyin zhag gcig la grangs rtsis pa de'i lo drug stong thub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-6: dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-8: nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ni las thams cad la rag las pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-9: des dud 'gro'i 'gro bar bsdus pa lha ma yin gnyis pa dag gi sa la brtags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-10: chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-11: sems can 'khor bar gtogs pa thams cad ni chos la rten pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-12: chos kyi 'gro ba chos skyob pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-13: legs par byas pas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-14: mi rnams kyi nang du skye la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-15: nyes par byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-17: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-18: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-19: ji ltar na lha kun tu rgyu ba rnams gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams las thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-20: ci zhig byed cig gu snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30a-21: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-0: 'di ltar lha kun tu rgyu ba rnams @30b rgyal chen bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-1: lha phreng thogs rnams la 'di ltar lha ma yin chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa rnams kyis klu rnams la 'di ltar chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi rgyu gang gis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-2: lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba rnams la bar chad bya ba 'bod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-5: shes pa thams cad kyang kha zas la rag las pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-6: de dag kyang kha zas la rten pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-7: dzambu'i gling du khyed deng la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-8: lo tog thams cad dbrog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-9: 'bru thams cad ma rung bar bya ba'i char phob cig ces rab tu gzengs bstod par byed pa de dag bdag cag la bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-10: chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de rnams kyis kyang de dag bdag cag la bsnyad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-11: bdag cag gis kyang khyed cag la bsnyad pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-12: khyed cag gis kyang nye ba na gnas pa'i lha gang yod pa de dag la bsnyad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-13: lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyis kyang pi wang can gsum pa rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-14: pi wang can gsum pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu myos pa rnams la bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:30b-15: de ltar rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyis chos dang mi mthun pa 'di rgya cher bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-0: so so'i bye brag ji lta bu yin pa rgyal chen bzhi pa de rnams kyis kyang grong khyer chen po blta na @31a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-1: sdug na lha'i mdun sa chos bzang dag gi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor par gyur ba'i lha rnams kyi dbang po koo shi ka la snga ma bzhin rgya cher bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-2: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po koo shi kas 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-4: dzambu'i gling na ci sangs rgyas dkon mchog la dad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-5: chos dkon mchog la dad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-6: dge 'dun dkon mchog la dad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-12: drang ba'i rang bzhin can yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-15: rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-16: tshes grangs kyi smyung ba la nye bar gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-17: g-yo thabs dang; tshul 'chos pa la ma chags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-18: gzhal lugs la g-yo byed cing mi slu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-19: phan tshun gnod pa dag byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-21: dzambu'i gling du deng la rtogs shig ces bsgo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-23: de ltar 'tshal lo zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-24: 'jig rten skyong ba dag mi rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir dzambu'i gling ga la ba der dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31a-30: tshong rdal nas tshong rdal du de dag rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-0: dzambu'i gling na chos dang ldan zhing chos @31b kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi dag gang gnas pa dzambu'i gling 'di thams cad la snga ma bzhin so sor rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-1: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po de dag gal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-2: chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag mthong na de ltar rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs nas longs spyod ldan na gnas pa'i klu nor rgyas kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-7: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'phel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-9: mun nag mi gsal ba'i phyogs ni sel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-10: bdud kyi phyogs ni srabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-11: chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-14: chos kyi rnga ni kun tu brdungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-15: chos kyi dbyangs rab tu len du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-19: lha ma yin chos dang mi ldan pa rnams ni 'grib cing 'dug go zhes bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-20: de thos nas klu nor rgyas kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-21: 'jog po la sogs pa dga' bar gyur pa rnams kyis 'jig rten skyong ba mgu ba dag la 'di skad ces /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-23: bdag cag rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-25: mi'i 'jig rten na mi rnams la klu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:31b-26: lha ma yin chos dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis bar chad bya bar mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-0: rab tu dga' zhing mchis so zhes de skad lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la gsol @32a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-2: de skad thos nas klu rnams kyi drung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-3: 'jig rten skyong ba dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-4: snga ma bzhin de skad bsnyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-5: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yid rab tu dga' nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-6: 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-7: thub pa de nyid gzigs pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-8: khyed la lam btod 'di gsungs la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-9: mi gang rab tu gnas pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-11: sems can rnams la bden dang de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-12: sbyin dang byams pa srung zhing tshig snyan smra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-13: yang dag lta dang dri ma bral ba'i yid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-14: sangs rgyas kyis ni mtho ris lam du gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-15: dkar po'i chos dang yang dag ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-16: dkar po'i sems la rten pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-17: snang las snang ba'i me tog dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-18: sgron las sgron ma gzhan 'byung ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-19: snang las snang ba'i mchog 'byung zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-20: bde las shin tu bde bar 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-21: de bas skyes bu sgron ma mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-22: ngam grog tu ni ltung mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-23: rtag tu nor bu dri med ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-24: rtag tu gang zhig sems dag pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-25: de ni zhi ste nga med brtan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-26: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-27: bsam gtan tshul khrims ting 'dzin dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-28: gang gi sems la shin tu bsgoms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-29: brtan po de ni gser 'dra ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32a-30: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-0: srog gcod pa dag @32b spangs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-1: sems can kun la snying rje mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-2: brtse ldan drang po zhi ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-3: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-5: zhe sdang las ni rnam spangs la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-6: sdig pa'i chos kyis ma gos pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-7: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-8: gang la rtsva dang gser mnyam zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-9: gang gis 'dod pa dug lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-10: 'dod pa spangs pa'i brtan po de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-11: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-13: yul gyis ma drangs gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-14: de ni 'jigs pa'i dgon las brgal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-15: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-16: grogs po gnyen bshes rtsa lag dang; ;phan tshun mi mthun gyur pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-17: gang zhig shin tu sdums byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-18: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-19: 'dod pa'i 'dam las drangs shing skyon bsal ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-20: sems can kun la rtag tu bde 'dod gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-21: de ni dri med zhi ba yid grol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-22: de ltar bdud kyi stobs ni 'joms par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-23: gang zhig dbang la blo gnas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-24: blo yi dbang du mi 'gro gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-25: de ni dgra las rnam rgyal te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-26: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-27: lus kyi las mtha' dge ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-28: sdig las bral ba bde ldan gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-29: de ni 'dod spangs bsam gtan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-30: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-31: sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-32: sred pa'i zhags las rnam grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-33: bud med zhags pas ma bcings pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:32b-34: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-2: sbyin dang tshul khrims ting 'dzin ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-3: blo gros brtan zhing rtag brtson pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-4: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-5: gral gris zhags pa bcad la ltar; ;gang gis 'ching ba bcad pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-6: rang dbang zhags pa bcad pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-7: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-8: 'dod pa'i dri mas ma gos bram pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-9: skyon dag spangs shing bcom ste sred dang bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-10: nyes med dri bral sems can brtan pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-11: rang gi 'bras bu la spyod mtho ris 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-12: sems can mir ni gyur ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-13: legs par byas pa mang spyad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-14: las kyi rnam smin de yis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-16: mi yi mthu yis lha 'byung la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-17: lha yi mthu yis mi 'byung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-19: dam pa'i chos kyi lam du gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-20: lha yi bde 'bro mi yin la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-21: mi yi bde 'gro lha yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-22: ngan song gsum gyi sa dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-23: dge ba'i las rnams spangs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-24: de ni khyed yin rtag tu brtson //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-25: legs par mthong ba mchog yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-26: rtag tu chos spel byed pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-27: lha mchog rnams ni rab tu 'bod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-28: bde ba thams cad chos la las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-29: mya ngan 'das pa chos la las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-30: gnyid log rnams la chos ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33a-31: 'gro ba mchog ni chos yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-0: de skad ces bsgo nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la @33b yang 'di skad du mi rnams yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-1: chos rnams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'bod cig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-2: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha rnams kyi sems kyi rtog par rigs nas nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-3: de nas yang dge slongs las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha ma yin rnams kyi sa gnyis pa la brtags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-4: sa gsum pa la rtogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-5: lha ma yin rnams kyis gsum pa'i rnam pa ji lta bu yin snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-6: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-7: sa gzhi gsum pa gang yin pa ni dpag tshad nyi khri chig stong yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-8: sa gzhi de'ang gnas bzang po zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-13: skye bo mthun pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-15: rol mo'i sgra snyan pas gang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-16: grong khyer zab pa zhes bya ba dpag tshad brgyad stong pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-17: grong khyer de na lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng zhes bya ba gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-18: lha ma yin de rnams kyang rtse ba la gnas pa zhes bya la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-19: grong khyer zab pa de 'ang rin po che'i rnam pa du ma dang; tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-22: padma'i rdzing rab tu mang po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:33b-24: rnyog pa dang bral ba'i padma skye ba'i rdzing rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-1: ma yin rtse ba'i grogs po dang ldan pa rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-2: dus tshigs drug nyams dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-3: tshal chen po bzhi rnams kyis mdzes pa byas pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-5: dril bu g-yer kha'i phreng ba'i tshal zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-6: gang du dril bu g-yer kha'i shing ljon pa rtag tu sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-7: 'di ltar tshal gnyis pa gser phreng zhes bya ba gang du gser gyi shing ljon pa skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-8: tshal gsum pa me phreng zhes bya ba gang du me lta bu'i shing ljon pa 'bras bu dmar po 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-9: tshal bzhi pa 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang du me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-10: 'bras bu 'dres pa rnams kyis mdzes pa byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-11: tshal bzhi po de rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi grong khyer zab pa mdzes par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-12: gang na lha ma yin rtse ba'i grogs dang lhan cig gnas pa ni lha dang mthun par 'debs gnas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-13: de ltar gnas pa de dag ni me tog phreng dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-15: byug pa rnams kyis lus brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-20: rgod pa rnams kyis rtag tu gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-21: lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'bum rnyed kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-22: lha ma yin gyis dbang po me tog phreng gis bskyangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34a-23: skyed mos tshal du rtag tu rtse bar gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-0: lus kyi bar bar rin po che rnams @34b sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-1: lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pas gnas gnyis pa na gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-2: lha ma yin 'dzam bha zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-3: lha ma yin me tog phreng zhes bya ba'i drung du mngags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-4: 'di ltar mi'i 'jig rten na mi 'di dag thams cad mar 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-8: byas pa la phan 'dags pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-9: de ltar gnas pa de dag ni mi mthu che ba rnams kyis lha rnams mthu che ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-10: des na bdag cag klu dang bcas pa rnams kyis nges par lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-11: mi rnams kyi dam pa'i chos kyi bar chad bya ba la 'bad par bya'o zhes snga ma bzhin du de dag thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-12: gnas gsum pa na gnas pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng shin tu mi dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-13: bdag cag gi dgra bo lha 'di dag ni mi la rag las pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-15: mi'i bar chad bya'o zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-16: da nas lha ma yin rtse zhing gnas pa mtshon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-17: go cha sna tshogs kyis lus rnam par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-18: shin tu chags pa rnams klu rnams kyi gnas longs spyod ldan ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-19: de nas lha ma yin gyi sgra de dag thos nas klu'i rgyal po chen po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:34b-20: 'jog bo la sogs pa la lus la glog gi phreng ba 'bar ba 'byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-0: shin tu chas pa rnams glog mang po char ltar 'byin pa na rgya mtsho'i dbus nas klu @35a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-1: 'bum phrag bye ba du ma ngag mngon par 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-2: de nas lha ma yin de rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-3: klu de rnams rgya mtsho'i dbus su g-yul chen po 'gyed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-4: de gang gi tshe chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi 'byung ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-5: lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-6: gal te chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skye dgu 'byung na snga ma bzhin de'i che lha ma yin gyi phyogs rgyal bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-8: de ltar thams cad chos la rag las pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-9: de gang gi tshe klu pham par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-10: de dag kun tu rgyu ba'i lha rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-12: 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams kyi mthu la bgegs bya ba'i phyir 'bod cig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-13: de nas kun tu rgyu ba'i lha khro bas gdungs po rnams kha rlangs 'byin bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-15: 'di ltar lha ma yin gyi phyogs 'di ni mthu che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-17: lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal gyi g-yul bsham pa la rab tu 'bod cig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-18: kun tu rgyu ba'i lha'i bu de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-19: kha rlangs de mthong nas kyang rtog ge pa dag na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35a-20: 'di ltar du ba 'jug ring byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-0: char legs par 'bab par 'gyur @35b ro; ;char legs par 'bab par mi 'gyur ro zhes snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-1: 'di ni du ba 'jug ring ston pa'i rgyu gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-2: de gang gi tshe lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-4: gnod sbyin dag rgyal bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-5: char legs par 'bab cing lo legs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-6: de'i tshe nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-7: mtshon gyis 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-8: 'di lta ste; rtog ge pa dag na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-9: 'di ltar gzas char phab bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-10: de nas gang gi tshe chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skye dgu 'byung zhing mar mi 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-12: rgan rabs la gus par mi byed pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-13: lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni rgyal bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-14: char mi 'bab cing chos dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis lo legs par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-16: de la rtogs pa dag gzhan du bsgyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-17: gza'i nyes pas char mi 'phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-18: rgyu skar gyi nyes pas lo legs par mi 'gyur ro zhes snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-20: chos ma yin pa mngon par mi shes pa rtog ge pa dag gzhan du bsgyur zhing 'jig rten pa la gzhan du sgrogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:35b-21: de ltar mi shes pas nyams pa thams cad ni mu stegs ya mtshan gyi blor 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-0: gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams kyis klu rnams zil @36a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-2: de nas yang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams la 'di ltar sgra sgrogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-3: chos lugs rgyal par gyur cig chos min rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-4: bden pa rgyal bar gyur cig rdzun pa rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-5: lha rnams rgyal bar gyur cig lha min rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-6: snang ba rgyal par gyur cig mun pa rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-7: sbyin pa rgyal bar gyur cig 'jungs pa rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-8: tshul khrims rgyal bar gyur cig gsod pa rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-9: sangs rgyas rgyal bar gyur cig mu stegs rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-10: brtan pa rgyal bar gyur cig g-yo ba rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-11: chos bzhin rgyal par gyur cig ngor sgyu rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-12: snying rje rgyal bar gyur cig brtse med rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-13: byams pa rgyal bar gyur cig khro ba rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-14: brgya byin rgyal bar gyur cig lha min rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-15: gong ma rgyal par gyur cig 'og ma rgyal ma gyur; ;bgrangs pa rgyal par gyur cig bkres pa rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-16: ye shes rgyal bar gyur cig gti mug rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-17: bya ba rgyal par gyur cig bya mi rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-18: brtson 'grus rgyal bar gyur cig le lo rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-19: skyes pa rgyal bar gyur cig bud med rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36a-20: rgan rabs rgyal bar gyur cig byis pa rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-0: @36b bzod pa rgyal bar gyur cig sdang ba rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-1: mi rnams rgyal bar gyur cig rab 'joms la sogs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-2: phung bar byed pa'i klu rnams rgyal bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-3: nyin mo rgyal par gyur cig mtshan mo rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-4: zla ba rgyal bar gyur cig gza' rnams rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-5: lo tog rgyal bar gyur cig brtsigs ma rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-6: bde ba rgyal par gyur cig bde min rgyal [?] ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-7: nad med rgyal bar gyur cig nad rnams rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-8: 'jam po rgyal par gyur cig rtsub po rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-9: thar pa rgyal bar gyur cig bcings pa rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-10: gzhung lugs rgyal bar gyur cig lugs min rgyal ma gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-11: gces pa rnams ni thams cad rab tu rgyal bar shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-12: gces min dag ni dus rnams kun tu bcom par shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-13: de ltar 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag rnga po che thogs nas lha rnams la rgyugs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-15: de nas lha rnams de dag gis smras pa thos nas mtshon cha dang go cha sna tshogs bgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-17: lha ma yin rnams lhan cig g-yul 'gyed par mig btsums pa tsam gyis tshad du der thams cad phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-18: de nas lha ma yin rnams kyis de dag la brtags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-19: 'di ltar dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:36b-20: bram zer 'dzin pa'i skye dgu 'byung ba snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-1: yin rnams kyis lha de dag mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-2: so 'og gzhan ga la bar thams cad du 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-3: gal te dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-4: bram zer mi 'dzin pa'i skye dbu 'byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-6: de dag lhan cig g-yul 'gyed par shom ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-7: de dag yud tsam zhig g-yul bkye nas lha rnams kyis pham par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-8: de nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-9: lha ma yin pham pa rnams dang lhan cig rang rang gi gnas su 'jug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-10: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-11: lha ma yin gyi g-yul mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-12: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-13: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de gnas gsum pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i lha ma yin me tog phreng ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-14: las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha ma yin gnas gsum pa gnas bzang du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-15: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37a-16: gang gis dus su sbyor ba'i don du gyad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-0: dga' 'dun par gyur pa dag la sbyin pa ngan pa byin pa de sems pa dang mi ldan zhing @37b zhing bzang po ma yin pa la byin pa de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba gnas gsum pa na gnas pa'i lha ma yin rnams kyis nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-1: de dag ni mi rnams kyi lo bdun brgya gang yin pa de dag gi nyin zhag gcig yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-2: bgrang ba de yi lo bdun stong thub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-3: dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-4: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-5: lha ma yin gyi bdag po me tog phreng gi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-6: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-7: 'di ltar sems pa dang mi ldan pa gang gis tshul khrims 'chal pa la zan gcig byin na las des lha ma yin gyi gnas zab par lha ma yin gyi bdag po bdud rtsi dri ma can za bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-8: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des gzhan bzhi pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-9: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas 'di ltar dud 'gror gtogs pa lha ma yin gyi gnas gzhan bzhi pa mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba dpag tshad nyi khri chig stong yod pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-10: de'i dbus na grong khyer mdzes pa zhes bya ba dpag tshad brgyad stong pa gcig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-11: gnas de'ang dpag tshad khri sum stong yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:37b-12: grong khyer de na lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro zhes bya ba gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-1: yin gnas pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming ni kun spro zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-3: rgyal po de'ang lha ma yin de dag pas stobs shin tu che ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-9: dbang po dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang grangs su mi rtsi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-10: brtson 'grus lhag pas rab tu rgyags pa thams cad sa'i 'og gi gting na gnas pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-11: de las 'og tu gyur pa ni gzhan gang yang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-12: de nor bu'i sa gzhi'i steng na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-13: de rtag par yid rab tu dga' zhing rtag tu spro la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-14: rtag par yid sna tshogs su shin tu phye ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-15: yul gyi srid pa sna tshogs la rnam par chags pa dag gnas gzhan bzhi pa grong khyer zab pa na shin tu bde bar gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-16: grong khyer de'ang kun nas padma'i rdzing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-19: bskyed pa'i sa dang; ra bas mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-20: rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pas brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-22: phan tshun bshes gnyen mi mthun pa dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-23: phan tshun 'khrug pa dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-25: nam mkha' gnyis pa lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38a-26: ji ltar nam mkha' la gza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-0: skar ma'i tshogs rnams du ma @38b dag gis mdzes par byas pa de ltar grong khyer de'ang kun nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-2: byed kun sems la rag las shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-3: 'bras bu sems la rag las mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-4: ji ltar sems ni sna tshogs ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-5: de lta bur ni 'bras bu'ang mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-7: thams cad sems kyis sna tshogs bris //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-8: sems kyis dbang du ma gyur gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-9: de ni gnas ni ye med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-10: yid ni thar dang bcings pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-11: gnyis kyi gzhi dang rgyu ru 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-12: dge ba yi ni skye bo 'grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-13: mi dges myur du 'ching bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-14: de ltar sems can sems kyi dbang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-16: sred pas rmongs pa'i sems can rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-17: sems kyi dbang du gyur nas 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-18: dmus long lam bzang mi mthong ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-20: ji ltar sems can de rnams kyis yang dag pa'i lam bsgrubs pa de ltar rgyu sna tshogs dang mthun par gyur pa'i gnas de sna tshogs su snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-21: 'di ltar gnas de grong khyer de'i phyi rol na 'dug pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-23: nye ba'i tshal dang; lteng ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-26: chu bo rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:38b-27: bya rnam pa brgya snyed kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-0: de'i gnas bzhi pa de na lha ma @39a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-1: yin gnas pa gang yin pa de dag kun spro zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-5: rgyan shin tu bzang bas lus brgyan pa rnams gnas pa; phan tshun yid la cung zad kyang 'khrug par mi byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-6: rtag tu yid la spro zhing dga' ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-8: rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-10: yang na stong du dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-12: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-13: gnas bzhi pa de'ang nor bu thogs pa'i bud med rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-14: lha ma yin kun spro rnams rtag tu lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro'i bka' shin tu nyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-16: de la bka' nyan pa'i ngo bo ni rtag tu dbang du gyur par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-17: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro'i las kyi rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-18: der las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-19: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-20: 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na log par lta ba la zhen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39a-21: las kyi 'bras bu mngon par mi shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-0: dge 'dun las phyir phyogs par gyur pa gang la re zhig @39b cig na dge slong tshul khrims dag dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-1: shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-2: lam du zhugs par gyur ba zhig gis nan gyis bsod snyoms gcig bslangs pa dang byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-3: byin nas kyang bdag gis bsod snyoms byin pa'i 'bras bu ni don med cing 'di las bdag gi chos su 'gyur ba'ang med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-4: log par rab tu byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-5: dmangs rigs 'di la bdag gis bsod snyoms sbyin pa 'di ni tshva sgo can la bsod snyoms byin par zad do zhes kyang smra la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-6: zhing 'ba' zhig yon tan dang ldan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-7: gzhan gyi ngo tshan gyis sbyin pa tsher ma can nyams pa byed pa des lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-9: rin po ches brgyan pa; g-yo ba med pa dag tu zhing shin tu yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-10: sems pas dngos po ma bzung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lha ma yin kun spro zhes bya ba rnams kyi bdag po rab spro zhes bya ba so sor 'gran pa lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:39b-11: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-0: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha ma yin kun spro zhes bya ba rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa @40a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-2: las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha ma yin gyi gnas su lha ma yin kun spro dag ji ltar skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-3: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-4: sred pa'i ro la zhen par gyur pa gang sems can yod pa'i tshal du gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-5: 'di ltar tshal de dag na sems can 'khod pa de rnams sus kyang ma bsdus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-6: gang gis kyang lhug par ma bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-7: bdag gis tshal 'dir bsdu bar bya'o snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-8: sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-9: bdag nyid kyi 'tsho ba sbrang rtsi dag 'dod pa'i phyir sdud par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-10: de lus dang bral nas lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-11: de'i 'tsho ba'i phyir sems can bsrungs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-12: kun spro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-13: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-14: lha ma yin g-yul 'gyed pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-15: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-16: 'di ltar klu'i gtso bo longs spyod ldan na gnas pa chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa mgo bdun yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-18: klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40a-20: klu'i rgyal po bzang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40b-0: klu'i rgyal @40b po ro ha ni dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40b-1: klu'i rgyal po sprin chen dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40b-4: klu'i rgyal po rab spro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40b-6: de dag ni chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:40b-7: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:42a-0: de nas gnas gsum pa na gnas pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang pos gnas bzhi pa la gnas pa'i lha ma @42a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:42a-9: de nas lha ma yin dpung bzang dag gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro la snga ma ji lta ba bzhin bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:42a-10: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spros lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag la 'di skad ces /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:42b-12: 'di ltar bdag ni rang gi lag mthu dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:42b-14: de nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod ring por ma thogs par rang gi lha ma yin rnams la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:43b-20: bram zer 'dzin pa'i skye dgu dag lha yul du skye la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:44b-1: dug nag po rnam par gdungs shing blo dman pa de rnams phan tshun g-yul 'gyed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:44b-5: de dag klu 'ba' zhig gis lha ma yin rnams pham par byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:44b-12: lha ma yin ga la ba 'khod pa der 'dong bar byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:44b-14: nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-4: lha ma yin rgya mtsho'i nang du g-yul 'gyed par 'gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-6: de nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams pham par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-7: de nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyi gnas ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-8: de nas lha ma yin gnas gzhan gnyis pa na gnas pa de dag rang gi phyogs mngon par bcom pa mngon du mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-9: bdag cag 'di na g-yul 'gyed par 'khod na lha ma yin rnams ci'i phyir 'bros /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-10: lha ma yin rnams ci'i phyir 'bros zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-11: de nas yang lha ma yin rnams g-yul 'gyed du lha rnams ga la ba der rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-13: lha ma yin rgya mtsho'i dbus su phan tshun mngon par gnod pa'i g-yul chen po 'khrug pa bkye bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-14: de nas gang gi tshe lha rnams rgyal ba de'i tshe lha rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi dpung mngon par bcom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-15: de'i tshe 'jigs pas bskor ba'i sa na gnas pa'i lha ma yin rnams lha rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45a-16: de nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi dpung mi bzad pa de dag mngon par mthong nas 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45b-0: de @45b nas lha ma yin rnams yang lha rnams ga la ba der g-yul 'gyed du dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45b-1: phan tshun g-yul chen po de dag bkye bar gyur to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45b-3: 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams kyis bdag cag mngon par gtses kyi rgyugs shig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45b-8: de nas lha de dag mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45b-9: yang lha ma yin rnams khros nas rgyugs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:45b-11: lha ma yin de rnams phan tshun spu zing zhes byed pa'i g-yul chen po bkye ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46a-3: lha phreng thogs rgyug par byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46a-16: lha'i phyogs ni rgyal bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46a-17: lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni pham par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46a-18: chos la rten pa shin tu legs par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46a-19: chos la mi rten pa lta ga la zhig 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46a-20: gang gi tshe de dag chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa byung ba de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi phyogs rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46a-21: lha ma yin gyi dpung de dag 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mngon par mthong nas lha rtag tu myos gnas ga la ba der dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46b-0: lha ma yin gyi @46b phyogs rnams rgyal bar gyur gyi rgyugs shig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46b-5: rnam par 'joms par byed pa gnod pa du ma byed pa de dag phan tshun g-yul mi bzad pa chen po bkye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46b-6: de nas gang gi tshe lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams pham par byas pa na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46b-8: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis lha ma yin de dag la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46b-12: lha dag nyung zhing 'di dag khyed cag las lhag pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46b-14: bdag cag gis lha rnams pham par bya yi; de lta bas na lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag slar log cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46b-16: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan las de skad thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46b-17: lha ma yin dag lha rnams dang g-yul 'gyed du phyir log go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:46b-19: lha ma yin de dag mtshon cha 'debs pa 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa du ma'i g-yul 'gyed par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-0: de'i tshe lha ma yin gnas gnyis @47a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-1: pa na gnas pa gnyis shing rtse ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-3: de dag gang gi tshe chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skye dgu byung ba de'i tshe /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-5: gal te chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-6: lha'i phyogs de dag gis lha ma yin gyi phyogs pham par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-7: de ltar lha rnams ni chos kyi gtso bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-9: chos la gzhol ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-10: lha ma yin de dag thams cad ni chos dang mi ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-11: chos ma yin pa la brten pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-12: chos kyis skyob pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-13: de nas lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te; kye ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-14: lha ma yin 'di dag gis bdag cag la de ltar gtse bar ci ste gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-15: 'di dag ni bdag cag las khyad zhugs pa'ang med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-17: dzambu'i gling na'ang da dung du mar 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-19: chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-20: rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-21: gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47a-24: bag yod pa la bag yod par gnas pa'i mi dag yong de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-0: de ltar bag yod pa la bag yod par gnas pa @47b de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-1: lha ma yin gyi chos 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-2: chos 'byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-3: de dag gis de ltar rig nas kun tu rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-6: rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams chos kyi rgyal mtshan khyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-7: lha ma yin gyi dpung ga la ba der lha de dag thams cad rig ma thogs par rgyug par byed cing 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams sdod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-9: khyed cag gis nged rnams la ci'i phyir gtse /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-10: nged cag las khyed kyi dpung khyad zhugs pa'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-11: gtso bo'ang ma yin; mtshon cha'ang mi mang bas nged cag 'di rnams ni khyed rnams gzhom pa'i phyir lhags pa yin gyi yang sa'i 'og tu ma 'gro zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-12: mngon par gtse bar byed pa'i blo can chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa 'di dag thams cad la bde ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-13: mya ngan las 'das pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-15: klu nor rgyas kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-16: 'jog po la sogs pa dang lhan cig de dag thams cad bdag nyid thams cad las mtshon cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-17: lag cha char ltar 'bebs shing lha ma yin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-18: de nas klu rnams kyang me rab tu 'bar ba char ltar 'bebs shing lha ma yin ga la ba der rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:47b-19: de nas lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang klu de dag la mngon par brtags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48a-1: zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i klu rab 'joms la sogs pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48a-2: 'di ltar khyed kyang bdag cag gi phyogs yin gyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48a-6: klu de dag gis kyang me'i char chen po 'bebs la lha dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48a-11: de nas sgra gcan gyis de dag mthong nas yang 'di ltar bdag 'di na gnas na lha ma yin khyed cag rnams la ci zhig gnod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48a-12: bdag gcig bus lha rnams dbang po dang bcas pa bcom ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48a-13: lha'i 'jig rten thams cad bdag cag gir bya na khyed dang 'khod pas lta ci smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48a-14: lha'i dbung 'di dag kyang chen po ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-0: 'di ltar bdag gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po @48b brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-3: thags bzang ris dag la sbran la bdag nyid kyis lha rnams las rgyal bar bya'o zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-4: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-6: lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-7: lha ma yin gyi dbang bo thags bzang ris ga la ba der rings par song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-8: de dag la 'di ltar lha 'di dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-9: rgyal chen bzhi pa thams cad bdag cag gi phyir 'ong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-10: lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'di dag kun shes nas lan bya ba gang yin pa la so sor soms shig ces smras so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-12: gang gis lha ma yin rnams 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir khyod song zhig ces smras so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-14: lha ma yin gyi g-yul ga la ba der bdag nyid g-yul 'gyed du song ste; de dag mthong nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po de lha ma yin rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:48b-18: lha ma yin rnams lha'i stobs rab tu che ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49a-2: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan lha rnams ga la ba der mtshon cha dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49a-4: de nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan de ltar rgyug pa mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49a-5: klu de dag kyang lhan cig tu me char ltar mngon par 'bebs shing lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba der sgra gcan gzhom pa'i phyir rgyug par byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49a-14: gal te chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dag byung ba de'i tshe lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams pham par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49a-16: lha ma yin gyi g-yul chen po 'gyed pa ni chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49a-17: chos ma yin pa kho na la rag las pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49a-18: de nas gang gi tshe lha ma yin rgyal zhing lha pham par gyur pa de'i tshe lha rnams phan tshun du /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49b-2: de nas chos yid la byas shing chos la dad pa bskyed pa'i lha rnams yang lha ma yin ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49b-3: de nas chos kyis bskyabs pa'i lha rnams gzi brjid brgya 'gyur du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49b-4: de ltar de dag gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49b-5: lha ma yin shin tu sgyid lug pa rnams la lha ma yin gyi dbang pos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49b-8: 'di dag ni bdag cag las gzi brjid dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49b-12: phal che ba khyad zhugs pa med de /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49b-18: lha ma yin de dag phan tshun 'dres nas g-yul 'gyed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:49b-22: skyob pa rnams kyi nang na chos skyob pa mchog yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-2: 'di skad ces lha ma yin dag ci ste 'bros /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-3: lha ma yin 'di dag mi ngan pa'i sar ci ste gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-4: lha dang lha ma yin du ma'i nang na dpa' bo ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-5: lag cha thogs pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-6: mtshon chas 'jigs pa ma yin gyi phyir log ste 'khod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-7: 'di dag gis ci ste gnod ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-8: de nas de'i tshe de thos nas yang lha ma yin rnams g-yul 'gyed du phyir log go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-9: de nas yang des gzengs bstod cing mgu bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-10: nga rgyal gyis khengs pa rnams lha rnams ga la ba der g-yul bkye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-12: de nas sgra gcan ni lha ma yin de dag kun gyi dang po kho na la 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-13: de dang po kho nar 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-15: des skyob de 'khor ba'i lha ma yin de dag thams cad rgyal chen bzhi'i lha ga la ba der sgra gcan gyi mthu la rten pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-16: stobs skyes pa dag rgyug par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-17: 'di ltar bdag cag gi lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'di dang po kho na la zhugs pas lha rnams dbang po dang bcas pa'ang thub par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-18: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha 'ba' zhig lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50a-19: de nas yang phan tshun rtog cing mtshon cha'i tshogs kyis rgyun gcig la gcig 'debs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-0: sgra gcan yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal bar bya zhing lha @50b rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir lha ga la 'khod pa der rdo ri tsam 'phen cing gnod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-2: de ltar lha rnams la rdo char ltar 'bebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-3: 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-4: lha rnams la sgra gcan 'di ni rdo char ltar 'bebs pas bdag cag la mngon par gnod par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-6: lag cha char ltar dbab pa rnams kyis de bzlog cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-7: 'di ltar yang lha rnams la gnod pa med par mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-8: de dag la 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis 'di skad smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-9: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba der sgra gcan dag pham par bya ba'i phyir khro ba'i shugs kyis rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-11: 'jig rten skyong ba dag shin tu spu zing zhes byed pa rdo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-12: lag char bsres pa'i g-yul bkye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-13: rdo char ltar 'bebs pa des rgya mtsho kun nas rab tu 'khrug par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-14: lha'i rdo char ltar 'bebs pa rnams kyis kyang de ltar rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i sems can 'bum phrag du ma dag gsod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-17: kun nas rgya mtsho'i dpung 'khrug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-18: de nas sgra gcan de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-19: 'jig rten skyong ba dag g-yul chen por bkye ba lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:50b-20: lha ma yin rnams kyis mngon par mthong nas ngo mtshar cher skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-0: g-yul 'gyed pa rnams kyi nang na 'di ni g-yul chen po yin no zhes @51a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-2: de nas gang gi tshe chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag byung ba de'i cho lag cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-4: 'jigs par bya ba kun med kyis kyang; lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan pham par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-5: gal te chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag byung ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-6: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan mngon par mtho bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-7: lha rnams ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-8: de ltar 'di dag thams cad ni gtso bo las gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-9: glo bur ba ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-10: de nas gang gi tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dpung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-12: pham par gyur pa de'i tshe lha ma yin shin tu yi chad pa rnams kyis yang smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-13: lha ma yin 'di dag ci ste 'bros /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-14: rgud pa'i chos mang po sgrub pa ni bdag cag rgud par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-15: nyon mongs pa des chog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-17: bdag cag rang gi gnas rnams su'ang bde ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-18: lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du'ang yid bde ba'i ngo bor mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-19: blo de lta bu ma byed par blo mthu rtsal dang bcas par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-20: rang gi gnas su 'gro ma 'dod par slar log cig //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51a-22: de nas tshig de thos nas yang lha ma yin thams cad 'jig rten skyong ba dag ga la ba der g-yul 'gyed du brgyugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-0: de nas yang phan tshun lhan cig rdo mtshungs pa med pa char @51b ltar 'bebs shing ri'i rtse mor glog char ltar 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-1: yul ngan du byas par spu shin tu zing zhes byed pa'i g-yul bkye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-2: de nas yang lha'i dpung gis lha ma yin gyi dpung pham par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-3: de nas yang lha ma yin de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-5: lha 'di rnams mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-6: 'di ltar bdag cag rang gi mthu bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-7: de bdag cag gi don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-9: phan par bya ba'i phyir gnas gnyis pa na gnas pa skar phreng gi bdag po lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa la skyabs su dong bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-10: lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa de ni rang bzhin gyis brtan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-12: lha ma yin rnams kyis g-yul du dbang po dang bcas par brgya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-13: yang na stong du stobs kyis rgyal ba yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-14: de nas de ltar lha ma yin gyi gtso bo de dag thams cad lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-15: de nas de dag thams cad kyis lha ma yin gyis dbang po brtan pa de la 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-17: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag 'di ltar lha'i phyogs stobs rab tu che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-18: lha ma yin sgra gcan dang bcas pa rnams kyis phyir brgal bar mi nus pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:51b-19: lha ma yin gyi dbang pos lha ma yin rnams kyi dpung bgyi ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-0: pha rol gzhom pa'i phyir de @52a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-1: dag nges par bgyi ba'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-2: khyod kyi lag na mtshon cha yod pas lha dag dbang po dang bcas pa yang bdag cag la phyir rgol bar mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-4: lha ma yin rnams kyis g-yul du rgyal ba mang du brnyes pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-5: lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag nges par bzlog tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-6: lag na mtshon cha chen po thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-8: mthu rtsal bskyed cing lha rnams pham par bgyi ba'i phyir bzlog tu gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-9: khyod kyis brgya byin nyid kyang brgya stong du pham par bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-10: lha de rnams khyod kyis mthu rtsal gyis pham par bgyis pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-11: de nas brtan pas lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag las tshig de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-12: lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng ga la ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-14: rab dgod ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-15: lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-16: lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i phyogs sgra gcan dang bcas pa lha rnams kyis pham par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-17: lha rnams ni stobs rab tu che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-18: stobs rab tu che bas bzod par dka' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-19: lha ma yin rnams kyis bzod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-20: g-yul 'gyed par rgyal bar bgyi ba'i phyir de gnang bar mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52a-21: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-0: rab dgod kyis @52b lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa de la 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-1: lha ma yin gyi dbang po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-2: bdag cag 'di dag khyed kyi grogs su 'khod pa yin gyi khyod song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-4: bdag cag gis grogs byas pas khyod dang sgra gcan dang bcas pas lha thams cad las kyang rgyal bar nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-5: de nas tshig de thos nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa de lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba der g-yul 'gyed pa'i phyir song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-6: de nas lha ma yin rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa de mthong nas shin tu mgu zhing mthu rtsal skyes pa rnams lha rnams ga la ba der mtshon cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-8: mda' dag 'phen cing 'debs pa na thams cad lha ma yin gyi dbang po gnyis dang lhan cig lha rnams ga la ba der rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-9: de nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin de dag mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-12: 'di ltar yang dang yang du bdag cag rnams kyis pham par bya 'dod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-13: de nas yang brtson 'grus la dmigs nas dud 'gro'i 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis pham pa rnams yang 'ong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-14: de nas de ltar rig nas lha shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:52b-16: lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa de dag thams cad lha ma yin ga la ba de nyid du 'gros shin tu myur bar 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-1: ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-2: sgra gcan gyis 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-3: lha rnams bdag cag gi steng du 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-5: bdag cag gis de dag nges par g-yul 'di gnyis kyi bar du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-7: de nas de skad smras ma thag tu lha ma yin gyi dbang po brten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-8: sgra gcan phan tshun rgyal bar 'dod pa dag lhan cig tu rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-9: de nas lha rnams ni nyi ma nub pa'i phyogs su lta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-10: lha ma yin rnams ni shar ba'i phyogs su lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-11: de ltar shar ba'i 'od zer gyi mthu des mig rab tu nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-12: de nas lha ma yin gyi mtshon cha char ltar 'bebs pa rnams kyis lha rnams la dbab par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-13: de nas lha ma yin mig bsgribs pa rnams phan tshun du 'di ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis mig rab tu nyams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-14: bdag cag gis lha rnams la brgal bar mi nus so zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-15: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyi rang gi lag pas nyi ma sgrib par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-16: 'di'ang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i rgyu gsum pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-17: de'i tshe rgyu mi shes pa'i rtog ge ba rnams 'di ltar lo legs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53a-19: char cher legs bar 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-1: rgyal po la rung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-2: rgyal po la mi rung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-4: skye bo 'jig par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-5: de ltar bstan bcos ngan pas bslus pa rnams gzhan du rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-6: de ltar sgra gcan des nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de bsgribs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-7: 'od zer yang bzlog nas blta bar bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-8: lha rnams mngon par mthong nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-11: lha ma yin rnams bde bar mthong gi pha rol pham par bya ba la 'bod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-12: de nas lha ma yin rnams mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams char ltar mngon par 'bebs shing lha rnams ga la ba der brtan pas sna drangs nas rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-13: lha rnams kyis kyang de dag mthong nas mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-14: lha ma yin ga la ba der rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-15: de nas phreng thogs kyi lha rnams ga la ba der brtan pa de dag rgyug cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-16: de dag mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis char mngon par 'bebs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-17: phreng thogs kyi lha rnams kyis de dag mngon par mthong nas 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-18: lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-21: 'di ltar khyed lha rnams kyis lan du ma zhig tu pham par byas kyang khyed chos la so sor rig par mi byed rnam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-22: nged ni chos kyi tshul dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:53b-23: chos la gzhol; chos la sgrub pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-0: nged ni chos ma spangs pas @54a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-2: khyed ni brnab sems kyis gnod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-3: gzhan gyi rdzas la rang gir bya ba'i brnab sems yod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-4: brnab sems mang ba de ni khyed yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-5: chos ma yin pa dang ldan par gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-6: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang yang dag par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-7: chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i lha rnams ji ltar pham par byar 'dod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-8: mun pas ni snang gsal chen po rnams kyang zil gyis gnon par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-9: de nas rnam pa 'di dag smras pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-10: brtan pas de dag la 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-11: kye; mang du smra ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-12: khyed kyi 'byor pa la nged rnams kyang smon pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-13: lha ma yin gyi dbang po thogs bzang ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-14: rab dgod la sogs pa bzhi po 'di dag gi dpung bshams pa rnams kyis lha thams cad pham par bya ba'i phyir 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-15: nged ni khyod kyi 'byor pa la dga' ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-17: phreng thogs kyi lha ga la ba der rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-18: de 'ong bar mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-19: ji ltar de'i lus kyi ngo bo shin tu phra ba'ang mi mngan pa de ltar mda' sna tshogs char ltar phab bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-20: de ltar brtan pa mtshon cha'i char gyi nang du chud nas kyang phreng thogs kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54a-21: las kyis bcom zhing sgrub pa brnab sems mang po 'di cir dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-0: chos ma yin pas ni nam yang chos zil @54b gyis mnan pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-1: nged ni khyed la cung zad kyang 'tshe bar mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-2: nged la ci ste gnod pa byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-3: de de skad smras pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-4: lha de dag ga la ba der rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-5: de nas phreng thogs kyi lha rnams kyis klu de dag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-6: dpung don med pas khengs pa 'di khyed kyis me'i char mngon par phob shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-7: 'on kyang dpung gi mthu 'di nyams par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-9: klu'i rgyal po 'jog pos phyogs gcig tu klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la me'i char phab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-10: brtan pa ga la ba der rgyug par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-11: me'i char mngon par phab pa na de lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa ga la ba der brgyugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-12: de nas lha ma yin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-13: klu de dag me'i char chen po'i nang du chud par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-14: de nas de dag la me'i char mngon par phab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-15: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ri dpag tshad bcu ba gcig blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-16: phreng thogs kyi lha rnams ga lba ba der rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-17: de 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas lha lag na yol go thogs pa dag ri bsreg pa'i phyir me'i char mngon par 'bebs shing rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-18: de nas me'i char des ri de thams cad bsregs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-19: de ltar de bsreg par rig nas brtan pa de mthu nyams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-20: lha de rnams la 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:54b-21: 'di ltar bdag gis ri rab tu 'bar ba gzhan thams cad steng du dbab bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:55a-0: de nas lha ma yin rnams @55a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:55a-1: kyis ri rab tu 'bar ba gzhan zhig de'i drung du khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:55a-2: de nas brtan pa des de khyer nas lha rnams kyi steng du 'phangs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:59b-17: ci lha de rnams kyi brgya byin 'ongs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:59b-19: lha ma yin rnams kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:59b-21: de nas rab dgod khros pa'i mig dmar pos rang gi dpung la lta zhing 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:59b-22: rgyal chen bzhi ba dag nyi tshes gnas gsum du gtogs pa'i lha ma yin rnams pham par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:59b-23: dpung dang mthu nyams par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:59b-24: brtson pa med par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:59b-26: lha ma yin rnams lha'i ris nyi tshe gang gis dpung dang mthu nyams par byas pa de'i phyir 'di ltar nga chas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:59b-27: lha thams cad pham par bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60a-8: brgya byin du bcas pa nga gcig pus thub par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60a-9: nga ni bdag bar ma dor pham par mi 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60a-10: gang lha'i brtson 'grus dpung dang lhan pa dag lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams la lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60a-13: de skad smras nas thags bzang ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60a-14: rab dgod de dag rnga sgra 'byin cing lha ma yin rnams rgyugs shig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60a-17: lha ma yin thams cad 'byor bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid cha'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60a-18: des de skad ces bsgo nas shing rta 'khor lo rtsibs 'bum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60a-19: lha ma yin gyi 'od nyi ma lta bu bye ba phrag du ma dag chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60a-26: ri rab tu bcas pa g-yo ba nas legs par mthong gi tshal na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i mdun sa chos bzang na 'dug pa'i stan gyi bar du g-yo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-0: bdag gi stan yang g-yo ba las na @60b gor ma chag par lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-1: lha ma yin g-yul 'gyed par 'gyur te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-7: ri ngos dang bcas pa thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-8: ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'di'ang rab tu g-yo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-9: brgya byin des de ltar rig nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-11: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-14: thags bzang ris dag lha rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir cha zhing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-15: de'i phyir bdag nyid kyang 'di ltar glang po ches srung gi bu la zhon te; lha thams cad dang lhan cig tu lha dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-17: gang gi phyir rab dgong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-18: thags bzang ris kyi g-yul 'gyed pa gang yin pa der lha 'dug pa ni ngas ma mthong ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-21: lha'i mdun sa chos bzang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-22: grong khyer blta na sdug na gnas pa rnams la'ang bsgo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-26: sum mdo dag tu 'ang 'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin de ni lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-27: lha ma yin gyi g-yul 'gyed par 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-29: thags bzang ris dag ga la ba de nyid du thams cad 'dong bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:60b-30: de nas de dag la de skad smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-2: shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-3: mtshon cha thams cad yod pa der lha brgya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-6: bye ba mtshon cha don du gnyer ba de dag shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-7: de dag rgyug pa na rgya mtsho drug pa lta bu'i sgra byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-8: lha rnams phan tshun 'dong ba shin tu brtul ba'i rdul gang gis nam mkha' yog par gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-9: de ltar de dag mtshon cha rnams blangs nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba rnams ni nam mkha' la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-10: skam sa la rgyu ba rnams ni skam sa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-11: ri'i rtse mo la rgyu ba rnams ni ri'i rtse mo kun tu gang nas 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-13: nags tshal dag na gnas shing rtser dong ba'i lha gang yin pa de dag kyang rnga sgra thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-14: shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal ga la ba der rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-15: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i 'dod pa kun kyang btang nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-16: thams cad rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-19: go mtshon rab tu mang po brgya 'am /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-23: de dag thams cad brgya byin shin tu mthong bar 'dod cing 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61a-24: de nas brgya byin gyis de dag gi nyam drod rig nas lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed cing shing rta rab tu mang po la zhon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-0: shing rta kha cig ni rin po che sna @61b bdun gyis brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-1: kha cig ni gser gyis brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-2: kha cig ni dngul gyis brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-3: kha cig ni bee d'uryas brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-4: kha cig ni shel gyis brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-5: kha cig ni spug la sogs pa'i rin po che chen po rnams kyis brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-6: kha cig ni nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-7: dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas gtibs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-9: las kyi mchog ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-10: rang gi gzi brjid kyis rtag tu mdzes pa na kha cig ni gser gyi ri rab kyi rtse mo dag khyab par gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-12: stong snyed kha cig ni nam mkha' la dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-13: lha'i dbang po lha ma yin rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir nam 'gro zhig gu snyam nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-16: 'thab pa la yid zhugs pa thams cad 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-17: de dag de ltar 'khod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-18: lha'i dbang pos glang po'i kha lo sgyur ba ma ta li la bsgo ba /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-21: rang gi 'dod pas sprul pa'i padma'i tshal na glang po ches srung gi bu glang po che mang pos yongs su bskor ba ga la ba der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:61b-22: de nas glang po che cang shes de la 'di skad smras so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62a-2: lha ma yin gyi g-yul du khyod la zhon nas lha ma yin rnams pham par bya'o zhes gsung ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62a-4: lha'i mdun sa chos bzang ga la ba der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62a-5: der 'ongs pa dang ma ta lis brgya byin la smras pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62a-10: so re re la padma'i rdzing bu bcu bcu /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62a-12: padma re re la ri bo bcu bcu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62a-13: ri bo re re la bog ri brgya brgya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62a-14: bog ri re re la lha mo brgya brgya /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62a-18: glang po che'i dbang po de'ang lus kun nas dpag tshad stong yod do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-1: de nas de 'gro ba mngon par mthong nas /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-4: lus la rgyan sna tshogs ni btags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-7: sgra di ri ri 'don pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-8: rab tu dga' ba'i yid rnam pa du ma phyir zhing yid rab tu dga' bar gyur to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-17: lha ma yin gyi g-yul ga la ba der 'jug par byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-22: lha rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir rab dgod dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-24: 'di ltar rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu dkrugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-25: ri bor gtogs pa stong rab tu g-yo bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-26: lha ma yin rnams sgra 'jebs par 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-27: shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra thos so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:62b-29: klu dag kyang mthu chung bar gyur /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63a-3: klu'i rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa rab 'joms la sogs pa ni shin tu dga' nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63a-5: klu'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa 'jog po dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63a-13: lag na yol go thogs pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63a-22: lha'i dbang pos de dag la smras pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63a-26: thags bzang ris dag chas pa'i phyir bdag kyang de dag chad pas gcad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63b-0: lha de rnams kyi skyabs @63b dang; dpung bya ba'i phyir 'di ltar bdag 'gro bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63b-6: bdag ni chos ma yin pa la mi dga' la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63b-7: chos ma yin pa la yid kyang mi 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63b-8: de ltar bdag cag yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa rnams la rnam yang thub par mi 'gyur gyis /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63b-19: dam pa'i chos la dga' ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63b-27: ye shes la goms par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63b-28: de la yid zhugs par byed pa dag yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63b-29: bdag gis kyang chos dang mthun pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin can bsgrubs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63b-30: de dag dang bdag cag nyung gis kyang lha ma yin du gtogs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:63b-31: de skad smras nas lha'i dbang po bee d'urya'i ri ga la ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-0: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ga la ba @64a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-2: de dag mngon par mthong nas lha'i dbang pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-4: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha 'di dag 'khod pa ni lha ma yin rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir 'khod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-5: lha'i dbang pos de skad smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-6: 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis slar smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-7: 'di ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i lha 'di dag ni brgya byin khyod la rten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-9: khyod la gnas pa kho na lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-10: lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshogs dang bcas pa'ang rtsis la ma chags par bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-11: de skad smras pa na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams brgya byin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-12: lha'i dbang po brgya byin sngon du 'dren pa dang bcas par rgyal bar sbyon cig ces gsong por smra zhing bstod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-13: de lha'i tshogs kyis bstod cing rgyal chen bzhi'i lha ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-16: rin po che sna bdun gyis ni mdzes par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:64a-17: nam mkha' ltar rtag tu lus 'od kyis ni gsal bar byas /
