K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:101b-23: de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:101b-25: nye ba'i tshal de rnams su lha mo yid du 'ong ba rgyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-0: spud pa sna tshogs thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i bde ba @102a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-2: srid pa'i yul la rnam par chags shing dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-3: yul drug la blo shin tu chags pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-4: chu'i nang na nya rgya'i gseb tu nya chud de nya rgyas bsdus pa ltar bde bas nam cung zad kyang skyo bar mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-5: de ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las ma zad pa de srid du de na lha'i bde ba rnam pa du ma la spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-6: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-7: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-9: dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-10: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-11: de rang gi las dang rgyu mthun par ded dpon chen por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-12: shin tu 'byor ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-13: rgyal pos kyang bkur bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-14: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-15: lha phreng thogs kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-16: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas gang na lha 'khod pa tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-17: nye ba'i tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-18: de dag las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-19: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102a-20: tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-0: dge @102b 'dun la zhing du shes pa gang gis chos gos bya ba'i phyir se 'bru gcig phul la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-2: yang du sems kyis yongs su spel bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-4: bdag nyid la bdag nyid rab tu dga' bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-5: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-6: nye ba'i tshal gyi nang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-7: der skyes nas de lha'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-8: nye ba'i tshal na ni gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-9: bdag nyid gar dga' mgur ni 'chag cing 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-10: chu la'ang mi nub par 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-12: thang la 'gro ba bzhin du 'gro la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-13: de bzhin du bar snang la'ang thogs pa med par 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-14: de ji skad bstan pa'i gnas rnams su lha'i phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-16: shin tu bde ba dang ni ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-17: rang dga' nyams bag tu gnas shing dga' bar ni byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-21: lteng ka nyams su dga' zhing shin tu dri zhim pa sna tshogs kyi nang na lha mo'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-22: nyi ma gnyis pa ltar rang gi gzi brjid kyis 'bar zhing lha'i bde ba rang gis byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-23: rgyu'i stobs dang 'brel ba la nye bar spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-24: gzhan gyis byas la gzhan spyod pa ni med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-25: rang gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-26: las kyis nges par 'byung ba'i srog chags rnams legs par byas pas ni lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:102b-27: mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-1: ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-3: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-4: legs par byas pa'i las kyis der skyes pa de ji srid du legs par byas pa'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na bde ba la spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-5: de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-6: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-8: dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-9: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-10: de las de dang rgyu mthun par skye bo tshal na gnas pa rnams kyi nang na 'byor pa dang ldan zhing gzhan gyis gnod pa med la rang dgar longs spyod par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-11: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-12: lha phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas bcu ma lus par brtags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-13: lha gzhan lag na yol go thogs zhes bya ba dag la rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-14: lha de rnams kyi gnas gang na gnas pa rang dga' zhing rang gi yid dang mthun par 'dod pa ji tsam yod snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-15: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-16: 'di ltar lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas kyang bcu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-18: padma'i nang na rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103a-19: bung ba'i sgra snyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-7: lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas ni bcu po 'di dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-8: sa de rnams na lha dag las so sor byas pa gang gis lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-9: tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa sems bsgoms pa'i yid dang ldan pa gang gis sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-11: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum brjod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-12: de der mthar shin tu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i las skyed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-13: mi'i gnas skabs kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de nam 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lus dang bral na bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyis gnas padma'i nang na rgyu ba zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-14: der skyes nas kyang de'i gnas de ni yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i ro shin tu zhim pa la chags pa'i mig mi 'dzums pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-15: lus nyi ma ltar gsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-18: yid du 'ong ba la mngon par dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-19: bya chu skyar gyi mdog lta bu'i padma kun gyis mdzes par byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-20: padma de dag nam yang zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:103b-21: padma re re las kyang lha'i dri dpag tshad tsam du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-3: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dri rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-4: bung ba kha dog sna tshogs can kha cig gser gyi bya lta bur 'dug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-5: kha cig ma he'i mig gi mdog lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-6: kha cig bee d'urya'i mdog lta bur 'dug pa dag sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-7: de'i khyad par ni mi rnams kyis legs par bslabs pa'i pi wang gi sgra 'byin pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-8: shin tu snyen cing lhag par dga' bar byed pa'i sgra kun tu gang bar 'byung ba dag 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-9: de ci'i phyir zhe na; lha'i 'dod pa la mi yis dper byar med pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-10: mi gang gis kyang lha'i sgra mnyan par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-13: 'dod chags dang bral ba ma gtogs par de la mi'i 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-14: 'di ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba ni stobs dang ldan la dbang po rnams kyang stobs dang ldan pas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-15: mi'i 'dod pa la spyod par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-16: 'di ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba de'i dbang po dga' bar 'gyur ba'ang med la g-yo ba'ang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-17: 'di ltar de na bung ba'i sgra 'byung ba dag des mnyan par nus sa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-18: dud 'grong gyur pa sems rmongs par gyur pa rnams kyi sgra'ang de lta bu yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104a-19: 'dod pa las sems chags pa'i lha'i tshogs rnams kyi glu dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-0: sgra lta smos @104b kyang ci dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-2: 'di ltar sgra la chags par byed pa la'ang skyo bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-6: reg bya rnams kyis kyang de dang mi mthun par skyo bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-7: de ltar de sgo du ma de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-8: sred pa'i sgo'i thabs du ma'i bde ba de dag la ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las mtho ris su skyes pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-9: de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-10: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-11: yi dvags dang; dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-12: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-13: de las de dang rgyu mthun par grong khyer du grong gi bdag po shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-15: gzhan du'ang rgyu dang rkyen de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-16: gzhi des mthar mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-17: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-18: lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-19: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas bung ba'i sgra snyan zhes bya bar ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-20: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-21: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:104b-22: tshul khrims dang ldan zhing shes rab dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-0: @105a *// sems pas bsgoms pa'i snying rje dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-1: snying rjes brlan pa'i yid sems can la phan par zhugs pas mchod rten la rol mo'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-3: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas bung ba'i sgra snyan du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-4: der skyes nas kyang rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa de sil snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-9: nyams dga' ba rnams pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba la spyod pa padma'i dris myos pa'i lha mo glu dbyangs thos na yid 'phrog par byed pa'i dbyangs la ni nyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-10: bde bar gnas pa'i kun dga' ra ba na nye bar spyod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs du ma dag ni dbyangs kyi sgra 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-11: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'dres pa'i dri'i ngad kyis ni lus la reg cing zhim pa du mas mdzes par byas pa'i ri rab kyi rtse mo rnams la sdug pa thos na shin tu dga' bar byed pa rnams dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-12: gnas la dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-13: de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod pa mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-14: dge slong dge ba'i las la bstod cing 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-15: las 'di dang ni lha yi yul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-16: gsum gyi them pa'i skas su 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105a-17: de la 'dzeg pa'i mi rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-0: lha yul bde ba 'byung bar @105b 'gro ;ngag la rnam pa bzhi bsdams te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-1: lus las byung ba rnam gsum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-2: them skas bdun la 'dzegs nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-3: lha yul gsum du 'gro bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-4: tshul khrims spyod pa shin tu bde //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-5: nor spyod de ltar bde ba min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-6: nor gyis mi ni 'gri ba byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-7: tshul khrims kyis ni 'grib mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-8: des ni mi dag legs par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-9: so so dag tu'ang de mdzes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-10: de bas mtho ris 'gro ba la; ;thub mchog rnams kyis dge bar bsngags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-11: skyes bu dge ba spyod pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-12: skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-13: lha yi 'jig rten du mar de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-14: bde ba rnams kyi 'byung khung mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-15: rang gi lus las byung ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-16: 'od kyis de dga' bar ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-17: rang gi las kyis bkur ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-18: mtho ris gnas na dga' bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-19: rtag tu dga' bar gnas pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-20: rtag tu bde bar gnas pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-21: lha gang yin pa lha yi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-22: de na tshul khrims byed rgyu yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-23: tshul ldan de yi tshul khrims ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-24: du ma'ang legs par bsrungs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-26: de bas tshul khrims rtag tu spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-27: tshul khrims mtho ris skas yin la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-28: bde rgyu 'byung ba'i gnas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-29: tshul khrims spangs pa'i mi dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-30: gang du'ang bde ba mi 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-31: tshul khrims chu ni dang ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-32: kun tu rnam par gang ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-33: khrus byas mi dag lha yi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:105b-35: lha yi phreng ba rgyan rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-2: de kun dge ba'i rgyu las byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-3: lha yi gnas na dga' bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-4: gang zhig lha mos yongs bskor dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-5: gang zhig nyi zla 'dra ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-6: de kun dge ba'i rgyu las byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-7: lha dag lha yi nang na dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-8: gang zhig bsams na 'byung byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-9: byung nas kyang ni 'grib med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-11: de kun dge ba'i rgyu las byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-12: gang zhig tshul khrims rjes su 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-13: bde ba dag ni grangs med la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-14: thams cad du ni 'phel byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-16: rtag tu dge ba spyod pa'i mi; ;rgyal pos kyang ni rtag tu bkur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-17: dge bas mi ni dge bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-18: de bas tshul khrims rtag tu spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-19: dge ba spyod pa rtag tu dul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-20: 'byung po kun la snying brtse mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-21: rtag tu sbyin dang byams ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-23: srog gcod pa las ldog pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-24: sems can kun la snying brtse mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-25: yang dag las kyi mtha' ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-27: ma byin cung zad len mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-28: sbyin la'ang de ni rtag tu dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-29: blo ldan blo gros dbang po zhi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-31: gang zhig log par g-yem dang bral; ;yang dag lam la rtag tu dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-32: mya ngan 'das la som nyi med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-33: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-34: gang zhig 'thungs na skyes bu dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106a-35: yid la mi dga' mang byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-0: chad spangs @106b shin tu bstan pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-1: lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-2: bde ba du ma bskyed byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-3: thams cad dbugs ni 'byin byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-4: tshul khrims legs par spyad bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-5: nyes pa byas pa'ang rnam par spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-6: de ltar dge slong des bde ba 'byung ba rnams pa du ma dag mngon par mthong nas bung ba sgra snyan gyi lha rnams la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-7: de ltar lha de dag lha'i 'jig rten du gtogs pa'i bung ba mang po rnams kyis sgra snyan pa 'byin pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-8: ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa zad par ma gyur ba de srid du sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-10: reg bya khyad par 'du sdug pa dag myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-11: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-13: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-14: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-15: de las de dang rgyu mthun par me tog gi phreng ba bzang po thogs shing rtag tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-16: gnod pa med pa gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-18: longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:106b-19: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnams par smin pa shes pa de lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-0: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi @107a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-1: gnas sgra la chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-2: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-3: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-4: tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing sems shin tu bsgoms pa gang gis sangs rgyas gzi byin dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa la gdugs phul na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-5: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sgra la chags pa zhes bya ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-6: der skyes nas kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan pa de gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-8: bee d'u rya'i ri rnam pa sna tshogs la rgyu ba dag la bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-9: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba 'khor dang bcas pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyi ri'i rtse mo rnams su rgyu zhing rol mo'i tshal zhes bya ba'i tshal der 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-11: gos gyon pa me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-13: byug pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dris rnam par brgyan pa des res 'ga' spos kyi tshal zhes bya ba shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i tshal du'ang 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-14: tshal de na chu bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107a-18: shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-0: rnam pa ji tsam du bya 'dab chags kyis mdzes par byas pa'i rnam pa de tsam du 'od gang @107b gis sdug pa lta bur lha'i 'od stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-1: 'od kyi rnam pa gzhan yang sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-4: tshal de kha dog bzang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-5: las kyi mtha' spyad pa la zhugs pa'i tshal de na me tog du mas bsgos pa dri shin tu zhim pa'i dri ngad ngad por rdzi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-6: gang gi tshe rdzi des lo ma de dag la phog par gyur pa de'i tshe rdzis phog pa'i lo ma phan tshun reg pa las rol mo'i sgra 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-7: de'i khyad par ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na spyod pa'i rol mo dag gis bcu drug gi char yang mi phod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-8: gang gi tshe lo ma re re la phog pa de'i tshe'ang rol mo'i sgra shin tu chags su rung ba dag 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-9: de sil snyan yan lag lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-10: yul shin tu nyams dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis myos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-11: de nas yang lo ma'i rol mo'i sgra des sred pa la chags shing dga' ba bag med pa brgya snyed la gnas par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-14: sgras bslus pa de; ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-18: reg bya khyad par du sdug pa dag myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-19: de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:107b-20: shi nas byang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-2: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-3: de las de dang rgyu mthun par rol mo la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur zhing nor dang; 'bru dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-5: chung ma shin tu 'byor pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-7: rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang bkur bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-8: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-9: der lha dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-10: ming ni ci zhes bya snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na lha'i 'jig rten na lha rnams kyi gnas dris dregs dga' zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-11: de nas sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-12: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-13: sems shin tu tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-14: sems yongs su bsgoms pa gang gis mchod rten gyi bum pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-15: gdugs la dri chab phul na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-16: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dris dregs dga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-17: der skyes nas kyang lha'i bde ba dang ni ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-18: bde ba dpe med pa'i kha zas la ni rten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-19: lha'i bdud rtsi'i zas kyis ni tshim /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108a-21: yid kyi gdung ba dang ni bral /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-0: gos gyon pa rtag tu sil snyan yan lag lnga @108b ldas rtsen cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-3: rtse ba'i grogs dang ldan pa lha mo'i tshogs rnams ni glu dbyangs len /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-4: nyin gcig cig bzhin rgyun mi 'chad par ri sul las chu'i shugs 'bab pa ltar bde ba rnams ni 'phel /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-7: dngul gyi ri'i rtse mo rnams su dga' bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-10: lteng ka rnam pa sna tshogs ni mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-11: tshal gyi nang na gnas pa bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-12: khu byug rnams kyang mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-13: lta ba du ma'i zi lang bar lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-15: nags tshal yid du 'ong ba rnams su lta bar byed kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-16: sems tshim pa med pa dag lha'i 'jig rten de na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-21: nye ba'i tshal rnams na mtho ris kyi chu po'i ro gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-22: gang 'byung ba dag ni 'di ltar dzambu'i gling na legs par byas pa'i las kyis dgun chang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-24: sha kha ra'i chang gi ro 'byung ba rnam pa de lta bur 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-25: de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-26: lha'i 'jig rten de na ji srid du de'i legs par byas pa'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba dag dang dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-27: de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:108b-28: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-1: ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-2: de las de dang rgyu mthun par bran khyim bdog cing nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-3: 'bru mang po kun nas gang bar 'gyur bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-4: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-5: lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-6: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas rlung gi rgyu zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-7: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-8: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-9: tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-10: sems yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying rje dang ldan pa gang gis tsha bas gdungs pa'i dge slong rnams la rlung yab kyis rlung g-yabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-11: gang gis rlung 'byung ba reg na bde ba ku shi ra'i dri dang 'dres pas dge slong shin tu tsha bas gdungs pa de rnams rlung des bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-12: kha ton 'don pa dang 'jug par bya ba dag byed par nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-13: sbyin bdag de las byas pa'i rkyen des lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rlung la spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109a-14: der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de la rlung dri zhim pa dpe med pa ldang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-0: gang rgyal chen @109b bzhi'i lha rnams kyi rlung dpe med pa ldang ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-1: lha'i ris gzhan nas rlung langs pa'i dri 'bum 'gyur du zhim pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-2: shin tu bsil bar yang ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-3: rnam par smin ba bzang po gcig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-8: der rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi rlung ni nyis 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-9: rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams las lhag par sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi sum 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-10: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams las lhag par 'thab brel ba rnams kyi bzhi 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-11: 'thab bral ba rnams las lhag par dga' ldan pa rnams kyi lnga 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-12: dga' ldan pa rnams las lhag par 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi drug 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-13: de dag pas kyang lhag par gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyi yang 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-14: de ltar sems can rnams kyi las kyi bye brag las 'gro ba'i ris kyi bye brag tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-15: las byas pa de dag mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-16: legs par byas pa'i las des rlung la spyod pa'i lha de rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-17: lha'i ris drug na rlung langs pa dpe med pa dri zhim pa bde ba gang yin pa de dag ldang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-18: rlung de dag gi mthu gcig cig bshad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-19: 'di ltar de'i mthu thams cad ni bshad par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-20: lha de rnams kyi rlung dga' mgur byed pa ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:109b-21: de ni gang gi tshe rol mo'i sgra 'byung bar 'dod na de'i tshe rlung de ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-1: tshal gyi gseb tu song nas ji ltar de lha mos rol mo byas pa cung zad kyang snyan par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur ldang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-2: gal te shin tu dri zhim par 'dod na de gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris man chad kyi mdog dpe med pa dang ldan pa dag las langs nas lha de rnams kyi drung du ldang bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-3: gal te bsil ba 'dod na de ji ltar de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-4: dag gi lus la bzod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i bsil pa ldang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-5: gal te yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-6: de bzhin du bee d'urya'i ri rab kyi rtse mo lta bar 'dod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-8: de bzhin du dzambu'i chu bo'i gser gyi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-10: de bzhin du me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-17: me tog nyams dga' ba'i yul sna tshogs lta bar 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-18: lha mo sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'gro bar 'dod pa'i lha rnams la rlung sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-19: dri dang; bde ba rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa de dag ldang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-23: ri khrod rnam pa sna tshogs su snga ma bzhin khyer bar yang byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-25: 'gro ba dag 'dod pa lnga la dga' ba'i lha rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110a-27: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-0: 'thab @110b mo dag gis skyo ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-1: phan tshun grogs su gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-2: phan tshun gnod pa med pa rnams yid gcugs shing gnas de dag la yid zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-3: rang gi las kyis bsgyur ba rnams dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-4: lha'i 'jig rten na lha rang gi las tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-6: bzang po rnams kyis rgya'i 'bur lta bur las kyi 'bras bu 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-7: ji ltar rlung phrag dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-8: ser sna dang bral ba'i shugs 'byung ba la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-9: shugs zad nas sa la 'bab pa de ltar ji srid du las kyi rnam pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-11: bzang po legs par byas pa'i rnam pa de srid du 'byung ba'i shugs spyad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-12: de nas yang legs par byas pa'i las zad nas lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-13: sems can rnams ni las kyi skye gnas las skye zhing las la rton pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-14: ji ltar las byas pa de ltar 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-15: sems can rnams kyi skye ba ni rgyu med pa las byung ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-16: dge slong des las de dag mthong nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-17: ji ltar nyi ma'i rjes su dus 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-18: ji ltar dus kyi rjes su zhing rnams skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-19: de ltar las kyi rjes su skye ba 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-20: rgyu med pa las skye ba 'byung mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-21: gang gis lus can bcings pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-22: tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-23: rnam par chags pa mang po'i las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-24: rnam gsum lu gu rgyud kyis bcings /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:110b-25: ji ltar sbrang rtsi dug dang zas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-2: de ltar lha yi bder gtogs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-3: mthar ni ltung ba rnam par spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-4: gang zhig sdug bsngal 'chi ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-5: bsod nams zad de dman pa ni; ;rang gi chung ma rnams kyis spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-6: de 'dra ba ni dpe med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-7: legs byas zad de dman pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-8: sgron ma 'bar ba zad pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-10: sdug bsngal chen po rab tu skyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-11: sred pa'i dug gis rnam bsregs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-12: mya ngan gyis ni sems nyams te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-13: lus dang ngag gi spyod dman pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-14: lha ni ltung ba dag gis 'jigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-15: 'dod rnams shin tu slu byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-16: ji lta ji ltar bde myangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-17: de lta de ltar yongs su gtong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-18: de dag sdug bsngal rab tu che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-19: lha yi yul nas ltung ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-20: sdug bsngal rab tu skye ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-21: de yi khyad par sems can dmyal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-22: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-23: sred pas 'khor ba kun byas pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-24: 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnams kyis dkrugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-25: srid pa'i sgrog gis bcings pa yi; ;sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-27: de bzhin sa steng 'chi ba'i mtha'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-29: sdug bsngal mthong nas rnam par spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-30: skye bo bag med dga' ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-31: de ni thar pa mi 'thob ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-32: bag med dug gis rmongs pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111a-33: de la mya ngan 'das pa ring //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-0: bag med dgra yi mchog yin @111b pas; ;bag med rnams la chags ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-1: shin tu bag med lha rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-2: yang dang yang du dmyal bar ltung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-5: de bas sred pa'i chags pa spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-6: 'dod chags bral ba zhi ba'i gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-7: de ltar dge slong des lha'i 'jig rten gyi mtha' ltung bar mthong nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-8: rlung la spyod pa'i lha de rnams kyi mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-9: bde ba de dag la las kyi rgyus bskyed cing mi rtag pa nyid dang 'brel ba yin pa lta zhes rnam par dpyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-10: lha de rnams kyang ji srid du de'i legs par byas pa'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-11: de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-12: ji ltar dus ji srid du legs par byas pa'i las yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-13: 'od gsal ba 'byung ba'i dus de srid du lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten na spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-14: de zad nas ltung par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-15: lhung nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-17: dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-18: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-19: de las de dang rgyu mthun par rlung gis bdas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-20: 'gro ba rgya mtshor spyod cing 'tsho ba'i ded dpon du 'gyur ba mthong ngo ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:111b-21: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-0: de nas yang dge slong las @112a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-1: kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-2: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas me tog phreng dga' zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-3: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-4: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-5: tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-6: ngag gi las kyi mtha' yang dag pa sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang gis tsha ba'i dus su dge 'dun la chu ril ba gang phul ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-8: 'brog dgon par zhugs pa dag la'ang chu ril ba gang byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-9: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten me tog phreng dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-10: der skyes nas kyang de'i lus bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-11: sgeg pa sna tshogs su ni spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-12: lha mo'i sil snyan gyi sgra 'byin cing dgon pa sna tshogs kyi nang du ni zhugs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-15: dngul gyi ri rab kyi gshong na rtse ba dag dang lhan cig ni gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-16: ri khrod rnam pa sna tshogs na lha mo dang ni lhan cig 'khod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112a-17: rlung dri zhim pos reg pa'i lus kyi me tog phreng ba thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-0: lteng kas brgyan pa'i yul rnams na dga' bar byed cing @112b lha mo mang po'i nang na spyod pa ni lo 'bum phrag du ma song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-1: de ltar gnas pa de res 'ga' tshal 'bab chu zhes bya ba na gnas te tshal de na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-2: tshal de ni pee d'urya'i shing ljon pa la gser gyi 'dab ma yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-3: gser gyi shing la bee d'urya'i 'dab ma yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-4: dngul gyi shing la gser gyi 'dab ma dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-5: tshal de'i nang du zhugs pa de rtag par yid rab tu dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-6: lus rang gi 'od dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-7: de'i legs par byas pa'i las des shing de dag brtol ba las mtho ris dang mthun pa'i skom 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-8: skom de'i khyad par ni mi'i rgun chang dang sbyar ba'i chang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-9: sha kha ra'i chang dag 'bras bu bi tsu man da'i ro dang mtshungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-10: skom de ni lha'i ro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-12: stobs dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-13: de'i dri dpag tshad du'ang 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-15: dngul gyi mdog lta bu yid rab tu dga' ba kun gyis skom de 'thungs nas tshal de na sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byin cing kun tu 'gengs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-16: shing de dag gi sdong po brtol nas skom 'byung ba de la bung ba'i tshogs 'ub 'ub 'du ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-17: skom kha cig gi mdog ni gser lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-18: kha cig gi mdog ni bee d'urya lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-19: kha cig gi mdog ni spug lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-20: kha cig gi mdog ni padma r'a ga lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:112b-21: kha cig gi mdog ni mrgad lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-1: byung nas brug pa chu bo ltar 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-2: skom gyi chu bo de'i ming yang mtha' med 'bab ces bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-3: chu bo'i rgyar dpag tshad gnyis yod pa'i 'gram gnyis ka nyams dga' la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-4: 'gram gnyis ka lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing glu len la gser gyi padmas khebs pa 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-5: de nas lha mo'i tshogs kyis 'thungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-9: phan tshun gser gyi padma'i sdong bu bee d'urya rnams kyi sgeg par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-12: shing rta sna tshogs la zhon pa rnams rgyug par byed cing dgod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-13: lha'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas phan tshun 'thor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-14: lha de rnams kyi padma'i rdzing yod pa de ni kun nas bsten pa zhes bya la gzhan dang mi 'dra ba dpe med pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-15: legs par byas pa'i las kyis bsgyur ba'i lha de rnams ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-16: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-17: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-19: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113a-20: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes nas de las de dang rgyu mthun par bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-0: skom pa @113b yong ye med cing 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i yul du skye la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-1: nor dang shin tu ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-2: skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-3: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-4: lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-5: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-6: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-7: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-8: tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-9: legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-10: sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying gis brlan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-11: skyo ba med cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems pa gang bdag la phan pa med kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-12: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i nad pa'i rim gro byed na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten kun tu lta ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-13: der skyes nas kyang lha'i phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-14: gos gyon pa rab tu dga' ste lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor pa'i bde ba dang ni ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-15: yid rtag tu dga' ba lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams dang ldan pa dag skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du ni rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:113b-16: dga' mgur gnas pa grogs sdug gu lha mo'i tshogs du mas bskor cing yongs su spyod par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-2: lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis ni mchod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-3: ri rab rin po che du ma'i 'od kyis gsal bar byas shing rab tu 'bar ba dag la ni gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-4: gos tshon can rnam pa sna tshogs ni bgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-5: mthe ris dang mthun pa'i rin po che du ma dag gi rgyan gdags par bya ba ni btags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-6: tshal na rnam par rgyu ba'i lhas bsams pa'i tshal dkrigs pa sna tshogs dag na ni gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-13: stegs sna tshogs dag la rnam par rgyu ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-14: rang gi las rnams las kyi bya ba byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-15: de ltar de yongs su rgyu ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-16: phyogs gzhan zhig na tshal dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas gtibs shing gser gyi lan kan bres pa zhig des mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-17: bya rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-18: bya'i tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa 'byin pa rnams kyis ni kun tu gang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-19: rlung gis phog nas rab tu g-yos pa'i dril bu g-yeng kha'i sgra ni drag tu 'khrol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-20: nyi ma 'bum snyed kyi 'od dang ni ldang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-21: ri rab las byung ba gser gyi ri bdun la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114a-29: rgyu skar phreng gis yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-0: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas gtibs pa'i tshal der 'jug par @114b byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-1: rnam de lta bu'i tshal lha'i phreng ba la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa de na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-2: lha mo tshal gyi gsab gseb bcu zhing rtse ba gang yin pa de dag 'od zer 'bum snyed 'byung ba ltar tshal de na snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-3: shing ljon pa'i bar bar na 'khod pa'i lha de dag gis de rnams mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-4: de nas yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la blo rnam par chags pa dag blta ba'i phyir de'i drung du 'dong zhing shin tu rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-5: gser gyi padma rnams kyis de dag dang rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-9: rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis kyang shin tu dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-10: de ltar 'dod pa la blo rnam par chags pa de mig lha'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-11: rna ba sgra snyan pa gsal ba yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-12: sna dri zhim pa bsung che ba yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-13: lce ro zhim pa bro ba yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-14: pags pa reg bya bde ba 'jam pa yang ba yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-15: srid pa drug gi mes yongs su bskor ba de kun nas sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-16: de ltar chog mi shes pa de dge slong des mngon par mthong nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-17: lha yi 'jig rten kun nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-18: sred ba'i me yis yongs su bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:114b-19: rmongs pa 'dod pa'i dbang song ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-1: pa dbang med sred par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-2: ji lta ji ltar shing rnyed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-3: de lta de ltar sred pa 'phel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-4: ji lta ji ltar bde thob na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-5: de lta de ltar sred me 'phel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-6: shing mes sreg pa'i nyes pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-7: mi yis yongs su spang nus kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-8: 'jig rten sred mes sreg pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-9: yongs su spang bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-10: chu bo chen po rgal 'dod la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-11: chu srin gyis ni 'jigs pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-12: de dag bde ba'i mthar phyin na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-13: sred pas de la gnod mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-14: sred pa'i zhags las rnam grol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-15: 'dod chags zhe sdang spong ba po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-16: nyes sdig las ni grol ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-17: mkhas pa de ni mya ngan bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-18: gang zhig tshul khrims srung ba nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-19: mtho ris de la yid zhugs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-20: de dag tshul khrims sdig dang bcas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-21: zas dang dug ni 'dres pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-22: bskal pa bye bstong rnams su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-23: sred pas bslus pa'i mi rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-24: shin tu rmongs pas de mi stong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-25: yid ni gti mug dbang du song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-26: skom gyis gdungs pa'i khur tsa pa; ;lan tshva'i chu ni 'thungs pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-27: sred pas bslus pa'i sems can rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-28: sred pa nyid kyi rjes su 'brang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-29: skye bo skad cig tshim byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-30: skad cig gis ni skom byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-31: skyes bu tha ma sred pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-32: gdungs pa lam gol tshol ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-33: de bas sred pa bsten mi bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-34: sred pa de ni bsten par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115a-35: sred pa'i dbang du song ba'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-1: gang zhig bde ba bla na med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-2: bsam gtan skyed mos tshal la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-3: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-4: de dag bde ba de bzhin 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-5: bde ba bla na med pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-6: lha yul spyod pa'i skye bo dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-7: sred pa'i zhags pas drangs nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-8: yang dang yang du mdyal bar ltung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-9: 'chi mtha' dang por dge ba min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-10: yang dag lam ni ston mdzad pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-11: sred la rtag tu sten byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-12: 'di yis sdug bsngal tsha zhes gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-13: de ltar dge slong des lha'i 'jig rten 'dod pa'i dba' rlabs kyis bdas shing 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mngon par mthong bas 'khor ba la yid byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-14: de ltar lha'i de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas kun tu lta ba dag la dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-15: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-16: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-18: dud 'gro'i rang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-19: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-20: las de dang rgyu mthun par bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-25: zho shas 'tsho ba dang rtag tu ldan zhing shin tu 'byor bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:115b-26: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-1: yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-3: lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-4: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-5: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-6: tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing sems pa gsal ba'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis rgyal pos gsad par bya bar btson ra'i nang du bcug pa las nong rdzas thams cad phul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-7: de thar bar byas sam; de bzhin du rgyal po'i bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-8: de dang mthun pa dag la phul nas de thar par byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-9: de las nor rdzas sna 'ga' yang len par mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-10: snying rjes brlan pa'i snying gis sems can rnams la phan pa kho na byed cing legs par byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-11: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rtag tu dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-12: der skyes nas kyang lha de rnams ngo bo nyid kyis yid rab tu dga' ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-13: de dag bas kyang de brgya 'gyur du yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-14: las de dang rgyu mthun par 'bras bu 'brel pas rgyu dang mthun par 'bras bu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116a-15: lha'i 'jig rten der skyes pa de lha mo'i tshogs mang pos ni yongs su bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-2: dga' mgur spyod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis ni mtha' 'khor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-3: nye bar spyod cing ri rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-6: ri khrod rnams su ni rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-7: de bee d'urya'i rdo leb bzang po reg na shin tu bde ba rnams kyi steng na rang dgar ni spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-12: nye ba'i tshal rnams su shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa dag dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-13: bde ba de'i khyad par ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bde bas 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-18: chu ser dang bral ba de'i phyir bde'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-19: lha'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-20: gos du ma gyon pa me tog brgyus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-21: bgo ba sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-22: ri rab kyi drung dag na rgyu bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-23: gal te gser gyi ri zom la 'dzegs na gser de'i mthus de gser lta bur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-24: gal te beed'urya'i zom la 'dzegs na bee d'urya'i mthus bee d'urya'i mdog lta bur 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-25: bdag nyid mtsho'i nang du zhugs pa ltar gyur kyang 'dam rdzab kyis gos pa lta bur ni mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-26: gal te shel gyi ri zom la 'dzegs na shel gyi 'od des de zla ba gnyis pa lta bur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-27: gal te dngul gyi ri zom la 'dzegs na dngul de'i mthus de'i yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-28: nying lag thams cad kha ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-29: me tog ku mu de ltar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:116b-30: de ltar lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-1: yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-2: nye ba'i tshal rnams su dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-3: yongs su spyod par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-4: lha'i bde ba dpe med pa dag myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-5: de ltar de rnam par spyod pa na shing ljon pa du mas mjes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-6: lha'i nyams dga' bar byed pa'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-7: der lha de dag dzambu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing rta la zhon nas 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-8: tshal de'ang bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing tshal gyi lcug ma gzhon nu 'phyang ba dag tu shing rtas phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-9: bya lha'i skad du rtse ba zhes bya ba lha rnams dang smra ba mthun pa dag lha de'i dge ba'i las kyi mthus bskul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-10: 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-11: dga' bar byed pa'i las rnams dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-12: skyes bu gang zhig 'dir byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-13: de yi las kyi rnam smin na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-14: legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-15: bde ba thob pa'i lha de dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-16: bag med pa la ma bstan na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-17: de ni bde las bde thob cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-19: bde ba'i mtha' de zad 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-20: 'di la rtag dang ther zug med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-21: de thob gzhal med khang rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-22: skyes bu mchog rnams chags ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-23: bde mtha' rtag tu lhung 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-24: bde la rtag pa nyid med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-25: rgyu de thams cad rig nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117a-26: yid la nges par legs par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-0: bsags pa @117b thams cad tha mar zad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-1: mtho ba'i mthar ni tha mar rnyil //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-5: de la rtag pa nyid med de; ;khams gsum dag tu sngon byung zhe'am //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-6: phyi nas 'byung ba nyid med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-7: ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-8: nub par 'gyur ba rab tu mngon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-9: de ltar skyes pa thams cad kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-10: tha mar 'chi ba gnas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-11: chos rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-13: bag med yid la ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-14: bag med dug gi mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-15: bag yod 'chi med gnas yin la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-16: bag med 'chi ba'i gnas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-18: bag med rnams ni rtag tu 'chi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-19: ji ltar dug dang ji ltar me //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-20: srog chags bag med de bzhin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-21: bag med myos pa'i sems can rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-23: rtag tu bag yod mi rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-24: 'jig rten kun gyis phyag byas shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-25: gang na bag med mi gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-26: zhi ba mchog tu 'gro bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-27: de kun mtha' ni zad 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-28: rmongs pa gang zhig mi rig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-30: ma byas don med gdung bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-31: rtag tu bdag nyid dga' 'dod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-32: 'chi ba'i bar du dge ba byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-33: chos spyod bde ba yin no zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-34: mkhas pa rnams kyis gdams pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-35: rgyu yi de nyid rnam ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:117b-36: sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'khor ba kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-2: 'gyur zhing tsha bar rtag tu gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-3: de nas lha des bya de rnams kyi tshig thos nas yang dag par bsams te yid la yang dga' ba bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-4: sngon gyi tshe'i 'bras bu dran nas phud tsam zhig bag med pa la ma zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-5: mos pa'i srab skyogs kyis yid de 'dzin par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-10: rig bya yid du 'ong ba rnams la bag med pa ma skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-11: de nas yang yid mi brtan pa de lha'i bde ba'i dbang du gyur te ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba de ma zad kyi bar du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-12: de yul sdug pa de rnams la spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-13: de phyis lha yul de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-14: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-16: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-17: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-18: de las de dang rgyu mthun par nam yang bcings par mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-19: rtag tu bde ba dang ldan pa nyam nga ba rnams las thar bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-20: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-21: lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118a-22: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-0: lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas dri la chags pa zhes bya ba ji @118b ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-1: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-3: skyes bu tshul khrims dang ldan pa sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-5: sems rnyog pa med par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-6: gzhan la gnod pa med pa gang gis sangs rgyas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-8: dge 'dun la zhing chen por shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-9: gos shin tu dri zhim pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas la legs par byas so snyam du'ang sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-10: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dri la chags pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-11: der skyes nas kyang shin tu bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-12: rang gi 'od dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-13: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yid rab tu dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa de dus ring mo zhig 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-14: dus ring po 'das pa de'ang yul gyi bde ba des lha de dag gis mi rig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-15: gang bdag gis dus 'di 'das so zhes dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-16: bde ba mi brtan pa thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'i yul rnams la chog mi shes pa rnams kyis mi rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-17: de ltar snying la chags pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-19: byug pas lus bskus pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-20: tshal gyi bar bar dag na rgyu bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:118b-21: shing ljon pa mang po'i 'od kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-0: skyed mos tshal dag gis brgyan pa'i yul nyams dga' ba' @119a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-1: tshal rnams la rten par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-2: 'dod pa mang po la snying chags pa dag yul gyi bde ba des lha'i 'jig rten gyi mtha' 'di ltung bar khong du mi chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-3: de ltar yul gyi sred pas yongs su bslus pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-4: ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha'i 'jig rten de dag na dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-5: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-6: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-7: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-9: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-10: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-11: de las de dang rgyu mthun par yul rtag tu bsil bar skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-12: yul gnod pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-15: lo nyes 'byung ba dang bral ba'i yul rnams su skye la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-16: skye bo kun gyis mchod par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-17: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-18: lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-19: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-20: lha'i mig gis lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas spyi gtsug thar ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119a-21: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-0: des thos pa @119b las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-1: rgyal po la gnod pa byed pa'i mi spyi gtsug nas bzung ste dpyangs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-2: sdug bsngal ba las gang gis de thar bar byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-3: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten spyi gtsug thar zhes bya ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-4: rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas gsum gyi nang na de nyams dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-9: 'dod pa rgyun chad pa med pa gang yin pa bsdus pa de dag thams cad 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-10: bde ba'i gnas de na bde ba des mngon par 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-11: ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing yul gyi bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-12: nyams bde ba des dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-13: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-15: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-16: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-17: de las de dang rgyu mthun par mya ngan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-19: gnod pa dang bral bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-22: skye bo thams cad dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:119b-23: shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-2: tshe'i bar chad med par 'chi bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-3: de nas yang dge slong de gnas bcu mthar chags su rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-4: lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas de tsam du zad dam zhes rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-5: des gnas bcu las gnas gzhan bcu gcig pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-6: lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas bcu ni de dag nyid yin par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-7: des lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas bcu ma lus par brtags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-8: rgyal chen bzhi'i nang na che ba gnas gsum ba rtag tu myos gnas zhes bya ba thams cad la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-9: lha rtag tu myos gnas de dag gi gnas ji tsam zhig yod zhig gu snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-10: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-11: rtag tu myos gnas de dag gi gnas kyang bcu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-23: lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas ni bcu po 'di dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-24: sa gzhan gang zhig tu las gang gis gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120a-25: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-0: sems shin @120b tu dang zhing rnying la rnyog pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-1: sems bzang po yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa gang gis shing ljon pa chen po gang la yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-3: srin po dag gnas pa'i shing ljon pa de gcod pa na yongs su skyob par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-6: srin po de dag gnas dang bral bas 'tsho bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-7: de'i mthus bde bar gnas na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas lhag par dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-8: der skyes nas kyang de gnas gzhan de na chu bsil ba zhes bya ba'i rdzing bu yangs pa gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-11: ngur ba lus gser gyi kha dog can sgra 'byin pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-12: rin po che sna bdun gyi padma rab tu mang po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-13: padma'i rdzing chu bsil ba de dag na'ang kun nas gser gyi tshal zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-15: dngul gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis kun nas dkrigs shing bskor nas skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-16: shing de rnams kyang padma'i rdzing gi chu de'i nang na de rnams kyi grib ma 'bab pa'i gzugs du ma gzugs brnyan lta bur snang la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-17: padma'i rdzing de'ang chu'i nang du shing ljon pa'i grib ma de rnams kyis gzugs brnyan lta bur snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:120b-20: ku mu das mdzes par byas pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-0: ji ltar brgya byin yang der @121a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-1: rtse ba'i blo skye ba de ltar mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-3: lha ma yin g-yul 'gyed par 'babs pa na nyi ma shar ba'i mdog lta bu'i padma 'bum phrag du mas mdzes par byas pa de rnams mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-4: brtags nas lha rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-5: kye ma; 'di ltar chu bsil ba'i rdzing bu skyon med pa 'di nyid shin tu nyams dga' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-6: de nas yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rdzing bu de rnams su yid rtag tu du dga' zhing rdzing bu'i 'gram du yid rab tu mgu ba'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-7: lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing bde ba dpe med pa dang ldan pa ci dga' mgur byed pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-8: shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-11: rang dgar za zhing 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-12: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-13: de nas yang byung nas gal te gnas gzhan du 'gro 'dod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-15: sems gdung ba rnams dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-16: sems shin tu dga' ba bde ba shin tu rgya che zhing 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-17: lha mo'i tshogs dgod cing glu dbyangs len pa; bro gar byed pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing rtag tu rtse ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121a-19: yid la bde ba gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-0: de dag nyon mongs pa med cing @121b shin tu rgyas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-2: dbang po lnga yul lnga dag la spyod pa'ang bde ba la gnas pa des tshim mi myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-4: sred pa ji lta bu dag la spyod pa de yul gang gis kyang tshim par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-10: chu dngo rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-11: rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-12: rin po che sna bdun gyis mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-13: bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin cing 'don pa rnams su lha de grogs dang lhan cig bde ba du mar gnas shing bee d'urya'i tshal gyi grib mas mdzes par byas pa dag na bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing 'don pa'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-14: nye ba'i tshal rnams na dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-15: rtse bar byed; mgu bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-16: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-20: byu ru'i ri rab kyi zom la rang dgar 'khod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-21: kha cig ni nyi ma ltar gzi che /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-22: kha cig ni zla ba ltar mdangs gsal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-23: kha cig ni gzugs dpe med pa dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:121b-24: ji ltar legs par byas pa'i las de rnams kyis lus mngon par bsgrubs pa de ltar lha yul du'ang rnam par mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-0: rgyu rkyen dang mthun par spyod pa de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha'i @122a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-1: 'jig rten de ni sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-3: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-4: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-5: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-7: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-8: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-9: de las de dang rgyu mthun par shin tu nyams dga' ba'i yul lo legs shing bde bar skye la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-10: shin tu 'byor ba dang ldan zhing mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-11: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-12: lha rtag tu myos gnas kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-13: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-14: lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas autpa la mdog ces bya ba ji ltar gnas pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-15: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-16: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-17: chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-18: tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang gis 'di ltar me tog autpa la bskyed pa 'dis sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-20: dge 'dun rnams kyi longs spyod bya'o snyam du bsams nas bskyed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122a-21: de'ang 'bul bar byed cing de sems la dga' bar yang 'dzin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-0: de @122b lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten autpa la'i mdog gi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-1: der skyes nas kyang lha yul du rtse ba'i skye bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-2: dga' mgur spyad pa de dag yang rtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-8: bro gar byed pa dang ni ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-9: bde ba du ma la ni gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-11: bee d'urya'i tshal gyi grib ma mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-13: byu ru lta bu'i sa gzhi bde ba mthon dma' ran pa rnams su ni rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-14: lha mo'i tshogs du mas ni yongs su bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-15: kha zas zhim po ni za /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-16: ci dga' mgur 'dod pa thams cad bsam pa tsam gyis ni 'grub /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-17: ngo bo nyid kyi ri du ma la ni gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-18: bde ba las mchog tu bde ba ni thob /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-19: dbang po lnga yul lnga la chags shing dga' ba ni nyin gcig bzhin nyams dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-21: bee d'urya'i mdog lta bu'i lus ni autpa la'i tshal nas autpa la'i tshal du rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-22: autpa la'i dri gang yin pa de dpag tshad brgyar ni ldang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-23: autpa la'i dri zhim po des lha'i me tog zhim po gzhan thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rgyal po bzhin du ni mdzes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-24: rgyu dang mthun par 'bras bu 'byung bar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:122b-25: de mtho ris su phyin nas kyang me tog autpa la de rnams las dga' ba rnam pa mang po du ma 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-1: spyod cing bde ba la gnas pa'i dbang po drug nges par 'byung ba la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-2: ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-3: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-4: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-6: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
