K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-8: de las de dang rgyu mthun par me tog mang po bskyed cing 'byor ba'i yul rnams su skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-9: shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-10: mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-11: gnod pa med par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-12: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-13: lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-14: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha yul na rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-15: padma dkar spyod ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-16: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-17: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-18: tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123a-19: lus ngag gi dri ma dang bral ba sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis sangs rgyas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-0: @123b dge 'dun la me tog dbul ba'i don du padma'i tshal skyed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-3: dge 'dun la'ang sems dad pa dang ldan par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-4: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas padma dkar spyod kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-5: der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-9: 'od sna tshogs kyis ni lus brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-10: lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis ni mchod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-11: lha mo'i tshogs me tog phreng ba thogs pa rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-17: dga' ya yar rab tu dga' zhing rtse bar ni gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-18: mtho ris dang mthun pa'i kun dga'i ra bar gnas shing bde ba rtag tu myong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-19: ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de bde ba dpe med pa rnam pa du ma yon tan shin tu che ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-20: skye bo thams cad dang lhan cig gzhan la gnod pa med cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa rnam pa sna tshogs de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-21: de dag myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-22: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-23: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:123b-25: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-0: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi rnams @124a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-2: de las de dang rgyu mthun par nor gyi bdag po shin tu bde ba dang ldan zhing bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-3: dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-4: rgyal pos kyang bkur bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-5: de nas yang dge slong las kyis 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-6: lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyis gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-7: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas grong khyer dmar gnas zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-8: gnas der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-9: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-10: sems pa dang ldan pa phan par 'dod pa gus pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang yin pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-11: dge slong dag yang dag par rab tu byung ba'i chos gos shing byis pa la'i shun pas kha dog dmar por bsgyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-19: me tog bandu sa tsur dang bcas pas kha dog dmar por bsgyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-20: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten grong khyer dmar gnas kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-21: der skyes nas kyang phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124a-22: gos dmar po gyon pa de'i gnas de ni 'od kyis brgyan pa'i lus kyi rgyag tu gsal bar byas pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-0: lha de dag thams @124b cad kyang ci dga' mgur spyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-1: de rnams kyi mthus gnas de dag thams cad rnam pa de lta bur dmar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-2: ji ltar padma r'a ga'i 'od de gos pa med pa ltar lha de rnams kyang de ltar dmar por snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-3: rgyan gyi kha dog sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-4: ser por 'dres shing rin po ches klubs pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmar por 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-5: legs par byas pa'i las des de'i gos gsal ba rnams kyis dmar por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-6: gang gi tshe de rtse zhing gzhal med khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-10: nye ba'i tshal sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-12: rgyan dmar po sna tshogs thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dag yul du mar 'gro ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-13: de'i tshe de dag gi rgyan rnams kyi tshon rtsi gsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-14: kha dog thams cad kyang gsal bar snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-15: rin po che'i 'od sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-16: lha'i bu de tshal nas tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-17: ri'i zos nas ri'i zom dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-18: padma'i tshal nas padma'i tshal dang; chu bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-21: nye ba'i tshal nas chu bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-24: nye ba'i tshal du 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-25: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs nye bar len cing phan tshun grogs su gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-26: so sor chags pa'i snying gis dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:124b-28: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:125a-1: yid rab tu dga' ba dag bdud rtsi'i zas bzang po la ni za /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:126a-5: gang zhig tshul khrims yongs spong ba //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:126a-10: tshul khrims 'chal ba rnam par spong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:126a-11: tshul khrims srung ba rtag tu dul //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129a-13: bram ze nyon mongs pa mgon med pa rnams la nyin gcig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129a-16: bzhi lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129a-17: de ltar rim gyis rgya cher rtag res 'khor byin na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi rgun chad myos gnas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129a-18: der skyes nas kyang mtho ris kyi skyed mos tshal na bde bar gnas pa de gser gyi dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas bres pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129a-19: sgra mang po 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i tshal rnams kyi nang na lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129a-20: 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i yul la chags pa dag dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-0: lha @129b gzhon nu gzhan rab tu mang po rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing lha'i bdud rtsi skom mang pos ni myos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-1: me tog manda ra ba'i phreng bas ni mgo brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-2: padma'i tshal gyi gsab gseb na ni gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-6: dngul gyi ri dag la ni 'dzeg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-7: bung ba sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa'i padma'i tshal rnams kyi nang na rnam par rgyu bar ni byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-8: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyi ma 'bum so son 'gran pa lta bu'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-9: padma'i tshal rnams kyi nang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-10: gser gyi bya sgra 'byin pa thos na rnar snyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-11: rol mo yan lag lnga dang ldan pa thos na snyan cing bde ba rnams kyi nang na mngon par dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-13: bee d'urya'i rdo leb kyi sa gzhi legs par bsnyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-14: mu tig gi bye ma sa gzhi bsnyams pa'i mtsho lha'i chu yon tan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-15: rang gis byas pa'i bsod nams kyis sprul pa'i lhun po dag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-18: dngul dang; shel gyi rdo yis mdzes par byas pa'i ri bzang po'i rtse mo dag na mngon par dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-20: skyid pa sna tshogs la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:129b-22: lha mos dkrigs pa'i nang na dgod cing rtse la g-yer ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-0: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba rang gis byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur @130a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-1: pa de srid du rang gis legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-2: gang gi tshe las zad par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-3: de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-4: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-6: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-7: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-8: de las de dang rgyu mthun par rtag tu bde ba dang ldan zhing ri 'bigs byed kyi sman ljongs dag tu gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-9: rgyal po'i yid ches par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-10: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-11: lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-12: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-13: lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas yul la 'dod pa zhes bya ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-14: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-15: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-16: sems dang ldan par gyur pa gang gis tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-19: ma log kyang rung ba zhig nad kyis thebs pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130a-23: de yang nad sos par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-0: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yul la dga' ba'i lha rnams @130b kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-1: der skyes nas kyang 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-2: lha'i gnas gzhan dag tu mchod cing las 'phel ba las bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-3: ji ltar mar me 'bar ba las 'od 'byung ba de ltar las 'phel ba las bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-4: de ltar lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten na las kyi 'bras bu de la spyod pa rnam par smin pa shin tu nyams dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-6: thun mong ma yin pa dag 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-7: legs par byas pa'i las des der skyes pa de bee d'urya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-9: dngul gyi lhun po gsal ba'i rtse mo mthon po rnams na shin tu bde bar gnas pa'i kun dga'i ra ba dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-11: stegs bu du mas brgyan pa'i sa dag la gnas shing tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-12: nye ba'i tshal rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-13: 'od sna tshogs kyis yun ring du nyams dga' bar byed pa rnams kyi nang na lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-14: de dag gis rtsed mo byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-15: de ltar dbang po lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-16: blo yul la chags pa de ci dga' mgur bde ba la gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-17: ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha yul lha'i gnas de na 'dod pa thams cad la blo rnam par chags pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:130b-20: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-0: @131a *// de zad nas de nas yang las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-2: dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-3: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-4: de las de dang rgyu mthun par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-5: gzugs bzang po dang ldan zhing gar yang 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-6: nor bzang po dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-7: rgyal po'i 'khor gyis mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-10: dus kyang chos bzang po la dga' ba'i dus su skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-11: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-12: lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-13: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-14: lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas chu bsil gnas zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-15: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-16: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-17: snying rje can sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis sems can gzhan 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-18: skom gyis gdungs pa'i skom pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131a-19: gshin rje'i mi yis 'jigs pa bstan nas 'khrugs par gyur pa la bu ram chu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-0: chu grang mo blud na de legs par byas pa'i las kyi mthu des gang gi tshe @131b 'chi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-1: lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas chu bsil bar gnas zhes bya ba'i lha de dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-2: der skyes nas kyang chu bsil ba'i tshogs 'bab chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-3: chu bo phun sum tshogs pa'i sa phyogs dag na de dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-4: de'i lha'i btung ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-6: mthong na myos pa skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-7: dris myos pa skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-8: reg pas myos pa skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-9: sgra thos na myos pa skyed par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-10: myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing snying dga' bar byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-11: yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i btung ba dag kyang 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-13: btung ba de dag 'thungs nas lha rnams lha'i stobs bcu 'gyur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-14: ji ltar nam mkha' la 'gro ba nyams par yang mi 'gyur zhing ltung bar yang mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-15: de bzhin du sa la'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-16: de'i brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa'ang med la ca co dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-17: ga zha'i sgra la mngon par dga' zhing yid shin tu dga' ba de rab tu dga' ba brgya 'gyur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-18: de'i rna ba'ang mnyan par bya ba la thogs pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-19: shin tu bde ba yang dag par 'byung ba 'gyur ba; mtho ris dang mthun par gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-20: yul gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba dag myong bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:131b-21: rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa'i tshal 'di lta bu dag kyang yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-6: tshal 'bab zer sgra rol mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-8: tshal bde bar gnas pa de rnams kyi nang na mngon par dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-9: mig gis kyang gzugs 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-10: rna bas kyang sgra snyan pa rnar 'thad pa yid du 'ong ba dag thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-11: snas kyang dri zhim pa bsung che ba yid du 'ong ba dag snom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-12: de ltar lces kyang ro zhim pa bro che ba yid du 'ong ba dag myong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-13: de ltar rnam pa de lta bus yid tshim par byas pa'i snying dang dbang po lnga yul la chags pa'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-14: bde ba dag myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-15: de lta de sred pa'i tshogs drug gi mes nyin gcig bzhin sreg par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-16: 'dod chags kyi mes kyang nyin gcig bzhin yongs su sreg ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-18: bag med pa'i me lce drug shin tu stobs che bar gyur kyang de dag des mi rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-19: bag med pa des yid phrogs shing bag med pa'i gnas su skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132a-20: bag med pa des nyams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-0: legs par byas pa'i las des yul gyi bde ba la lhag par dga' ba zad pa med pa de ni ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de nas bde ba myong bar @132b byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-1: gang gi tshe las zad par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-2: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-3: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-5: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-6: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-7: de las de dang rgyu mthun par bkres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-9: ngal ba dang; lo nyes 'byung ba'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-10: rtag par shin tu bde bar gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-11: yul ma mthong ba rnams su 'ongs na yang dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-13: de la bya ba med bzhin du'ang mal stan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-14: na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyis yo byad mang po dag sbyin pa byed pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-15: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de; lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-16: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas brtan dga' zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo; ;der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-17: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-18: gang gis spong ba'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong yid skyo bar bya ba'i phyir mi ro'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-19: mi ro lta bur bris pa zhig bzhag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:132b-20: de bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten brtan dga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-1: tu brtan dga' de bee d'urya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-5: margad lta bu'i mtho ris kyi gnas dag na yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-6: yang du dga' bar byed cing nyin gcig bzhin du bde ba par chad med pa 'bum snyed dag myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-7: rol mo mang po du ma 'bum snyed dag mang du thos na bar chad med par dga' ba lhag par chags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-8: kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni dper byar yang med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-13: dris myos shing dga' ba mang po du ma 'byung ngo; ;der dga' ba 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-15: tshal mthong na dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-16: bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin na dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-18: lha mo mthong na dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-19: rgyags par gnas na dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-20: dri zhim pos dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-21: thags su ma btags pa'i gos gyon na dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-22: spos sna tshogs kyis phog na dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-24: btung ba'i tshogs na dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-26: nam mkha' la 'gro bas dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-27: snying du sdug pa'i lha mthong na dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-28: rin po che'i ri'i rtse mo nas ri'i rtse mo blta na dga' ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-29: de dag la sogs pas mngon par dga' la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133a-30: dga' ba du ma gzhan rnams la yang shin tu chags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-0: bde ba shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i kun dga' @133b ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-1: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-2: rang gis byas pa'i bde ba la gnas pa lha'i bde ba rnam pa du ma de dag ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong pa legs par byas pa'i las de zad par ma gyur ba de srid du myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-3: las de zad nas de nas yang lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-4: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-6: dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-7: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-8: de las de dang rgyu mthun par skyed mos tshal sna tshogs kyi nang na gnas shing shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-9: bgo ba'i gos sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-12: blta bar bya ba sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-13: de nas yang dge slong des rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-14: las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnam par phye nas gnas bzhi pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-15: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas pi wang can gsum pa zhes bya ba'i lha rnams mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:133b-16: de rnams kyi gnas bcu po yang 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-0: @134a *// skyil mo krung gi steng du skye ba dang ldan par gnas pa dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-1: lha pi wang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas ni bcu po de dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-2: dge slong de de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par 'byed par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-3: gnas de rnams su lha dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-4: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-5: 'di ltar las de dag byed na de ltar de dang mthun par skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-6: las de dang mthun par rnam par smin pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-7: de la rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas dang po dri dga' zhes bya bar der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-8: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-9: sems pa dang ldan par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-10: des sems bsgoms pa des lus bsgoms pa gang gis bsod nams bsags par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-11: dge 'dun dag la kun dga' ra ba'i sa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-12: bu ram shing gi ra ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-14: shing aa mra'i ra ba phul la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-15: de'ang yongs su spyod par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-16: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dri dga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-17: der skyes nas kyang bde ba du ma thob cing spyod pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-19: tsandan sa mchog gi byug pas lus byugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134a-20: lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-0: cha byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa dgod @134b pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-2: sgeg chos la mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig padma'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-4: nags tshal gyi bar dag na me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-6: yid rab tu dga' ba rnams dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-8: de'i lha'i dri rnam pa du ma dag padma'i tshal de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-9: lha'i me tog de dag brtol nas dpag tshad brgyar bsung stobs cher 'byung ngo; ;dri snoms pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de dag thams cad dri shin tu nyams dga' zhing mchog tu yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du mas myos pa rnams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-10: yang lha'i dri des brgya 'gyur du myos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-11: shin tu myos pa'i lha'i ris de dag nyid la sems chags pa rnams lha de dag nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-12: rnam pa du ma brgya 'gyur du dga' mgur spyod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-13: de rnams lhan cig chu bo'i drung du 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-14: chu bo de dag gi ming ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-16: rin chen 'bab ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-17: rin po che'i dum bu 'bab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-20: sbrang rtsi 'bab pa'i chu bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-21: dbu ba rog rog 'bab pa dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-22: chu bo de dag thams cad kyi 'gram na bya ngang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-24: dur pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-26: shing ljon pas mtha' khebs pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:134b-27: shing de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi bya rnams kyis kun nas dkrigs shing sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-1: mo'i tshogs glu snyan pa len pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang bya'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-2: tshal gyi nang na rgyu ba'i bya gzhan sgra 'byin pa lha'i rnar snyan pa de dag la shin tu nyan par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-3: yul gyi 'dod pa la sems rnam pa chags shing bya'i sgra 'byin pa de la snying shin tu chags pa de dag gis bde ba de thams cad bor nas bya'i sgra de la nyan par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-4: bya'i sgra yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs dag thos na bde ba rnam pa du ma sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-5: sgra dbyangs bdun dang ldan zhing rgyun mi drag pa 'byin pa la nyan par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-6: chu bo gzhan dag tu sgra 'byin par lha mo rnams dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-7: glu dbyangs len dgod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-8: lha'i chang myos pa'i skyon dang bral ba dag la 'thung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-9: de dag de rnams kyis mthong nas kyang de rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-13: gser gyi ri bo gzhan dag gi rtse mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-18: padma'i tshal bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa rnams su lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-20: phyogs gzhan dag na bee d'urya sngon po'i dum bu lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135a-21: me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs pa'i phyogs dag na dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-0: de ltar @135b de legs par byas pa'i las de dang rgyu mthun par sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas mtho ris kyi bde ba yid du 'ong ba rnams pa du ma dag myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-1: lha'i bde ba de'ing dge slong des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas rtogs nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-2: rnam pa chags pa'i dbang po lnga //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-3: de ltar yul rnams lnga la chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-5: yul gyis tshim par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-6: yul rnams kun gyi nang na gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-7: 'dir ni bud med kho na lta //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-8: yul kun zil gyis mnan nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-10: tshogs pa dang ni ma tshogs dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-11: 'chi ba dang ni gtam brjod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-12: bud med rgyu las kun 'byung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-13: me yis mi 'di sreg par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-14: me ni tshogs dang 'bar 'gyur gyi; ;ma tshogs 'bar bar mi 'gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-15: tshogs na'ang 'bar la ma tshogs kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-17: me de'i yul de med pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-18: rgyang ring na go sreg mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-20: mi bzad dga' bas sreg par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-21: kun tu rtog pa'i shing skam 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-22: dga' ba ya yo'i shugs dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-23: sred pa'i mar la smyugs pa 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-24: 'dod chags me yis dga' bas sreg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-25: 'di ltar me yis lus gcig ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-26: bsregs nas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:135b-27: ming dang gzugs dang ma bral ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-0: @136a *// sreg byed mi bzad me la ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-1: 'byung po dga' bar mi byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-2: 'dod chags me ni rab rno yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-3: mi rnams yid ni 'byung mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-4: dbang po lnga las byung ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-5: 'di ni yul rnams lnga yis bsgribs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-6: sred pa rlung gi stobs dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-7: 'dod chags me yis skye dgu sreg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-8: rtog pa'i gtsub shing las byung ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-9: yul rnams kyis ni yongs su spel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-10: lus ni shing ltar sreg byed kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-11: de ni skye bos mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-12: ji lta ji ltar 'dod chags me //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-13: rab tu 'bar bas sreg byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-14: de lta de ltar 'dod chags dri //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-15: bde ba bzhin du yongs su bsten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-16: me ni rab tu gsal 'gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-17: 'dod chags me ni mun pas bsgribs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-18: de bas dug dang dgra lta bu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-19: brtan pos 'dod chags me spongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-20: de ltar dge slong des de dag mthong nas 'dod chags kyi mes sreg pa'i lha la snying brtse bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-21: lha'i sred par gtogs pa dag la yang skyon de dag rtogs nas sred par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-22: de ltar dri dga'i sa phyogs na bde ba rnam pa du ma dag ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba legs par byas pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-23: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136a-24: shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-0: dud 'gro'i nang du ma @136b skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-1: mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-2: de las de dang rgyu mthun par rtag tu sa phyogs bde ba thob cing shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-3: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-4: lha pi wang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-5: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-6: lha rnams kyi gnas sgra snyan pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-7: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-8: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-9: legs par byas pa'i las spyad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-11: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan par gyur pa gang gis lta ba log par zhugs pa dag la tshigs bcad gcig bstan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-12: de dag kyang sems yud tsam zhig sangs rgyas la dad pa skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-13: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sgra snyan pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-14: der skyes nas kyang dbang po yul la dga' zhing bde ba de lha'i mtsho 'gram na rtse ba la ni dga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-15: padma'i tshal gyi phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-16: gser gyi ri la gnas shing lha'i rol mo byed pa la ni dga'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-18: rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-19: 'dzum zhing 'jo sgeg la mngon par dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:136b-20: byad bzhin gyi mdangs sdug cing dbang phyug mtshungs pa med pa la dga' ba rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-1: tu nyin gcig bzhin bde ba la gnas pa rab tu 'phel zhing bee d'urya'i ri'i rtse mo dag na gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-2: bde ba sna tshogs spyod pa me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-3: phye ma dang; byug pas lus brgyan pa dag de na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-4: yul gyi rnam pa mang po la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-6: ri khrod yangs pa na gnas pa dag gser gyi ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-7: tshal rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-8: de na gser gyi ri 'di lta bu dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-10: ri mkha' thug ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-11: ri grib med ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-12: ri thams cad dga' zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-13: ri yid bzhin sprul ces bya ba dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-14: ri de dag ni rin po ches rnam par phye zhing mdzes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-15: gser gyi tshal gyis mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-16: ri'i rtse mo rnams na lha'i tshogs snying rab tu dga' ba rnams rtag tu glu dbyangs kyi sgra ni 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-18: zhing bsil la gtsang ba'i rgyun dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-19: padma'i rdzing rnams kyis ni rtag tu mdzes par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-20: bya rtag tu myos shing rnar snyan pa; sgra 'byin pa rnams ni nye ba na 'khod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-21: mig tu shin tu sdug pa'i ri'i sa phyogs kyi sman ljongs de rnams na rang gi las la spyod pa'i lha de dag dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-24: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-25: lha mo bzang mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137a-26: bya myos pa sgra 'byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-0: gser gyi bung ba myos pa mang po rnams kyis yongs @137b su bskor ba'i lha de dag thams cad reg na bde ba'i lha'i lcug ma'i khyim rnams su 'khor dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-1: de ltar de na gnas pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-2: ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba lha las ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-3: gang gi tshe zad par gyur pa dang de lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-4: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-6: dud 'gro rnams kyi 'khor bar yongs su 'khyam par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-7: gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-8: de las de dang rgyu mthun par rtag tu rigs shin tu che ba'i nang du skye zhing shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-9: skye bo kun gyis mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-10: ris mthun pa'i gzugs bzang po dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-11: ris mthun pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-15: skye bo dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-16: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-17: lha pi wang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-18: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi lha'i gnas de la chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-19: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:137b-20: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-0: legs par byas pa'i las kyi @138a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-2: de la rab tu chags pa'i yid sems dang ldan par gyur ba gang gis grogs po la skom phor gang tsam blud pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-3: 'gron po rnams la srog chags lu ta dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-5: sbrang bu mchu ring dag gis 'jigs pa las bde bar bya ba'i phyir khron pa dag 'gegs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-6: 'di ltar srog chags dug dang 'dres pa 'di dag gi dug chu'i nang du song na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-7: de las 'gron po lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ro snyam nas bya ba ci yang med kyis kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-8: byams sems kyis khron pa la 'thung ba'i skye bo gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir gzhi de las de g-yog par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-9: skyes bu dge ba de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha pi wang thogs pa rnams kyi gnas de la chags pa zhes bya bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-10: der skyes nas kyang de'i lus ni nyi ma gnyis pa lta bur gzi che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-11: legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis lus thams cad ni brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-15: 'bab chu na gnas pa rnams de dang spyod pa'i ngang tshul mthun pa'i lha mo'i tshogs gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138a-17: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-0: reg bya sdug pa du ma la rab tu chags shing mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa @138b yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-1: gnas de dag na rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-2: tshal 'di lta bu dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-4: rnyis pa med pa'i tshal ni tshal de na me tog rnams kyang rnyis pa med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-5: dri dang yang bral ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-6: gser gyi grib ma'i tshal zhes bya ba gser gyi lcug mas dra bar bres shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-7: bee d'urya'i bung ba rnams kyis mdzes par byas la; rma bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-9: bya de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi sgro gshog dang ldan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-10: sgra snyan cing 'jebs par 'byin pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-11: tshal de na shin tu nyams dga' bar yang bdag nyid kyis mthong nas shin tu bde bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-12: de na bya 'di lta bu dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-15: lha rnams kyi snying la 'dod pa bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag des sgra 'byin par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-16: de thos nas lha rnams kyang ngo mtshar cher skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-17: 'di ltar bya 'di dag ni lha dang mthun pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-18: gang bdag cag gi yid la 'dod pa de dag bya de rnams sgra 'byin par byed do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-19: bya chu zhim gnas zhes bya ba de dag gi kha nas chang ro dang dri'i ngo bo gtsang ba phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ngo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-20: kha nas byung ba'i chang de la yang bya gzhan rnams 'thung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:138b-21: de 'thungs nas bya de dag bcu 'gyur du myos shing yid rab tu dga' nas brgya 'gyur du sgra 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-0: lha de dag gi nang na glu dbyangs phan tshun 'dres pa brgya 'gyur du snyan @139a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-2: bya de dag gi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-3: lha mo de dag gi glu dbyangs thos nas 'dod pa la chags pa'i lha yid shin tu bde ba rnams brgya 'gyur du dga' ba skye zhing de dag gi glu dbyangs dang sgra la chags par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-4: bya mchu sgyur 'gro zhes bya ba gang dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba sgra 'khrol ba'i gsab gseb na dga' bar byed pa la 'di ltar ci 'di na bya'i sgra 'byin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-5: ci dril bu g-yer kha'i sgra 'byin ces gsal bar mi mngon pa de ltar de dag dang lhan cig sgra 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-6: phan tshun 'dres pa nyis 'gyur du'ang snyan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-7: bya 'gram gyi mtha' na spyod pa zhes bya ba gang chang rtag tu chu bo ltar 'bab pa'i 'gram dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-8: gser gyi padma'i bar bar dag na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-9: bya grib ma'i nang na rgyu ba zhes bya ba gang ji tsam du sred pa'i rnam pa dang 'dres na gzugs kyi rnam pa de tsam 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-10: rnam pa de srid du gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-11: bya chags pa zhes bya ba gang gal te lha shin tu nyams dga' ba rnams dang nye bar lha mo de dag gnas na brgya 'gyur du mdzes te tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-12: nags tshal du ma rnams kyi nang na yang rtag tu bde bar gnas pa dag dga' bar byed do; ;yid la bsams pa gang yin pa de dang de dag nyid 'grub par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139a-13: shin tu rgya che bar gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-0: lha mo'i @139b tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba'i lha de tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-1: nye ba'i tshal de rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-4: bee d'urya'i ri'i rtse mo gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-5: gzhan dag la bee d'urya'i padma'i rdzing gis yongs su bskor cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-7: ka randa pas kyang bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-8: bee d'urya sngon po lta bu'i chu shin tu dri zhim pas gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-11: dngul gyi shing ljon pa shin tu dri zhim pa rnam pa du mas gtibs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-12: kun nas ri 'di lta bu kun yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-17: de rnams su lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i lha thams cad nam mkha' las 'gro zhing 'bab la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-18: kun nas dga' bar byed cing dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-19: gzugs sdug pa 'bum phrag du ma dag la lta bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-20: sgra snyan pa 'jebs pa yid du 'ong ba 'bum phrag du ma la nyan par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-21: dri zhim pa bro che ba yid du 'ong ba 'bum phrag du ma dag la snom par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-22: de bzhin du reg pas reg par bya ba dag la reg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-23: de ltar dbang po thams cad yul la myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-24: rang gis byas pa de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas de dag na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:139b-25: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-0: @140a *// shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-3: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-4: de las de dang rgyu mthun par rtag par rgyun du bde ba dang ldan zhing kun dga'i ra bar bde bar gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-6: skye bo thams cad la sdug par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-7: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-8: lha pi wang can gsum pa'i gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-9: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas skyor chus skyes zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-10: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-11: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-12: legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-13: sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-14: snying rjes brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang gis sems can 'chi bar 'gyur ba skom gyis gdungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140a-15: mgul sgra ngar ngar por bgags shing srog cung zad yod pa la skom blud dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-0: de bzhin du gang gis de'i srog bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sman dag byin na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten pi wang @140b gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang skyor chus skyes pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-1: der skyes nas kyang de'i dbang po'i lus dang mtshungs shing lha mo'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-2: bde ba rgyun mi 'chad pa la rtag tu gnas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-3: de ltar rang gi las la spyod pa de tshal du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-5: 'bab chu du ma dag kyang rab tu mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-6: de res 'ga' lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-7: tshal phreng zhes bya ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-8: tshal de yang chu bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-10: padma'i tshal du ma dag gis brgyan cing lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag gi mdzes bar byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-11: lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rab tu dga' ba rnams kyis gang ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-12: tshal de ni shing ljon pa me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-15: bya'i sgra ca co snyan pa 'byin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-16: tshal de ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-19: yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i me tog manda ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-21: de ji ltar dga' ba rnams kyis bskor ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-22: me tog de dag gi dri'i mthu ni 'di lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-23: lha rnams dri ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar me tog de dag las 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:140b-24: me tog de gcig gis me tog de thams cad kyi dri'i bya ba byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-0: tshal phreng ba de nyid na lha rab tu dga' zhing bro gar byed pa phan tshun grogs su gyur @141a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-1: pa rnams tshal me tog lnga pa zhes bya bar 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-2: de na yang bya dus su dran par byed pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-3: des lha de dag mthong nas 'di ltar tshig 'brel ba'i tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-4: bsod nams dag ni nyams dga' la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-5: de dag 'bras bu mchog tu dge /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-6: bsod nams lta bur sgrol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-7: de lta bas na bsod nams byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-8: bsod nams gnyen gyi mchog yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-9: bsod nams gter ni zad mi shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-10: bsod nams mar me lta bu yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-11: de bzhin pha dang ma dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-12: bsod nams byas na 'gro ba'i lha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-14: mi yul bsod nams byas pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-15: de dag lha yul dga' bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-16: 'di ltar bsod nams che ba'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-17: rtag tu bde dang ldan par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-18: bsod nams lta bu'i bde ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-19: de lta bas na bsod nams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-20: 'jig rten gnyis la phan byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-21: dga' dang nor gyi rgyur gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-22: bsod nams yin par rtag tu mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-23: de ltar bsod nams bde mchog ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-24: rtag tu bsod nams rjes 'brang ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-25: de ni grib ma bzhin du 'brang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-26: de bas bsod nams bde mchog ste; ;bsod nams lta bu'i bde ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-27: bsod nams zad pa'i lha rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141a-28: rang gis byas pa'i rjes su ltung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-0: de bas bsod nams @141b yang dag spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-1: lha yi yul du bdag cag gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-2: dud 'gro'i skye gnas mthun par gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-3: bsod nams ma yin rgyur gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-4: rang gis byas pas sems rmongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-5: gang zhig bsod nams dman pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-7: bye ma la ni mar med ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-8: de la bde ba ga la yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-9: sems kyis bslus pa'i rmongs pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-10: bsod nams kyis ni yongs su spangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-11: de dag la ni bde med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-12: de dag sdug bsngal mtha' med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-13: yang dang yang du skye 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-15: lha dag bde bas myos pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-16: de dag la ni bde rtag med; ;las kyis rgyar ni bcug gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-17: gti mug gis ni bslus pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-18: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-20: lha dag lha yi 'jig rten nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-22: de ni dmyal las dmyal bar ru //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-23: de yis dper byar yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-24: bde mtha' rtag tu ltung bar go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-25: 'di dag ci zhig mi shes sam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-26: lha rnams 'chi med yul lta bur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-27: bde bas rmongs rnams lta bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-29: grangs su bgrang du yod med kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-30: sred pas yongs su bslus pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-31: mi rnams yid ni 'byung mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-32: de nas lha de rnams lha'i bya de'i sgra de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-33: cung zad cig yid la byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:141b-34: yang bag med pa de nyid kyi dbang du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-0: sred pas srid par spyod pa de dag thams cad ni sems @142a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-1: la rtag tu rag las pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-2: phreng ba'i tshal de na bde ba las bde bar gnas ba de dag sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas bro gar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-4: yul bud shing lta bur gyur pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-5: bag med pa me lta bus rgyun mi 'chad par sreg pa na yul nas yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-6: nye ba'i tshal nas nye ba'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-7: ri'i steng nas ri'i steng dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-8: gzhal med khang nas gzhal med khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-9: padma'i tshal nas padma'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-10: rin po che'i ri'i rtse mo nas rin po che'i ri'i rtse mor rgyu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-11: de ltar lha mo dang lhan cig yul gyi sred pas bdas pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-12: lha de rnams ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha'i 'jig rten de na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-13: de zad nas de nas yang lhung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-14: lhung nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-17: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na de las de dang rgyu mthun par tshe rabs tshe rabs su nad med par 'gyur zhing nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-18: skye bo dam pa kun gyi yid du 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-20: skom pa dang bral ba'i yul bzang por skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-21: me tog gis brgyan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142a-22: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-0: lha @142b pi wang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-1: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha pi wang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas lus dkar zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-2: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-3: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-4: zhing dang zhing ma yin pa'i rnam pa shes shing yid shin tu dang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-5: sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-6: der yid zhugs shing sems g-yeng ba med pa las kyi 'bras bu mngon par shes pa gang gis mchod rten nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-7: dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi skyang nul rlung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-9: char pas zad pa slar skyang nul byugs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-10: de ltar byas nas de rjes su dga' zhing gzhan dag kyang de nyid la dga' bar byed du 'jug la; lugs bzhin du 'jug ste de ltar byed na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lus dkar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-11: der skyes nas kyang de dag thams cad dkar bo kho nar snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-12: de'i khyad par ni dung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-15: 'o ma dang bcas pa dag ni bcu drug gi char mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-16: de ltar rnam pa de lta bu'i gzhal med khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-19: gzhan dag kyang kun nas dkar zhing mchog tu dkar por snang bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:142b-20: 'di ltar lus kyang mchog tu dkar ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-0: @143a *// dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can de dag skyed mos tshal du dga' ston byed du 'dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-1: 'di ltar byu ru'i tshal zhes bya ba gnas de dag tu sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing dgod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-2: shin tu yid dga' ba'i grogs po rnams dang lhan cig tshal der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-3: de ltar de dag byu ru'i tshal gyi nang du 'dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-4: gang gi tshe zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-5: bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing gser btso ma'i shing ljon pas mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-6: shing ljon pa'i nye ba'i tshal gyis mdzes par byas pa'i byu ru'i tshal de'i mthu ni 'di lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-7: ji ltar kha dog dmar po gzhan dang mi mthun par 'byung ba de ltar shing ljon pa'i 'od dmar po rnam pa de lta bu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-8: lha de dag thams cad tshal de'i mthus dkar po de rnams dang bral nas kha dog shin tu dmar por gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-9: phan tshun gtam du bdag cag gi lus lhan cig skyes pa'i mdzes pa gang yin pa de dag tshal gyi kha dog gi mthus mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-10: shing ljon pa de dag kun nas kha dog dmar po kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-11: bdag cag ni tshal gzhan du 'dong bar bya'o zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143a-12: de nas lha de rnams lha mo de dag dang lhan cig bee d'urya'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-0: tshal de yang bee d'urya'i mdog des ji ltar dzambu'i gling gi gnam @143b ltar kun nas sngo ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-1: de nas lha rnams tshal der yang kha dog dkar po gang yin pa de dag bee d'urya'i shing ljon pa'i dbyibs de rnams kyis kyang zil gyis mnan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-2: shing de rnams la bya gnas pa gang yin pa de dag kha dog sngon por gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-3: padma gang yin pa de dag kyang sngon por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-4: de ltar bee d'urya'i tshal de dag thams cad sngon po nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-5: de nas lus dkar ba lha mo'i tshogs mang pos yongs su bskor ba lha'i rol mo'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-7: glu dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams tshal de na yun ring du dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-9: dga' mgur spyod par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-10: lha'i bde ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-11: de nas yun ring zhig lon nas lha lus dkar po rnams rtse ba'i don du dngul gyi shing ljon pa'i tshal du 'dor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-12: dngul gyi tshal de nas kun nas kha dog dkar por snang zhing tshal de na gang ci yod pa de thams cad dkar ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-13: tshal de na padma yang dngul gyi padma shin tu nyams dga' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-14: bya rnams kyang dngul gyi bya yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-15: de ltar lha lus dkar po dang ldan pa de dag thams cad tshal de'i nang du zhugs pa ji ltar 'o ma'i nang na zla ba'i gzugs brnyan snang ba de ltar mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:143b-16: tshal de na lha rnams yun ring du dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-0: dga' mgur spyod par byed cing lha'i dpe med pa 'dod pa'i bde ba yan lag lnga dang ldan pas @144a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-1: bde ba myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-2: de dag der yang dga' bar byas nas lus sna tshogs ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-3: tshal de yang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing gser gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang mdzes par byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-4: de bzhin du dngul gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-5: de bzhin du bee d'urya'i shing ljon pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-6: de bzhin du lo ma sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-7: shing de rnams kyang kha dog sna tshogs kyi lo ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-8: mdog sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-9: tshal de'i nang na lha de rnams de dag nyid kyis lus rnams rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-10: tshal de na yang lha de rnams yun ring du dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-11: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-12: lha mo'i tshogs kyi nang na 'khod pa rnams de dag gis glu dbyangs nye bar len cing de na yang de rnams yun ring du rtses nas kun tu mthong ba'i gser gyi ri ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-13: de yang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-14: lha de dag gis ri kun mthong chu bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144a-16: lteng ka mang pos brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-0: bya'i tshogs mang po'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri bo de la 'dzegs nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab drug khris bskor ba de rnams kyi dbus na ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'dug pa de dag @144b thams cad mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-1: de nas lha lus dkar po rnams kun nas mthong ba'i ri bo de la lha mo dang lhan cig yun ring du rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-2: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-3: de nas yang de rnams de las babs nas ri bo phyogs gtsang ma zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dzeg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-4: ri bo de la yang gnas gzhan dag nas skyes pa'i lha rnams dga' ba'i mthus ri bo de la 'ongs nas dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-5: lha gzhan de rnams dang lha lus dkar po de rnams dang yang phan tshun lhan cig sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed cing dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-6: de nas lha yul gyi phyogs cha dga' ba de rnams su lha de dag yun ring du dga' bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-7: mar zad nas mar me 'chi bar 'gyur zhing nyin par gyi mtha' zad na nyi ma nub par 'gyur ba de ltar lha de rnams legs par byas pa'i las zad nas mar me ltar lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-8: shi nas kyang nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-10: dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-11: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-12: de las de dang rgyu mthun par padma'i rtsa lag lta bur mdog dkar sham bzang por 'gyur zhing stong phyogs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-13: rgya yul la sogs par skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-14: rtag tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:144b-15: mi'i gtso bo chen po'i yid gcugs par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-1: yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha pi wang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas su rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-3: lha'i 'jig rten na lha phan tshun dga' ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-4: gnas der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-5: sems can dge ba phan tshun grogs su gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-8: grol ba'i dge 'dun gyi gtso bor gyur pa gang dag gis sbyin pa byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-9: tshul khrims bsrungs na de dag thams cad rgyu de dang rkyen de las lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten phan tshun dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-10: der skyes nas kyang phan tshun bde ba bskyed cing sems mthun par bskyed pa de rnams bsod nams kyi tshogs smin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-11: de na lha'i padma'i rdzing na gnas shing kha zas la dga' ba de yul nyams dga' zhing bde ba dag myong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-12: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yid rab tu dga' ba dag dgod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-14: rtse bar byed; dga' mgur spyod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-16: cha byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145a-17: rin po che sna tshogs kyi sa gzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-0: @145b ri de rnams la dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-1: de ltar rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod cing dga' ba de rnams su chu bo'i 'gram bee d'urya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-2: nor bu'i lan kan bres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-3: gser gyi rnam pa'i bya ngang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-4: dur pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-5: 'gram na shing ljon pa skyes pa rnams kyi sdug gur brgyan pa'i sman ljongs dag na lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rnams dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-6: der de dag dga' bar byas nas mu tig 'bab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chu bo ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-7: chu bo de dag na chu gang yin pa de dag ni chang ro rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa rnyog pa med pa 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-8: bye ma gang yin pa de dag ni mu tig yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-9: 'dam rdzab gang yin pa de dag ni gser yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-10: chu bo de nor bu kha dog bzang po du mas brgyan pa nya rnams kyis shin tu mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-11: de'i ngos gnyis ka na gser gyi shing ljon pa rnams la 'dab ma ni bee d'urya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-12: bee d'urya'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi 'dab ma yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-13: 'dab ma yod pa de thams cad la dus tshigs thams cad kyi 'bras bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-14: me tog bzang dgus khebs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-15: bya'i tshogs rtag par rab tu dga' ba rnams kyis kun tu gang la thos na yid 'phrog pa'i sgra 'byin pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-16: bya'i tshogs mthong na dga' ba rnam pa de lta bu dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-17: rtag tu kun nas dga' ba'i lha de rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:145b-18: lhan cig byed blta bur dus thams cad du dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-1: de rnams kyis yang dag par dga' bar byas nas phyogs gzhan snyan pa spyod pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-2: phyogs de nas lcug mas g-yogs po'i khyim yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-3: rin po che mrgad kyi dum bu ring po skyon med pas phye bas phyogs kyi rim pa mtho dma' dang ldan zhing padma'i tshal gyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-4: sa phyogs shin tu rnam par phye ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi bya rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-5: la la dag na yang gser gyi sa gzhi'i phyogs nyams dga' bar bee d'urya'i lcug ma'i dra bas gtibs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-6: bung ba dang me tog gis kun tu gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-7: lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rtag tu dga' ya ya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-8: rab tu dga' ba rnams kyis kun tu gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-9: legs par byas pa'i las la spyod pa'i lha de rnams kun tu dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-10: de nas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-14: 'bab stegs mang po yod par 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-16: tshal de dag na chu na rgyu ba'i bya mdog bzang po gang yin pa de rnams kyis nam mkha'i phyogs de dag thams cad bar mtshams med par kun tu bkang nas sgra 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-17: chang chu bo ltar 'bab pa rnyog pa med pa rnam pa du ma dag 'bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-18: gser gyi rdo las dba' rlabs kyi sgra 'byung zhing dbu ba 'khrugs pa'i sgra khro lo lo 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146a-19: bya rab tu dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa long long po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-0: chu bo @146b de rnams kyi ngos gnyis ka na 'khod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rnams dang dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-2: lag na gser gyi padma thogs pa rnams phan tshun rdeg pa na de ltar phan tshun yid gcugs pa lhan cig rtse ba de rnams kyis dus ring du 'das so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-3: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-5: phyogs de nas kyang myos byed tshal zhes bya ba der lha thams cad rtse ba'i grogs dang lhan cig 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-6: tshal de na sems kyi rnam pa thams cad myos byed kyis mun par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-7: bya de dag ni 'bras bu'i ro rnams kyis myos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-8: bee d'urya'i bung ba dag ni me tog gi ro rnams kyis myos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-9: khu byug dag ni dpyid mthong nas myos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-10: 'gram na rgyu ba'i bya dag ni chang gi ro rnams kyis myos; de bzhin du lha rnams ni lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis myos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-11: de bzhin du lha mo rnams kyang lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i ros myos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-12: de ltar 'dod pa'i ros myos pa'i bud med rnams ni gzhan gyis myos par mi 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-13: 'di ltar bud med thams cad ni 'dod pa lhur len pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:146b-18: lha de dag kyang myos byed mthong nas brgya 'gyur du myos pa rnams de na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-0: de ltar lha de rnams ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las zad @147a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-1: par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-2: de las de zad nas lha'i ris de nas kyang 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-3: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-6: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-7: bsod nams gcig pa de dag thams cad yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-9: grong khyer gcig tu skye bar 'gyur zhing thams cad 'byor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-10: thams cad rigs che zhing btsun par skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-11: thams cad phan tshun dga' zhing bya ba gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-12: dge ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-13: de dag las de dang rgyu mthun par dge ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-14: mi dge ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun la 'byung gi so so la ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-15: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-16: lha pi wang can gsum pa'i gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-17: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-18: lha pi wang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas yang dag chags spyod ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-19: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147a-20: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-0: zhal tam tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa gang gis khyim pa gzhan dag dga' bar @147b byas; gzengs bstod mgu bar byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-1: dad par byas nas sems yongs su bsgoms pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-2: zhing yon tan dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin du bcug cing tshul khrims kyang srung du bcug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-3: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yang dag chags spyod kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-4: der skyes nas kyang rang gi mthu 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-5: las gang gis bdag cag 'dir skyes shig gu snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-6: de dag mir skyes pa yang dag par dran no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-7: 'di ni mi'i 'jig rten na bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-8: 'di'i sbyin bdag ni bdag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-11: gzhi des de dang bdag bsod nams mthun par gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-12: 'dir 'ongs pa lta zhig gu snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-13: de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyan thos de yang skye ba dran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-14: 'di ltar 'di ni bdag gi sems dang bas sbyin pa sbyin du bcug pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-17: gzhi des de nas bdag lha'i 'jig rten 'dir sems dang ldan par skyes lta snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-18: de ltar yang dag chags spyod kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-19: de nas gzhan du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-20: padma'i tshogs lta bu'i lha mo mang po byad gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:147b-23: sdug pa so so du mas brgyan pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-0: lha mo de dag mthong nas lha de rnams kyis mthong ma thag tu ji ltar tshe rabs snga ma la byas pa shin tu phra mo yang mi dran zhing @148a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-1: yul la sems rnam par chags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-2: bag med pa'i gnas su skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-3: yul gyi bde bas sems phrogs pa de ltar 'dod pa rnams kyis 'phangs pa'i yid skye bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-4: de nas yang dag chags spyod kyi lha rnams kyis lha mo'i tshogs 'bum phrag du ma byad gzugs dpe med pa dang ldan pa de dag mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-5: thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'i 'dod chags kyi mes yid rab tu bsregs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-6: ji ltar mes pud shing skam po yun ring du sreg par byed pa de ltar lha de rnams kyi yid de dag rab tu sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-7: lha mo de dag ga la ba der 'gro bar byed la lha mo rtag tu 'dod pa la don gcig tu byed pa yang kha rlangs dri zhim pos nam mkha' 'gengs shing lha'i cha byad du ma thogs la lag na padma khyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-8: lha ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-9: de nas lha de rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-10: lha mo de rnams lha'i 'dod pa bde ba rnam pa du ma de dag myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-11: de nas bag med pa de lta bur rig nas dge slong de 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam nga ba du ma las yid byung nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-12: nyin mo gsar du byung ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-13: rnying pa med par byed pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-14: bde dang sdug bsngal sar ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-15: rnying pa nye bar rjod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-16: de ltar lha yi 'jig rten du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-17: bde ba 'dzin pa'i skye bo dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148a-19: ji ste 'bral ba'i mtha' mi rig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-0: ji ltar @148b shing dang sbrang rtsir bsres //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-1: ji ltar dug dang zas bsres pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-2: de ltar bde ba 'di kun gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-3: mtha' mi bde ba mi rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-4: lha yul du ni lhag par yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-5: yul rnams lta la ga la ngoms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-6: sred pas ngoms pa med pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-7: khyad par du yang ga la bde //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-8: shin tu bde ba'i stobs las ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-9: lha yul rnams su ye nas sred //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-10: sred mes yongs su gdung rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-11: bde bar nye bar ma dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-12: gcig tu bde spyod sred bral zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-13: nga med re ba med pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-15: bde gang yin pa de thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-16: gang dag sred pa'i bag la nyal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-17: yong ye sems la mi 'jog pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-18: de dag thog mtha'i dri ma bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-19: bde ba'i nang na'ang de bde 'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-20: sems ni shin tu bsdus pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-21: thams cad du ni re med dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-22: bya dang mi bya ma rmongs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-23: bde ba rtag tu nye bar gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-24: gang gis 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-25: dga' bcas 'byung ba bcom pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-26: brtan po gtso de pha rol 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-27: bde ldan mya ngan 'das la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-28: gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-29: sred bcas de la bde ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-30: gang zhig 'dod chags me las grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-31: de ni dri med bde bar 'dod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:148b-32: de ltar dge slong des bag med pa la gnas pa'i lha de rnams nyin gcig bzhin du sred pa'i me rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'i bag med pa rnams mthong nas snying rje bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-0: de nas lha de rnams kyang lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu tshal @149a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-1: du bas 'khrigs pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der lha mo'i tshogs g-yer ba rol mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-3: gad mo sna tshogs 'don pas yongs su bskor ba bde bar gnas pa rnams skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-4: kha cig ni lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas nam mkha' la bya bzhin du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-5: kha cig ni gzhal med khang bya ngang pas bteg pa rnams kyis 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-6: kha cig ni grogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang rnams kyis 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-7: kha cig ni lha mo'i tshogs de dag nyid kyis bskor nas rkang pas 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-8: bde bar gnas pa de rnams glu dbyangs len zhing lus ngal ba med pa de thams cad tshal du bas 'khrigs pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-9: de nas tshal de na lha gzhan sngar 'ongs pa gang yin pa de rnams kyis lha gzhan de dag mthong nas de nas yang rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-10: yid shin tu mgu bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-11: de nas lha gsar du 'ongs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-12: lha rnying pa rnams phan tshun 'dres nas ca co dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-14: rab tu dga' zhing nyams dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-15: du bas 'khrigs pa'i tshal de kun sgra rnam pa du mas kun tu gang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-21: lha mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149a-22: de bzhin du de na glu dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-0: chu mang @149b po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-1: rin po che'i bya kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-2: dbyibs rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-3: lha rnams kyi glu dbyangs kyi sgra thos na snyan pa dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-4: de ltar tshal de sgra snyan pa kun gyis gang pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-5: tshal de na lha'i sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-10: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-11: lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor pa dag gis lha rnams skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod byas nas bde ba nyams su myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-12: de rnams tshal de nas byung nas yang lhun po so sor snang ba zhes bya ba'i ri'i rtse mo ga la ba der lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-13: lha de rnams der 'dong ba na so sor snang ba'i ri'i rtse mo der lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-16: nye ba'i tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i ri'i rtse mo de na rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-17: 'jig rten thams cad kyi don sgrub cing mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-18: chos kyis bskyed pa'i mi chos dang ldan pa ni ji tsam zhig yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-19: chos dang mi ldan pa ni ji tsam zhig yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-20: 'jig rten la phan par sgrub pa ni ji tsam zhig yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-21: phan par mi sgrub pa ni ji tsam zhig yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-22: dam pa'i chos kyi mthu che'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-23: chos ma yin pa mthu che /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:149b-24: bdud kyi phyogs lha ma yin brtan pa dang /
