K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-4: de nas dzambu'i gling du chos dang mi ldan zhing chos ma yin pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i mi de dag de bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ba rnams brgya byin la smra bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-5: dzambu'i gling na mi chos dang mi ldan zhing chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa mar mi 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-7: dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-9: rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dag mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-11: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'grib bo zhes bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-12: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-13: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-14: sum cu rtsa gsum pa ji ltar phyogs pa rnams la bos nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-15: lha ma yin brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-17: klu chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa rab 'joms la sogs pa sa'i 'og nas langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-18: bdag cag la g-yul 'gyed du'ong go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-20: de nas brgya byin gyi bka' de mnos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-21: gang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams brgya byin gyi bkas shin tu rings par lag cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-22: mtshon cha sna tshogs snga ma bzhin tshogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-23: ri bo zla ba zhes bya ba'i rig la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191a-24: de nas 'jig rten skyong ba de rnams dong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-0: lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang @191b lha'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis ni bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-3: lang tsho la bab pa'i gzugs rgyan sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-4: lha mo rnams ni rjes su 'brang zhing lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig thams cad mngon par 'byor ces bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-5: skyed mos tshal gang yin pa de ri rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-6: skra lta bur cung zad 'dra ba'i dper bya na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-7: 'di ltar zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-8: nyi ma gza'i tshogs kyis bskor ba mi mthun par mthong ba lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-9: ri rab gser gyi ri stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-10: shing ljon pa lha'i gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-14: padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i skyed mos tshal de lha'i me tog gis mdzes par byas shing bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor la sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa lha'i padma'i rdzing rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-15: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi glang po che'i rgyal pos srung gi bu zhes bya ba skyed mos tshal chen po de na rdzing de dag snga ma bzhin yod pa'i nang na bal glang mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-16: gser dang; bee d'urya'i padma'i 'dam bu'i nang na bal glang mo dang lhan cig rtse zhing yul der 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:191b-17: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha'i tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-0: lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis @192a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-2: glang po che'i rgyal po de'ang de lta bu yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-3: padma gser bcom lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-4: nam mkha' la nyi ma 'bum phrag 'char ba de lta bu'i 'od bzang po 'char ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa der de dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-7: dud 'gror gyur kyang lha'i bde ba myong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-8: de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin der song nas lag pa gnyis kyis byugs shing phyi bdar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-9: kye; bdag gi glang po che'i rgyal po 'di ni g-yul 'gyed pa la dgos pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-11: lha ma yin 'thab pa'i tshe 'di'i steng nas bdag rgyal ba thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-12: de nas glang po che mchog phyi bdar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-13: skyed mos tshal thams cad 'byor ldan na khang bzang mya ngan bral zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-14: chu'i zam pa lta bu'i skad de las 'dzegs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-16: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-17: der zhugs nas lha'i rgyal po de lha mo bye ba phrag dgu'i mdun na rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-19: lha'i rgyal po de rnams dang lhan cig lha'i 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur bar rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-21: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192a-22: lha'i rgyal po rang gi las dang mthun par longs spyod 'byor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-0: lha'i @192b rgyal po de ji srid du 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-2: yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-3: so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba bde ba'i rnam par smin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-4: bde ba so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad par ma gyur ba de srid du 'di lta skyed mos tshal brgya snyed kyis brgyan pa'i lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang gi skyed mos tshul de na ba de ba kun dang ldan zhing lha'i tshogs thams cad dang bcas pas yan lag lha dang ldan pa'i rol mo rnams kyis rtse bar byed dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-5: de dag phyis lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-6: shi nas kyang ji ltar las de dang nye bar 'gro zhing myong bar 'gyur ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-8: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-9: gal te mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-10: de las de dang rgyu mthun par mchog tu bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-11: rig pa'i blo dri ma med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-17: rtsa lag dang bde bar lhan cig 'khong par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-18: lha'i rgyal bo de ni ngan song gi sgo bcad pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-19: lha de dag gi 'chi 'pho ba la mngon par btags nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-20: sa gang yin pa de dag gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-21: tshal ni padma sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:192b-22: rtse mo mchog ste nyams dga' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-0: @193a *// rin po che dang ldan pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-1: mtsho dang 'bab chu rin po che'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-2: rdo ba sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-3: ljon shing me tog sna tshogs dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-4: bya ni sna tshogs dag gis khebs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-5: gser las byas pa'i dpag bsam shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-6: kha cig dri med bee d'urya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-7: dngul dang gser ni btso ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-8: tshal ni rnam par 'dres pa bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-9: bung ba rnams ni sgra 'byin pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-10: padma'i rdzing ni rnam par mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-11: khang bzang mchog ni nyams dga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-12: rin po che ni che dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-13: rnam par brgyan pa nyams dga' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-14: lha la 'os pa thams cad yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-15: de dag thams cad de bzhin 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-16: skye bo rnams ni yongs su 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-17: kye ma sred pas bslus pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-18: lha rnams kun gyi bde ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-19: sgyu ma chu bur dbu ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-20: dri za'i grong khyer lta bu yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-21: sred pa dug dang me 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-23: sred pa'i mtshor ni 'khyam byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-24: skye bo de kun 'jig par byed; ;'dod pa longs pas chog mi shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-25: bde ba 'dong pas chog mi shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-26: 'chi ba'i me yis rnam bsregs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-27: lha tshogs de dag ga las 'ongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-29: ye nas ngan te 'phags pa min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-30: gang gis rnam par rmongs pa'i lha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-31: 'chi ba yi ni dbang du song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193a-32: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-0: gnod sbyin sems @193b can dmyal ba klu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-1: 'chi ba'i zhags pa mi bzad par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-3: khams gsum pa ste 'di dag kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-4: 'chi ba'i zhags pas sbrel gyur kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-5: sred pa'i rmongs pas rmongs pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-6: dbang med mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-7: de ltar brgya byin gyis rtag tu lha de rnams kyi skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-8: gzhan mi rtag pa 'chi ba dag mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-9: lha dag shin tu go bar bya ba'i tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-10: 'byung po kun la phan bzhed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-11: bcom ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-13: 'jig rten pa la mang du gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-14: mdor na shes dang shes bya dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-15: de yis 'di kun thugs su chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-16: shes dang shes bya ma gtogs par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-17: gsum pa dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-18: 'di ni mi rtag sdug bsngal stong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-19: byed pa po yang spangs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-20: de nyid lam ni rnam ston pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-21: sangs rgyas kyis ni 'khor ba gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-22: de ltar dbang po 'di phyag rgya 'dis btab pa'i yid dri ma med pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-23: bstod nas de nas yang lha'i bde ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-24: de ltar de lha'i bde ba thams cad myong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:193b-25: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-0: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum @194a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-1: pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas mtho ba na gnas ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-2: sems can dag las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-3: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na 'di ltar gang gzhan gyis gsod pa po dag nyi ma gcig tsam du srog gcod pa spong ba'i tshul khrims srung du bcug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-4: 'khor ba las thar pa 'dod pa rnams ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-5: rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs nas 'bras bu chung dur 'gyur ba yang spong du 'jug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-6: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na mtho ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-7: gnas mtho ba de'ang ri rab kyi steng na mtho ba yin la khyed cag gi las sna tshogs snang ba bzhin gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-8: dngul gyi bkra bas phye ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-9: lha rnams mtho ba'i gnas der 'dzegs nas ri rab kyi drung thams cad lta bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-11: dngul las byas shing; bee d'urya bkra bas rnam par phye ba rnam pa du ma la lta bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-12: lha'i phreng ba dang gos gyon pa rnams gser gyis brgyan pa'i sa gzhi rnams la dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194a-13: yongs su spyod par byed la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-0: yongs su spyod par @194b byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-9: chu bo shugs phreng zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-10: chu bo stong 'bab ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-11: chu bo gar dgar 'bab ces bya ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-12: chu bo de dag ni myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad rab tu 'bab pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-14: mdog sna tshogs yod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-18: aanda rnyil gyi mdog dang mthun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-20: gser gyi mdog ltar ser ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-22: chu shin tu dri zhim zhing brtan pa dag tu khyad par 'phags pa'ang 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-28: ro sha kha ra 'dra ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-35: nags tshal sna tshogs dag me tog dri zhim po rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas shing bya kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:194b-36: rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195a-2: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas sil snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195a-4: bro gar sna tshogs kyis rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195a-6: yongs su spyod par byed do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195a-15: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas ni dkrigs /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195a-17: phan tshun grogs su gyur cing phan tshun longs spyod pa gcig pu don du byed pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-6: rang gis legs par byas pa'i las rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-7: 'bras bus kun nas bslang bas ji srid du 'dod cing sdug la yid du 'ong ba legs par bsrungs pa'i tshul khrims srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-8: ma byin par len pa spangs pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-9: dga' dgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-10: der las zad nas lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-11: shi nas las kyi 'gro ba ji lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-13: 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-16: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang na skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-17: gal te mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-18: de las dang rgyu mthun par ri la gnas pa rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-19: nor dang shin tu ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-21: mchog tu gzugs bzang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-22: 'jig rten gyi bar bzang por dro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:195b-23: bsil ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-0: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha @196a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-1: rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas ri rtsen gnas bzhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-3: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-4: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na gang gis lus kyi tshul khrims rnam gnyis bsrungs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-5: srog chags gsad par chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-6: bcings pa thar bar byas shing mthu rab tu cha bar gyur la nus par ldan pa zhig lam du zhugs te bkres shing skom bzhin du bu ram shing ngam ldum ra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-7: rdzi'u'i grong dag tu ba'i bcud dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-8: bu ram shing gi bcud ma byin par ma blangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-9: sems can gsad par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-10: ma byin par blangs nas 'jigs te 'gro ba thar par byas pa'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas ri rtser gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-11: der skyes nas kyang de bde ba'i longs spyod du ma dang ldan zhing de yul chu bo lta bu dums bdas pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-12: de'ang 'dod chags chu bo lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-16: mgu ba'i gling du chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-18: kun tu rtog pa'i rlabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196a-23: reg bya sdug pa'i bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-0: @196b lta ba chu srin khri kun tu 'khrugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-1: rab tu thogs pa du ma ya yor 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-3: nye ba'i tshal chu yis bar bus ded pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-5: spro ba chu las brgal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-6: yul du ma'i ri khrod nas chu 'bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-7: srid pa'i chu bo 'dam rdzas la sogs pa rnam pa de lta bu dag las lha rnams 'byung bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-9: chu bo gangg'a'i pha rol gyi 'gram gyi rlabs mi mngon par ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-10: thog ma med pa'i dus nas rgyun du shin tu zab mor rab tu zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-13: gzugs med pa'i khams na skye ba dang; rga ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-20: 'khrug pa rlabs lta bus khyab cing myur du 'gro ba'i sred pa chu klung lta bu de sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu'ang yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-21: mi rnams kyis kyang chog pa 'dzin mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-22: de ltar sred pa'i rnam pa chu bo lta bus ri rtse na gnas pa'i lha rnams rab tu bdas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-23: des lha de dag lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-24: lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-26: dga' dgur spyod bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-27: der tshal de lta bu de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-29: tshal rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:196b-30: tshal rtag tu mngon dga' zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-2: tshal kun nas mngon dga' zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-3: tshal zla ba 'dra zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-4: tshal gangg'a'i steng du rgyu zhes bya ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-5: tshal 'di dag ni ri rtse na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-6: tshal de rnams kyi nang du lha dag bde ba du ma dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-7: bud med kyi dga' ba rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-8: dga' dgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-9: btung ba'i chu bo rnams kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-11: chu bo sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-12: chu bo lag mthil gyis byug cing reg pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-13: chu bo ngoms mi myong zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-14: chu bo me tog ku mu da dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-15: autpal skye zhes bya ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-16: chu bo dag gi 'gram gnyis ka ril khebs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-19: gser gyi shing ljon pa 'bras bu dang ldan zhing me tog dang ldan pa rnams kyis lha'i sa gzhi de dag nyams dga' bar brgyan pa'i sa gzhi der dge ba'i las sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-20: las byas pa sna tshogs kun nas bslang ba rnams kyis tshal de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-24: skom chu bo ltar 'bab pa de dag tu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-25: lha de rnams lha'i rol mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-26: lha'i gnas chen po dang; thags su btags pa ma yin pa'i lha'i gos rnams kyis dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197a-27: lha de rnams rang las 'od 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-2: yid ngal ba dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-4: yid rtag tu kun nas dga' ba rnams ji srid du lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-5: ngag gi 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba shin tu bsil ba rnam par smin pa mchog tu bad ba mtho ris su skye ba nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i las ma zad pa de srid du 'gros 'chos shin dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-7: yongs su sbyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-8: de dag las zad de lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-9: shi nas kyang las ji ltar byas pa bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-11: yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-12: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba mir 'grub pa'i las kyis mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-13: de las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu longs spyod can du 'gyur zhing rtag tu shes pa la dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-17: yul bzang por skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-18: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-19: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-20: sum cu rtsa gsum na lha rnams kyi gnas gzhan gang zhig yod snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-21: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:197b-22: blta na sdug pa gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gnas ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-0: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur ba @198a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-2: des brtags na gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-3: sems can gzhan chus khyer ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-4: mtshon gyis gsod par bya ba srog phyung zhing nor rdzas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-5: bdag nyid la mi lta bar chu nas phyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-6: bkres bzhin du lam du 'gro ba na gzhan gyis ma byin par blang ba la rab tu spro ba bskyed kyang len par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-8: phyogs dpen par phyin la 'tsho ba nyam nga bar gyur kyang 'bras bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-9: rtsa ba dag ma byin par len par mi byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-10: tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma gus par bslab pa'i gzhi rdul phra mo tsam ral ba la'ang 'jigs par lta na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro grong khyer chen po blta na sdug tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-11: grong khyer de'ang dpag tshad khri yod la; khyams khris legs par rnam par phye ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-12: grong khyer de'i sa gzhi dzambu chu bo'i gser las byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-13: kun nas khang pa chen po bee d'urya las byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-14: gzhan yang dngul las byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-16: dzambu chu bo'i gser las byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-17: mthon ka sna tshogs las byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-19: rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri dag gis bkra bar phye ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198a-20: de dag gi srang yang kun nas shin tu rnam par phye ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-0: khang bzang @198b gi ris shin tu rnam par phye ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-1: khang pa de dag kyang nyi ma gang med kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-3: ji ltar nyi ma med na sgron ma gsal bar byed pa de ltar nyi ma med kyang khang pa'i mchog de rnams las de ltar 'od 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-4: grong khyer de dag kun nas tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-5: nye ba'i tshal de rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-7: nye ba'i tshal kha cig bee d'urya las byas pa dag la mu tig gi dra bas bres /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-8: kha cig gser gyi shing ljon pa dag la dngul gyi dra bas bres /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-9: kha cig dngul gyi shing ljon pa dag la gser gyi dril bu g-yer ka'i sgra 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-10: kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa'i skyed mos tshal bkra ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-11: kha cig dpag bsam gyi shing yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-12: lha gang dag gi yid la bsams pa de tshal de dag las thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-13: tshal kha cig aanda rnyil dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-14: bee d'urya las byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-15: de na gser gyi bya rnams sgra snyan pa sna tshogs 'byin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-16: gser gyi tshal gang yin pa de na dngul gyi bya rnams skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-17: mthon ka'i tshal gang yin pa de na bya padma r'a ga'i mdog tu 'dug pa rnams skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:198b-18: gser gyi tshal gang yin pa de na bya lus sna tshogs 'dres pa rnams skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-0: de ltar grong khyer chen po legs par mthong na nye ba'i tshal du gyur pa rnams mdzes @199a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-3: gser gyi khang pa mdzes par byas pa gang yin pa de dag la dngul gyi ka ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-4: bee d'urya'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-5: gser gyi srang gang yin pa de dag la bee d'urya'i ka ba btsugs shing gser gyi shing ljon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-8: khyim 'dres pas mdzes par byas pa gang yin pa de na bya gser gyi mdog can yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-9: grong khyer blta na sdug gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-10: gang du snang ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-11: de dpe med par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-12: grong khyer de'ang kun nas tshal chen po bzhi rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-18: tshal thams cad dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-19: tshal de thams cad na chu bo chen po khri yod pa gser gyi padmas khebs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-20: chu bo de dag shin tu nyams dga' ba yin zhing 'gram gnyis ka zhig pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-25: shing ljon pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199a-26: tshal chen po de dag bung ba 'dab ma bee d'u rya la lus dngul du 'dug pa'i tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-0: gang bung ba rnams kyi sgra snyan pa'i drung na mi'i gling bu'i sgras bcu drug gi char yang mi phod @199b do; ;bee d'u rya'i shing ljon pa rnams la 'bras bu gser gyi mdog can shin tu dri zhim zhing khar snyib pas ches lhag pa'i ro dag yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-1: 'bras bu rnams kyi dri gang yin pa dpag tshad du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-2: bya rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rgyags pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-3: de nas dri gang yin pa des brgya 'gyur du shin tu rgyags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-4: gser gyi shing ljon pa gang yin pa de rnams la dngul gyi 'bras bu lha'i dri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-6: ro lnga dang ldan pa dag 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-7: shing ljon pa bee d'urya'i sdong po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-8: gser gyi 'dab ma yod pa gang yin pa de rnams la 'bras bu kha dog sna tshogs yod pa dag 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-9: de ltar tshal kha dog rnam pa du ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-10: rnam pa sna tshogs dpe med pa gzhan dang mi 'dra bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-11: grong khyer chen po blta na sdug yongs su bskor nas rnam par gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-12: kun tu rtog pa'i ri mo bris pa ltar lha'i las rnam pa du ma byas shing las rnam pa du ma sna tshogs byas pa rnams kyis de rnams kyang sna tshogs su byung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-13: de ltar 'bras bu rgyu dang mthun par rgyu'i 'bras bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-14: ji ltar sa bon gyi rnam pa ji srid yod pa de srid du 'bras bu'i rnam pa'ang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-15: de ltar grong khyer blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha rnams bde ba mang po du ma dag gis phrogs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:199b-16: grong khyer de ngo bo nyid kyis legs mthong nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-1: spug dag gis brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-2: dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis dkrigs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-3: gser gyi dril bu g-yer kha sgra snyan pa 'byin pas mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-6: skyed mos tshal de dag tu blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha rnams 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-7: lha'i grong khyer na gnas rgyan dang; rol mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-8: sil snyan rtag tu sgra 'byin pa rab tu 'byin cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-10: lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis kun tu gang ba de na btung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-11: phreng ba dag gis mdzes par byas pa; rgyal mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-12: ba dan bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dag rlung gis rab tu bskyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-13: yang ri rab kyi steng gi grong khyer du lha'i tshogs bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma dag gis kun tu gang zhing las chen po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa de na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-14: 'di ltar lha mthu rab tu che ba mchod par 'os pa chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-16: skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod la rtag tu yid mi dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200a-18: lha me'i tshogs 'bum phrag du mas kun tu gang ba sa ya phrag 'bum 'khod pa rnams brgya byin gyis ma lus par yongs su shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-0: gang gi tshe lha de rnams gal te lha'i grong khyer chen po skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod de nas skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du 'gro ba de'i tshe lha rnams shing rta 'bum phrag du ma rnams dang 'gro @200b ste; lha de rnams 'gro ba na rgyal mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-1: ru mtshon sdug gu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i shing rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-2: kha dog sdug gu rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-3: dbyibs sna tshogs su 'dug pa bye ba phrag stong dkrigs pa dag byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-5: aanda rnyil las byas pa'i gzhal med khang gang yin pa de la shing rta'i mda' padma r'a ga las byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-6: de la shing rta'i steng gi khang pa rin po che las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-8: phyi rol ni bee d'urya las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-9: sa ris ni gser las byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-10: kun nas dril bu g-yer kha 'khrigs pa'i sgra 'byin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-11: de nas yang lha rnams gzhal med khang rnams pa sna tshogs gzhan gyis 'gro bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-13: shing rta'i mda' ni gser las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-14: shing rta'i steng gi khang pa ni bee d'urya las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-15: sa ris ni spug las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-16: mu tig gi dra bas ni g-yogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-17: phyi rol ni rin po che ma rgad lta bu las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-18: ngos ni byu ru las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-19: srog shing ni dngul las byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-20: kha cig shing rta'i mchog rnam pa gzhan gyis 'gro bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-22: kun nas shing rta'i mda' ni gser las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-23: ngos ni mu tig gis g-yogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-24: sa ris ni padma r'a gas shin tu rnam par bye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:200b-25: srog shing ni dngul las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-0: kun nas byu rus ni mdzes par byas pa yin te shing rta 'bum phrag mang po gsal ba mtshan nyid dpe med pa @201a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-1: de dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-2: 'bum phrag rnam pa du ma de rnams la lha dag nyid zhon nas tshal chen po de rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-3: rgyal mtshan la la bee d'urya las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-4: rgyal mtshan la la gser las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-5: yu ba la la dngul las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-6: rgyal mtshan la la'i yu ba padma r'a ga las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-8: ru mtshon la la'i mdog du ma yod pa dag gis nam mkha' bar med par byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-9: skyed mos tshal du gnas par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-10: yid rab tu dga' bas tshal chen po bzhi po ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-11: de ltar lha de rnams 'dong ba na sil snyan bye ba 'bum phrag du ma sgra 'byin cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-12: rol mo'i sgra snyan pa sna tshogs phan tshun rdob par zhugs pa dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-13: shin tu bzang zhing nyams dga' ba'i khyad par che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-14: ji ltar las byas pa ngan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-16: chen po byas pa bzhin las bde ba rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa na 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-17: lha de rnams so so la lha mo'i tshogs brgya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201a-21: rab tu rgod cing yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo snyan pa dang bcas pa rdo ba pa zhes bya ba kun tu gang zhing byed la tshal chen po zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dod bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-0: lha'i 'dod pa'i @201b yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur ba'i lha mo de dag thams cad lha de rnams dang so so phrad nas de ltar bro gar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-3: 'di ltar lha de rnams 'dod pa la rnam par zhen pa zhes bya ba dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-4: lha'i sgra snyan pa tshang tshing gi nang na lha'i snyan pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-5: gar dga' dgur 'gro ba'i lha de rnams lha'i 'dod pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis der skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-6: la la nam mkha' la sprin nag po 'gro ba lta bu bee d'urya'i mdog can de rnams 'gro bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-7: lha'i mchog de dag kha cig ni 'di ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-11: dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs kyis dga' gtam smra zhing nam mkha' khyab par byas nas tshal chen po ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-12: lha'i mchog gzhan kha cig ni gser gyi sa gzhi'i lam nas rab tu 'gro la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-13: 'gro ba de rnams kyi shing rta 'bum phrag du ma'i mu khyud kyis gser gyi rdul bslang ste nam mkha' khyab par byas nas 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-14: gang gis nam mkha' de skya bor byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-15: lha rnams la bgo bar mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-16: lha gang 'chi ba dang nye bar 'gyur ba de rnams kyi gdong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-17: gos de la ni 'go bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:201b-18: lha gang gzhan dag gis rdul te mthong zhing 'chi ba'i ltas mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-1: bsngal mtha' med par 'gyur ba mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-2: de snying rje rje lta bur gyur pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-3: bud shing lta bu'i yul 'byung dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-5: lam 'di nas ni lha rnams dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-8: bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-9: phyi nas nyon mongs phrad pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-10: bdag nyid kyis ni sdug bsngal rig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-11: bag med pa dang 'dres pa'i sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-12: yul la rtag tu mngon par dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-13: lus can lhan cig skyes gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-14: 'chi ba brtan pa mi rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-15: bag med pa la mngon dga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-16: bde ba nyams dga' byed pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-19: 'chi ba'i zhags pas bzung ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-20: khyod la skyob pa byed med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-21: sman dang sngags dang las mi skyob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-22: de bzhin lha min lha mi skyo ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-23: rdul rnams kyis ni gdong g-yogs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-24: bdag nyid kyis ni mi rig ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-26: shi ba phyi nas thob par 'ong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-27: gang zhig bde ba'i don ma mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-28: skye brtag tu brkam chags shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-29: sred pas ngoms ni mi myong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202a-32: khyod kyi pho nya dang po ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-0: 'di yi 'og tu mchi ba @202b yang; ;shin tu mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-1: tshal dang nye ba'i tshal brgyan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-2: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-3: sems can ri bo mchog de nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-4: dbang med bcings te khrid par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-5: myos pas rtse bar gnas pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-6: bde bas ngoms ni mi myong zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-7: rmongs pa sred pa ma ngoms pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-8: dbang med sa steng ltung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-9: ji ltar rtag tu me dag las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-11: de ltar 'chi ba'i rtags byung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-13: de ltar lha de dag bag med pa chung ba la gnas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-14: sems sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la goms pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-15: lha de'i bar chad de mthong nas bdag nyid dang lha de rjes su ston par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-16: de ltar lha de'i gtam smra ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-18: shing rta sna tshogs la zhon zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-19: shing rta'i dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas dkrigs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-20: lus cha byad du mas 'bar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-21: mig rgyas pa lta bur 'dug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-23: gos gyon pa gser btsoms rnams par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-24: gang ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo stong snyed du phye mar rlog cing 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-25: de nas lha de lha'i tshogs de rnams rtog cing 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-26: de bzhin du la la ni nam mkha' la; ;la la ni sa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-27: la la ni bya'i shing rta rnams kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-28: la la ni lha mo dang lhan cig glu len /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:202b-31: nye ba'i tshal de dag lha'i padma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-4: rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-5: kun nas mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-6: nye ba'i tshal gyi phyogs ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-7: blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha de rnams shing rta'i mchog de dag la zhon nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-8: gser gyi shing ljon pa nyi ma lta bu yod pa ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-9: gang gzhan bar snang la rgyu ba de dag kyang bar snang de las babs nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-10: de ltar lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad 'dus nas sil snyan gyi sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-11: glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-12: yongs su spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-13: phan tshun grogs su gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-15: phrag dog la skyo ba med pa rnams bro gar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-17: dga' dgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-18: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-24: glu ste rnam pa 'di lngas kha zas chu bo ltar 'bab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-25: btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab pa'i ngogs su lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-26: lha mo'i tshogs de dag phan tshun dga' zhing lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal der rtses nas gang na bee d'urya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203a-31: sbrang rtsi lta bu rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-0: de shing ljon pa'i drung de dag tu'ang @203b 'dod pa nyams dga' ba'i lha mo gzugs mi mdzes pa med pa'i gzugs rnams dang lhan cig 'bras bu'i ros myos nas yun ring du dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-1: de nas de ltar bde ba la gnas shing rgyags pas myos pa'i lha dang lha mo'i tshogs de rnams bro gar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-3: dgod pa'i sgra de dag thos shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-4: gang lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi rjes su 'gro la phyi bzhin du 'brang ba de rnams sgra de dag thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-5: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dod bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-6: de ltar de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi drung du dong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-7: brgya byin la gsong por smras shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-8: thal mo sbyar nas mgo bos gtugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-11: 'di ltar blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad skyeng mos tshal du dga' spyod bgyid du mchi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-13: de dag mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-14: de nas brgya byin de dag las tshig de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-15: lha rnams la 'di ltar blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha dag gang nas dong ba'i skyed mos tshal du bdag cag kun 'dong gi khyed rnams 'dong bar shoms shig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-16: de nas brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang shing rta rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can la zhon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:203b-17: la la gser gyi shing rta srog shing bee d'urya las byas pa ba dan btags pa rnams la zhon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-0: la la bee d'urya'i shing rta srog shing @204a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-1: gser las byas pa rnams la zhon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-2: la la ni rin po che sna bdun bkra zhing ba dan sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa rnams la zhon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-3: la la gser gyi bya sgra snyan cing shin tu mdzes par 'byung ba'i bya'i shing rta rnams la zhon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-4: la la rta khra bo 'gros 'jam zhing bde ba dag la shing rtas blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-5: shing rta de rnams rta de rnams la btags te rta'i shing rtas 'gro bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-8: gser gyi bya ngang pa rkang pa ni bee d'urya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-9: sgro ni padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu rnams kyi steng du zhon nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-10: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang lhan cig tu blta na sdug gi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-11: skyed mos tshal ga la ba yod pa der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-12: yang lha gzhan dag rin po che sna bdun gyi rma bya'i gzugs dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-13: mdongs kyi tshogs kyis khebs pa gang mi'i 'jig rten na'ang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin la lha'i 'jig rten na lha gzhan dag mi 'dra ba legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis mngon par brgyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-14: de dag gi mdog sdug cing dbyibs legs pa dpe bya bar yang mi nus pa'i steng du zhon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-15: rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag la gzhan dag zhon nas blta na sdug gi skyed mos tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204a-16: nye ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-0: lha'i tshogs de rnams rol mo'i sgra @204b dang; glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyis dgod cing rtse la yongs su spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-1: lha gzhan myos shing 'khod pa rnams skyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-2: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi shing rta bzhi'ang 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang legs par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-3: shing rta rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-7: spug shin tu gsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-11: shel la gser gyi khye'u rnams kyis mngon par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-12: shing rta'i mchog de la brgya byin zhon nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-13: rin po che sna bdun gyi bya ngang pa gser gyi padma ltar rgyas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-15: cha byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa sgra che zhing gdangs snyan pa 'byin pa de'i drung na lha mo'i dbyangs kyang snyan par mi 'gyur ba stong gis khrid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-16: brgya byin gyi shing rta rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngang pa rnams kyis khrid bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-17: shing rta de la'ang tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bsgyur ba'i 'phan lnga brgya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-20: dngul las byas pa las btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-27: dkar pos mdzes par byas pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-28: shing rta de la lha'i rgyal po de zhon nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:204b-29: lha mo'i tshogs du ma ni nye ba na glu dbyangs len /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-0: lha 'bum phrag du ma'ang mdun du song nas glu dbyangs len cing nam @205a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-1: mkha' la ni yang dang yang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-2: sa la ni yang dang yang du 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-5: lha'i bde ba de nye bar spyod cing sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas nyams dga' bzhin du grong khyer blta na sdug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-6: skyed mos tshal ga la der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-7: der 'dong ba na lha'i tshogs gzhan dag gis mthong nas bro gar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-10: rol mo byed cing padma sna tshogs sdong bu bee d'urya las byas pa dag lag tu khyer nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-11: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha rnams dang lhan cig gang nas mngon du 'ong ba der blta na sdug pa na gnas pa'i lha de rnams kyis kyang skyed mos tshal nas byung nas 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-12: de nas brgya byin gyis bdag cag gis drung 'dir 'ong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-13: khyed kyis 'di dag dang rtse ba de bya ba'i rigs so zhes kyang bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-14: de nas brgya byin gyi kha nas tshig thos pa spyi bos blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-15: blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha ga la ba der chu blang pa'i phyir brgyugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-16: lha mo'i nang nas lha mo de dag kyang blta na sdug pa'i gnas pa'i nang du chu blang ba'i phyir brgyugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-17: blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205a-18: chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha mo dag kyang gang de nas phan tshun rgyug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-0: de ltar lha rnams phan tshun du gser gyi padma'i 'dab ma dag blangs nas skyed mos tshal ga la @205b ba der rgyug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-1: de dag phan tshun lhan cig tu dgod cing rtse la rgyu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-2: lha'i dbang po brgya byin par snang la rgyu zhing 'dug pas kyang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-3: lha mo rnams me tog ku mu das rtse ba de dag mthong ngo; ;lha de rnams chu la yun ring du rtse ba de byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-5: padma la rtse ba rtsom par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-7: lha mo de dag phan tshun padma la rtse bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-8: la la gser gyi padma rnams kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-10: gser gyi sdong bu rnams kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-11: la la sdong bu sna tshogs rnams kyis rtse ste de ltar phan tshun rtsed mo byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-12: de ltar phan tshun yun ring du bstegs shing rtses nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-13: 'bras bu'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-14: de dag gis 'bras bu snyi ba rnams blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-15: phan tshun steg 'dod pa 'phen par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-16: 'bras bu la rtse ba de'ang byas nas chang gi tshal ga la yod pa der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-17: tshal der song nas myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing 'khrugs pa med pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin ro zhim pa las ji ltar byas pa bzhin du zhim pa dag la 'thung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-18: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang shing rta'i mchog de las babs nas lha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-19: de dag gi nang du 'dug go ;lha'i rgyal po de rgyal po de rnams kyis mthong nas phan tshun kun yid dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:205b-20: lha'i rgyal po la mchod par byed do ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-0: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar @206a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-2: bam po sum cu rtsa gnyis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-3: de ltar kun gyis thal mo spyi bor sbyar te mchod pa byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-4: 'di ltar lha'i dbang po bzhugs pa bdag cag gi srog gi 'bras bu mchis pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-5: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ni gang bdag cag gi pha ma dag pas lhag par srog stsol ba lags so zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-6: de ltar brgya byin de la de rnams kyis legs par mchod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-7: de nas yang lha de dag la 'di skad ces khyed ni bdag gi bu dang 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-9: de ltar de dag phan tshun legs par mchod pa byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-10: de nas yang bag med pa'i sar zhugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-11: bag med pa de nyid la gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-13: nye ba'i tshal dag bya'i tshogs rnams kyi sgra 'byin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-16: tshang tshing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-17: gser gyi chu bo padma'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-18: nye ba'i tshal mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-19: sa gzhi mnyam zhing 'jam la mi rtsub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-24: shel gyi shing ljon pas brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-26: btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab cing 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-28: padma la sogs pa me tog chen po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206a-29: tshang tshing rnams kyi nang na lha'i bu mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-0: rgal rgal yongs su spyad @206b pas bsten pa'i tshang tshing gi tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-1: skyed mos tshal rnams su lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-3: lha'i yul lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-4: de nas yang blta na sdug pa na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-5: chos bzang na gnas pa dga' bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-6: rang gi gnas gnas su zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-7: de dag der zhugs nas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-8: ji srid du 'dod pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-9: de dag phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-10: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-13: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-14: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-15: las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu shin tu bad bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-16: rig pa'i blo dri ma med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-17: rol mo la dga' ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-22: rtag tu spro ba la dga' zhing bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-25: bza' bar bya ba mang po la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-27: rims nad med la mya ngan dang bral bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:206b-28: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-0: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha @207a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-1: rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-2: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas phyogs gcig na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-3: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-4: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-6: 'byor ba'ang shin tu chung zhing dman par gyur pa gang gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-7: gzhan las nor rdzas kyi rnam pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-9: shin tu sdug bsngal yang bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-10: chung ma 'ba' zhig la mi sbyor bar sems yongs su bsgoms pa'i yid kyis nor rdzas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-11: kha zas de dag gzhan sdug bsngal zhing pha rol gzhan dag nyon mongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-14: mgon med pa rnams la bgo bsha' byas nas sbyin par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-15: srog chags gzhan gyi chung ma la 'khrig pa'i dga' bas rab tu chags pa dag gzhi des mngon par bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-16: srog bcad pa'i nyon mongs pa 'thob cing gshed ma'i lag tu bskur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-17: lho phyogs kyi sgo nas khrid de srog bcad par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-18: nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i nang du chud pa las thar bar byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207a-19: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten phyogs gcig na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-0: der skyes nas kyang legs par @207b bya ba byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-1: dge ba'i las shin tu rgya che ba byas shing yang dag par spyad pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-2: rang gi lus las kun nas 'od 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-5: yang 'od de dag gi kha dog sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-10: lha de'i 'od des lha'i 'jig rten gyi 'od gsal ba de dag thams cad de nas yang bcu 'gyur bas lhag par gsal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-13: skar ma'i 'od kyis dzambu'i gling gsal bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-14: de nas yang zla ba'i 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa de bzhin du lha de'i rang gi lus kyi 'od kyis lha'i gnas de dag thams cad brgyan pa bzhin rnam par gsal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-15: 'od des gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha de la; lha de dag gis mngon par brtags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-16: rnam pa de lta bu khyad par gang gi drung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-17: lha gzhan de dag srin bu me khyer bzhin gsal ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-18: lha'i ris der lha der lha de skyes ma thag tu lha mo de dag thams cad lha de ga la ba der rgyug cing skyes ma thag tu rgyan thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-20: gang gi gtsug gi nor bu mthon ka chen po'i 'od kyis dpag chad dag tu 'od snang bar byed pa bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:207b-21: 'od gang gis gzhan mtho ris na gnas pa'i 'od de dag thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-0: phyi rol gyi nor bu de dag thams cad der ltar zil gyis @208a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-2: ji ltar nyi ma shar bas srin bu me khyer rnams kyi 'od zil gyil gnon par byed pa de bzhin du lha de dag zil gyis gnon par byed do; ;de nas skyes ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi cod pan dpag tshad brgyar 'od 'phro ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-3: 'od kun gyis brgyan cing 'od zer 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-4: gang gi 'od sngon po dang; ;ser po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-8: de'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi mgul rgyan dpag tshad brgyar 'od 'phro ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-9: de ltar de'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan phreng 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-10: de'i 'og tu phreng ba 'chang ba rdo rjes brgyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-11: de'i 'og tu da'i rked pa'i phreng rgyan ji ltar 'ja'i kha dog lta bur skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-12: de'i 'og tu de'i lham rin chen sna bdun gyis spras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-13: 'od sna tshogs dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te; shugs gang gis rim pa 'di de ltar 'gro ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-14: gang gi tshe lha de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag che ge mo zhig tu nam mkha' las 'gro'o snyam du bsams nas bskyed ma thag tu lha yul du 'byung ba'i lham des lha de bteg ste nam mkha' la khyer nas gnas der 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208a-15: lus ngal ba med cing gnod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-0: gang de'i 'og tu de'i @208b gos thags su btags pa ma yin pa rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa 'od gsal ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-1: gang gi 'od kyis lha'i ris nyams dga' ba des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-2: de nas yang shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-3: lha de skyes ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-4: las byas pa gang gis bdag 'dir skyes shig gu snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-5: des brtags na las legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i gzhi dzambu gling de nas bdag shi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-6: der gang bya ba legs par bya ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-8: nyes par byas pa de 'dir nye bar spyod par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-9: de dag gis legs par byas pa'i las kyi rgyu des bdag 'dir skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-10: rgyu med pas ni ma yin no snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-11: de de ltar bsams pa dang thang cig lha mo gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-12: lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa ji snyed pa thams cad nyid nye bar 'ong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-13: de dag gi rgyan gyi sgra ji ltar mi yul na sil snyan yan lag lnga dang shin tu ldan pa de dag gi sgra 'byung ba de ltar de rnams kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do; ;de dag gi dri'ang dpag tshad gnyis su gang bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-14: dri gang gis me tog thams cad kyi dri zil gyis gnon par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-16: lang tsho sngon ma byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing tshim pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-18: sngon gyi gos kyi yon tan rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:208b-19: lha de'i legs par byas pa'i las des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-0: @209a *// nyi ma shar ba'i nyi ma'i 'od kyis me tog thams cad rab tu rgyas par 'gyur ba de ltar lha de'i 'od byung bas lha mo de dag thams cad kyi gzugs rab tu rgyas par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-1: de dag dang de phrad nas 'dzum zhing dga' ba dag gis rtsed mo byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-2: de dag gis de pang du blangs te tshal dang nye ba'i tshal ga la ba de nyid du 'gros sdug gus khyer zhing lha de'i mdun du sil snyan sna tshogs dang rgod pa'i sgras dga' bar byed pa de dag lha la lta zhing tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-3: nye ba'i tshal de dag ga la ba der gdong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-4: lha de'i gnas su tshal 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-6: padma rmad byung gi tshal yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-7: tshal de na gang gi tshe lha de 'jug pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-8: gom pa 'dor ba'i sa dag la padma sdong bu ni bee d'urya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-11: lo ma ni 'jam zhing 'dab ma 'jam pa dang bung ba'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-12: de dag la lha de'i rkang pa gnyis 'jog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-13: de nas rkang pa bteg pa dang padma gzhan dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snga ma zhum par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-14: de padma'i tshal de nas sbrang rtsi'i chu'i tshal zhes bya ba sbrang rtsi'i chu'i tshal ga la ba der 'dod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209a-15: tshal de na lha'i shing ljon pa gser las byas pa de dag thams cad las lha'i rgun chang 'dzag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-1: dri dang ldan pa'i rgun chang de dag la lha'i mchog de 'thung bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-2: myos pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sbrang rtsi de dag la lha rnams 'thung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-4: ro sngon ma byung ba de de dag la 'thungs nas kyang tshal gsum mdzes zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-5: der gsum mdzes dpe med pa 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-8: bung ba'i tshogs sgra 'byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-9: gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-10: lha mo rol mo byed pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-11: lha'i mchog de tshal gsum mdzes de na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-14: nye ba'i tshal nas nye ba'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-15: padma'i rdzing nas padma'i rdzing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-16: lteng ka nas lteng kar dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-18: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-19: bya sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa la nyan cing dbang po lnga yul lnga la tshim pa med pa'i yid sred pa'i mes sreg pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-20: ji srid du de'i legs par byas pa'i las ma zad pa de srid du dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-21: de las de zad nas de nas yang lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-22: shi nas kyang las kyi thag pas bcings pa rang gis byas pa'i las rnams kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-23: yi dvags dang; dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:209b-24: gal te mi'i so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-0: las de dang rgyu mthun par de @210a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-3: yon tan phun sum tshogs shing kun nas mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-4: rang dang 'brel ba las 'tsho zhing gzhan la rag ma lus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-5: rang 'dod pa bzhin spyod cing nad med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-9: de bzhin du gsum ldan gyi dus su'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-10: de bzhin du gtso bo'i nang du'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-11: de bzhin du rgyal srid phyed la dbang ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-13: tshong pa 'byor ba'i mchog nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-15: gser dngul thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-16: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-17: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas shing gseb na gnas pa zhes ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-18: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-19: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-20: gang gis rkun po chad pas bcad par 'os pa bzung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-21: gang 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs pa'i bsam bas; de la chad pas mi gcod cing gnod par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210a-22: pha rol gzhan gyis rkun po bzung ba de'ang sems can la phan par 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-0: byams par gzhol ba'i sems @210b dang ldan pa'i bsam pas thar bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-2: na ba'i rkyen gyi gso sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-3: yo byad sbyin par byed cing gong ma'i rdzas bsgrubs pa de dag rku ba'i sems kyis mi rku ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-4: tshig 'jam zhing tshig nyung la phan par smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-5: nyin gcig bzhin sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-8: bdug pa dag phul te phyag 'tshal la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-9: de'i yon tan yang rjes su dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-10: bla ma la lus kyis kyang gus par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-13: rtag tu snyan par smra ba dang; sdig pa'i grogs po mthong na shin tu 'dre bar mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-14: de dag dang lhan cig dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-17: mngon par smra bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-18: mi nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-20: 'jig rten pas spangs pa rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-21: thad kar lta zhing 'dug par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-22: rgan po la legs par lta ste; rgan po shes pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-23: sems can la byams shing pha rol gdung bar mi byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-26: 'jam por smra ba dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing; yang dag par rnam par 'byed pa'i tshul khrims kyang yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:210b-30: zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la rgyu med par 'tsho bar mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-0: @211a *// bza' ba mang du mi za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-1: 'dod dgur 'gro ba'i tshul du mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-2: gnod pa'i tshul med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-3: glo bur du mi 'khrug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-7: snyis 'tsho ba dri ma dang bcas pa la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-8: nyo tshong la sogs pa chos ma yin pa dang yang dag par 'brel bar mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-9: chang 'tshong gi khyim du dga' ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-10: bud med la rag las shing sdig pa byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-12: rtab rtab por mi 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-13: smra ba na gzhan gyi gsang mi shor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-14: grogs po rnams la glags lta zhing gsang ste dgra mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-15: gnad btsal te rgyal po la mi smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-16: gzhan gyi zhing rnams la skye ba'i ldum ra mthong na bdag nyid kyir mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-17: yul mi'i dpya nar ma drug cha gcig 'bul ba las lhag par mi 'bebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-20: skal ba byin pa mi 'phrog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-22: nyin mo gzhan gyi 'bras bu mi 'phrog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-23: rku sems thams cad dang bral ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-25: nyung ngur bral ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-26: ji ltar na nyung ngur bral ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-27: las kyi nyer bsdogs mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-28: las bar ma dang bral ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-29: gang byas pa 'chags par byed cing skyon du rtsi la mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211a-30: chen po dang bral ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-0: las kyi nyer @211b bsdogs mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-1: de bzhin byed du mi 'jug cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-2: gzhan gyis byas nas kyang 'chags su 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-3: so sor rjes su yi rang bar mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-4: mi ngan pa de rnam pa spong bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-7: chen po byed pa de chung ngu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-9: chen po'i 'bras bu la spyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-10: de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-11: nyes par byed pa rnam par spangs pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-12: de der skyes nas kyang lha'i lus sha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-14: rnag khrag dang bral ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-15: gang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba de'i dpe bya bar yang sla ba ma yin mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-16: cung zad cig dper bya na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-18: sems can gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos su skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-19: gang gser gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyad par gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-20: lha'i bde ba myong ba'i mi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi pa'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i khyad par gang yin pa'i khyad par de ni shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha de'i dper cung zad bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-21: shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha de ri rab kyi steng dpag tshad sum stong yod par dpal dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun gyi lha'i shing ljon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:211b-22: chu bos mdzes par byas pa lta bur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212a-0: phyogs de na tshal kun spyod @212a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212a-1: ces bya ba gser gyi shing ljon pa yod pa der 'di ltar lha rnams kyi sems la gang du bdag cag 'gro bar bya ba der shing ljon pa dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du de ltar 'ong bar shog cig snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212a-2: de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams gar 'gro ba de dag gi phyi bzhin du de ltar 'ong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212a-3: dper na; 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sems bskyed ma thag nyid du 'khor lo nam mkha' la 'gro ba de ltar lha rnams kyi sems bskyed ma thag nyid du shing ljon pa dag nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212a-4: lha rnams gar 'dod pa der yang sa'i steng du 'bab par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212a-6: bya dag sa'i phyogs gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212a-7: gang du 'gro zhing gnas pa de dang de nyid du gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du shing ljon pa de dag thams cad de ltar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212a-8: 'di ni shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi rang gis byas pa'i las kyi mthu gcig yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212a-10: de ltar legs par byas pa'i las de dag gi mthu ni lha rnams gang du 'dong ba der bya dag sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa lta bu'i sgra 'byin bzhin du phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-0: legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyi mthu ni lha rnams nam mkha' la 'dod pa dang bcas par 'gro ba'i lha dag padma'i @212b rdzing na bung ba myos pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-1: gser gyi bya ngang pas mdzes par byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-3: ngur pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-5: shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi legs par byas pa'i mthu ni lha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-7: gos gyon pa dag nam mkha' gang la 'gro ba'i nam mkha' der /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-8: lha'i padma sdong bu bee d'urya las byas pa'i gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-9: 'dab ma stong yod pa'i 'dab ma de re re la lha mo 'khod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-10: lha ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-11: de nas yang shing gseb na gnas pa'i legs par byas pa rnams kyi las kyi mthu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-12: lha dag lha'i padma la 'dug nas gang du 'gro ba nger nam mkha' de las lha'i ba tung bas gang ba'i lha'i snod dag lag tu 'ong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-13: btung ba de dag lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-14: lha mo de dag dang lhan cig 'thung zhing dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-16: yongs su spyod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-17: phyogs gzhan gang du 'dong bar yang 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-19: shing gseb na gnas pa rnams kyi las kyi mthu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-23: lha'i 'jig rten gyi gnas nas gnas gzhan du rnam pa gang gzhan gyis 'gro 'dod pa'i ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-24: ri'i rtse mo de dag tu'ang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:212b-27: chu bo phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-1: sum tshogs pa dag nam mkha' las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-2: lha gnas pa de rnams lha mo dag gis yongs su bskor la lhan cig tu lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs nye ba na len cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-3: de dag nyid dang yul nas yul du nam mkha' la 'gro ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-4: de nas chos bzang na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-5: blta na sdug pa na gnas pa yid dga' bas gnas mthon po mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-6: ji ltar dzambu'i gling na mi rgyu ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-7: lha gzhal med khang gsal ba na gnas pas mthong ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-8: de ltar chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-9: blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha de dag phan tshun du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-11: 'di ltar shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha de dag bde ba mchog dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-12: bdag cag pas khyad ches bde la; lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag nye bar len cing gang dga' mgur rgyu ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-16: yul nas yul du 'gro'o zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-17: de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang padma 'dab ma stong la sdong bu lha'i gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-18: bee d'urya las byas pa'i steng du 'dug nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-19: lha mo bzang mo dag dang lhan cig nam mkha' las 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-20: legs par byas pa'i las kyis sprul pa'i padma de'ang nyams dga' ba 'di lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213a-21: 'dab ma thams cad la lha mo lha'i phreng pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-0: gos @213b gyon pa gser rgyan gyis brgyan pa thams cad yid rab tu dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-1: thams cad sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dga' bas myos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-2: thams cad brgya byin la phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-4: lang tsho dar la bab pa'i dregs pas myos pa lnga 'khod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-5: de dag thams cad lha'i rgyal po brgya byin dang lhan cig tu shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams ga la ba der nam mkha' las 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-6: shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha de dag gis kyang brgya byin de mthong nas phyir zhing yid rab tu dga' la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-7: yang ji ltar bshad pa'i gnas de dag las babs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-8: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-9: dong nas brgya byin de la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-11: brgya byin gyi sngon du 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-12: shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha snying dga' ba rnams kyis brgya byin de yongs su bskor nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-13: brgya byin mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-16: tshal lam; nye ba'i tshal lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-18: gnas gzhan ga la ba der nam mkha' las 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-19: brgya byin gyi sngon du 'gro ba de rnams der yun ring du rtses nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-20: de nas yang rang gi gnas ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:213b-21: brgya byin gyi sngon du 'gro ba rnams ji ltar song ba de ltar slar 'ong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-0: de nas brgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga @214a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-1: la ba der 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-6: reg bya sdug gus myos pa'i lha de dag kyang ji srid du sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-8: yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-9: de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-10: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-12: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-13: gal te mi dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-14: las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu bde ba mchog dang ldan zhing rtag tu nad med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-16: nor dang shin tu ldan zhing mchog tu bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-17: de bzhin du sde gzhan gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i bar gyi gling dag gi rgyal por 'gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-18: rgyal tshab tu 'gyur bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-19: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-20: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-21: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas shing rta sna tshogs na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo; ;der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214a-22: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-0: mchod rten gyi gnas rnams su sngon yo byad sbyar ba rnams rgyal @214b po mi rigs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-2: mi rigs par chags pa la brkam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-4: gang gis gcod par byed pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-5: skyes bu dam pa yid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-6: sems bsgoms pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mngon par dran pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-7: tshig shin tu snyan cing gsal bas sangs rgyas la bstod nas de phyir zlog par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-9: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang shing rta sna tshogs na gnas pa'i sar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-10: der skyes nas kyang shin tu dge ba'i las byed pa de sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-14: sa der las kyi 'bras bu gzhan gyis kyang skye bar 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-16: ma byin par len par spangs pas 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-18: khyis 'tsho ba las ri dvags thar par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-20: byed du'ang mi 'jug ;gzhan gyis byas pa la rjes su yi rang bar yang mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-21: ji ltar ma byin par len pa mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-22: ma byin par len pa ji ltar spangs pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-23: bdag nyid yul gyi bdag po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-25: blon por gyur pas pha rol la chad pas gcod par mi byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:214b-26: gzhan byed pa'ang zlog par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-0: khrims la 'jog par byed pa de dag ni @215a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-1: shing rta sna tshogs su skyes par 'gyur ba'i las rnam pa gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-2: tshal gyi rgya dpag tshad sum stong yod pa de na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-3: lha dag shing rta sna tshogs rnams kyis dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-4: des na shing rta sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ming du btags la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-5: shing rta sna tshogs der gnas pa'i lha rnams rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-7: shing rta'i nang na gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-8: dngul gyi padma ma bee d'urya shin tu blta na sdug ba dri mchog tu yid du 'thad pa'i rdzing 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-9: bung pa bee d'urya'i mdog lta bu'i tshogs lding ba rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-10: tshal der bkra pa 'di dag kun 'byung bar 'gyur te de brjod pa /
