K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-11: padma'i rdzing rnams su padma bkra ba 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-13: padma la la padma'i phyed mthon ka las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-14: phyed bee d'urya las byas pa yin te bkra ba gcig yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-15: yang bkra ba gzhan ni phyed bee d'urya las byas la phyed gser las byas pa yin te bkra ba gzhan yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-16: yang bkra pa gzhan ni padma 'dab ma brgya pa thams cad kyi padma la padma phyed kyi padma'i 'dab ma ni gser las byas la gzhan ni padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-17: yang bkra ba gzhan 'byung ba ni; padma bee d'urya'i 'dab ma dag la bud ba gser gyi mdog can rgyu la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215a-18: dngul gyi 'dab ma dag la bung ba padma rla ga'i mdog can rgyu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-0: yang bkra ba gzhan 'byung ba ni bee d'urya'i @215b padma'i sdong bu la ni gser gyis yongs su dkris /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-1: gser gyi padma'i sdong bu la ni rin po ches yongs su dkris /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-2: dngul gyi padma'i sdong bu la ni spug gis yongs su dkris /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-3: rin po che ma rgad kyi kha dog lta bu'i sdong bu la ni dzambu chu bo'i gser gyis yongs su dkris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-4: bung ba sgra 'byin pa kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa rnams kyis padma'i rdzing bu de dag khebs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-6: dzambu'i gling na me tog tsu la sa'i dog pa la bung ba rnams kyis rtag tu khebs pa ltar shing rta sna tshogs kyi'ang de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-7: de nas legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis gnas sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-9: dzambu'i gling na lag bzo mkhas pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-10: lag bzo'i slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis rtsig ngos la bkra ba 'dab ma sna tshogs bkod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-11: tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bris pa ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-12: tshal gyi gnas de na'ang de lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-13: yang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal gyi bkra ba gzhan ni bya sna tshogs kyi sgro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-19: bya gang gi lto gser du 'dug pa de'i sgro dngul yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-20: rgyab padma r'a ga'i mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-21: mig rin po che ke ke ru'i mdog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-22: de bzhin du gang dngul gyi ltor 'dug pa de'i sgro gser la mig bee d'urya'i mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:215b-23: mig gi 'bras bu padma r'a ga'i mdog la rgyab bkra bar 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-1: bdun gyi mdog lta bu'i bya sna tshogs rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa babs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-2: 'di ni shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal gyi bkra ba gzhan yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-9: rin po che ke ke ru dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-11: de rnams kyi 'od kyis tshal de sbras shing brgyan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-12: tshal de phan tshun gyi 'od zer 'khyil bas shin tu gang la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-13: lha'i 'od zer gyi mthus shin tu mdzes bar byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-14: yang tshal sna tshogs bkra ba gzhan ni lcug ma 'phyang ba dang; shing gel ba sna tshogs dag phan tshun 'dzings par 'dug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-15: kha dog gsum 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-16: bee d'urya'i lcug ma la padma r'a ga'i mdog gi 'bras bu de 'phyang bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-17: aanda rnyil gyi mdog lta bus lhan cig dkris pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-18: dngul gyi lcug ma la padma r'a ga'i mdog gi 'od kyis lhan cig bskor ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-20: gser gyi lcug ma la gser gyi lcug mas lhan cig dkris pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-22: rin po che ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu'i lcug ma la dngul gyis yongs su dkris pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-23: de ltar lcug ma kha dog gnyis pa 'phyang pa yongs su dkris pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216a-24: lcug ma 'phyang ba kha dog gsum pa rnams la yongs su dkris pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-0: bee d'urya'i lcug ma la gser @216b dang; ke ke ru'i mdog lta bus kun tu dkris pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-1: de bzhin du lcug ma ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu la gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-2: dngul lta bus yongs su dkris pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-3: de bzhin du dngul gyi lcug ma la padma spug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-4: mthon ka lta bus yongs su dkris pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-5: de ltar lcug ma re re la gnyis gnyis kyis kun tu dkris pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-6: yang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du bkra ba gzhan 'byung ba ni gser gyi lcug ma dag las me tog bee d'urya'i mdog lta bu 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-7: de bzhin du dngul gyi lcug ma dag las me tog mthon ka'i mdog lta bu 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-8: de bzhin du gser gyi lcug ma dag las me tog ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-9: de bzhin du spug gi lcug ma dag las me tog bee d'urya'i mdog lta bu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-10: de ltar lcug ma sna tshogs dag las me tog sna tshogs dag 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-11: las sna tshogs kyis bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-12: sems sna tshogs kyis bslad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-13: rgyu sna tshogs dang mthun pa ni yang dag par skyes pa sna tshogs dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-14: de ltar las rnams kyi rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-15: gzhi des de ltar shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal thams cad bkra ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-16: ji ltar sa bon las 'bras bu 'byung ba de bzhin du rgyu dang mthun par 'bras bu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-17: gang 'dir las byed pa rnam pa gang ji ltar 'phangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-18: gang gi tshe zhing gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:216b-19: sems pa'i rnam pa ji lta bu nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-0: sna tshogs su slong bar byed pa'i @217a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-1: bar las rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa'i 'bras bu ni de ltar rgya'i 'bur lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-3: sems can dmyal ba gang rgyu med par 'bras bu 'byung ba de med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-4: gzhan gyis byas la rnam par smin pa gzhan la 'byung ba de ni gnas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-5: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-6: shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal bkra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-7: 'jig rten bkra ba la'ang rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-8: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i shing rta sna tshogs na lha rnams las ci zhig byed cig gu snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-9: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-11: mi chos dang mi ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-12: chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-14: phar mi 'dzin pa; dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-16: rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus par mi byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-17: dge ba'i bshes gnyen du mi 'dzin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-19: 'bras bu la yid mi ches pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-20: yang dag pa'i lta ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-21: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sngon du 'gro ba med pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-22: bdud sdig can dag dga' bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-24: chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'khor bzhi po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217a-26: bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba 'thab pa zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-0: bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba g-yeng byed ces bya ba @217b gang chos spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems g-yeng bar byed pa'am dam pa'i chos nyan pa gnyid log par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-1: gsum pa lhag par chags par rmongs pa zhes bya ba sbyin bdag gtong ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-3: sbyin bdag rnams kyi sems chags pa skyed par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-4: 'di ltar bdag gis gang dge sbyong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-5: bram ze zhing du gyur pa rnams la sbyin du bdag gi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-7: ci bgo snyam du sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-8: bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba gsum pa dag sems can rnams rnam par rmongs par byed cing 'jig rten na rgyu bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-9: bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi ba 'du shes log pa zhes bya ba de 'jig rten na rgyu zhing de rab tu 'byung ba rnams kyi sems rab tu mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-10: dang po ni chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-13: tshong zong nyo tshong byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-14: bud med la lta 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-15: chang 'tshong gi khyim du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-18: rmi lam gyi gnod pa'i sems skyed par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-19: bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po de dag gang gi tshe chos dang mi ldan pa'i skye dgu dzambu'i gling du byed pa nus pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-22: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'grib bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:217b-23: bdud kyi phyogs ni 'phel te dgyes par mdzod cig ces bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-1: bdud sdig can dag gi rjes su 'brangs pa de dag la bdag cag gi phyogs ji ltar 'phel /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-2: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ji ltar 'gribs zhes dris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-3: de dag gis lho dzambu'i gling na mi chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-4: chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-9: rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-10: bdag cag gi 'dod chags kyi chags pas zil gyis mnan cing dam pa'i chos nyan pa la'ang gnod par bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-11: de nas rab tu 'byung ba'i blos phal cher rab tu byung ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-12: khyim na gnas pa sdom pa blangs shing tshangs par spyod pa rnams kyi rmi lam du'ang bud med gyi gzugs su sprul nas rmi lam gyi gnod pa bgyid du stsal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-14: sbyin bdag rnams kyi sbyin pa gtong ba na bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-15: chung ma la rag las ba'i sems kyis yid chags par gyur pa bgyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-18: rab tu byung ba'ang nyo tshong gi zong la sems brtson par bgyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-21: 'tshang 'drud pa la dga' bar bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-22: de ltar bdag cag gi thabs 'di rnams kyis bdud kyi phyogs ni spel /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-23: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni bshig go zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218a-24: bdud sdig can gyis de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-0: lha ma yin sgra @218b gcan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-4: klu rab 'joms la sogs pa dag la 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni yongs su dmas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-5: bdag cag gi phyogs ni 'phel te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-6: khyed dga' bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-7: de ltar yang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag nyid yang sa'i 'og tu gtong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-10: thags bzad ris la snga ma bzhin du bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-11: de thos nas lha ma yin rnams rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-12: klu rab 'joms la sogs pa chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa rnams la bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-13: longs spyod ldan na gnas pa'i klu de rnams kyis thos nas kyang shin tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-14: de dag mi rnams la snga ma bzhin du bgegs byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-15: de dag kyang 'phags skyes po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba gzhan dag las de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-16: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-17: de zhugs nas lha rnams bos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-18: 'di ltar 'jig rten skyong ba 'di dag na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-19: 'di ltar bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams rab tu mthu dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-20: lha ma yin thags bzang ris dang; rab dgod la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-21: klu rab 'joms la sogs pa mthu rab tu che'o zhes zer gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:218b-22: de la lha khyed cag gis lha'i tshogs thams cad 'dir bsdu bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-1: nas kyang bdag cag lha'i tshogs thams cad lha ma yin dang g-yul sprad pa'i phyir rin po ches brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs su 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-2: de thos nas lha thams cad kyis de ltar 'tshal lo zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-3: rang gi gnas ga la ba der 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-4: dong nas lha gzhan thams cad bsdus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-6: shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal ga la ba der 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-7: dong nas skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs kyi gnas nyid du 'khod cing sil snyan sgra dbyangs sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-9: shing rta sna tshogs kyis bkra ba rnams su dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-10: gang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal na rtag pa rtag pa nyid du 'khod pa'i lha de dag ni skyed mos tshal gar yang mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-11: de nas lha'i dbang po des lha de dag bsdus nas shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal de nas dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-12: shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha de dag kyang ji srid du 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-14: yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-15: de zad nas lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-16: shi nas kyang nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-18: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-19: gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219a-20: las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-0: na tshod thog ma nas @219b 'chi ba'i bar du me tog gi phreng ba sdug gu thogs shing cha byad sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-1: shing rta sna tshogs la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-3: gal te de rab tu byung na de seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-4: gtam sna tshogs smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-5: gtam sna tshogs kyis 'khor kyang kun nas shin tu dga' bar byed pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-6: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-7: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-8: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas dga' ba na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-9: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-10: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-11: skyes bu dam pa bsam pa dge bar gyur pa gang gis srog gcod pa mi byed cing ma byin par len pa'ang mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-16: byas na'ang 'chags par byed cing skyon du bgrang bar byed la sdig pa'i grogs po de yongs su spong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-17: de la srog gcod pa dang bral ba ni gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-18: rnam pa ni du yod cig gu snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-19: 'di ni bya ne'u bzung bar thar bar byed cing sdom pa len du bcug nas bdag nyid mi byed la so sor 'chags par byed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:219b-20: bya bas bya bzung ba nor rdzas kyis blus te thar par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-1: de nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-3: rab tu spro bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-4: ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-5: ma byin par len pa spangs pa gang yin zhig gu snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-6: 'dir sdud pa bor gyur nas grong rnams 'dzin tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-12: bong bu la sogs pa sdus shig ces bsgo ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-13: de'ang sdom pa'i 'jigs pas skrag nas ma byin par len pa mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-14: de las dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-16: chos 'chad pa'ang chos nyan pa po rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshes grangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-18: dus dang ldan par byas la de dag kyang dga' bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-19: de dag yid rab tu dga' ba sems rtse gcig gis chos nyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-20: dam pa'i chos 'chad pa'i slob dpon de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-21: sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na sbyin ba'i mchog 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220a-23: chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-0: rgyu 'dis kyang lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na dga' ba'i tshal du @220b skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-1: der skyes nas kyang de lha'i bde ba phun sum tshogs ba dpe med pa brgya phrag stong du ma myong ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-2: 'di ltar gang du tshal de'i phyogs kyi cha ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-3: dpag tshad sum stong yod la rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-4: de ltar lha rnams rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gzhan gar yang mi 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-5: de bas na lhan cig skyes pa'i yon tan gyis de dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-6: de na shing ljon pa thams cad 'dod pa dag gang lha rnams kyi yid kyis yang dag par sems par byed pa de dag nyid lha de rnams kyis shing ljon pa las 'thon par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-7: de ltar lha rnams kyi yid la bdag khyim zhig 'dod do snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-8: de nas de ltar lha des yid la byas ma thag tu shing ljon pa de'i yal ga'i rtse mo la 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-9: shing ljon pa de'i khang bzang rin po che sna bdun dang ldan zhing nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-10: ka ba stong yod pa'i khang bzang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-11: khang pa de'i ka ba so sor de'i phyogs phyogs bee d'urya las byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-14: la la ke ke ru las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-15: la la spug las byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-16: de nas khyim gyi mchog de shing ljon pa'i rtse mo de la yod pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:220b-17: da ni bdag lam 'jam zhing mtho dma' ru gyur pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-1: par bya'o snyam bsams ma thag nyid du shing ljon pa de nyid la lam mthong ste der 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-2: de ltar lam de nyid nas zhugs pa dang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-3: da ni bdag gi khyim 'dir khyim nang du padma'i rdzing zhig yod na rung ngo snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-4: de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du padma'i rdzing rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-7: dur ba sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-8: de nas yang lha de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-10: glu dbyangs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa 'byung par gyur cig snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-11: de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du gang rlung ngad 'jam pa rab tu ldang bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-12: rnam pa ji srid du phan tshun reg pa na sgra 'byung ba'i rnam pa de srid du sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-13: lha de 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-14: shing ljon pa'i nang gi khang par da ni bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-15: btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab par gyur cig snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-16: de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du shing ljon pa'i yal ga de dag rdol nas bza' ba chu bo snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-17: btung ba chu bo snyed kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-19: reg pa phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-21: da ni bdag bdud rtsi bza' bar bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-22: de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du bdud rtsi lha'i ro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221a-24: mdog phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-0: de de la za bar byed @221b do; ;de des shing tu tshim pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-1: de nas yang lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-2: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-3: de ltar dga' ba'i tshal du lha dag shing gi drung du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-4: bde ba nye bar spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-5: de gal te yang shing ljon pa'i mchog de las 'bebs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-6: de sa'i steng du song nas sa de la 'chag par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-7: de 'chag pa na bee d'urya'i sdong bu dang ldan pa'i padma gser gyi 'dab ma mtho ris su 'os pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-8: 'jam zhing 'phar ba kun nas mchog du nyams dga' zhing shin tu dri zhim pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-9: de dag la rkang pas 'gro zhing lha de 'chag par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-10: lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs len pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-11: de ltar lha de rkang pas 'chag pa'i bde ba nye bar myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-12: de rnam par rtog pa 'bum snyed du ma dag 'grub cing bde ba myong ste dbang po lnga rnams kyi yul lnga rnams la myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-13: dbang po kun rang gi yul gyis tshim pa med par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-15: mig gis gzugs gang mthong ba de dag zlos pa med par mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-16: gang mthong ba de dag sna tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-17: nyams dga' ba mig tu 'ong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-18: mig dang bas 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba 'dzin cing mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-19: de ltar mig gzugs rnams kyis tshim pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:221b-20: gang rna bas mnyan pa'ang nyams dga' ba gzhan dang mi 'dra ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-0: rna ba'ang sgra rnams kyis tshim pa med @222a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-1: do; ;de ltar snas kyang dri snom bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-2: gang snom pa de dag kyang 'dod ba sdug pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la snom ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-3: sna'ang dri rnams kyis tshim pa med de; ;de ltar lces kyang ro rnams myong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-4: gang myong bar bya ba de dag kyang shin tu 'dod pa dag la myong bar byed cing yid du 'ong ba dag la myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-5: de ltar lus kyis kyang reg bya la reg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-6: gang reg par bya ba de dag kyang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dag la myong bar byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-7: de ltar yid kyis gang bsam par bya ba de'ang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dag la sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-8: de ltar sred pa'i tshogs drug la lus rnam par chags pa dag tshal de na rgod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-11: rtse bar byed kyang 'dod pa rnams kyis tshim pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-12: de yul 'og ma dgon pa lta bu la dbang po mthon por byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa rlung lta bus bskyod pa'i dge ba med pa shin tu byung ba'i mes nyin gcig bzhin sreg kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-13: de sred pa'i 'dod ba rnams kyis tshim pa bskyed par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-14: de ltar de dag dga' ba'i tshal na rtse zhing yul du ma la dga' ba myong ba kun tu rtse ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-15: dga' ba myong ba na lha ma yin las rnam par rgyal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222a-16: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang snga ma bzhin du ri brtsegs pa sna tshogs ga la pa der 'gro bar byed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-0: [?] @222b song nas kyang lha rnams bos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-2: dga' ba'i tshal du dga' bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-3: lha'i 'dod ba'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis rtses shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-4: 'di ltar bdag ni bdud kyi sde thags bzang ris la sogs pa las rnam par rgyal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-5: bdag dga' ba'i tshal du 'gro yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-6: de ltar lha thams cad lha mo'i tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-7: bdag cag rnams kyi dbyar zla ba bzhir gnas pa'i skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod bya ba gal ba der dong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-8: lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis nges par dga' bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-9: de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams la bsgo nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-10: shin tu dga' ba chen po dang yang dag par ldan pa glang po ches srung gi bu bos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-11: 'di ltar glang po che'i mchog chos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-12: nga skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-13: dga' ba'i tshal na skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod ga la ba der 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-15: lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongs su bskor la dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-16: khyod kyis ji ltar sngon yang yongs su sprul pa byas pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-17: de ltar khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-20: rtsib logs la zhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-26: nye ba'i tshal dag sprul pa gyis shig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:222b-27: de nas brgya byin gyi tshig thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-0: glang po che'i mchog sa srung gi bu @223a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-1: bdag nyid chen por sprul te lus chen por byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-2: de mgo brgyar sprul te mgo re re la so bcu bcu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-3: so re re la padma'i rdzing bcu bcu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-4: padma'i rdzing re re la padma stong stong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-5: padma stong stong la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab ma yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-6: 'dab ma stong stong la rin po che sna bdun gyi bung ba yod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-7: 'dab ma stong stong la lha rnams 'khod kyang lha mo'i tshogs dang phan tshun nyam nga ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-8: de dag glang po che mchog gi mgo la zhon pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-9: lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der nam mkha' las 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-10: glang po che mchog gi rtsib logs la'ang tshal gnyis sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-11: tshal rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-12: tshal gnyis po 'dod bde zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-13: tshal gnyis po de na shing ljon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-15: lteng ka phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-16: rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-17: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa phun sum tshogs pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-18: tshal de na gnas pa'i lha rnams dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod la lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis dga' ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-20: lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223a-21: glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu ri rab gnyis pa lta bu dga' ba'i tshal gal ba der 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-0: glang po che mchog gi rgyab tu'ang grong khyer mnyam zhing 'jam pa'i @223b ngos zhes bya ba blta na sdug gnyis pa lta bu sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-6: rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-7: de'i dbus su khang pa sprul te rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ka pa brgya yod pa'i ka ba rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-8: de'i dbus su mtsho 'byung ste der lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-9: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha'i rgyal po brgya byin dga' bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-10: dga' mgur spyod pa bzhin du dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-11: de 'gro ba na'ang 'gyur ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-12: ji ltar ri rab la gnas pa 'gyur bar mi mngon pa de ltar glang po che'i mchog 'gro'ang mi mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-13: de nas yang glang po che'i rna ba la padma'i rdzing gnyis sprul te rgyar dpag tshad bcu gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-14: gnyis pa'ang dpag tshad bcu yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-15: gcig ni zab pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-16: gnyis pa ni dang ba zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-17: chu yon tan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas shin tu gang ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-18: de na autpal bee d'urya'i 'dab ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-19: rin po che'i sdong bu dag skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-20: kha cig ni padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu la bung bas nye bar mdzes par byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-21: me tog rgyas la lha'i dri phun sum tshogs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:223b-22: autpal de dag gi nang gi zer ba'i stan la lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-0: lha mo gang dag lhan cig 'khod de dga' bar byed la @224a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-1: lha kha cig ni chus rtse zhing padmas rtsa bar kyang lha rnams kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-5: glang po che mchog gi lag pa'i steng du rdzing ring po sprul te srid du dpag tshad lnga yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-6: khang bzang yang thog can gyis yongs su bskor la lha'i shing ljon pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-7: me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-8: me tog manda rabs khebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-9: bung ba sgra di ri ri 'byin pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-10: lha'i tsandan gor shir sha'i 'dab mas nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-11: gser gyi shing ljon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-12: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan rnams kyis shin tu khebs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-13: me tog de rnams kyi nang na 'khod pa'i lha mo me tog gi ze ba'i steng na 'dug pa dag rol mo byed cing de dag glu dbyangs len la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-14: lha'i rgyal po de la'ang tshig dge ba rnams kyis bstod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-15: de ltar glang po che mchog gi lag pa'i steng du'ang rdzing ring po sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-16: de nas yang glang po che'i rgyal po'i sna'i thor to la rdzing chen po rgyar dpag tshad tsam yod pa sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-17: padma rgya che ba 'bum phrag du ma dri shin tu zhim pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-18: gang lha'i dri de dpag tshad bcur ldang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-19: padma chen po 'dab mas nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'dab ma re re la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224a-21: lha mo'i tshogs rnams nye bar glu dbyangs len cing rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-0: dga' mgur spyod par byed kyang lha rnams rtse zhing yongs su spyod pa phan tshun @224b mi mthong la de bzhin du gnod pa dang bral ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-1: de ltar yang sna'i thor to la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-2: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de rnams dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-3: de ltar ri rab kyi steng du 'gro'ang glang po che'i mchog 'gyur bar lha rnams kyis mi rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-4: de nas yang glang po che'i mchog gi sna la ri chen po 'byung khungs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-5: ri de nyid la 'byung khungs sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing lha'i shing ljon pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-10: padma'i rdzing gis brgyan par lha gzhan dag kyang rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-13: glang po che'i mchog me tog gis bkra ba de'i mgo la'ang ri sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-14: de nas yang glang po che mchog gi so'i thor to zla ba tshes pa lta bu la nye ba'i tshal dag sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-16: mtshos sa gzhi rtag tu gang ba'i thang lta bur bkra bar byas shing 'dab mas kyang nye bar mdzes par byas bung ba lang long 'khrigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-17: khu phyug gi sgra di ri ri 'byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-18: skam la rgyu ba rin po che sna bdun gyi rma bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-19: shang shang te'u shin tu yid du 'ong ba du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-21: lha'i bya rnams kyis so la sprul ba nye bar mdzes par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-22: glang po che'i mchog lus chen por gyur nas dga' ba'i tsha la ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:224b-23: lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing ngal ba med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-1: ldan pa 'gros mdzes pas rab tu 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-2: de nas yang glang po che'i mchog de'i sna gnyis kyi nang nas sna chu'i rgyun 'dzag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-4: dzambu'i gling na mtsho gangg'a dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-5: ya mu na'i chu 'bab pa shin tu dang zhing rnyog pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-6: bsil ba rab tu 'bab pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-7: de bzhin du cung zad dpe lta bur bya na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-8: ji ltar mi'i gnas bzhi dag na sman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-12: gro tsha bas gdungs shing bskams pa rnams de nas yang sos par bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-14: lo ma rnams kyis steng na chu 'bab pa mngon pa de ltar glang po che'i rgyal po de'i rab tu dbye ba'ang rtag tu de lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-15: gal te chu 'bab pa de rlung gis nam mkha' la 'thor bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-16: rlung gis rgyang ring du skam par byed pa de ni zil pa 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-17: mi'i gnas gsum na snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-18: de nas yang glang po che'i rgyal po'i mchog de'i sna sgra 'bud pas 'byung ba de ni nam mkha'i dbus na lha rgyu ba rnams kyi nang du 'bab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-19: 'od dkar por rgyu ba mngon pa 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-20: gang mu stegs pa gzhan dag na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-21: 'di ltar 'di ni dbang po'i lam mo zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225a-22: yang gzhan dag na re; 'di ltar 'di ni glang po che sa srung gi bu'i lam yin no zhes brjod kyang de ltar chu dkar po'i ngo bo nyid de mi shes so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-0: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran @225b pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-1: bam po sum cu gsum pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-2: de dag rlung gis gtor ba dang 'phral la 'bab cing de nyid ri dvags skom pa lta bur mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-3: ngo bo gzhan du 'gyur te ngo bo dag ni mi gsal ba'i ngo bor snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-4: de nas yang glang po che'i rgyal po'i mchog de'i spyi bo la ri yod pa gang yin pa de'i spyi bo thams cad la rgyal mtshan gyi mchog bee d'urya'i gdub kor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-6: ji ltar nyi ma gnyis pa lta bur de de ltar rnam par mdzes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-7: glang po che'i mchog de'i steng na ba dan yang sprul te ring khyad dpag tshad tsam mo; ;ba dan de kun nas 'od dkar po 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-8: gang mthong nas lha ma yin rgya mtsho na gnas pa rnams phan tshun du 'di ltar 'di ni lha rnams 'ongs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-9: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi ba dan rgyal byed ces bya ba snang ngo zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-10: de nas glang po che'i rgyal po'i mchog de dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-11: tshal de rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong nas lha rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-12: khyed cag thams cad du nyams dga' ba chen po de nyid la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-13: tshal chen po kun nas mthong na dga' ba gang du lha 'di dag lha ma yin las rgyal ba thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-14: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu zla ba bzhir dga' bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:225b-15: de nas lha dag gis tshig de thos nas lha de dag gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-0: ji lta bdag cag la brgya byin gyis bka' @226a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-1: stsal pa de ltar bdag cag rnams kyis bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-2: de skad ces smras nas brgya byin gyi glang po che srung gi bu dga' ba'i tshal du nye bar phyin no; ;de nas gang lha gzhan dga' ba'i tshal de na rtse mo byed pa de dag dga' bar byed cing yongs su spyod par byed la lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa de dag thams cad rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-3: glang po che'i rgyal pos srung gi bu nye bar mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-4: dga' ba'i tshal gyi ril rtse zhing gnas pa'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga' zhing; lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der dang ste phyin nas lha'i rgyal po la mgro thal mo sbyar te mchod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-5: brgya byin gyi mdun du sil snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-7: rol mo sna tshogs kyi dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-8: brgya byin gyi mdun na bro gar dag byed bzhin dug dga' ba'i tshal chen po de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-9: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang glang po che sa srung gi bu las babs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-10: lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-11: steng du zhon pa'i lha kun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-12: de bzhin du mgo la zhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-13: de bzhin du sol zhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-14: de bzhin du rtsi ba log la zhon pa de dag thams cad glang po ches srung gi bu las babs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226a-15: dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der rtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-0: @226b bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-1: de nas gang dga' ba'i tshal chen po na snga na 'khod pa'i lha de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-2: gang brgya byin dang lhan cig lha ma yin gyi g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba thob pa de dag thams cad 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-3: dbyar zla ba bzhir bde ba dpe med pa de rjes su myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-4: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-5: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-7: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-9: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-10: bde ba dpe med pa de rjes su myong ba na; skabs der ji srid du las byas shing bsags pa de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-12: tshe zad pa'i lha gang yin pa de dag phyis lha'i 'jig rten dga' ba'i tshal de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-13: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-15: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-16: gal te mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-17: las de dang rgyu mthun par rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-18: sgyu rtsal gyi blo dri ma med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-19: gzugs mchog tu mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-20: skye bo thams cad kyi yid du shin tu 'thad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:226b-25: nye ba'i tshal yod pa dga' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-5: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes bde; glang po che'i rgyal pos srung gi bu'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-6: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-7: 'di ltar de las kyi rnam pa gang gis rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-9: lha chen po lha ma yin gyi g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba thob cing las gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-10: rnam pa ji lta bu zhig gis dud 'grong skyes snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-11: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na; 'di ltar 'di ni sngon sems can tshe lo bdun khri thub pa na bram ze chen po rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-12: rig byed kyi yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-14: sngon gyi rabs shes pa zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-20: sdug bsngal ba rnams la rtag res 'khor yang byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-21: sems shin tu dge zhing 'jig rten kun la phan par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-22: de'i tshe rgyal po legs mthong zhes bya ba de'i dga' spyod chen po shin tu nyams dga' ba ji ltar lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-23: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i lta bu byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-24: glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong gser gyi dra bas g-yogs shing dril bu g-yer kha'i drang btags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227a-25: kun nas gser gyi dri bas brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-0: rta brgyad khri bzhi stong @227b kun nas gser gyi dril bu g-yer kha'i sgra 'byung bas brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-1: de bzhin du bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gis yongs su bskor cing rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-2: de bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong dag gis yongs su bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-3: nye ba'i tshal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba gzhal med khang ga la ba der dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-4: rgyal po legs mthong gi mchog tu bde ba shin tu rgya che ba'i 'byor ba de dag la bram ze des kun nas mngon par brtags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-5: bram ze'i 'byor pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pas kyang rgyal po chen po de'i dga' spyod byed pa ga la ba der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-6: bram ze de'i ming ni skye bo kun snyoms zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-7: de nas bram ze skye bo kun snyoms rgyal po de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-8: de'i 'byor pa dang ldan pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-9: rgyal po de'i rtag tu bzhon pa glang po che sprin brtsegs zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-10: de'i lus de kun nas dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas brgyan pa mu tig gis phreng ba rnams btags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-11: kun nas bzo mkhas pas rgyan byas pa; rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-12: sil snyan gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar 'byin pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-13: skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba'i glang po che shin tu rgya che ba mchog tu blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-14: rab tu bde ba mthong ba dang bram ze skye bo kun snyoms de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:227b-15: kye; ae ma glang po che 'di ni mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-0: lha; de bzhin du bdag kyang da ni lha'i @228a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-1: rgyal po brgya byin gyi rtag tu bzhon pa'i glang po che'i rgyal por gyur cig snyam du sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-2: de sbyin pa de'i mthu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-3: de'i las kyi mthus lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris su lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi rtag tu bzhon pa glang po che'i rgyal por skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-4: de nas de'i tshe dge slong des 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-5: las 'di ri mo mkhan lta bu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-6: gang dang gang du 'dri byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-7: sems kyi dbang phyug chen po yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-9: yongs su 'gyur ba'i bye brag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-10: gang dang gang du sbyor byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-11: khams gsum 'khor bar rgyu ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-12: de dang der ni sems kyis gtong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-13: lus can rnams kyi las kun ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-15: de ltar rtag tu sems dul ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-17: bsnyen par dga' zhing yang ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-18: gang yang rung bar ltung ba yi; ;sems ni dul na legs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-19: sems dul bde ba thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-20: gang gis rtag tu sems dul ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-21: de yis rtag tu nyes pa bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-22: nyes pa bcom pa'i brtan po la; ;sdug bsngal nyid kyis gnon mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-23: gang zhig 'dir ni sdug bsngal zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-24: gang zhig gzhan du sdug bsngal ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228a-25: de dag thams cad mi bzad pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-0: sems 'di yang @228b zhing g-yos pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-1: lha dang lha min sha za klu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-2: lto 'phye srin por bcas pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-3: gtso bo mchog gcig sems yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-4: de ni srid gsum rgyal po bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-5: sems ni lha yi yul rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-6: sems ni mi yul rnams su khrid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-7: sems ni ngan 'gro rnams su khrid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-8: sems kyis skye dgu 'khyam par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-9: phan pa med pa'i yul rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-10: 'khrul zhing nyams par gyur pa'i sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-11: sred pa yis ni 'das pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-12: sdug bsngal mtha' med pa la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-13: spyod pa gcig la rtag tu spas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-14: bsnyen par dka' la stobs po che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-15: nyams par byed la mi mngon pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-16: de ni mi brtan myur du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-17: de 'dra'i sems ni gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-18: mkhas pa rnams ni 'dul bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-19: de dag bdud kyi bcings las 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-20: pha rol bde ba 'byung ba thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-21: rnam rtog mi bzad g-yon can te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-22: de ni gting dpag dka' zhing g-yo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-23: de lta bu la rten pa'i sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-24: dmyal ba'i g-yang sar nye bar ltung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-25: nyes pa de dag las grol zhing; ;dbang po don gyi dbang mi 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-26: sdig pa'i chos kyis mgos pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-28: sems ni rgyu dang rkyen las skyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-29: de ni rnal 'byor mchog la 'jug ;myur du gyur pa'i dbang gis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-30: de bzhin de ni shin tu 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-31: de ltar las ni byed pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:228b-33: gcig tu phra mo gcig spyad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-2: de yi lus dang 'gro ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-3: 'jig rten mtha' ni gang du khrid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-5: thams cad du ni shes par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-6: gang du lus ni 'gro ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-7: 'dug pa dang ni las byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-8: de yi las ni mthong 'gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-9: rnal 'byor de ni mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-10: de ni gdul bar dka' ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-11: de yi lus kyang mi rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-12: sems can kun gyi rtog mi bzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-13: yang bar spyod la mig kyang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-14: sdig dang sdig mi byed pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-15: de ni sgyu ma lta bu yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-16: de yi rtog pa mi rig cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-17: 'gro ba med pa mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-18: tshe rabs dag ni brgya snyed du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-19: skye bo thams cad khrid byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-20: 'di ni mtshon gyis mi chod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-21: me yis sreg par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-22: skye bo mig med thams cad ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-23: gcod par byed cing sreg par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-24: las kyi thag pa dam po yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-25: skye bo bcings pa sdug bsngal che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-26: tshe rabs dag ni stong snyed du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-27: khrid par byed kyang mi mthong ngo; ;skad cig tu ni dge byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-28: skad cig tu ni mi dge byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-29: dge dang mi dge byed pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-30: sems dul ba ni bde bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-31: sgo drug nas ni byung ba yis [?]//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-32: yul rnams la ni rab tu brkam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-33: 'jig rten mthar ni sems khrid pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229a-34: nyon mongs yang dag mi rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-0: de ltar dge slong des legs par byas pa chen po de chung dur [?] bsgyur ba mthong @229b nas; yid la legs par byas zhes bya ba'i las gang gis phal lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-1: lha gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-2: 'di ltar de sems gtso bo'i dbang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-3: sems yongs su 'gyur ba'i dbang gis dud 'gror grub pa lta zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-4: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-5: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-6: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sa rnam mdzes na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-7: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-8: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-9: gang bdag nyid tshul khrims bsrungs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-11: bdag nyid sdig pa mi byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-13: skyon du bgrang bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-14: tshul khrims la'ang rab tu bkod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-15: de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims dri ma med pa brtan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-16: nyer bsdogs yongs su dag pa srung bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-18: ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-19: srog gcod rnam pa du spangs zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-20: 'dir sdom pas bsdams pas sems can mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-24: srog chags gnas na gnas pa mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:229b-25: ne'u le mang po gnas pa'i sa brkos pa gang gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-0: sems can gnod par 'gyur ba rko bar @230a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-3: sdom pa ma blangs pa'ang phyir zlog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-7: ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ji ltar 'dzin ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-9: gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la rku sems kyis cung zad tsam yang mi len pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-10: gzhan len na'ang phyir zlog par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-11: tshul khrims la rab tu 'jog par byed la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-12: de ltar srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-13: ma byin par len pa rnam par spangs pa'i skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims spyod pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-14: lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rnam par mdzes na gnas pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro; ;rtag tu dga' zhing glu dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-18: dga' mgur spyod pa skye bo rang gi 'od dang ldan pas rtag tu gang ba'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-20: skyed mos tshal gyi gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-21: tshul khrims bzang po bsrung ba mtho ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230a-22: las bya ba legs par byas pa de'i yul shin tu nyams dga' zhing longs spyod dang ldan pa'i 'byor ba'i 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-0: tshal de kun nas gser gyi dra ba'i skud pas nye bar sbrel zhing dril bu g-yer @230b kha'i sgra si li li 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-1: de la dril bu g-yer kha'i rnam pa ni 'di dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-3: gang las kyis byas pa'i bee d'urya'i dril bu g-yer kha rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-4: 'di ltar las bya ba legs par byas pa zhi ba khyod byon pa lta zhes smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-5: 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-6: yid ni shin tu dang ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-7: tshul khrims dag ni gang bsrungs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-8: de ni tshul khrims bsrungs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-9: bde ba 'dir ni nye bar gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-10: tshul khrims legs par bsrungs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-11: goms pa du ma byas pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-12: yongs su 'gyur ba bde ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-14: tshul khrims ngan 'gro rnams las skyob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-15: tshul khrims bzang 'gror khrid par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-16: de ltar tshul khrims rtag tu bsrungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-17: yongs su 'gyur ba'i bsil ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-19: tshul ldan ga las 'jigs pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-20: ngan 'gro las skyob bdag las med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-21: tshul khrims skyob pa mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-22: de ni khyod de tshul chen gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-23: thams cad du ni bsrungs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-24: lha yi gnas su 'ongs pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-25: shin tu bag med ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-26: de ltar lha de legs par byas pa'i las kyis dril bu g-yer kha'i sgra des bag med pa'i nyes pa rnams khong du chud par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:230b-27: de nas gang lha yun ring bar tshul khrims bsrungs pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-0: legs par khong du chud nas skad cig tsam du'ang shin tu bag @231a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-2: gang gis tshe rabs mang po shin tu goms pa med pa de ni de'i tshe sgra rnam par 'byin pa yi khong du mi chud par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-3: de ltar de phyir zhing shin tu bag med par 'gyur ba zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-4: de ltar de yang dag par khong du chud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-5: de nas yang gzhan du 'gro bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-7: nye ba'i tshal rin po che sna bdun gyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i gnas rnams ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-8: rnam mdzes kyi tshal de'ang kun nas dpag tshad sum stong yod pas bzhi po 'di dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-9: tshal chen po'i sa gzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-10: grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba thams cad che ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-11: sa lhag ma gzhan dag ni chung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-12: tshal de'ang kun nas gru bzhi pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-13: tshal de'i ngos bzhi la bee d'urya shin tu dri ma med pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing chen po bzhi yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-14: shing dag de dag gi 'od rgyar kun nas dpag tshad tsam la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-15: ring du'ang dpag tshad lnga stong du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-16: shing de dag gi 'od nyi ma bzhin du snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-17: shing de dag gi yal ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-18: lo ma rnams la lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-19: lha mo'i tshogs lhan cig rtse bar byed cing yid la gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-20: gang 'dod pa de de dag las 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-21: shing de dag gi dbus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231a-22: rnam mdzes kyi tshal de kun nas gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-0: bee d'urya'i padma'i rdzing rnams @231b kyis nye bar mdzes par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-1: gser btso ma dri ma med pa'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-2: kun nas zhing ma rmos pa chen po shin tu dri ma med cing shin tu gtsang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-3: shin tu ro zhim pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-4: brtson 'grus chen pos nye bar mdzes par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-5: bya dkar po dri ma med pa lta bu mthong na yid du 'thad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-6: thos na nyams dga' ba sgra 'byin pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-7: tshal de na gang bya dngul gyi sgro yod pa de dag gi mgo gser la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-10: mig padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-11: de ltar bya thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dbye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-12: gang shing rnams kyi kha dog dngul lta bu de dag gi steng na gser gyi bya rnams gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-13: gang gser gyi shing ljon pa de dag la dngul gyi bya rnams gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-14: gang bee d'urya'i shing ljon pa de dag gi yal ga'i gsab gseb na bya padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-15: gang shing ljon pa padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bu de dag la bya mthon ka'i kha dog lta bu rgyu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-16: 'bras bu thams cad la za zhing sbrang rtsi dag la'ang 'thung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-17: gang kun nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams la rin po che sna bdun gyi sgro bkra ba'i bya de dag kyang rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:231b-19: de ltar bung ba'i tshogs kyang padma mang po rnams kyi nang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-0: dus kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yod @232a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-1: pa; padma'i gseb tu zhugs shing ze ba'i gseb gseb na gnas pa rnams dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-3: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-4: de ltar shing ljon pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i grib ma yon tan kun 'byor ba'i steng na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-5: lha rnams lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-6: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-7: tshal de'ang lha thams cad kyi yon tan kun shin tu phun sum tshogs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-8: gang gi tshe lha rnams lha ma yin rnams dang g-yul 'gyed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-9: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha rnams la 'di ltar lha rnams sta gon gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-10: ri bo zla ba la gnas pa'i lha ma yin 'di dag lha rnams la mngon par gnod pa byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-12: de thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rnam mdzes kyi tshal ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-14: brgya byin gyi mdun du 'gro ba dag rnams mdzes kyi tshul du 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-15: de rnams zhugs nas kyang phyogs bzhi dag gi phyogs bzhig la ba de rnams na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-16: lha'i bee d'urya'i shing ljon pa chen po shin tu dri ma med pa bzhi yod pa de dag gi sdong po gang yin pa de dag la me long bzhin du lha rnams kyi lus mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-17: de dag rnam par rgyal ba'i mtshan ma mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232a-18: yang lha gang dag lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-0: lha ma @232b yin gyi g-yul 'gyed pa na yan lag dang 'bral ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-1: chad par 'gyur ba rang gis gcod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-2: gzugs brnyan gang 'byung ba shing de rnams kyi nang na snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-3: gang lha yan lag chad par 'gyur ba de dag de nyid du'ang phyir skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-5: rked pa gcod pa ni ma gtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-6: de ltar lha de dag phyir skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-7: ji ltar lha mgo gcod pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-8: rked pa gcod par 'gyur ba de bzhin bdag nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-9: de la bdag nyid de mthong nas lha de dag la bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-10: lha de rnams de 'chi ba'i dus yongs su spang ba'i don du brgya byin la 'di ltar lha 'di dag ni lha ma yin rnams dang g-yul 'gyed pa'i tshe 'gum par 'gyur ro zhes bsnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-11: de thos nas brgya byin gyis grogs po; khyod g-yul 'gyed par ma 'gro zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-12: khyod kyi tshe'i bar chad du ma gyur cig ces zlog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-13: 'bras bu de gang gi yin zhig gu snyam du dge slong de sems par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-14: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-16: yid snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur ba gang gis shan pas gsad par bshams pa las thar bar byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des rnam mdzes su shing ljon pa'i rnam pa de lta bu skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:232b-17: me long lta bur gyur pa de la gzugs bsnyan snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-0: de nas yang lha rnams rnam mdzes kyi @233a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-1: tshal ga la ba der 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-2: dong nas kyang rnam mdzes kyi tshal de'i dbus na tshal yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-3: de'ang 'dod pa thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin la der zhugs nas lha rnams gros byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-5: lha ma yin rnams kyi dpung che chung la sems par byed de lha ma yin rnams dpung gang dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-6: lha rnams dpung gang dang ldan zhig ces lha de rnams phan tshun dpyod pa byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-7: de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis lha rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-8: chos la rten pa dag ni chos kyis lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-9: gang gi tshe dzambu gling na gnas pa'i mi rnams rtsod pa'i dus su dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gtsor 'dzin cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-10: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-11: pha rol yang spyod du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-13: dag gi tshul khrims rnam bdun yang ma ral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-16: brtan zhing tshul 'chos pa med par bsrungs pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-17: dzambu gling gi mi rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-18: ji ltar sgro ba bye mas bkang ba la thur du bstan pa'i bye ma'i shugs 'bab pa bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233a-19: de ltar mi dag lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-0: de ltar lha'i dpung mngon par 'phel @233b la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-1: lha ma yin gyi dpung yongs su 'grib ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-2: lha ma yin gyi brtson 'grus zhan par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-3: ri bo zla ba la gnas pa'i lha ma yin gyi dpung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-4: lha rnams kyis zlog pa nyid du byed do; de nas dus gzhan du las kyi lam dri ma can spyod pa'i mi rnams dge ba'i las kyi lam ral pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-7: brtan por mi spyod pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-8: dzambu gling gi mi rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-9: lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-11: shing ljon pa aa mra rab tu smin pa dag la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas shin tu sgul bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-12: de shin tu bsgul ba na ji ltar aa mra lhung ba de ltar mi dag lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-13: de nas yang dus dams pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-14: dge ba shin tu dri ma can spyod pa'i mi 'byung ba rnams lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-15: ngag gi tshul khrims mi srung zhing shin tu brtan por mi spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-16: shin tu dkar ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-17: rtag par ma yin pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-18: lha shin tu dman pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-20: shing ljon pa bil ba spom po brtan pa 'bras bu ma smin par gyur pa la mi stobs chung ngu'i 'dom gyis 'khyud nas shin tu sgul bar byed pa de tshegs chen pos shin tu sgul bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:233b-21: gang sgul bar byed pa de dag kyang shin tu zhan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-0: de sgul ba na bil ba'i 'bras bu gang zhig 'bab pa na smin @234a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-1: pa nyung zad cig 'bab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-2: da ltar gyi mi tshul khrims dri ma can de lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-3: lha khyed cag kyang shin tu bag med pa la gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-4: shin tu bag med pa la gnas pa de ni bag med pas chog ste lha ma yin gyi dpung ni 'phel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-6: de ltar chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i mi rnams chos ma yin pa'i tshul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-8: ngag gi tshul khrims rnam pa bdun mi spyod cing ma rungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-9: pha rol gdung bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-12: chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-13: chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-15: lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-17: sgro ba bye mas bkang ba'i kha thur du bstan nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-18: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas ji ltar kha nas blug ste gtong ba de bzhin du da ltar gyi mi rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-20: lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-22: mi dge ba spyod pa'i mi 'byung ba de dag de ltar tshul khrims phyogs gcig pa cung zad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-24: ngag gi cung zad srung ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234a-26: kha cig ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-0: yi dvags @234b dang; lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-1: kha cig ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-3: shing ljon pa aa mra smin pa dag la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i 'dom gyi 'khyud pa dag gang aa mra rab tu smin pa'i 'bras bu de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-4: de dag tu ltung bar 'gyur la gang ma smin pa de dag ni lhung par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-5: de bzhin du dge ba 'dres par spyod pa'i mi rnams kha cig ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-6: kha cig ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-8: lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-9: gang gi tshe thams cad du chos ma yin pa'i skye dgu phal cher 'byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-14: rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-16: ngag gi tshul khrims cung zad kyang mi srung ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-17: dzambu gling gi mi de rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-19: lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-20: de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi stobs ni 'phel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-21: lha'i stobs ni yongs su 'grib bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-23: lha ma yin gyi g-yul 'gyed par 'gro ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-24: nga nyid kyis rgyal bar nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-25: lha gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-26: de ltar 'di yid la byos la lha rnams chos la 'bad par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:234b-27: chos la yang dag par dga' bas ni 'jig rten 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-2: mthu rnams kyi nang na ni chos mthu che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-4: de ltar yid la bya ba 'di yid la byos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-5: lha ma yin pham par bya ba la rab tu 'bod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-6: de skad ces bsko ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-7: brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-8: ji ltar khyod kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du sgrub cing mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-9: ji ltar brgya byin gyis bdag cag la bka' stsal pa de bzhin no zhes smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-10: go cha'i tshal ga la ba der go cha bgo ba'i don du 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-11: de nas shing de dag las lha rnams kyi go cha mi phyed pa dag rab tu 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-12: gang gyon nas lus mi phyed pa rnams de ltar thams cad rnam par spang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-13: ji ltar ri bo'i rtse la gnas pa'i nyi ma 'od dmar po 'char ba de ltar brjid pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-14: ri bo zla ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der g-yul 'gyed pa'i don du 'dod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-16: lha ma yin g-yul 'gyed pa snga ma bzhin du de rnams g-yul 'gyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-17: de nas gang lha de rnams rnam mdzes su so sor gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-18: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis de dag phan tshun grogs su gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-19: yid 'dod chags kyis rab tu myos pa kun /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-22: gser gyi shing ljon pa'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235a-23: lha'i rin po che ke ke ru'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-0: lha'i me tog @235b dang; 'bras bu 'byor pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-2: dga' ba rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-3: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-4: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bya rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la rjes su sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-5: bya 'di dag las gang gis kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-6: cha byad sna tshogs su 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-8: rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyi nang na bde bar 'khod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-10: nye ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-12: yongs su spyod par byed snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-13: las kyi de kho na zhi ba mor shes pa de las kyi 'bras bu la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-14: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-15: ri mo mkhan gla za ba sems la g-yo med pa gang gis gzugs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-17: skyed mos tshal tshon rtsi kha dog bzang po sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'dri ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-20: ser po dang; dmar po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-21: 'dres pa rnams kyis rtsig ngos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:235b-23: mchod rten gyi khang pa'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gla za bas shing ljon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-2: gzhal med khang la sogs pa bris pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-4: chos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yon bdag rnams kyi lung bzhin du bzo bo gla pa las byed pa rnams kyis gzhi ma nyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-9: de dag la sogs pa gzugs gzhan dag tshon rtsi bzang po dag gis sna tshogs su bris na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-10: de dag lus dang bral nas bde 'gro lha rnams kyi nang du 'dri 'dri ba de bzhin du byar skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-11: tshul khrims spangs pa las sna tshogs byas pa des ri dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-12: bung bar gyur nas dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-13: de ltar lha rnams kyi las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-15: ji ltar blun po de rnams kyis las de dag sems pa bzhin byas pa de bzhin du de dag blun por gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-17: nye ba'i tshal bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-19: ri'i rtse mo rnams su bde ba de dag myong bar 'gyur ro; ;gang gis ji ltar gzhi sbyangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-23: gser la sogs pa la gzugs ji lta ba bzhin byas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-24: las rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i gzugs rgya'i 'bur lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236a-25: lha de dag kyang rnam mdzes kyi tshal de na ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-0: so so yang dag @236b bar myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-2: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-6: lha'i bde ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-7: de zad nas de nas yang 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-8: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-10: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-11: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba legs par byas pa'i las mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-12: so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-13: mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-14: legs par byas pa'i las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-15: bde bar gnas pa'i bde bas rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-16: rgyal tshab tu yang dag par 'grub la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-17: skye bo du mas mchod par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-18: rtag tu skyed mos tshal la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-19: rtag tu dga' ston la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-20: rtag tu yid rab tu dga' zhing gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-25: kha zas gzhan bca' ba bde ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-27: skyed mos tshal du gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-28: bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-32: 'khol ba dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:236b-33: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-1: rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyis yongs su 'dun gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-3: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-4: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na skyes bu dam pa shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-5: ldan par 'gyur ba gang gis pha ma la gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-8: na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad yongs su byin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-9: gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i las de nyid la 'jog par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-10: yang dag par 'jog par byed la so sor 'jog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-11: rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyin pa byin par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-12: srog gcod phra mo'ang srung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-13: 'bras bu smin pa rul bar gyur pa'i nang na srin bu yod par bag tsha nas za bar mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-14: gzhan dag za na'ang zlog par byed cing smod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-15: de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-16: gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims la rab tu 'jog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-17: ji ltar na ma byin par len pa spangs she na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-18: 'di la ma byin pa len pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-20: mtshams su byas par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-21: 'bras bu sar pa shugs kyis khyer te bor ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-22: kun dga' ra bar lhung ste bor ba'ang spong bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-23: gzhan yang zlog cing len pa la smod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237a-24: dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-0: @237b gzhan la phan par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sar skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-1: yongs 'dun gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-2: shing ljon pa gcig pu de lhag par mdzes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-3: gang gi tshe chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi 'byung ba na; 'di ltar yang lha'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyi bya ba legs par byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-5: dzambu gling gi mi rnams kyi spyad pa legs par byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-6: nyes par byas pa'i nang na de'i dri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-10: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yin no zhes de rjod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-11: gang gi tshe dzambu gling du chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi 'byung ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-12: shing yongs 'du sa brtol me tog rgyas par 'gyur zhing; dpag tshad brgyar dri 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-14: gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar ba de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid dga' nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-15: shing yongs 'du sa brtol yongs su bskor te 'khod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-16: ae ma 'di ltar yongs 'du sa brtol rnam pa thams cad du me tog rgyas pa 'di /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-17: gro ma chag par dzambu gling gi mi rnams dge sbyong du 'dzin bram zer 'dzin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-18: rigs kyi rgan rabs la mchod pa byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:237b-19: rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su zhugs pa lta zhig ste /
