K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-0: 'di ltar bdag cag gi shing ljon pa 'di rnam pa thams cad me tog rab tu rgyas @238a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-2: lha de dag de dang nye bar dbyar zla ba bzhir lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis gnas par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-3: gang gi tshe shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog gi rnam pa phyed rgyas pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-4: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams shin tu dga' bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-5: ae ma dzambu gling gi mi rnams gor ma chag par tshul khrims 'dres par spyod pa la zhugs pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-6: shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog gi rnam pa 'dres par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-7: gang gi tshe thams cad du chos ma yin pa'i skye dgu phal cher 'byung ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-8: shing yongs 'du sa brtol thams cad du lo ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-10: de bzhin du mdog kyang mi sdug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-11: de bzhin du dri'ang mi zhim /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-12: de bzhin du 'od kyang mi gsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-15: sprin gyis 'khrigs na nyi ma'i 'od rab tu dro ba dang ldan pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-16: 'od kyi mthu nyams pa sems can rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-17: shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'od chung la dri'i rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-18: 'od kyis gnas par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-19: shing yongs 'du sa brtol na gnas pa'i lha rnams brgya byin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-20: lha; kye ma shing yongs 'du sa brtol 'od chung zhing dri mi 'da' la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238a-21: ji ltar sngon mdzes pa dang ldan pa de da ltar mdzes pa ma lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-0: gor ma bkum @238b par dzambu'i gling na skye dgu chos ma lags pa bgyid pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-3: rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su smi 'jug pa dag mchis so zhes bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-4: lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-5: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-6: shing yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig yongs su bskor nas 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-7: sangs rgyas la shin tu gus pa skyes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-8: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mngon par dran pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-9: lha rnams la 'di ltar shing yongs 'du sa brtol 'di thams cad du lo ma rnyis par gyur pa'i shing yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der kho bo 'gro yi lha gzhan de dag chos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-10: 'di ltar bdag ni shin tu gsal bar gnas pa'i mchod rten khyer /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs thogs te shing gi rgyal po de dag ga la ba der song la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-12: shing de'i drung du bdag bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-14: byug pas mchod pa bya'o de skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-15: de nas brgya byin gyi tshig lha rnams kyis thos nas lha brgya phrag stong du ma dag lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dod ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-16: brgya byin yang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs spyi bo la khyer nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:238b-17: shing yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der dong ba dang shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung na gnas pa'i lha gzhan dag gis rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-0: shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi lo ma rnyis par 'gyur cing 'od mi gsal @239a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-1: la dpal dang ldan pa med nas yid shin tu lhag par mi dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-2: de nas brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das de shing gi drung du gser btsom lta bu'i sa gzhi la bee d'urya'i gdan gyi steng du bzhag nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-3: lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa dad pa skyes pa dang bcas pa'i rim gro thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la dri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-4: tshal gyi me tog ma li ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-7: rnam pa de lta bu'i spos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-8: me tog rnams kyis bkrus shing mchod pa byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-9: brgya byin gyis lha rnams la ji ltar lha dag dad pa yang dag par skyes pa ni ser sna dang bral zhing bag med pa dang bral ba la gnas par dga' ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-12: 'phags pa'i tshogs ni khams gsum pa'i bla ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-13: bdag cag gi bla ma'ang yin no zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-14: de nas lha dad pa skyes pa thams cad sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-15: de nas de'i tshe brgya byin gyis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa; sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-16: sreng pa'i dug las rnam grol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-17: srid pa'i pha rol yang dag brgal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-18: thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-19: de nas brgya byin thal mo sbyar nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239a-20: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig yongs su bskor cing pus mo btsugs nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-0: sems can kun @239b gyi gtso gcig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-1: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug bcom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-2: rims nad med cing mtshungs med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-3: thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-4: de nas lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-5: shing gi rgyal po de yongs su bskor nas 'khod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-6: thams cad dad pa yang dag par skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-7: thams cad dbang po gzhol ba'i lha kun ji lta ji ltar sems dad la yid dge zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-8: sangs rgyas dang chos la phal cher mchod pa byed pa de lta de ltar shing de 'dab ma bye nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-10: de nas de mthong nas de ltar phyir zhing shing yongs 'dus brtol rim gyis sdon bzhin du me tog rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-11: shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi 'od kyis dpag tshad brgya dag tu mdzes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-13: 'dab ma ni sprin gyi mdog ltar dkar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-14: bung bas ni nye bar mdzes par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-16: kun nas lha'i tshogs kyis ni gang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-17: nyi ma gnyis pa ltar ni mdzes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-18: de'i sngon gyi dpal de dag mthong nas lha rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-19: dpag tshad brgya dag tu dri 'byung ba ldang la rlung yang dpag tshad ba rgya dag tu rab tu ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-20: dri yid du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing shing gi rgyal po 'od kyis mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-22: ri bo stong phrag drug cu thams cad kyi nang na ri'i rgyal po ri rab mdzes pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:239b-23: shing ljon pa rnams sna tshogs kyi nang na shing yongs 'du sa brtol de bzhin du rnam par mdzes shing kun tu snang la lhan ne ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-1: rdzogs shing dpal shin tu rgyas la dpal 'bar te kun nas kyang 'od 'bar ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-2: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga' bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-3: phan tshun du 'di ltar lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi spyan mtshungs pa med pa'i mthu la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-4: gang du sangs rgyas kyi mthus shing yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sngon gyi mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-9: ji ltar 'di 'phel ba de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang gor ma chag par stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-12: dzambu gling gi chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams kyang chos la blo gros 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-13: chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa de dag de ltar nye bar 'jug pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-14: bdud kyi sgrub pa'i stobs rab tu med par 'gyur zhing bdud kyi ris kyi lha ma yin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-15: klu 'jig rten skyong ba chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa dag chos la bgegs byed par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-16: chos la smod pa byed par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-17: lha mo rnams kyi nang du lha bdag cag zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-18: shing gi rgyal po 'di mthong bas bdud kyi stobs ni nyams shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-19: lha'i stobs ni rab tu 'phel bar khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240a-20: de nas brgya byin gyi sngon du 'gro ba'i lha rnams de ltar phan tshun gtam yang dag par brjod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-0: de nas yang chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'jig rten skyong @240b ba bzhi dag dzambu gling nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dun sa ga la ba der 'dod bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-1: de nas shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung na lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-2: yid rab tu dang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-3: rang gi 'od zer 'bar ba gsal bas mchod pa byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-4: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gis rgyad ring po nyid nas mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-5: de nas de dag gi drung du phyin nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gis lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la spyi bos phyag btsal te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-6: 'di ltar lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs pa dgyes bar mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-7: da ltar chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi rnams chos ni spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-8: chos ma yin pa ni mi spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-13: rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams chos spyod kyi dgyes par mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-14: de nas de dag las thos nas lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs pa yid rab tu dga' ba mchog tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-15: de nas yang 'jig rten skyong ba dag la mchod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-16: 'di ltar mi'i 'jig rten na mi chos pa dang ldan pa rnams 'jig rten skyong ba dag gi kun dga' ba'i skal bar gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-17: de nas lha de dag thams cad kun dga' ba skyes par rig nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:240b-18: shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blangs pa de nas yang mchod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-0: lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba @241a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-1: der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-2: lha gzhan lhag ma gang yin pa de dag ni shing yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas brgya byin gyi mdun du 'gro ba yid rab tu dga' ba rnams shing yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-3: shing gi rgyal po de'i drung du dbyar zla ba bzhi'i bar du lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-4: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-5: lha yi rab tu dga' ba lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dag dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-6: yongs su spyod par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-7: bde ba dpe med pa nye bar myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-8: de ltar de nyid la gnas pa dbyar zla ba bzhi 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-9: de dag gi nang nas las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-10: tshe zad pa'i lha gang yin pa de dag lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-11: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-14: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-15: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong par 'gyur ba'i las mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-16: so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-17: mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-18: las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu gzugs bzang zhing shin tu blta na sdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241a-20: rtag tu bde zhing byad bzhin kun gyis blta bar mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-4: bud med thams cad kyis blta bar mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-5: shin tu bde ba dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-7: rgyal tshab tu 'gyur bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-8: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-9: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-10: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-11: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-12: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-13: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-14: sems can gzhan la phan par 'dod pa'i sems yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying rje dang ldan pa gang gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-15: yon tan mchog dang ldan pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-18: nad pa la zan gcig tsam byin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-19: bdag nyid kyang srog gcod pa mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-20: shing ljon pa'i gseb na grog sbur ra ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-21: srog chags ma ko ta ka'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-22: sems can gyi rnam pa de lta bu gzhan dag la ba lang rdzi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-26: de bzhin du gzhan bong bu'i rdzi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-27: rta rdzi dgun kyi dus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-28: dgun smad kyi dus su grang bas nyen te 'brog dgon pa dag tu phyin nas me bus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:241b-29: skyes bu dam pa sems can la phan par zhugs pa des me de chu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-0: thal bas zhi bar byas nas srin bu de dag thar bar byed pa @242a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-1: dang; gzhan srog gcod pa byed pa'ang phyir zlog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-2: bdag nyid kyang mi byed la gal te byas pa zhig yod na'ang de smod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-4: gzhan la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-5: skyon du bgrang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-7: lam bde ba la rab tu 'jog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-8: de ltar rnam pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-9: tshul de dag gis srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-10: ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-11: 'di la ma byin par len pa mi byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-12: ma byin len pa mi byed pa'i rnam pa du yod snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-14: dgun dang dgun smad grang ba'i dus su shing skam po med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-15: shing ljon pa med pa'i dgon par lam du zhugs pa de na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-18: rnga mo'i rdzi grang bas nyen pa dag gis me bud pa'i phyir ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-19: mtshan mo bsro bar bya ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-24: shing bur dag spungs te bzhag pa de dag la lam du zhugs pa de grang bas shin tu nyen par gyur kyang pha rol kyi yin no snyam du bsams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-25: rku ba'i sems kyis len par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-26: pha rol len pa'ang zlog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-27: gal te bdag gis blangs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-28: de'i chags par byed la phyir zhing mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-29: gzhan dag kyang lam dge ba la rab tu 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242a-30: gzhan gyis blangs pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-0: @242b las gyi mjug ma byin par len pa las byung ba bzlog par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-1: bdag nyid kyang mi byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-2: sdig pa'i las rdul phran tsam gyis kyang 'jigs par lta ba'i skyes bu dge ba de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-3: 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i sa de'ang 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-4: dngul gyi sa gzhi la gser rnams kyis bkra bar brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-5: gser rnams kyis 'gram de'ang bkra bar brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-6: dngul gyis bkra bar brgyan pa'ang de bzhin bkra bar brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-7: de bzhin du ke ke rus bkra bar brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-8: de bzhin du rdo rje mang pos bkra bar brgyan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-9: de ltar sa de las kyi 'bras bu dang mthun par rnam par mdzes pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-10: shing ljon pa rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas shing sdug par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-12: bya sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-13: ri dvags dang; bya'i kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gram khebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-15: nye ba'i tshal yang rin po che sna bdun rnam pa du ma dag gis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-16: de nas tshal de na 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i lha shing gseb na 'khod pa rnams lus kun gser btsoms brgyan cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:242b-17: lha mo brgya phrag stong gis yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-1: cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-2: de dag rnam pa ji srid du 'gram gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-3: gang du gnas shing rin po che'i 'od gang gis brgyan pa'i rnam pa de srid du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-4: lus thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-5: rin po che'i shing ljon pa de rnams kyi 'od kyis lus thams cad brgyan pa nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-6: shing ljon pa de dag gi drung du song nas bde ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-7: yongs su sbyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-8: de dag de dag gis dga' bar byas nas lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu'i tshal ga la ba der 'dod bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-9: 'bab chu'i tshal de'ang kun nas gser gyi shing ljon pa'i 'gram nas skyes pa rnams kyis khebs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-10: shing ljon pa de rnams kyi lo ma ser pos khebs pa'i 'od kyis 'bab chu kun nas chu ser por gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-11: de dag drag tu 'bab kyang de dkar po nyid du mi mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-12: shing ljon pa rnams kyi gsab gseb na lha gang dag lha mo dang lhan cig dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-13: yongs su spyod par byed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-14: 'di ltar shing ljon pa rnams kyi yal ga dag rdol nas bdag cag rnams kyi chang zhim po 'byung bar gyur cig ces snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-15: de nas sems bskyed ma thag tu shing ljon pa de dag rdol nas lha rnams kyi dge ba'i las des char ro dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-17: dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag byung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243a-18: shing ljon pa'i yal ga dag las 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-0: @243b de 'bab pa na lha dag gis mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-1: snod rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-2: rin po che'i snod rnam pa sna tshogs thogs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-4: lha'i chang bde ba des brgya snyed du myos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-5: chang des myos pa rnams bud med mthong ba'i bde ba sred pa'i mes kun nas sreg par byed kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-6: bsregs so snyam du mi sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-7: bde bas bsgribs pa rnams sems pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-8: de nas yang lha de rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-9: ji lta ji ltar lha'i thos pa nyams dga' ba rtag tu dga' bar byed pa'i rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs bdag cag gis mnyan par bya'o snyam mo ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-10: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-11: bam po sum cu bzhi pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-12: de ltar sems bskyed ma thag nyid du dge ba'i las des rol mo'i sgra shing ljon pa rnams las 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-13: shing de dag rlung gis skyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-14: de dag bskyod pa na lo ma de dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-15: ji ltar sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sgra snyan sim zhes byed pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de lta bu'i sgra shin tu thos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-16: sgra de dag thos nas kyang lha de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-17: 'di ltar da ni shing dag las bdud rtsi 'byung bar gyur cig snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:243b-18: de ltar sems bskyed ma thag nyid du ji ltar zo ba kha thur du bstan pa rnams kyi nang nas kha ra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-0: kha ra'i dum bu kha dog dpe med pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba de bzhin du shing ljon pa rnams las bdud rtsi 'byung @244a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-1: ste; de dag lha rnams za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-2: des tshim nas glu dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-3: sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung ba rnams nye bar len bzhin du rin po che'i sa ga la ba der lha mig mi 'dzum par rgyu ba rnams 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-4: de dag rin po che'i sar dong nas phan tshun grogs su gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-5: 'dod chags lhur 'dzin par sems pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-6: der yid zhugs pa der dga' bar gyur pa de dang mthun pa'i spyod pa dang dga' ba'i lha 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-8: tshal de nas yang kun nas tshal zhes bya ba der 'gro bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-10: tshal de na bya'i rigs bdun la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-12: gser gyi ngang pa kha cig rin po che sna bdun lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-13: ne tso kha dog sna tshogs su 'dug pa kha cig aanda rnyil lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-14: bya karanda pa kha cig ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-15: kha cig bee d'urya lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-16: dur ba kha cig aanda rnyil lta bu yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-17: kha cig spug lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-18: rma bya kha cig rin po che sna bdun lta bu yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-19: kha cig mthon ka lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-20: shang shang te'u yang sna tshogs su 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-21: kha cig byu ru lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-22: bya ka la pingka rin po che sna bdun lta bu yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-23: kha cig dngul gyi mdog lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-24: de dag thams cad mthong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-26: sgra snyan cing 'jebs pa 'byin pa la mkhas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244a-27: kha cig nam mkha' la bdag [?]/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-0: @244b nyid phan tshun 'khor lo bzhin byas nas rtse bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-1: ji ltar lha rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra 'byung ba de ltar yongs su 'byin par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-2: ji ltar lha mo'i tshogs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa la shin tu chags par 'gyur ba de ltar sgra gzhan dag 'byung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-3: gzhan kha cig padma'i tshal bung ba'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa rnams su bya mo rnams dang lhan cig bcas par dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-5: gzhan dag skams la 'dug nas bya mo rnams dang lhan cig bcas par dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-6: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-8: dngul gyi shing ljon pa 'dab ma sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa rnams kyi nang na de'i grib mas lus mngon par brgyan pa rnams rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-9: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-10: de ltar bya de dag dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-11: de nas bya de rnams yongs su rtse ba na lha de rnams kyis mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-12: de nas yang rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-13: snar snyan pa'i yid kyis bya'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pa bde bar thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-14: de nas lha de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-15: lha mo de dag kyang nam mkha' la rgyu ba de dag gi nang du zhugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-16: nam mkha' la rgyu zhing rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-17: de bzhin du chu la rgyu ba rnams dang lhan cig chu'i nang na rgyu skam la rgyu ba rnams dang lhan cig skam la rgyu zhing rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-18: lha de dag kyang lha mo rnams dang lhan cig bya de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:244b-20: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-0: de nas dge slong des lha @245a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-1: de dag dang bya de dag mtshungs par 'dod pas sems phrogs shing myos pa rnams la 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-3: gti mug gis ni bskyod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-4: de lta bas na lha rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-5: lha dang dud 'gro mtshungs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-6: skal ba bzang po thob pa'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-7: bag med rnams la mi spyod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-8: de ni mkhas pa zhes brjod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-9: de las zlog pa gzhan yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-10: lha rnams bag med pa yis phrogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-11: sems can dmyal bar rab tu 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-12: de lta bas na mkhas pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-13: bag med dug dang 'dra bar brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-14: blo zhan bag med rnam dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-15: sngar ni bde ba lta bur mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-16: bag med las byung 'bras thob nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-17: don med de ni phyis gdung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-18: skye bo mkhas pas bag med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-19: don kun med par byed mthong nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-20: de ltar de las gzhan dge ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-21: gang yin bag med mi bsten to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-22: bag med gzhan du sdug bsngal zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-23: bag yod gzhan du bde ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-24: bag med pa dang bag yod dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-25: mtshan nyid bsdus te bshad pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-27: de ni bag med sten par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-28: gang zhig shin tu bag med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-29: nam yang bde ba mi 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-30: bag med bral ba dam pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-32: gang zhig shin tu bag yod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-33: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-34: gal te blo zhan lha rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-35: dud 'gro mtshungs par rtse byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245a-36: lha rnams dang ni dud 'gro dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-0: @245b khyad par med pa nyid yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-1: lha dang lha ma yin dang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-2: yi dvags de bzhin dmyal ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-3: ris mthun blo dang 'gro ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-4: kun tu mi mthun tha dad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-5: blo mi mthun pas las mi mthun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-6: las mi mthun las de bzhin 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-7: las mi mthun pa sna tshogs las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-8: 'gro ba rnams kyang snang ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-9: las rnams sna tshogs tha dad pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-10: lha rnams shin tu bag med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-11: lha yi 'jig rten las ltung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-12: khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-13: gang tshe lha yi 'jig rten las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-14: ltung bar 'gyur ba de tshe lha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-15: khyed kyi sdug bsngal nye ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-16: bdag nyid bde ba shes par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-17: de ltar rtogs pas rnam par nyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-18: bag med pas kyang bslus pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-19: sred pas gdungs pa'i lha rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-20: sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-21: lha dag dmyal bar gang song ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-22: 'di ni shin tu dpya ba yin; ;rtse mo nyams su len 'gyur rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-23: gnod pa mi bzad nyams su myong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-24: srog chags sems ni rmongs pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-26: sred pas yongs su bslus pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-27: sdug bsngal las ni sdug bsngal 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-28: de ltar dge slong des lha de rnams ni shin tu bag med pa khod du chud nas rjes su ston par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-29: de nas lha de rnams yul gyi bde ba thams cad nye bar myong yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-30: ji ltar me shing lam chen pa ltar yul rnams kyis tshim pa nyid med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:245b-31: ji srid du las byas shing bsags pa de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-1: sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i bde ba rjes su myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-2: de zad nas de nas yang lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-3: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-5: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-6: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu shin tu bde bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-8: skom mang ba'i yul du nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-9: 'bru'i bang mdzod mang po 'byor pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-11: blon po chen po byed pa 'gyur bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-12: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-13: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-14: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas tshang tshing gi 'gram na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-15: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-16: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-17: sems can skyes bu dam pa sems dge bar bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis bsam gtan dang po thob pa'i dge slong dag la bsod snyoms byin zhing gzhan dag kyang sbyin du 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-18: byin pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246a-19: gzhan dag kyang de nyid la rab tu dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-1: de ltar sbyin pa la bdag nyid mngon par dga' ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-3: ma byin len pa dag dang bral ba ji lta bu zhig yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-4: 'di la ma byin par len pa spangs pa rnam pa du yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-5: rnam pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-6: 'di ni lam du zhugs pa na khron pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-8: 'bab chu dag tu 'gron po rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir chu rdza'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-9: kham phor sbyar ba gang yin pa de dag la gzhan gyis 'di ltar dbye 'di ni rgyal zhing phyogs gzhan na'ang chu med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-10: bdag cag la'ang chu snod chu rdza'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-11: phru ba khyer ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-12: de gal te bdag cag gis khron pa'i phyogs de nas mkhyer na skom pas bdag cag gi srog chad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-13: zhes bskul kyang de len par mi byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-14: bdag nyid skom par shes kyang ma byin par len pa'i 'jigs pas chu rdza'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-15: kham phor lan par mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-16: gzhan len pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-18: dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-19: de ltar ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin zhing rnam pa de dag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-20: srog chad par 'gyur yang ma byin par len pa mi byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-21: srog gcod pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-22: rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-23: 'di la bdag nyid srog gcod par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-24: gzhan byed pa'ang phyir zlog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:246b-26: byas na'ang skyon du bgrang zhing mang du smod par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-4: dung pas gdungs pa na srin bu phre'u 'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-5: srog sbur phra mo dag la'ang kun nas gnod pa'i sems kyis gnod par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-6: srog dang bral bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-7: gzhan byed na'ang phyir ldog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-9: dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-10: dge ba'i mi bdag nyid dge ba byed cing gzhan yang rab tu gzhog par byed pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i sar skye bar 'gyur ro; ;der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de dge ba'i las la spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-11: las byas pa'i rnam par smin pa 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-13: dus kyi tshal rgya che zhes bya ba 'byung ste; tshal de na rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od gsal ba rin po che aanda rnyil dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-14: bee d'urya'i 'od dri ma med cing gsal la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-15: bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin pa rnar snyan pa dus tshigs drug tu rtag par shing ljon pa me tog mchog rab tu rgyas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-19: rin po che aanda rnyil dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-20: bee d'urya'i padma nyams dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-21: gser btso ma'i ri bo mthon pos brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-23: skam la rgyu ba'i bya ri bo mthon po'i gsab gseb dang 'gram na gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247a-25: cha byad sna tshogs su 'dug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-0: sgra skad chen po 'byin pa rnams kyis brgyan pa dge @247b ba'i las kyi 'bras bus sprul pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-1: lha de dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la spyod de yun ring du bde ba rgyun mi 'chad par spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-2: lha mo'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-4: gos gyon la dpal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-5: lha mo de dag nye bar glu dbyangs len cing yongs su spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-6: tshal der rnam par rgyu ba na dge ba'i las des bskul ba'i bya rnams kyis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-7: dge ba'i las kyis skye bo dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-8: lha yi yul du mchod par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-9: de ltar mi dge dmyal bar khrid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-11: lha yi 'jig rten thob nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-12: lha gang khyad du gsod mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-13: gang du sred pas mi gnod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-14: de na bde las bde bar 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-15: las kyi thag pa ring po yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-16: srid par rgyu ba bcings pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-17: dgra dag 'khor los bcings pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-18: dbang med las kyis 'khyam par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-19: ji ltar mkha' la rlung shugs kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-20: phyag dar dum bur gtor ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-21: de ltar srid par rgyu ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-23: ji ltar rgyu dang rkyen dag las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-24: padma byung ba mdzes pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-25: de bzhin dge ba'i las kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-26: lha yul du ni byung ba mdzes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-27: ji ltar shel ni rab dang zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-28: ji ltar nam mkha' rab dang ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-29: de ltar sems ni rab dang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-31: de yis lnga dag bsrungs pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-32: rtag tu bcings pa gsum las grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:247b-33: chos gcig las ni rab 'das pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-2: ngo tsha med cing khrel med dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-3: rgod dang sdig pa'i grogs po ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-5: mkhas pas de dag bsrung bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-6: bden dang sbyin dang de bzhin du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-7: bzod dang rtag tu dge bshes gnyen /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-8: 'byung po rnams la rtag byams pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-9: lha yul gyi ni lam rgyags yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-10: mi dag sems la g-yo med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-11: bde bas bskyod pa mnyam bzhag pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-12: rang gi las 'bras mngon sum ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-13: lha yi gnas su 'ongs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-14: chos dang chos min gtsor 'dzin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-15: kun nas 'jigs rten srog yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-16: 'di ltar chos las skyob gzhan med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-17: de bas chos la dga' bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-18: gang zhig chos ni yongs spangs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-19: mi dag nyes par byed la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-20: de ni nyes pas gdungs pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-21: rtag tu sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-22: lha yi 'jig rten thob nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-23: bag med rnams la chags gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-24: de ni dge ba'i las mtha' zad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-25: 'chi ba'i mtha' ni mi rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-27: de ni gtan du bde dang legs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-28: 'chi ba'i zhags pas bcings pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-29: nam yang bde ba yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-30: ji lta ji ltar bde thob pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-31: de ltar sred pa'i tshogs 'phel lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-32: sred pa'i me yis gdungs pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-33: sems can dmyal bar nye bar 'dren //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-34: lha la bag med mi rigs kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-35: shin tu bag med ma byin cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-36: bag med nyes pas rnam nyams pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-37: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'chi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248a-38: de ltar bya de rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-0: lha @248b mos yid g-yengs shing yul gyi sred pas blo gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-2: bya'i sgra rnam par 'byin pa bden pa de thos par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-6: 'bab chu dag la rjes su sten par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-7: de gal te kun dga' ra ba bde bar gnas pa'i lteng ka zhes bya ba ri mtho ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-8: ri mtho ba de na bya mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba bya mo rnams dang lhan cig phan tshun dga' zhing phan tshun shin tu lta 'dod pa dag lteng ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-9: padma'i tshal sna tshogs de rnams su rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-10: de nas bya de rnams mthong nas lha de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-11: kye; ae ma bya gzugs sna tshogs can 'di dag sgra sna tshogs 'byin cing nyams dga' bar byed pa na te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-12: mtho ris kyi bya bsdus pa thams cad mthun par sgra 'byin pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-13: sna tshogs su sgra 'byin par byed pa'i bya de rnams kyi steng du gnas bcas la bdag zhon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-16: lteng ka dag blta bar bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-17: de nas sems bskyed ma thag nyid du lha de dag gi bya rnams lus chen por gyur nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-18: lha de dag ga la ba der myur du nye bar 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-19: de nas lha des bya de dag la lag gis nyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:248b-21: de nas bya rnams la zhon ma thag nyid du lhas sprul pa mngon par dga' ba'i bya'i tshogs dag nam mkha' la 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-0: de nas bya sna tshogs pa de rnams kyi rgyab tu zhon ma thag nyid du yid la rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal mad khang @249a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-5: padma phun sum tshogs shing bya rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar rtse ba sems par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-6: de nas sems bskyed ma thag nyid du bya de rnams kyi rgyab tu gzhal med khang de dag ji ltar lha des yid la bsams pa de bzhin du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-7: de nas lha de dag gi phyi bzhin du lha mo cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa dag rjes su 'brang zhing nye bar spyod pa na nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dong ste yul nas yul dag tu 'dong bar byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-8: de thams cad lha'i bde ba dag gis rtse zhing nye bar spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-9: mtho ris kyi gnas dag la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-11: mchog tu dga' bar rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-12: des sa de dag la rtog rtog nas sred pa 'bum 'gyur gyis g-yeng bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-13: 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi gnas dpe bya bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-14: de ltar sgo drug nas sred pa'i me 'bar ba mchog tu mi bzad pa yid la 'bar ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-15: de bde ba gzugs brnyan lta bu'i sdug bsngal des mngon par nyams bzhin du bya de rnams kyi steng du zhon nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-16: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dpe med pa nye bar len cing ri rab kyi zhabs thams cad la lta bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-19: lteng ka phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-24: padma'i tshal du mas khebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249a-25: bya sna tshogs kyis gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-2: lha'i bu mo phan tshun rtse ba na mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-3: yul de na dga' ba 'bum phrag du ma yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-4: yul shin tu rnam par phye ba'i dga' ba thams cad mthong yang 'dod pa rnams kyis de srid du tshim pa med pa nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-5: dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod las skyes pa'i sems kyis g-yengs pa'i sred pa'i lha de rnams yul dag gis dbang po rnams shin tu chim pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-6: de ltar de yun ring po du mar bya'i steng gzhal med khang na gnas pa des ri bo khri phrag drug cu'i nang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-7: ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'dug pa de dag thams cad la lta bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-8: lha las legs par bya ba thams cad kyi gnas dpe med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-10: rin po che du ma 'bar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-11: ngos bzhi kun nas lham pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-12: kha dog rnam pa bzhis shin tu rnam par phye ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-16: gser dang; shel shin tu bzang ba'i ri rab de la des ma lus par bltas nas rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-17: de ltar bya rnams kyi steng na zhon pa de dag bya de dag la sna tshogs su sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-18: ji lta ji ltar kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-21: dbyibs bsams pa de lta de ltar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-22: de nas yang de bya de rnams kyi steng du zhon nas rdzing chu dang ba zhes bya ba ga la bder 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-23: rdzing de'ang kun nas dpag tshad lnga yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:249b-25: rin po che aanda rnyil dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-0: bee d'urya rnams kyis sna tshogs su brgyan cing gzhan padma rnams kyis kyang @250a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-1: nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-2: legs par byas pa'i las mngon sum du gyur pa der dong nas de na lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig tu lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-3: padma de rnams kyi bar dag na bung ba bzhin du sbrang rtsi de dag la 'thung bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-4: bdud rtsi la'ang za bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-8: zla ba ltar dri ma med la ro dang shin tu ldan pa de dag la za bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-9: gos de dag kyang gyon nas ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de dag dang lhan cig tu dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-10: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-11: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-12: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-14: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-15: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag par shin tu bde zhing bzhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-16: skyed mos tshal phun sum tshogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-17: skye bo kun dga' ba'i rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250a-18: blon po chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-0: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas @250b la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-1: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-2: lha rnams kyi gnas nor bu snying po zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-3: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-4: skyes bu dge ba phan par 'dod pa gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-5: ma byin par len pa mi byed la gzhan byed pa'ang phyir zlog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-6: dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-7: bdag nyid kyis srog gcod pa mi byed pa'i rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-8: 'di la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-9: bung ba'i sbrang rtsi dag las drod gsher las skye ba'i srin bu dag 'byung bar mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-10: de srog gcod pa'i 'jigs pas sbrang rtsi za bar mi byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-11: gzhan za na'ang phyir zlog par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-12: rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-13: 'di ni sdig pa yin par shes nas spong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-14: de thabs kyis kun kyang 'dri bar mi byed la mig zur tsam gyis kyang lta bar mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-15: srog gcod pa dang bral ba'i rnam pa ni de dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-16: ma byin par len pa dang bral ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-17: 'di la sdom pa blangs pas mchod rten gyi gnas su sangs rgyas la mar me phul ba de'i 'od la'ang rku bar mi byed cing des bdag gi las mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-18: de las sna tsha'ang 'byin par mi byed la phra rab tsam la'ang 'jigs par lta ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:250b-19: de ltar srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-0: ma byin par len pa dag spangs @251a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-3: ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-6: nam mkha' la rgyu ba dag gsod par mi byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-7: de dag la 'phral la bsams nas gsod par mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-8: gzhan gyis bzung ba zhig yod na'ang thar par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-9: srog gcod pa byas pa nyes par byas pa'i 'bras bu 'chags par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-10: gzhan gyis srog gcod pa byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-11: sdig pa'i 'bras bu sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su 'grub kyi khyod ma byed cig ces 'doms pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-12: de ltar gzhan yang bzlog nas sdom pa la rab tu 'jog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-13: de ni sdig pa spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-15: gzhan gyi rgyud tshul khrims la rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyun rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba ni 'di la dgon pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-17: lam rgyags nyung yang srog la mi lta bar gzhan lam rgyags nyung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-18: lam rgyags med pa sdug bsngal ba la srog yongs su btang nas rang gi kha zas bgo bsha' byed pa de ni 'bras bu che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-19: zhing gi 'bras bu'i khyad par sems pa ni dus su phyin pa dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-20: 'di ltar nad rnams kyi nang na bkres pa nad che ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251a-21: de lam bltas par 'bras bu chen por yang dag par sbyor ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-0: de ltar tshul khrims gnyi ga srung ba bdag @251b dang; gzhan la phan par rab tu zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-1: sems rnyog pa med pa drang po'i rang bzhin can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-2: sems can shin tu mi dge ba phra rab tsam la'ang 'jigs par lta ba de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-4: pha'i lus la nor bu dag gi rgyan 'dogs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-5: sangs rgyas la nor bu dag gi rgyan 'bul ba'i mi de lus dang bral nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-6: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang nor bu'i snying po'i sar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-7: der skyes nas kyang legs par byed pa'i las byas pa de shin tu blta na sdug pa lha'i yul gyi bde ba byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-9: dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de'i lus de thams cad gzi brjid 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-10: lus de las gzi brjid 'byung ba kun tu dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-12: nyi ma shar ba na nyi mas ri gsal bar byed pa de ltar de'i gsal bas thams cad du snang bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-13: gnas gzhan thams cad kyang de'i rab tu gsal ba des de nas yang brgya 'gyur du rab tu gsal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-17: dmar po rnams kyis gsal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:251b-19: 'ja'i mdog mjas par 'gyur ba de bas kyang lha'i rang gi lus las 'od byung ba brgya 'gyur gyis mdzes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-0: dge ba'i las des mngon par bsgrubs pa'i lus kyi 'ong byung bas lha'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rnam par @252a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-2: ji lta nyi ma'i 'od kyis gza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-4: rgyu skar thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-5: lha de 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar zhing de rang gi gzi brjid des 'bar ba na rang gi gnas de dag la rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-6: gnas de'ang kun nas nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nye bar spras shing sna tshogs su brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-7: kun nas thams cad du rnam par mdzes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-8: nyi ma brgya lta bur 'od 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-9: des de dag mthong nas yid rab tu dga' bas phyogs gnyis pa la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-10: de na lha mo gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-11: rgyan dpe med pa thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-12: 'dod pa'i rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs skyed pa sten pa dag mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-14: de dag gi nang nas kha cig ni rol mo'i rnam pa rdza rnga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-16: lcags kyi sil dkrol de dag la sten to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-17: de dag gi nang nas gzhan kha cig ni lha mo rnams kyi nang du song nas bro rdung zhing klu len la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252a-18: me tog phreng bas mgul brgyan pa dag ngang pa rnams dang lhan cig padma'i tshal rnams kyi nang du chu la rnam par rtse bar byed do; ;gzhan dag ni lha'i 'bras bu dag la za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-0: gzhan dag ni dpag bsam gyi shing gi nang du dong nas me tog rnams 'thog par byed cing lha'i glu dbyangs dpe med pa @252b dag kyang len te 'dod pa yang dag par ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-1: skye bo kun gyi yid shin tu mgu bar byed pa rnam pa dum yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-2: de der skyes te lha mo de dag mthong nas thog ma nyid du yul gyi mchog 'dod chags kyi sbrul gyi mche ba lta bu'i yul gyi bde ba lngas mngon par zin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-3: stan de las langs nas gzhan du 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-4: gang na lha mon tshod dpe med pa dang ldan pa lha'i phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-5: gos gyon pa de dag mthong nas de 'dod chags kyi mes yongs su gdungs pa'i yid kyis der 'gro bar byed la de dag kyang lha de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-6: de nas lha'i bu gzhan de 'chi ba na yongs su gtong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-7: ji ltar bung ba dag gis me tog skam po bor nas sar pa'i drung du 'gro ba de ltar lha de 'chi ba na lha mo dag gis yongs su btang nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-8: me tog sar pa lta bu'i lha'i bu gzhan gyi drung du 'gro bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-9: me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba thogs pa snying du sdug cing chags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-10: lha'i bu gzhon nu dang thams cad du 'dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-11: thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa'i 'dod chags kyis nye bar spyod pas rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:252b-12: lha'i bu de'ang 'chi ba na rang gi lha mo de dag gzhan du dong ba mngon par mthong nas yid la gdung ba'i rnam pa de lta bus shin tu gdungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-0: ji ltar sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i mes mnar med pa'i lus bsregs pa de ltar de'i sdug pa gzhan du dong bar gyur pa'i yid la 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyi yid @253a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-1: shin tu gdungs pas shin tu gdungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-2: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas lha'i bu 'chi ba na phrag dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-3: ser sna'i yid sdug bsngal ba des mngon par nyams pa de 'chi ba'i dus byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-4: de srid pa phyi mar sems shin tu gdungs pa de la dmigs pa'i nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyi srid pas sems rnyog pa can du byas pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-5: de las gzhan yang mi mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-6: de de nas shi nas yang sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-8: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-9: de'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu gang zhig yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-10: gang gis gzhan gyi bud med la sdom pa ma bzung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-11: byi ba byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-12: de gal te dge ba'i las gzhan gyis lha rnams kyi nang du skyes kyang 'chi ba'i dus de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-13: de la gzhan gyi chung ma phyogs pa'i sdig pa'i las kyi rkyen 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-14: de ltar legs par byas pa'i nang na nyes par byas pa'ang de ltar smin par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-15: de lta bas na nyes par byed pa chung du'ang mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-16: ji ltar lha rnams 'chi ba na tshul khrims rnam pa bdun ma ral ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ba de ltar 'thab bral ba rnams kyi'ang yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253a-17: de ni rgya cher phyis 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-0: de nas lha'i bu shi ba de'i lha'i bu mo de dag lha'i bu gsar du byung ba de ga la ba der lha'i phreng ba mdog bzang @253b po; dri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-1: reg pa ma rnyis pa de dag blangs nas lha'i bu de'i lus la 'dogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-2: lha'i bu de'ang thog ma skyes ma thag tu dga' yid rab tu dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-3: lha'i bu mo de dag gi drung du 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-4: de nas lha'i bu de lha'i bu mo de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-5: phan tshun snying shin tu dga' ba rnams tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-6: nye ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-7: de lha'i ris de na chu rnyog pa med pa'i nang na padma'i bee d'urya'i mdog la 'dab ma gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-8: snying po rdo rjer skyes pa dag la bung ba 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-9: bung ba de dag kyang kha cig gi lus bee d'urya la sgro gser du 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-10: kha cig gi lus gser la sgro dngul du 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-11: kha cig gi lus 'dres pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-12: kha cig gi lus byu ru la sgro ke ke rur 'dug pa yin te; de dag rtag tu 'dam nas skyes pa'i padma ma rnyis pa dag gi nang na rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-13: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-14: de ltar lha mo rnams sgra snyan pa des glu dbyangs shin tu len cing; pheb rdob par byad pa de bzhin du bung ba padma'i gsab gseb tu dong ba de rnams sgra 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-15: de nas lha'i bu de lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig rdzing de dag gi nang du 'jug ste; de chu la rtse bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:253b-16: rgod rtse dga' dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-0: de ltar de rnams kyis shin tu yun ring bar rtse ba nye bar sbyar nas tshal gseb kyi shing ljon pa'i phreng ba @254a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-1: zhes bya ba shing ljon pa gnyis kyis khebs pa ga la ba der dong bar byed la glu dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-3: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang ldan pa gser btso ma'i ri bo rin po che'i rtse mo bzang po la rtog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-4: rtse mo dang ldan pa de dag la lha'i tshogs du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-5: lha mo gzhan dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing lta bar byed da //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-6: lha'i rang gi padma'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-7: me tog autpa la'i tshal dri rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-8: lha'i dri phun sum tshogs pa rnams gyi nang na lha'i phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-9: gos dar gyon pa dzambu chu bo'i gser btse mas brgyan pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-10: lha mo gzhan de dag dang lhan cig sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa nye bar len cing rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-11: gzhan dag ni bya ngang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-12: ka randa pa sgra snyan par 'byin cing rma bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-13: ngang pa sprengs pa'i nang du zhugs nas rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-14: de nas yang lha'i tshogs nam mkha'i gzhal med khang na 'khod pa gzhan dag nam mkha' la lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254a-15: nam mkha' la sgron ma lta bur gyur pa lha'i rol mo la blo shin tu chags pa rnams me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs shing sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa nye bar len pa na lha'i bde ba dag rjes su myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-0: de nas yang lha'i tshogs gzhan dag phan tshun grogs su gyur pa chang zhim po @254b dag 'thung zhing phan tshun dga' la mthun pa'i tshig gis 'dum pa dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-1: de nas yang lha'i tshogs rang gi las dang rgyu mthun pa'i bdud rtsi mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-4: bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dag za ba dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-5: de nas yang lha gzhan dag rin po cha sna bdun gyi lha'i shing ljon pa dag las rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dag 'thor cing bdag nyid la 'ching ba dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-6: de nas yang lha'i tshogs gzhan dag lha'i 'bras bu lag na thogs te phan tshun 'phen zhing za ba dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-7: de nas yang lha'i tshogs gzhan dag lha'i ngang pa rin po che sna bdun gyi sgro gshog brkyang ba'i steng du zhon nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba na phan tshun lus la gnod pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-8: de nas yang lha gzhan dag cod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-11: gling bu dag dang yang dag par rab tu ldan pa'i rol mo byed pa na lha mo rnams lha de rnams kyi mdun na bro gar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-12: de dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing lhan cig dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-13: lha'i padma rnams kyis phan tshun rdeg pa na 'dod pa la zhen pa de yongs su rgod la 'dod pa bsten cing smra ba dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-14: de ltar lha'i bu gsar du skyes pa de lha'i 'jig rten sna tshogs las sna tshogs kyis sprul pa de mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:254b-15: yid la sems pa dag gi mig gzugs sna tshogs lta ba la ngoms pa mi skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-0: bdag gi rna ba sgra rnam pa sna tshogs du ma la @255a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-1: nyan pa la ngoms pa mi skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-2: bdag gi sna dri rnam pa sna tshogs pa snom pa la ngoms pa mi skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-3: bdag gi lce ro phun sum tshogs pa ro myong bar bya ba drug la ngoms pa mi skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-4: bdag gi lus bgo ba'i reg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-7: reg pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag la ngoms pa mi skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-8: bdag gi yid sdug pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i chos byung ba thams cad la ngoms pa skye ba med pa de ni bdag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-9: kun nas bde ba la chags pa bde ba myong bar bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-10: de ltar rjes su bsams pa de phan tshun shin tu nyams dga' ba mtho ris dang mthun pa sna tshogs dag gi yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-11: yul dag la nye bar sten par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-12: sred pa'i tshogs drug la rnam par chags pa de kun nas sred pa'i mes yongs su bskor nas sreg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-14: sos ka rab tu tsha ba'i nyi ma'i gung la mi zhig mya ngam gyi nang du zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-15: mya ngan gyi nang du zhugs pa de'i mya ngan kun nas rtsva dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-18: shing ljon pa'i yal ga 'phyang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-20: ri khrod kyi tshal skam po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-22: ri sul der mi gang zhig gis me btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-23: de nas mi de kun nas tshal gyi me des yongs su bskor ba skom gyis gdungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255a-25: de nas gang dang gang du 'bros pa de dang de nyid du me'i phung po rab tu tsha ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-0: @255b tshal gyi shing sreg par byed pa kun nas shin tu 'bar ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-1: de ltar shin tu 'bar bar byas pas tshal gyi shing thams cad sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-2: de nas mi de lam gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-4: de nyid du kun nas rab tu 'bar ba mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-5: de me de'i nang du song nas sreg par byed kyang 'bros par mi nus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-6: da ltar me'i nang du song ba de thul gyis tshig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo las kyi me thams cad rtsva dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-9: 'dab ma skam po la sreg pa'i tshal gyi me lta bu'i sred pa'i mya ngam gyi nang du rab tu 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-10: de nas de sred pa me lta bu'i bag la nyal gyi kun tu sbyor ba'i stobs rab tu che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-11: rnam par rtog pa rlung lta bus bskyed pa'i 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan thob pa thams cad shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-13: lcug ma 'phyang ba skam po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-14: ri khrod lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-15: de'ang de ltar sred pa me lta bus nges par sreg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-16: kun nas rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba ni kun nas sred pa'i tshogs drug rab tu 'bar ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-17: gang bab bab tu 'bros zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-19: gang du dbang po shin tu chags pa'i sems yul la rjes su sten par byed pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:255b-20: de nyid du yul la sred pa'i me lta bus sreg par byed la shin tu rnam par rtog pa'i yul rlung lta bus g-yengs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-0: de de nyid du yul la sred pa'i mes sreg pa @256a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-1: na lha dag kun tu 'jigs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-2: de ni me tha ma la pa la sreg par bya ba'i dber bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-3: de ltar lha de lha'i gnas de na legs par byas pa'i rnam pa 'bum snyed dag la nye bar spyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-4: ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur ba de srid du dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-5: de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-6: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-9: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-10: gal te mi dang so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun par de rin po che'i sa gzhi dag la rin po che kun gyis brgyan pa'i khang pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad du rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-11: blon po chen por skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-12: rtag tu rab tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-14: skye bo kun dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-17: 'bru phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256a-18: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-0: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas kun tu gsal bar spyod pa zhes bya ba ji @256b ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-1: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na skyes bu dam pa dge ba spyod pa gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-2: ma byin par len pa mi byed la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-3: gzhan gyis byas na'ang phyir zlog par byed cing smod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-4: nyes pa byas pa srog gcod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa yang dag par ston pa rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-6: chu dag ge nang na srin bu shin tu phra mo'ang mthong nas za bar mi byed la chu la'ang 'thung bar mi byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-8: btsags nas kyang chu'i nang nas byung ba'i srin bu de dag sa skam po'i steng du chu tshags de sprug par mi byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-9: srin bu de dag gi srog chad par mi 'gyur ba'i chu'i gnas gang yin pa de nyid du srin bu de dag 'jog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-10: yang des shin tu 'tsho bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-11: gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du byed du 'jug cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-12: dge ba'i lam la gnas par byed la rab tu 'jog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-13: ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-14: rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-15: 'di la bu ram shing gi tshal lam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:256b-16: 'bra go'am 'bras bu ma du lung ka'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-0: chu shing gi 'bras bu gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba rnams la rku sems kyis rang gi skyes shing du bya @257a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-2: kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' bar bya ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-3: longs spyod pa dga' bar bya ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-5: tshong ba'i khe slogs bya bar bsams nas sa bon 'bru gcig tsam yang len par mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-6: gzhan byed pa'ang phyir zlog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-7: de bzhin du byed du 'jug cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-8: dge ba'i lam la'ang rab tu 'jog par byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-9: de bdag la phan zhing gzhan la phan par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-10: tshul khrims srung ba'i sbyin pa len pa spangs pa yang dag par blangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-12: ma byin par len pa dag las tshul khrims tshol zhing tshul khrims la rab tu gnas pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-13: 'di la srin bus blang ba'i nad mi bzad pa chen pos thebs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-14: srog chad du dogs kyang srin bu rnams gsad par mi bya'o snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-15: srin bu gsad pa'i sman sbyor bar mi byed cing gzhan yang byed du mi 'jug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-16: de ltar srog chad du dogs kyang srin bu gsod par mi byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-18: gzhan la phan par sbyor ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-19: ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-20: 'di la ma byin par len pa shin tu phra mo'ang mi len pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-21: sbyin pa'ang byin par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-22: rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257a-23: 'di la bdag nyid kyi nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman sbyar ba de gzhan mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-0: thos @257b nas bdag nyid kyi sman sbyar ba de bdag gir ma byas kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-1: 'di ltar de bde bar gyur cig snyam nas gzhan la sbyin par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-2: sbyin bdag dam pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-3: lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du kun tu bsal bar spyod pa zhes bya ba'i gnas der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-4: der skyes nas kyang de'i legs par byas pa'i las des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-5: gnas de'ang rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis kun tu bsal ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-7: shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-8: tshal sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra dang ldan pa'i 'khor zhes bya ba der 'dong bar byed do; ;bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-9: shing ljon pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i tshal de'ang de rnams kyis nye bar brgyan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-10: bya de rnams kyi mthu ni 'di lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-12: gang du nam mkha' la 'gro ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-13: der shing de dag kyang bya de rnams kyi mthus nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-14: lha gang dag shing ljon pa la gnas pa'i shing de dag kyang de bzhin du nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-15: gnas de na shing la gnas pa rnams kyi padma'i rdzing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-16: padma sna tshogs gser gyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:257b-17: 'dab ma bee d'urya sdong bu gser la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-0: @258a *// padma de dag lha mo rnams 'dzegs nas snying po la 'khod cing glu dbyangs len no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-1: glu dbyangs len pa na dge ba'i las des padma de dag gi bar bar nas chang zhim po dag 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-2: de yang dga' 'bab ces bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-3: de dag la de rnams 'thung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-4: de bzhin du padma'i snying po la 'khod pa'i lha'i bu de dag thams cad mngon par glu dbyangs len cing dga' mgur spyod pa na 'thung bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-5: de ltar padma'i gsab gseb na 'khod pa bde ba de lha mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing yun ring du chang zhim po dag la 'thung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-6: yun ring du bde ba nye bar spyad nas nam mkha' de las 'babs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-7: de ltar bya de dag dang 'di ltar lha mo'i tshogs kyis lhan cig bskor ba me tog ku ba la ya'i khyim zhes bya ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-8: khyim de'ang me tog ku ba la ya las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-9: kun nas rgyar dpag tshad brgya phrag stong yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-10: 'dab ma re re la lha mo sna tshogs sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa glu len zheng bro rdung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258a-11: gal te me tog ku ba la ya'i 'dab ma sngon po'i 'od des kun nas thams cad du sngon por 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-0: gal te 'dab ma gzhan dmar na de de ltar me tog ku ba la ya'i 'dab med mar po des kha dog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gzhan gang yin pa de @258b dag kyang dmar po de'i mthus de bzhin du dmar por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-3: snying po las byung ba'i stobs kyis ze ba'i nang na snying po yod pa gang yin pa de dag la las bya bas legs par byas pa'i lha mo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-4: ze ba'i khri de rnams kyi steng na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-5: lha mo'i lag pa na padma sna tshogs thogs pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-6: lha'i bu dang lhan cig glu dbyangs len /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-9: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-10: der yang yun ring du rtses nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-11: 'dab ma las byas pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-12: des chu klung yid 'ong lta zhes bya ba shin tu nyams dga' zhing 'gram gnyis ka shing ljon pas yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-13: chu klung de'ang shin tu nyams dga' ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-14: dga' ba 'di lta bu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-16: 'gram gnyig shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-18: lo ma rnams kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-20: lcug ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-21: lo ma rnams kyi bar bar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-22: bya gnas pa sgro dang chu sdug la sgra snyan cing 'jebs pa 'byin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-23: bde ba rnam pa du ma yid du 'ong ba'i bya rnams kyis 'gram mtha' dag brgyan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:258b-25: skom nas rnam pa gzhan cung zad yid du 'thad pa'i bar gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-1: chu bo de las rab tu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-2: de nas yang chu bo shin tu nyams dga' ba de las rnam pa gzhan 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-4: mtha' gnyis ka na lha mo cha byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-5: gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa lag na rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs thogs shing glu dbyangs len /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-9: 'di ltar yang yid du 'thad pa 'ba' zhig yod la dga' ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de chu bo'i nang du 'jug par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-10: lha'i bu las spyod pa legs par byas pa des de dag kyang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-11: de nas yang lha'i bu mo yid rab tu dga' ba de rnams bro gar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-14: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag kyang 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-15: lha mo yid rab tu dga' ba de dag kyang lha'i rol mo sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag thogs nas lha las spyod pa legs par byas pa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-16: lha des lha de dag dang; lha mo gzhon nu na tshod dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-17: cha byad dang rgyan thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-18: shin tu dga' bar byed pa dag mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-19: de nas yang dga' ba'i 'dod chags brgya 'gyur gyis skyed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-20: lha mo gzhan de dag dang lhan cig lha mo de dag ga la ba der rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259a-21: de nas chu bo'i 'gram gyi lha mo gang yin pa de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-0: me tog ku ba la ya'i @259b khyim nas byung ba gang yin pa de dag phan tshun 'dres shing phan tshun nyams dga' ba'i sgra 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-1: lha'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad rin po che'i ri rab kyi rtse mo rnams su lha mo'i rol mo'i sgras 'gengs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-2: rnam pa de lta bu'i yid du 'ong ba'i sgra de dag thos nas lha gzhan dag rtse mo gzhan dag tu lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-3: de dag gis kyang sgra de thos nas dga' ba nyid yid la byas te rings par chu bo'i 'gram yid du 'ong ba de dag ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-5: lha mo'i tshogs phan tshun 'dres pa de dag 'thab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-7: rgyags pa rnams kyis skyo ba med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-8: phan tshun grogs su gyur la gnod pa med pa dag glu len cing rgod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-9: phan tshun gzhan dag ni chang zhim po 'drim par byed cing 'thung bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-11: lha mo'i tshogs gzhan dag kyang bdud rtsi la bya bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-12: de ltar yun ring du rtse ba la zhugs pa de dag de nas yang chu bo'i 'gram de nas rgyags pa la gnas pa'i lha rtse zhing 'gying bar 'gro ba dag tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:259b-13: nye ba'i tshal de rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:260a-0: bde ba 'bum phrag de lta bu dang ldan pa'i lha rnams ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du nye bar @260a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:260a-2: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
