K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:278b-23: thams cad bee d'urya las byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:278b-24: thams cad ke ke ru las byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:278b-25: thams cad dngul las byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:278b-26: thams cad spug las byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-0: shing ljon pa'i sdong po thams cad shing tu rnam par phye ba @279a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-2: yang shing ljon pa de dag gi mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-3: yal ga rnams kyang de bzhin du thams cad rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-5: me tog phun sum tshogs pa dag lha'i me tog rnams kyis brgyan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-6: me tog de dag las kyang kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-7: dri rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-8: me tog de rnams kyi dri dpag tshad drug tu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-9: bung ba kha dog sna tshogs kyang me tog gi ros myos nas shing ljon pa de rnams kyi nang na rgyu bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-10: de ltar las dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun mthong yid 'ong gi shing ljon pa rnams mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-12: autpa la'i tshal dag mdzes pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-14: tshal de kun nas bee d'urya'i sdong bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-16: ke ke ru'i ze ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-17: aanda rnyil gyi mdog lta bu'i bung ba rnams kyis brgyan pa'i bung ba thams cad sgra snyan pa 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-18: ji ltar lha rnams kyi thos pa nyams dga' ba de bas kyang rab tu stobs che bar yid bde ba skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-19: yang tshal de nyid kun nas gsal zhing mdzes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279a-21: tshal gyi kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-0: ji ltar dzambu gling nas phyogs shin tu sdug par byas pa ltar tshal rnam par @279b mdzes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-1: tshal gsal ba de na stegs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-4: padma'i 'dab ma dag gis brgyan pa de kun nas rnam par mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-5: tshal yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de na lha de rnams rtse ba na mngon par mthong nas yid rab tu dga' ba'i lha de dag lha mo'i tshogs des yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig bde bar 'dong bar bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gar bab bab tu 'dong bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-6: lha gzhan dag lha sngon ma byung ba 'di dag bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs so zhes shes nas lha de dag nyid kyi drung du 'dong bar byed de; phan tshun tshig snyan pa nyid kyis bos nas phan tshun grogs su gyur pa padma'i tshal rnam pa sna tshogs la dga' ba dag sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-8: de nas lha de rnams de ltar yun ring du kun mthong gi tshal dar lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rtses nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-9: skyed mos tshal myos gnas zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-10: skyed mos tshal de'ang kha khyer rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing khron pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-12: rdzing ring po nyams dga' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:279b-13: de na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang bzang dkrigs pa gser gyis phye ba dang yang dag par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-1: par phye ba nyams dga' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-2: bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin cing gar byed pa dag nyams dga' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-4: chu bo'i sgra khru lu lu snyan par 'byin pa nyams dga' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-8: dri phun sum tshogs pa chu bo ltar 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-9: de nas yul der dong nas lha de rnams lha mo'i tshogs cha byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-10: rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-11: rang gis legs par byas pa'i las la spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-12: de ltar lha de rnams kyi rtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-13: dga' mgur spyod pa dag yun ring du 'das kyang lha bag med pa la gnas pa des khong du mi chud do ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-14: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-15: bam po sum cu drug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-16: de ltar yul lnga la rnam par chags shing bde ba la gnas pa de rnams kyi las legs par byas pa gang yin pa de dag zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280a-17: de zad nas de nas yang 'chi ba 'byung yang sems bag med pa'i dbang du gyur pa sred pas bslus pa kun nas sred pas bdas shing 'dod chags kyi mes gdungs pa na bde bas myos pas snying myos pa rnams mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-0: gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba thams @280b cad kyi gzhi yongs su btang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-1: 'jigs pa'i grong khyer chen po'i mi rtag pa nyid mthong bar gyur pa ma nor cing nges par 'gro ba'i ngo bo 'chi ba mngon du 'ongs pa de'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po yang rig par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-2: de'i tshe lha rnams kyi sems khong du chud pa'i dus yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-3: de ltar bag med pa'i yul la dga' ba de rnams ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du bde ba de dag myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-4: de zad nas yang lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-5: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-7: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-8: gal te nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las mi dang so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bas mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-9: las de dang rgyu mthun par de shin tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-12: drang zhing drang po'i rang bzhin can yul dbus su skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-14: mi bya ba shes shing chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-15: chos ma yin pa shes par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-16: gang du mi tshogs pa thams cad kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:280b-17: gang du chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-0: gang du 'jig rten gyi spyod pa smad pa med par 'gyur ba der skye bar @281a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-2: skye bo kun gyi mig dga' zhing byis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-3: rgan po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-4: lus rtag tu nad med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-5: gzugs bzang po dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-7: gang las kyang 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-8: sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-10: chung ma dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-11: 'dod pa thams cad yang dag par 'byor pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-12: nor rdzas kyi rnam pa la rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-16: dogs shing 'jigs pa gang nas kyang mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-17: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-18: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas sbyor ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-19: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-20: sems can dge bar gyur pa lta ba ma nor ba mang pos rtag tu las kyi 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid mthong brtag tu yang dag pa'i lta ba la yid zhen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-21: rtag tu drang po'i rang bzhin can gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-22: rtag tu pha ma la gus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281a-23: rtag tu chos la phyir mi ldog cing spro ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-0: dge @281b 'dun la gus pa skyes pa gang gis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-1: ma byin par len pa mi byed cing byed du mi 'jug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-2: rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-3: pha rol byed pa'ang phyir zlog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-6: las kyi 'bras bu yang dag par ston par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-7: gzhan la de kho na nyid bstan pas gang legs par bya ba byas pa de rab tu gzengs bstod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-8: dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-10: byas pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-11: bdag nyid kyang srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-12: ma byin par len pa dag spangs la gzhan dag kyang de nyid la rab tu sbyor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-13: legs par byas pa'i lam rnam pa gnyis kyis gang sdom pa ma blangs pa de ni len du 'jug par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-14: gang blangs pa de ni brtan por byed du 'jug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-15: gnyis ka legs par bya ba byas pa bdag nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-16: gzhan nyid la phan pa byas pa de ni mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-17: srog gcod pa spangs pa rnam pa du yod cig gu snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-18: 'di la srog gcod pa mi dge ba mi byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-20: rnam grangs du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-21: 'di la sems can gzhan la sems can du 'du shes nas srin bu phre'u dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-22: grog sbur la sogs pa la 'tshe bar mi byed cing srog gcod par mi byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:281b-23: 'di la srog gcod pa mi byed pa ni gang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-1: dvags dag g-yo thabs kyis 'dzin pa de dag phyir zlog par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-2: g-yo thabs kyi rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-3: 'di la 'dzin par byed pa rnyong lta bus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-10: bzung nas kyang srog gcod par byed pa de dag zlog par byed cing yang dag par dga' bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-12: 'di ltar srog chags dag gi srog gcod par ma byed cig ces zlog par byed cing chos la'ang rab tu 'jog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-13: rnam pa de dag ni srog gcod pa la yang dag par chags pa'i srog chags zlog par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-14: ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-15: 'di la rtsva tsam la'ang rku sems kyis mi rku la gzhan dag kyang zlog pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-16: rnam pa du zhig ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-17: 'di la ma byin par len pa'i mi kha cig de nyid la dga' ba'o; ;rnam pa du zhig yod snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-18: 'di la mchod rten la bud med dag dang lhan cig rol mo'i sgra byed pa dang gzhan dag bro gar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282a-20: gzhan dag yongs su spyod par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-0: rab tu dga' bar byed pa dag la chos dang mi ldan pa'i mi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' @282b ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-4: rol mo'i sgra byed pa de dag las glu len tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-5: ma byin par len pa gzhan byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-6: yang rnam pa gzhan gyis ma byin par len pa byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-7: 'di la gla ni de la bud med rnams gla len pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-10: 'khrig pa dag byas nas ji ltar sngar dam bcas pa bzhin de ltar mi ster pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-11: yang rnam pa gzhan gyis ma byin par len pa byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-14: shan pa dag las 'tsho ba rin sbyin par byas pa las mi ster ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-15: rim gyi rnam pa 'dis srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-16: ma byin par len pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-17: las de dag mi byed cing byed na'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed la yid kyis kyang rtog par mi byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-18: sbyin pa sbyin pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-19: 'di la tshegs chen pos 'tsho bar gyur kyang bsam gtan gsum pa 'thob pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-20: gzhan dag la sbyin pa byin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-21: rnam pa de lta bur phongs par gyur kyang gzhan la sbyin par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-22: ji ltar gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pa de ltar rang gi bu la'ang yid kyi shes pa gus pas sbyin par mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-23: de ltar sbyin pa byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:282b-24: srog gcod pa spangs nas tshul khrims la rab tu zhugs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-1: la ljan ljan phyags pas sems can dag srog chad par byed pa na phyir zlog par byed cing de nyid du chu ldugs par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-2: skams la phyung ba de dag kyang ljan ljin de nyid du phyir 'jug par byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-3: de dag ni srog gcod par mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-4: dge ba la rab tu zhugs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-5: dge ba'i las 'di gnyis byas pa'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-6: der skyes nas kyang las kyi mtha' spyad pa legs par byas pa 'dod pa thams cad la rnam par chags pa de lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs nye bar len pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-7: lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bde ba dpe med pa rjes su myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-8: de'i dper 'di cung zad cig bya na 'di ltar gang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gser gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i shin tu bde bar gyur pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-9: lha'i stan la gnas la lha'i bde ba de'i bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-16: gos kyi rdul dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-18: khug rna 'dres pa dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283a-21: rang la 'od yod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-0: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i @283b rgyal po de lta bu ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-2: chung ma la 'dzin pa dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-7: snyom pa dang bral ba yin la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni de lta bu ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-8: rnam pa 'dis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lha rnams kyi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-9: de ltar mi'i rim pa mngon sum gyi cung zad cig dper bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-10: de ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis rtse zhing gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-11: der skyes ba'i lha de rnams kyi tshal k'a b'i ra zhes bya ba srid du dpag tshad bcu yod la zheng du dpag tshad lnga yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-12: kun nas gser gyi bya rnam pa sna tshogs du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-13: kun nas gi wang gi thig les bkra bar brgyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-14: de nas tshal de me tog bzang po rnams kyis shin tu rnam par mdzes par brgyan cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-15: rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-16: shing ljon pa de rnams kyi nang na bya gnas pa de dag shin tu rnam par mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-18: gser mgar dag gis rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-19: shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyi ri mo rnams kyis mi rnams kyi rgyan sdug gur byed pa de ltar lha de rnams kyi tshal de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:283b-20: shing ljon pa de dag rnam par mdzes pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-0: kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs de rnam @284a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-2: 'di ni cung zad cig 'dra ba'i dper bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-3: de nas yang lha de rnams tshal de nyid na phan tshun padma rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-5: kun nas bee d'urya'i 'dab ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-8: lo ma rnams kyis rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-9: gang 'dab ma rnams kyi nang de dag na padma r'a ga'i mdog lta bur shin tu dmar zhing shin tu dri zhim pa de dag me tog thams cad brtol nas dpag tshad brgyar 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-10: dri gang gis myos pa'i lha de dag kyang padma'i lo ma'i dris bcu 'gyur du lhag par myos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-11: de nas yang k'a b'i ra'i tshal na lha dag lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-12: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-13: de nas sems bskyed ma thag nyid du da ni bdag cag bza' ba chu ltar 'bab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-14: btung ba chu ltar 'bab pa'i drung du 'dong ngo snyam sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-15: de nas de dag sems bskyed ma thag nyid du gzhal med khang chen po pu shu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-17: dril bu g-yer ka 'khrol ba'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs dkrigs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-18: rin po che'i cod pan btags pa'i rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-22: ke ke ru'i ka ba sna tshogs btsugs pa dag bya ngang bas khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284a-23: kha cig ni bya ka randa pas khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-0: @284b kha cig ni phug ron gyis khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-1: kha cig ni shang shang te 'us khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-2: kha cig ni bya tsa ko ras khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-3: kha cig ni bya sna tshogs lhan cig gis khyer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-4: rgyal mtshan de dag gi steng du 'dug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-5: las kyi mtha' spyad pa legs par byas pa'i lha rnams k'a b'i ra'i tshal chen po'i bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-6: btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab pa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-7: rgyags par gnas pa rtse ba'i don du lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-8: skom chu bo ltar 'bab pa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-10: skom gyi yul der phyin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-11: lha de dag rin po che'i gzhal med khang de dag nas 'thung bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-13: yongs su spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-16: glu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dga' bar byed do; ;de ltar de rnams yongs su spyad pa na yun ring du 'das kyang lha de rnams bde bar gnas pa des mi tshor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-17: de dag gal te yun ring zhig lon nas kun dga' ra ba kun mthong mtho zhes bya ba ga la ba der lha'i tshal blta ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-18: gzhal med khang de rnams kyi nang na 'khod pa de dag lha gzhan dag dang lhan cig mtho bar phyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:284b-19: kun dga' ra ba kun mthong mtho zhes bya ba de na glu rnam pa sna tshogs len zhing rol mo'i sgra 'byin par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-0: phan tshun grogs su gyur pa rgyags pa @285a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-1: gcig pu don du byed pa dag rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-2: de nas kun dga' ra ba kun mthong gi tshal de na lha gnas pa rnams mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-3: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi phyogs gcig na gang tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-4: nye ba'i tshal gyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-5: gser btso ma'i rdo leb 'bar ba spungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-11: skom chu bo ltar 'bab pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-12: lha mo'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pas kun tu gang ba thams cad dang mthun pa'i las kyi 'jig rten gyis bzung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-13: ri bo stong phrag drug cus yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-14: brtsegs mtho chen po na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-18: dge ba du ma'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa'i lha rnams gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-19: dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-20: rtse mo rin po che sna bzhis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-22: gnas dag tu lha rnams 'dong ba na cha byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-24: gzugs snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-25: lha rnams phan tshun grogs su gyur cing sems shin tu 'dod chags dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285a-26: phan tshun bag med par gnas pa'i sa phan tshun gtam shin tu snyan pa nyams dga' ba sna tshogs zer ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-0: khyad par du @285b 'phags pa dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-1: de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-2: bdag cag 'ba' zhig la bde ba yod pa ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-3: lha gzhan dag la'ang shin tu nyams dga' ba'i ngo bo lha mo rnams kyi tshogs dang rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-4: dga' mgur spyod par byed do snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-5: de ltar sna tshogs lha rnam pa du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-6: dpag bsam gyi shing mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-9: dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-11: nye ba'i tshal dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-12: de nas yang lha rnams gnas gzhan du dong ste phyin nas lha gzhan ri brtsegs mtho ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-13: brtsegs pa chen po 'bab chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-15: lteng ka sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-16: ri gang gi rtse mo dag la nyi zla 'khor zhing 'gro ba de dag la'ang rtog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-17: de nyi ma rab tu snang ba'i gzugs brnyan brgya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-18: yang na stong du snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-19: gang du sgra gcan zin gyi lag gis bzung ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-20: de nas yang gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha de dag nam mkha'i steng nas 'gro zhing yid la ngo mtshar skyes pa de bzhin du lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bro gar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-22: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs len cing ri'i rgyal po de thams cad skor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-23: de dag gis ri'i rgyal po tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:285b-25: ri khrod dang bcas pa de thams cad mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-0: @286a *// de nas yang rang gi gnas de dag nyid du dong ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-1: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas bro rdung bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-3: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-4: bde ba'i rnam pa'i myos pas myos pa dus du ma rnam par chags pa la dga' ba dag tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-6: lteng ka rnams su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa dag gis rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-7: de ltar de dag yun ring du yongs su 'das kyang dus tshod mi shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-8: thams cad du yid bag med pa'i dbang du gyur pa dag khong du mi chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-9: yang de dag rtse ba na ri kun nas dga' ba zhes bya brgyar dpag tshad lnga la 'phang du dpag tshad bcu yod pa de la kha cig gzhal med khang gi steng du 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-10: kha cig bya'i steng du zhon nas 'dzeg par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-11: ri kun nas dga' ba de rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-15: stegs kyi rim pa 'bum snyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-16: padma'i tshal brgya snyed kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-17: ri 'byung khungs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-18: rin po che sna bdun 'od 'byung bas brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-19: dpag bsam gyi shing dag 'bar ba de na lha de dag rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286a-20: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-0: glu dag gis myos pa phan @286b tshun grogs su gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-1: rang gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa rnams rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-2: yongs su spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-3: de dag dus yun ring du rtse bar byed kyang bag med pa la gnas pa dag khong du mi chud de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-4: yul gyis kun nas bslang ba de dag nyid kyis tshim pa med cing shin tu sdug pa'i bde bas rnam par rmongs pa de dag me tog ku ba la'i tshal du 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-5: me tog ku la'i padma rnams kyi kha rab tu bye ba de'ang bung ba 'bum snyed kyis gang ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-6: bung ba de dag nyid dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i bde ba tshim pa med pas chang 'thung zhing glu len no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-8: yang na stong du tshim pa med pa la lag na rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs thogs shing rtag tu myos par gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-9: phan tshun rgyags pa du ma don du byed pa de dag skyed mos tshal chen po 'dod pa nges par thob ces bya ba ga la ba der 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-10: tshim pa med pa de dag ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-11: bag med pa la gnas pa dag phan tshun rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-12: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-13: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-14: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:286b-16: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-1: gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-2: las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag tu na ba med cing bzhin gyi mdog bzang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-5: khyim bdag rnams kyis brdung bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-6: shin tu bde zhing yid la rig pa'i blo gsal bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-7: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-8: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas zhib tu dpyod pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-9: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-10: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na skyes bu dge ba bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-11: gzhan la phan par zhugs pa g-yo med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-12: gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-13: mi drang po'i rang bzhin can /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-18: rnam par smin pa bsil ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-21: rnam par smin pa bkra shis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-22: skye bo thams cad kyis mchod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-23: skye bo thams cad kyi spug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287a-25: 'jig rten pha rol tu bde ba byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-0: skyes bu gang 'jig rten 'di nas 'gro @287b zhing 'jig rten pha rol tu pha mar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-2: bde ba du ma 'byung bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-3: bde ba byas pa skye bar gyur pa ni legs par byas pa de'i las kyis byed par 'gyur te; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-5: ma byin par len pa mi byed cing byed du mi 'jug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-7: nyes par byas pa'i tshul khrims la dad pa dang thad kar lhan cig gnas shing 'dre bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-9: tshul khrims 'chal ba de dang lhan cig rnam par byang ba mthun par mi sgrub la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-10: 'di ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang lhan cig rtag tu dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-11: de dang lhan cig 'dre bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-12: de dang rnam par byang ba mthun par sgrub /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-13: de dang thad kar 'dug pa yang byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-14: de dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'jig rten gyi spyod pa byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-16: chos ma yin par sems par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-17: skyes bu dge ba de bdag nyid sdig pa dag mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-18: sdig pa'i grogs po dang lhan cig dga' bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-19: thams cad kun nas yongs su dag par byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-20: shin tu tshul khrims 'chal ba dag kyang dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed cing yang dag pa'i lam ston par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-21: 'gro ba'i zhing bzang po la dge ba'i las kyi sa bon 'debs par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:287b-22: de kun nas sems gser ltar sbyangs shing dri ma med pa'i sems dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa'i bde ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-1: pha rol la 'thob cing so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-2: srog gcod pa spangs pa ji lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-3: rnam pa ni du zhig yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-4: 'di la kun nas 'dod par bya ba me tog gi rgyu dag bskyed par bya ba'i don du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-6: dug bsres pa bzhag nas srog chags dun du ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-9: rkang brgya pa dag la reg par byas nas gsod par byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-10: 'di ltar bdag gi me tog gi rgyu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-13: 'bras bu dag mi nyams par bya'o snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-14: srin bu gsad pa'i phyir du bas gsod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-16: rgun 'bru rnyis pa'i nang na srin bu'i rnam pa yod pa lag gis gnod par mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-17: btung ba ma brtags par 'thung zhing de las skyes pa'i srin bu'ang gsod na de ltung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-18: srin bu de rnams dang srog chags de dag kyang so sor brtags nas 'thung bar byed la yun ring du bzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-19: drod gsher las chung ngur skyes pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-20: myos byed las skyes pa'i 'jigs pas kyang 'thung bar mi byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-21: rnam pa phra mo de dag ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-22: ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288a-24: rnam pa ni ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-0: 'di la rtag tu lo nyes byung bar 'dod pa de lo nyes byung na bdag gis 'gron bu'i khe brgyad 'gyur @288b du thob par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-1: yul ma ga dh'a'i gzhal bre'ang shin tu chung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-4: 'bru zhag drug cus smin pa la sogs pa'ang mi 'byung la bdag gcig pu'i yod par gyur cig snyam du de ltar sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-5: sems can rnams kyi bar chad bya bar sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-6: de ltar bdag gis srog chags rnams gtse bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-9: yang du de ltar bsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-10: gal te sems can rnams kyi skal ba chung ba des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-11: dus ngan pa zhig byung ba dang dga' la yid shin tu dga' nas ji ltar bdag gis bsams pa de ltar bdag dga' bar byed pa 'ongs so snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-12: de bre mi mthun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-14: brtson 'grus nyams pa'i yon tan mi mthun pas nas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-16: 'bras s'a lu dag gis gzhan la slu bar abyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-17: de ltar gang gi tshe sems par byed pa las kyi nyer bsdogs yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-18: gang gi tshe slu bar byed pa de'i tshe las yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-19: gang gi tshe srog chags dag bslus nas sems la 'dod par byed la dga' bar byed pa de'i tshe las kyi mjug yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-20: ji skad bshad pa'i nyes pa dag spangs shing mi byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-21: 'byor pa nyung bar gyur kyang gzhal blugs kyi g-yo dag gis gzhan la slu bar mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:288b-22: gzhan byed na'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-0: gal te lo nyes byung ba'i tshe @289a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-1: bdag nyid tshong pa zhig byed na'ang de ji lta ba bzhin de ltar 'tshong bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-2: chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi bsam pas rnyed pa'i rin thob par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-3: de ltar de srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-4: ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-5: mi dge ba la zhugs pa dge ba la rab tu 'jug pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-6: 'di la skyes bu dam pa legs par spyod cing dge ba spyod pa rtag tu bdag la phan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-7: gzhan la phan par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-10: tshegs chen pos 'byor ba dag sbyin pa po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-11: sbyin pa bdag gi drung du 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-12: de dag la slob par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-13: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dag kyang shes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-14: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu de kun tu ro myang bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-15: kun tu myangs nas kyang yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-16: yang du mgon med cing nyon mongs sdug bsngal ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-17: bsam gtan gsum pa thob pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-19: de la zhugs pa la sbyin par byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-20: de ni legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa rnams kyis chos dang mthun pa'i longs spyod bsgrubs nas de gsum gyis sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-21: gsum ni gang gi tshe sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems pa de'i tshe las kyi nyer bsdogs yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289a-22: gang sbyin par byed pa de las yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-0: gang gi tshe byin nas yid kyis ro myang bar byed cing de ltar yid la sems pa de'i tshe las kyi mjug @289b yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-1: de ltar dge ba stong nyis brgya bya ba byas pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten zhib tu spyod pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-2: der skyes nas kyang dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de las zhib mo des yid la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bdag nyid kyi ngo bo che ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-4: lha'i gnas de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams mdog shin tu gsal zhing rang gi dge ba'i las kyis dri ma med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-5: tshal de'ang srid du dpag tshad nyi shu la zheng du dpag tshad bcu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-11: nang gi tshal rnams kyis shin tu gang ba shin tu blta na sdug pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-12: shing ljon pa rnams kyis tshal gang yin pa 'di dri ma med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-17: me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-18: gser btso ma'i mdog dang mtshungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-19: kha cig dngul gyi mdog lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-20: gzhan dag bee d'urya'i mdog lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-22: tshal kyi shing ljon pa de rnams kyi lo ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:289b-26: yal ga phra mo me long lta bu'i nang dag tu lha de rnams kyi ngo bo gsal bar snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-0: shing gcig gi nang du snang ba de bzhin du shing ljon pa 'bum rnams kyi nang @290a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-2: nying lag thams cad snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-3: lha'i lus de gcig pu las kyi gzugs brnyan dang mthun par shing ljon pa 'bum phrag du ma dag gi nang na snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-4: yang shing ljon pa de rnams kyi ngo mtshar ba gzhan ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-5: ji tsam du las kyi rnam pa dman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-7: khyad par du 'phags pa gang dag gis lha de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-8: de'ang las byas pa ji lta ba bzhin shing ljon pa de rnams kyi shun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-12: 'dab ma'i nang na thams cad snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-13: de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-14: lha mo'i tshogs 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-15: lus thams cad me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-16: byug pas rnam par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-17: nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od 'bar ba tshal der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-18: de nas zhib tu spyod pa'i lha rnams brgya byin de 'ong ba mngon du mthong nas gus pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong ste phyin nas brgya byin la gsong por smras shing spyi bor thal mo sbyar te mchod nas yid la gus pa dang bcas pa thams cad tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-19: de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la snyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290a-20: phan pa'i sems thams cad kyis mchod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-0: lha mo'i @290b tshogs dge ba'i las kyi mtha' shin tu rgya che ba spyad pa de dang lhan cig yongs su bskor nas bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-1: de bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas shin tu gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-2: gser gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa'i tshal der phyin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-3: las mthun pa mngon sum du gyur pa de dag kyang las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par mthong nas brgya byin des 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-4: ljon pa sna tshogs 'di rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-5: dge ba'i las kyis mngon du gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-6: yi ge med kyang shin tu mthun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-7: mkhas pa rnams ni rjod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-8: rnam par smin pa gang gang gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-9: gang dang gang du skye 'gyur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-10: mi yis de dang de dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-11: dge ba'am yang na mi dge 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-12: skye bo dge ba'i las kyis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-13: rtag pa lha rnams nang du skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-14: de bzhin mi dges mi tha ma //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-15: sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-16: dge dang mi dge dag la chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-19: 'chi ba khong du mi chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-20: ljon pa rnams la mngon par gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-21: 'di ni dge ba'i rnam smin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-22: bde bas yid ni rmongs pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-23: bde las dga' ba 'bral mi nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-24: yul 'dod pa yi srog chags rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-25: 'dod pa'i ro yis rab myos pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:290b-26: gang gis bcings pa'i lus can ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-2: ji ltar 'jig rten dag gi me //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-3: tsha dang lhan cig skye ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-4: bud med mi bzad 'dod chags dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-5: nges par lhan cig skye bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-6: ji ltar bud med las byung me //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-7: lus can rnams kyi snying 'jug pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-8: me 'di gang zhig byung ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-9: de ltar tsha bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-11: chos ni thams cad zad byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-12: sems can dmyal ba 'di yi rgyu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-13: bud med yin zhes drang srong gsung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-14: bud med khar ni tshig snyan smra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-15: snying ni gdug pa'i dug dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-17: de la mi ni su zhig dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-18: yud tsam gyis ni dga' byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-19: de bzhin yud kyis dga' mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-20: snying du sdug pa'ang gnas mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-21: brtan pa med de glog dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-22: slu bar byed pa'i rgyu la mkhas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-23: rtag tu bya ba lhur byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-24: rtag tu yid la phrad par 'dod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-25: rtag tu nga rgyal 'ba' zhig sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-26: lha dang mi dang sha za dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-27: lto 'phye rnams dang srin bu yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-28: 'ching bar gyur pa bud med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-29: shin tu mi bzad dug dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-30: phan pa med dang rigs med dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-31: mthu rtsal tshe ba'ang dran mi byed; ;sems ni gnas pa med pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-32: bud med rlung gi shugs dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-33: gang du phun sum tshogs gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291a-34: der ni bud med chags byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-0: dbul bar gyur dang 'dor byed @291b de; ;skyes pa nges par gtong bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-1: skyes pa gang dang gang phrad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-2: de la bud med chags 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-3: de ni myur zhing ches myur bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-4: gtong ste mi mthun gnas par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-5: ji ltar bung ba me tog dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-6: bskams na thams cad gtong bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-7: de ltar nor dang bral ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-8: mi ni bud med rnams kyis gtong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-9: snying ni mi bzad ral gri 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-10: mun pas khebs pa brtan pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-11: gang gi rgyu yis bud med rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-12: skyes pa 'jig pa'i phyir skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-13: ji ltar bud med 'ching byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-14: lha rnams la ni 'ching gzhan med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-15: bud med 'ching bas bcings pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-16: sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-17: bud med las byung 'dod chags gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-19: bud med 'dod chags yid bsregs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-20: phyi nas me yis sreg par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-21: 'dod chags kyis ni nyams pa'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-22: las rnams kyang ni mngon sum ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-23: bud med 'dod chags rnam rmongs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-24: rmugs pa'i snying gis mi rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-25: skyes pa dang ni yid gcugs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-26: dga' ba du ma byas nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-27: sprul gyis pags pa 'dor ba ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-28: bud med kyis ni glo bur 'dor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-29: thabs kun gyis ni bud med bsgrubs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-30: thams cad du ni yongs bskyengs kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-31: bud med shin tu mi bzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-32: bdag gir bya bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-33: de ltar rang bzhin de yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:291b-34: bud med rnams ni sems mi brtan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-2: de la nam yang yid mi rton //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-3: de nas lha'i dbang po de'i kha nas thos shing las legs par byas pa gang yin pa'i lha de dag gis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-4: brgya byin gyi tshig de thos nas yid la byed pa dang bral zhing skyo ba skyes pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-5: skyo ba skyes nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-6: ji ltar brgya byin de bzhin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-7: de nyid mtshan nyid khyod kyis gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-8: bud med zhags par gyur pa'i sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-9: bdag cag gis ni ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-10: de nas brgya byin gyis lha de dag las tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-11: tshal de bya sgra snyan pa 'byin cing nyams dga' ba gzhal med khang du mas brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-14: lha'i rol mo'i sgra rnar snyan cing yid du 'ong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-15: gser btso ma lta bu'i ri dvags kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-17: lha mo'i tshogs kyis kun tu gang ba ga la ba der /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-18: lha'i rgyal po koo shi ka de lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig bde ba la gnas par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-19: lha'i bde ba nyid la yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-20: yang du spyad par bya ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-21: de tshal de na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams dang yang dag par ldan zhing shin tu nyams dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292a-22: dbang po mchog thams cad yul thams cad la rnam par dga' ba'i bde ba myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-0: de dag kyang spyad nas ri rab kyi rtse mo spos brtsegs zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun 'bar @292b ba lha'i 'byung khungs mu tig gi phreng ba rnams kyis rnam par brgyan pa ltar 'bab chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-1: chu bo bye ma mu tig lta bu rnams kyis nye bar brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-2: chu bo de dag gi 'gram gnyis ka na lha'i bya sgra 'byin cing shin tu blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-3: yid du 'ong zhing nyams dga' ba de dag na lha'i rgyal po brgya byin de lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-5: gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams rjes su 'brang zhing rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-6: de der yang yun ring du sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas rtses nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-7: gzhal med khang skyed mos tshal gyis brgyan pa spyi bo zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-9: lha mo'i tshogs yid rab tu dga' ba dang lhan cig der dong ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-10: gang lha gzhan 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yid phrogs pa dag gnas gzhan dag na rtse bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-11: de dag skyed mos tshal spyi bo ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-13: skyed mos tshal phun sum tshogs pa de'ang ri bo thams cad pas 'phang mtho la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-14: 'di ltar 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi drung nas 'od gsal ba cung zad 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:292b-15: ji ltar mi'i gnas bzhi rnams su ri rab las 'od gsal bar 'byung ba de ltar 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi drung nas 'od gsal ba phyis 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-0: 'jig rten spyi bo pa la 'od cung zad kyang med kyang 'jig rten spyi bo pa de stong 'gyur @293a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-2: de nas der yang brgya byin gyis dus yun ring du rtses nas de nas yang de bzhin du lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-3: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-4: zhib tu spyod pa'i lha de dag kyang lha'i gnas de dag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-5: ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-6: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-7: de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-8: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-10: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-11: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag par mchog tu bde ste rgyal po'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-13: rtag tu skra zhing mo sdug gur 'khyil ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-14: rtag tu yid shin tu zab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-15: thams cad kyis dka' bar bya ba rnams la don dang ldan par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-16: rab tu mang por mi smra zhing nyung ngur smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-17: rtag tu shin tu gos gtsang zhing dkar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293a-18: chung ma mi g-yem pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-0: khyim thabs kyi gnas la dga' zhing khyim thab la dga' la @293b phyi rol du mi 'khyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-1: rtag tu sbyin pa la dga' zhing sems shin tu drang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-4: rtsa la ga la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-5: bla ma la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-6: tshes grangs la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-7: rang gi bud med la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-8: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-9: gzhan gyi bud med la mi dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-11: phreng ba la dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-12: sdig pa'i grogs po la mi dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-13: rigs dma' bar mi skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-16: rgyan bzang por 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-17: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-18: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas glu'i sgra la shin tu dga' zhing mngon par chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-19: sa der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-20: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-22: gzhan la phan pa'i phyir sems dge ba las dge ba sems dri ma dang bral zhing gsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-24: ngag gi las kyi mtha' dge ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-25: las kyi mtha' spyad pa dge zhing 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-27: snying rje'i bdag nyid can las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:293b-29: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-2: tshul khrims kyi yon tan gnyis la rab tu zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-3: lkog ma yin par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-6: sdig pa'i grogs po'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-11: gang gi las kyi nyer bsdogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-13: las kyi mjug dang gsum ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-14: tshul khrims de dag kun kyang shin tu yongs su dag par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-15: tshul khrims kyis yon tan gnyis kyang bsrungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-17: ma byin par len pa'ang rnam par spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-18: srog gcod pa shin tu bsrungs pa rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-21: 'bras s'a lu rnams kyi nang na sems can srin bu phra mo skyes pa dag rang thag la mi 'thag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-22: de ltar srog chags de dag shin tu bsrung ba'i phyir ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-23: ma byin par len pas 'jigs pa'i phyir nas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-24: gro dag kyang 'tshong bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-28: bong bu dag la khur bkal bas rgyab snad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-29: de dag la srin bu byung ba rnams chu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-30: rtsab mos 'khru zhing srin bu mi shi ba'i cho ga'ang byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-31: 'di ltar bya sgro rnams kyis blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294a-32: sha nyams pa gzhan la srin bu de dag 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-0: chos ma yin pa'i 'jigs pas 'di ltar ba lang @294b dang; rta dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-2: bong bu dag la gnod par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-3: srin bur gyur pa'i srin bu rnams kyang 'chi bar ma gyur cig ces de ltar gnyis ka'i srog srung bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-5: grog sbur la sogs pa'ang shin tu srung bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-6: rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du kun la phan par 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-8: mtshan mo yid la bag med par mi byed; srog chags rnams la yid kyis kyang 'khu bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-9: sems can pha rol la dang po nas sems can gyi 'du shes bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-11: grog sbur la sogs pa de dag kun tu srung bar byed cing gnas skabs thams cad du dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-12: de dag ni srog gcod pa srung ba yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-13: de dag ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-14: ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-15: rnam pa ni du yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-16: 'di la de ltar dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa de sems can sbal ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-18: khyi 'am; wa bzung ba de dag zas gzhan gyis thar bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-19: thar bar byas nas kyang sha rjen za ba de dag la zas de dag sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-20: bkres pa de dag kyang de dag nyid za bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-21: de ltar srog chags de dag kyang shin tu bsrungs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:294b-22: de ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-0: de ltar ma byin par len pas ni lha rnams kyi nang nas shi @295a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-1: nas dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-2: rnam pa de dag ni ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-3: bdag nyid kyis kyang spangs la gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-4: dge ba la ma zhugs pa'ang dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-6: yang du gzengs bstod par byed; las kyi 'bras bu nye bar ston par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-8: khong du chud par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-9: rnam pa de dag ni srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-10: ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-11: legs pa la 'jug pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-12: 'di la 'byor ba nyung bar gyur kyang chos rtogs pas 'tsho ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-14: sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi'i phyir sems can gsod pa dag nor zas byin nas sbrang bu rnams kyi srog skyob pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-15: de ni sems can rnams kyi srog sbyin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-16: ma byin par len pa spangs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-17: sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-18: 'di la de ltar tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-20: gzhan dag la zas sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-21: de bzhin du tshegs chen pos 'tsho bas srog chags dag dgra'i lag tu song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295a-22: mtshon gyis 'khrug cing bsad du dogs pa na de thar bar byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-0: sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na mchog @295b ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-3: srog sbyin pa yin la de gnyis ka'i sbyin pa dag tu gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-4: skyes bu dam pa de gzhan dag kyang de ltar byed du 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-5: byas pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims la rab tu zhugs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-6: tshul khrims dang ldan pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du glu'i sgra la shin tu dga' zhing mngon par chags pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-7: der skyes nas kyang dge ba'i las kyis sprul pa de la mchod pa byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-8: 'di ltar gang shin tu rgya che ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal 'di thams cad mngon par brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-9: 'di thams cad legs par byas pa'i las kyis bskyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-10: lha'i gnas 'di gom gang tsam yang gang legs par byas pa'i las kyis ma sprul pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-11: gang du lha rnams kyis ma rtses pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-12: der bde ba'i rnam pa spyad nas ma shi ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-13: rang gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu zad nas nyams par ma gyur pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-14: gang du bdag cag gi lus mngon sum du gyur kyang sred pa'i zhags pas bcings pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-15: sred pas rnam par bsgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-17: yang du rnam par bslus pa rnams yid 'byung bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:295b-18: de ltar de brgya byin gyis mthong nas yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-0: yang du tshal de dag nyid ga la ba der bde bar gnas par bya ba'i @296a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-2: de skal pa nges par myong bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-5: lcug ma 'phyang bas khebs pa'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-7: btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab pa phun sum tshogs pa ga la ba der lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-8: tshal gyi phyogs der yang lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig rtses nas; skyed mos tshal myos 'gro 'dul zhes bya ba ga la ba der bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-9: de nas brgya byin lha de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-10: lha gzhan rnams dang yang lhan cig tu gzhal med khang myos 'gro 'dul zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-11: de nas brgya byin gyis skyed mos tshal de mngon par mthong nas khyed cag skyed mos tshal 'di ltos shig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-14: mthong lags so zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-15: de nas yang brgya byin gyis lha rnams la sngon byung ba'i rabs rjod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-16: 'di ltar bdag gis tshal 'dir lha rnams kyi nang du sngon gyi tshe rabs thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-17: bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig gis lha rnams la chos bshad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296a-25: yongs su byang ba'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-3: gang zhig yod na ci zhig 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-5: 'dod pa rnams yod na nyes dmigs 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-6: 'dod pa rnams med na nyes dmigs mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-8: 'di ni yod pas 'di 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-9: gang zhig med na ci zhig me 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-12: 'dod pa rnams med na 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs rnams mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-13: 'di ni 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-14: gang zhig 'gag na ci zhig 'gag ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-24: sred pa'i rkyen gyis 'dun pa sngon du 'gro ba 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-25: 'dun pa'i rkyen gyis 'dun pa skyed pa yid la byed pa mi mthun pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-26: de la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba'i bsam pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-27: rmongs pa tshol ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-28: ma rig pas rmongs pa yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-29: yang du yul rnams la tshim pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:296b-31: tshol ba gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-3: sred pa med na tshim pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-6: 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-8: byas shing bsags pa'i las rnam par smin pa 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-9: byas shing bsags pa'i las med na rnam par smin pa mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-11: 'di'ang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-17: gzugs la'ang brten nas yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-20: gang zhig med na ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-22: gzugs kyang med mig kyang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-23: yid la byed pa'ang med na mig gi rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-25: 'di'ang 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-27: gzhan yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297a-33: chu la sogs pa rgyu la brten nas bum pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-1: yang gang zhig med na ci zhig mi 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-7: chu la sogs pa rgyu rnams med na bum pa mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-8: 'di'ang 'di yod [?] na 'di mi 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-15: gang zhig med na ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-17: 'du ba med na 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-19: 'di'ang 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-21: gzhan yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-23: skye bo yod na 'chi ba 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-24: skye ba med na 'chi ba mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-27: 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-29: gzhan yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-31: 'dod chags kyi me yod na nges par gdung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-32: ji ltar me yod na nges par sreg pa yod pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-35: gang zhig med na ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-37: 'dod chags med cing 'dod chags kyi me med na 'dod chags kyi gdung ba mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-38: ji ltar me med na sred pa mi 'byung ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:297b-40: 'di'ang 'di med na 'di mi 'byung ba yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-6: nges par 'byung ba skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-7: mngal du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las nges pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-8: dri za nye bar len pa yod na skye ba 'byung ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-11: gang zhig med na ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-16: yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang med na mngal du nye bar len pa sngon du 'gro ba mi 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-18: 'di'ang 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-23: tshu rol yod na pha rol yod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-24: gang zhig med cing ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-26: tshu rol med na pha rol med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-29: 'di med na 'di mi 'byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-30: de ltar phan tshun rkyen dang bcas pa nye bar bzung nas btags pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-31: phan tshun rkyen dang bcas pas 'dus byas thams cad 'byung zhing 'brel bar 'byung ba la brten nas 'byung ste; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-32: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298a-33: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-0: de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba thams cad rgya che ba khong du chud par @298b bya'o;/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-2: de'ang bcom ldan 'das des myos 'gro 'dul gyi gzhal med khang chen po der mi'i nyin zhag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis lo lnga stong du chos bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-3: 'dir bdag gis khyed la phyogs gcig tsam zhig bshad pa 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-4: de ltar gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma ltar rgya che ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthun te chos kyi lus ni gcig yin no ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-5: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-6: bam po sum cu bdun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das des lha dung phyur phrag bdun dag gi zag pa zad par mdzad cing mig dri ma dang bral ba bskyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-8: de nas yang dzambu'i gling ga la ba der gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-9: der gshegs nas mi rnams la'ang thugs rje dam pas chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-11: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes rgya cher khong du chud par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-12: der yang sems can la phan par bzhed pa des mi rnams kyi zag pa du ma zad par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-13: de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-16: mi rnams kyi ston pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-17: de bzhin du brgya byin des lha de rnams la smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-18: gzhal med khang chen po myos 'gro 'dul zhes bya ba ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:298b-19: padma'i rdzing bya kha dog sna tshogs dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-0: rin po che sna bdun gyi padma rnams @299a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-1: kyis nye bar bskor ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-2: rin po che sna bdun gyi padma'ang 'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-5: cha byad dang ldan pa dang; nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog rnams kyis brgyan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-7: bee d'urya'i shing ljon pa'i 'od kun tu 'byang ba rnams kyis gzhal med khang chen po de nye bar brgyan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-8: rab tu gsal ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-9: gzhal med khang chen po de 'od sngon pos rnam par mdzes shing gser gyi lo ma rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-10: 'od dmar pos kyang rnam par mdzes pa yin no; ;de nas yang gzhal med khang chen po de nye ba'i tshal rnam pa gzhan gyis mdzes pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-11: khyim dang nye ba'i tshal de ni rab tu dbye ba du mas brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-12: rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkra bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-13: rin po che sna dun gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-16: shin tu nyams dga' zhing mthong na yid du 'thad pa gang yin pa dag mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-17: brgya byin yang ngo mtshar cher skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-18: de'i dbus na mtsho chen po yod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-19: gser btso ma lta bu'i chu rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-20: phye ma du mas bkra bar byas pa; bya kha dog sna tshogs can rnams kyis brgyan pa yin no /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299a-21: de nas lha de dag sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing 'gro ba na bro brdung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-0: phan tshun yid gcugs @299b pa dag mtsho rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-1: de nas lha shin tu bab med pa de dag rnams par rgyal byed na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis mthong nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa; ji ltar padma'i tshal dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-2: rjen za bya rgod mdzes ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-3: de bzhin zhi ba'i dgon pa ru //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-4: mi dge spyod pa mi mdzes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-5: ji ltar nyi ma 'od grang na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-6: log pa rgyur te mi mthun ltar; ;bag med lha rnams ga la zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-7: zhi ba'i tshul du ga lba dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-8: sred dang bral ba'i bde ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-9: sdug bsngal grol ba'i skyob pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-10: bde ba de yi khyad par las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-11: bde ba'i grangs su mi brtsi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-12: rab tu myos med bsam gtan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-13: kun tu zhags las grol ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-14: bde gang de ni bde mchog ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-15: sred pas bslu ba 'di ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-16: tshal 'di thob pas bstan pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-17: shin tu bsgom pa rnams kyis bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-18: lha mchog 'dod chags yid byed kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-19: bsten par 'os pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-20: khyod kyi bde ba gang yin 'di //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-21: de ni rtag par ma yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-22: sred pa med pas bsten pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-23: de ni zhi mchog bde ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-24: gang zhig thob nas sdug bsngal kun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-25: thams cad du ni gcod par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-26: gnas mchog rtog pa gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-27: tshal 'di nges par bsten pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-28: ngan g-yo spyod cing zhim za la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-29: brkam chags kyis ni sems bslus pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:299b-30: shin tu bsgoms pa zhi ba'i tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-1: so; ;dge ba'i yul du zhi ba nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-2: bsgoms pa'i sems ni dga' byed kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-3: 'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-4: tshal gyi gnas su mi dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-5: gang zhig rtag tu sems zhi ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-6: mi de tshal du dga' 'gyur gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-7: 'dod chags kyis ni sems dkrugs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-8: tshal rnams su ni dga' mi 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-9: dmigs pa lnga yis 'jigs byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-10: sred pa nyid kyis sreg mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-11: sred las rnam grol dri med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-13: skye ba yod na rtag tu 'chi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-14: nad med med na nad yod cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-15: phun sum sdug bsngal lhan cig skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-16: gzhon nu dag kyang rtag tu rgas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-17: sdug pa kun dang bral 'gyur zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-18: rtag tu 'du ba med par shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-20: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-21: rtag tu srid gsum nyams nga bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-22: gang gi blo ni mi rmongs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-23: skyes bu dam pa de yis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-24: zhi ba'i tshal du dga' ba 'thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-25: kun rtog 'dod chags mi brtan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-26: rtag tu 'dod chags la sogs bsgribs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-27: bde ba'i byung ba zhi ba'i tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-29: gang zhig rtag tu yid zhi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-30: tshal du rnal 'byor bsam gtan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-31: de dag rtag par tshal du dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-32: 'dod chags tshol ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-33: tshal rnams su ni bsgoms pa sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300a-34: grong dag tu yang g-yo mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-0: de bas rtag @300b tu tshal bstan bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-1: grong khyer gyis ni gnod mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-2: mi yi 'dod chags la sogs yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-3: grong khyer dag tu rnam par g-yeng //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-4: rmongs pa mi rtan g-yengs pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-5: tshal du phyir zhing dong bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-6: gang phyir sdig dang bral ba de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-7: bral ba'i yid kyis bsten bya ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-8: de bas mchog tu zhi ba'i tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-9: rnal 'byor rnams kyis gnas chen yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-10: sems dang dbang po rab zhi ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-11: rnal 'byor snying la dga' ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-12: de ni nga brgya byin stong snyed kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-13: shin tu dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-14: thams cad du ni rnam byang ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-15: rnal 'byor ba yi dga' mthong gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-17: 'thab bral ba yang de ma mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-18: 'dod pa'i dbang song dga' ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-19: de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-20: nyon mongs bcom pa'i dga' ba gang; ;de ni rtag tu dga' ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-21: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-22: dgra rnams su ni sems 'byung ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-23: de ni bcom nas dga' 'byung gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-24: de la 'dod pas ga la gnod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-25: 'dod pa las byung dga' ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-26: sdig bcas sdug bsngal 'bras bu tsha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-27: gang zhig 'dod pas rnam grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-28: de ni dga' ba mchog yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-29: de la brten nas rnal 'byor pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-31: 'dod pas byas pa'i dga' ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-33: sten pa'i tshe na mngar la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:300b-34: rnam par smin pa me dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-2: rtag tu sems can dmyal bar 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-3: sten pa'i tshe na mngar la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-4: bar du kun nas dga' 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-5: mthar yang zhi zhing dri med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-7: thog ma bar dang mthar dge gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-8: rtag tu ma ltar sdug pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-9: de ni spangs nas byis pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-10: 'dod pa'i yul la ci phyir chags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-11: bar dang mtha' ngan sdug bsngal dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-12: rtag tu skyon gyi glong gis bsgribs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-13: bde ba 'byung ba ma mthong gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-14: de ni byis pas ci phyir bsten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-15: ji ltar dug gi snye ma la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-17: de ltar 'dod pas dga' byas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-18: yongs su byung na dug dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-19: ji ltar me yis sreg pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-21: sreg pas kyang ni gzhan gsod de; ;'dod byas dga' ba de dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-22: phye ma leb kyis 'bar ba mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-23: tshig pa'i nyes pa mi mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-24: de ltar 'dod bskyed dga' ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-25: blo med rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-26: 'dod chags bskyed pa'i gdung ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-27: 'dod pa pa rnams rtag tu sreg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-28: phye ma leb ni 'tshig pa ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-29: thams cad du ni mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-30: de bas 'dod pa'i dug spangs te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-31: lha rnams ye shes rtag dga' zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-32: tshe ni don med mi bya la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-33: khyed cag bag med ma 'gro zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301a-34: bag med pa yis rnam rmongs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-0: skyes bu thams cad chags @301b par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-1: de ni phyi nas bral ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-2: de tshe gdung bas gdungs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-3: rtag tu 'dod pas rnam rmongs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-4: de ni dge ba'i las mtha' zad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-5: 'dod pa rmongs pas bslus pa ni; ;sum cu gsum nas dmyal bar 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-7: ji srid sems nyid rdzogs pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-8: de srid chos la yid kyi don //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-9: nye bar zhi ba dag tu 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-10: sred chu shin tu mi bzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-11: mtho ris kyis ni yul du 'bab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-12: rnam rtog shugs ltar mi brtan zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-13: nyes gsum bro ba lta bu 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-14: bag med pa ni chu ltar bab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-15: bud med 'dod chags nya lcigs 'dra; ;glu dang sil snyan sgra myur mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-16: lha ni rdo ltar mi brtan no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-17: sprul lta bu yi yul gyis khebs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-18: yid ni myur ba'i rlabs dang 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-19: lha rnams 'dod chags kyis bslus pa; ;rmongs pa de dag 'jug par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-20: 'di ltar de ni mi mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-22: ji ltar dug gi ljon shing gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-23: me tog bung ba rnams 'jibs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-25: rmongs pa rnams ni bde la spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-26: bung bas dug ni 'thungs pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-30: nyes gsum skam shing lta bu byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-31: bag med rlung shugs ldan pa 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-32: sred pa med 'dra ba lha yi tshogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-33: sreg par byed kyang mi rig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:301b-34: nyes pa las byung sa 'di ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-0: @302a *// bag med pa yi gsing mas bsgribs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-1: rang gis byas pa rmongs pa'i lha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-2: rmugs pa rnams ni rtag tu rgyu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-3: bag med pa rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-4: yul dag mi brtan mi bzad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-5: brtan po de la yid mi rton //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-7: rmi lam dmyal ba'i rgya yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-8: 'dod pa'i rmi lam rgyu yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-10: rtag tu legs pa spyad pa spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-11: tshal ni legs pa shin tu spyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-12: nyes par spyad pa'i mi yis min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-14: legs pa'i gnas zhes brjod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-15: 'dod pa tshol ba'i lha kun gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-16: gnas ni gang zhig ma thob pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-17: brtan po bag yod pa la dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:302a-18: mi yis gnas de thob par 'gyur //
