K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-6: de'i tshe sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-7: gshin rje'i mi gzugs mi sdug par bsgyur ba de dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-8: de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-9: de ltar sems can dmyal ba de dag sems can dmyal ba zad nas thar bar 'gyur ro ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-10: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-11: bam po bzhi bcu gsum pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-12: de nas brgya byin gyis de'i tshe lha de rnams la 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-13: ji ltar mi dag srog gcod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-14: dgra rnams las ni thar pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-15: bde ba 'dod pa thabs kun gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-16: mdza' bshes mang pos mngon du 'phrad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-17: de ltar dmyal ba stobs po che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-18: las 'di dag las nges grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-19: lha yul zhi bar 'gro ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-20: las rnams legs par byas pas thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-21: de ni yon tan du mas brgyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:405b-22: lha yi gnas su khrid byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-0: ji ltar legs par byas pa'i @406a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-1: las; ;de ma zad par dga' bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-2: de ni de nas zad dang phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-3: dbang med mi dag lhung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-4: mar me'i snying po zad pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-6: las kyi rlung las yang dag byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-7: de ni dma' dang mthon por mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-8: rlung zhugs dbang gis 'khrul pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-10: shes pa'i dbang du gyur pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-12: ji ltar padma'i rtsa rgyud kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-13: ri mchog ri rab mi 'gul ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-14: de ni las kyi zhags pa yis; ;nam yang 'dren par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-15: de ltar de ni mgon bral zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-16: mya ngan bral la nyon mongs bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-17: ri rab kyi ni rtse mo ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-19: de ltar brgya byin des lha de rnams la tshigs su bcad pa smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-20: sems can dmyal ba pa sems can dmyal ba las thar pa de'i srid pa bar ma'i mtshan ma sngon chad ma mthong ba rnams la brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-21: nam mkha' la rlung shin tu bsil ba lus la reg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-22: reg na shin tu bde ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-24: brten na shin tu bde ba sgra snyan pa thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406a-27: de las gzhan pa'i rgyud las byung ba'i sgra de ltar rlung dag gi sgra thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-0: dri'ang shin tu yid du 'ong ba la @406b snom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-1: gzugs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba dag mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-7: padma'i tshal shin tu dri zhim zhing rgya che ba dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-8: rna bas kyang glu dbyangs kyi sgra shin tu yid du 'ong ba dag thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-9: bdag nyid kyi byad gzugs shin tu che ba rab tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-10: lhag par dri zhim pa phreng bas brgyan pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-11: kun tu thogs pa med cing nam mkha' shin tu dri ma med pa thams cad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-14: rgyu skar gsal ba rnams kyis khyab par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-15: mtsho dag na yang bya ngang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-16: ka randa par 'dres pa'i sgra dag thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-17: de nas yang srid pa bar mar zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-18: srid pa 'byung ba'i pi wang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-21: glu dbyangs kyi sgra dag thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-22: lo bye ba phrag du mar ma myong ba'i de'i yid la rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-23: thams cad du mtshan ma bzang po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-26: rtsa lag dag dang phrad pa lta bur bdag nyid sems la nyin gcig bzhin snying rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-27: ji lta ji ltar srid par skye bar 'gyur ba de 'di'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-28: gzhan rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i rigs su skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:406b-30: nye ba'i tshal shin tu nyams dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-3: rin po che sna bdun gyi tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-4: bud med kyang ngo bo nyid kyis yid du 'ong ba gang yin pa dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-6: da ni bdag 'dir skye bar bya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-8: des sems bskyed ma thag nyid du skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-9: srid pa'i yan lag gi rim pa ni 'di lta ste; nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-10: de ltar srog chags dag sems can dmyal ba las thar cing ngan pa byas pa las yongs su thar nas bde ba dpe med pa thob par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-11: srid pa bar ma'i 'gro ba bcu bzhi pa ni de lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-12: srid pa bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel pa bco lnga pa ji ltar shes par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-13: gang gi tshe mi dag las shi nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skye ba de'i mtshan ma ci dag 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-14: mngon par 'dod pa de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-15: 'di la gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus su mi dag nyid las shi nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-16: de'i mtshan ma 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-17: ji ltar ri brtsegs pa chen po'i grib ma rdo thal gyis bskus pa'i thang la 'bab pa de ltar grib ma lta bu zhig bab pa dang 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407a-18: bdag gi steng du thams cad 'bab po snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-0: de lag pa gnyis kas ri 'bab pa phyir 'phul @407b bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-1: 'bab pa na lag pa gnyis kas 'dzin par byed cing lag pa g-yob par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-3: 'di ltar nam mkha' la reg par byed do zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-4: de'i 'og tu snam bu dkar po zhig mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-5: de'i steng na yang snam bu dmar po zhig yod par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-6: de'i 'og tu srid pa tha ma pa'i mi sems la ji ltar snang ba mthong ba de'i mi gsal ba de dag las rmongs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-7: ji ltar rmi lam na gzugs dag la blo rmongs pa ji ltar de rmongs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-8: de pha ma gnyis 'khrig pa'i chos dang ldan par gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-9: gal te skyes par 'gyur na ni de log par mthong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-10: ma la ni chung ma'i 'du shes skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-11: pha la ni dgra'i 'du shes skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-13: bdag 'di'i drung du 'gro'o snyam nas de ma de la 'khrig pa'i phyir phrad par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-14: ji ste bud med du 'gyur na ni 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-15: bdag gi khyim thab 'di 'dis phrogs so snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-16: de la zhe sdang skyed par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-17: de ma de skyes pa de dang 'byed par 'dod cing bdag nyid de dang phrad par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-18: de'i tshe srid pa bar ma pa'i rnam par shes pa 'gag cing skye ba'i srid pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:407b-19: de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis rgya'i 'bur ltar rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-1: las shi nas mi rnams kyi nang du skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni de lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-3: 'gro ba dang 'brel pa bcu drug pa ni 'di ltar lha dag nyid las 'chi ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-5: gang gi tshe lha las shi nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-6: de la 'di ltar lha gzhan sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-8: dud 'gro'i nang du skye ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-9: chung mas 'dor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-11: lha'i bu gzhan stan de la 'dug par mi mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-12: sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de dag mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-13: de shi ba'i stan de la lha gzhan dag skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-14: de'i 'gro ba lha'i nang du skye ba ches bzang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-15: 'di ltar gal te rgyal chen bzhi pa dag las shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i mtshan ma shin tu nyams dga' ba bzang po dag mthong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-16: 'di ltar des sngon gar yang ma thos pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i glu dbyangs thos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-17: de bzhin du yul lnga'i mtshan ma bzang po mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-18: de'i 'og tu de'i srid pa tha ma pa'i sems 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408a-19: des srid pa bar ma la bud med shin tu bzang mo lhag par blta na sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-0: byad gzugs rab @408b tu bzang ba rnams kyi lag na rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-2: skyed mos tshal yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-3: de ltar yid du 'ong ba sngon gar yang ma mthong ba srid pa bar ma'i gang yin pa de dag des rmi lam lta bur mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-4: de gang gi tshe skye ba'i srid pa dang nye zhing phrad par 'gyur pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-7: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor pa des sngon nam yang ma mthong ba de rnams gsal bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-8: de nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-9: kye; ae ma ngo mtshar che ba rnam pa 'di lta bu sngon bdag gis gar yang ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-10: de ni bdag 'dir 'jug par bya'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-11: des sems bskyed ma thag nyid du der skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-12: srid pa bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel pa bcu drug pa ni de lta bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-15: srid pa bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel pa bcu bdun pa ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-16: de ltar lha'i ris gzhan gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-17: gang dag nas ches dma' bar skye bar 'gyur ba de ni lteng ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-19: 'bab chu chung ba dag mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:408b-20: ji ltar de la 'dod pa de ltar bkres pas mngon par nyams par 'gyur zhing de der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-0: de ltar lha rnams kyi srid pa'i yan lag la rnam @409a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-2: rnam pa gcig tu 'gro ba lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-4: srid pa bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel pa ni gal te shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi dag nub kyi ba lang spyod rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i 'chi ba'i dus gang zhig la mtshan ma rnam pa ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-5: gal te nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi shar gyi lus 'phags su skye bar 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-6: de gnyis 'chi ba'i dus su mtshan ma rnam pa ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-8: phan tshun skye ba dag gis mtshan ma ni de bzhin du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-10: srid pa tha ma pa'i dus su phug gi sgo chen po rib rib por bsgrigs pa zhig mthong la; de nas ba dan skar mda' lta bur shin tu bzang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-12: la la ni dmar skya dag cig byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-13: de lag pa gnyis kyis de la 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-14: des ji lta ji ltar ba dan de la bzung ba de lta de ltar mi de yang phug gi nang du 'jug par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-15: srid pa tha ma pa btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-16: shi nas srid pa bar ma la gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-17: ba dan de nyid la 'dzin par 'dod pa kun tu rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409a-18: de ji lta ji ltar rgyug pa de lta de ltar de'i skye ba'i srid pa'i nye bar gnas par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-0: des snga ma bzhin du khyu mchog @409b pa dang lhan cig 'khod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-1: gseb dang rgod mar lhan cig 'khod par mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-2: de der kun tu 'dod chags skyed par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-4: 'gro ba dang 'brel pa bcu bdun pa ni de lta bur shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-5: de ltar shes pas shin tu bag yod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-7: bag med pa ni gang yang 'khor ba las 'grol ba med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-8: 'jig rten pa'i legs pa gang yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-9: bag med pa ni legs pa thams cad don med par byed pa nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-10: de lta bas na legs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba'i lha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-11: mi shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur bas yongs su spang bar byed pa de rab tu 'bad pas yongs su spongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-13: de ltar srid pa bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel pa bcu bdun pa dag srid pa'i ngo bo nyid la rtog par 'dod cing de kho na tshol bar 'dod pa'i lha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-19: rim pa brgyud pa gcig nas chos nyi shu'i bar du bstan pa gang yin pa de dag gi nang nas bcu bdun gyi bar ni bstan zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-21: da ni 'gro ba dang 'brel pa dag las gzhan pa'i khams bco brgyad bstan pa khams de dag gi rim pa la bab pas rim pa de bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:409b-22: de la khams zhes pa bstan pa gang yin pa de gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-0: de la mos pa rnam pa du ma dag gi @410a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-1: khams rnam pa du mar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-2: skyon gsum gyis bsgribs pa'i sems ni phung po gsum la gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-3: gsum gyis so sor dbang bsgyur to; ;phra mo la mos pa'i sems can byed pa sna tshogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-8: sdug bsngal myong ba sna tshogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-9: byad gzugs sna tshogs; dbang sna tshogs pa de dag thams cad ni sems kyi rang bzhin sems kyi khams la rag las pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-10: srid pa'i ris su srid pa sna tshogs nyid 'byung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-11: de ltar sems can rnams kyi khams ni mtha' yas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-16: sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi 'gro ba rags rim gyis mdor bsdu na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-17: bgrang bar gtogs pa'i khams bco brgyad ni sems kyi skyon la rag las pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-18: khams bco brgyad du bsdu ba de dag thams cad ni mdor bsdus pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-19: de la khams dang po ni 'dod chags kyi shas che ba'i khams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-20: de la 'dod chags kyi shas che ba'i khams dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-23: yi dvags dang; dud 'gro rnams kyi bud med nga rgyal spyod pa kun yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-24: de dag gi zhe sdang de ni chung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410a-25: 'di ni khams dang po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-0: dud 'gro spyi rnams kyi nang na rma @410b bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-9: pa linda ka la sogs pa'i dud 'gror gtogs pa ni 'dod chags kyi khams shas che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-10: dud 'gror gtogs pa'i 'dod chags kyi khams 'bring po'i shas yod pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-26: ya ti ka la sogs pa dag ni 'dod chags 'bring por spyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-27: sems kyi khams gnyis pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-28: de la dud 'gro de dag gi 'dod chags kyi khams chung ba gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-42: chu srin dhan dhu gsod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-43: tsu lun da la sogs dus su 'khrig par byed pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-44: dus su 'khrig tu 'gro ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-45: dus ma yin par 'dod chags spyod pa chung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-46: de dag ni dud 'gro'i khams gsum pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:410b-47: de dag ma gtogs pa gzhan rnam pa du ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-0: ming du ma gang yin pa de dag ni bshad par mi nus shing bgrang bar mi nus @411a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-1: so; ;yang dud 'gro de dag gi nang nyid na zhe sdang che ba gang yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-2: gang zhe sdang lhag par che ba nyid yin la 'dod chags che ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-3: 'di ni khams bzhi pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-13: ka ko da ra da dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-14: tsi li na da ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-18: chu srin byis pa gsod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-19: phag la sogs pa ni zhe sdang gi khams lhag par che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-20: khams lnga pa ni gang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-21: dud 'gro de dag nyid kyi nang na zhe sdang 'bring du spyod pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-23: yu ba bin ta ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-24: ka pa ling ka dang; sa lin dha ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-30: byi ba la sogs pa ni zhe sdang 'bring du spyod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-31: de la khams lnga pa dud 'gro de dag nyid kyi nang na zhe sdang chung ngu spyod pa gang yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411a-43: srog chags s'u kshma tsa ra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-0: sbal pa la sogs pa ni @411b zhe sdang chung ngu spyod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-1: de la khams drug pa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-2: yi dvags rnams kyi nang na yi dvags rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags spyod pa gang yin pa de dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-3: khams bdun pa ni dud 'gro'i nang du gtogs pa lha ma yin 'dod chags kyi khams lhag par che ba gang yin pa de dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-4: khams brgyad pa ni 'dod chags 'bring du spyod pa dud pa za ba gang yin pa de dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-5: khams dgu pa ni 'dod chags chung ngur spyod pa gtor ma za ba gang yin pa de dag yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-6: khams bcu pa ni lha ril pa spyi blugs nas 'thung ba gang yin pa de dag ni lha gzhan dag pas 'dod chags spyod pa chung ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-7: zhe sdang che ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-8: g-yul 'gyed pa la rkam zhing rtag tu brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-9: lha ma yin gyi g-yul 'gyed par 'dod pa de dag ni 'dod chags lhag par chung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-10: khams bcu pa ni 'di ltar phreng thogs rnams ni 'dod chags 'bring du spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-11: zhe sdang 'bring du spyod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-13: rtag tu myos gnas pa rnams ni 'dod chags kyi khams lhag par che ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-14: zhe sdang gi khams chung ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-15: thams cad du mngon par brtson pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:411b-16: khams bcu gcig pa kun tu rgyu ba dag ni zhe sdang gi khams lhag par che la 'dod chags chung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-0: khams bcu gnyis pa ni sum cu @412a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-1: rtsa gsum pa 'dod chags spyod pa kun yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-2: zhe sdang chung ngu spyod pa rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-3: khams bcu gsum pa ni byang sgra mi snyan pa 'dod chags kyi khams che ba kun yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-4: khams bcu bzhi pa ni nub kyi ba lang spyod pa zhe sdang spyod pa kun yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-5: khams bco lnga pa ni shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams 'dod chags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-8: khams bcu drug pa ni dzambu'i gling gi mi rang bzhin sna tshogs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-10: mos pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-11: khams bcu bdun pa ni lha gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-12: sems can dmyal ba 'dod chags spyod pa thams cad yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-13: 'di ltar de'i gnas dag na yang sems can dmyal ba pa rnams bud med dag la mngon par 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-14: 'di ltar las byas pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-15: lha'i gnas bzhi rnams ni 'dod chags lhag par che ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-16: sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid khams yin pa de nyid gnas yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-17: de nyid mos pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-19: de dag nyid khams bco brgyad yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412a-21: zhe sdang spyod pa de na gti mug la gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-0: zhe sdang @412b dag ni gti mug la rag las pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-1: rmongs pa med na chags pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-4: de ltar skyon gsum gyi bye brag tha dad pa bzhi'i skyon gyis khams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-6: yang khams bco brgyad yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-10: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-13: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-16: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-19: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-22: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-25: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-27: gzhan 'di dag kyang khams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-28: 'di dag ni gnod pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-29: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad rmongs par byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-31: mi bag yod pas yul de dag la bsams nas bsrung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-32: gang gnyis ka 'dzin pa bag med pa'i mi rnams kyi srid pa bar ma pa bcu dgu ni 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:412b-33: bsam gtan bzhir nye bar 'gro ba gnas gtsang ma dang bcas pa bcu drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-6: yi dvags rnams ni de dag dang 'brel pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-7: sems can dmyal ba myong bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-8: sdug bsngal mang po lhag par myong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-9: 'dod pa'i khams na gnas tha dad pa nyi shu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-10: kha cig dag rnam pa bcur yang 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-12: dngos po tha dad pa de dag thams cad khong du chud par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-13: de nas lha de rnams kyis brgya byin gyi kha nas chos de dag thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-15: la mngon par bstod cing 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-16: thams cad mgon du zhi byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-17: brgya byin khyod kyi chos 'di bshad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-18: 'jigs dang dngangs pa byung ba'i tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-19: sgrub la bdag cag gnas par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-20: chos gang 'chad par mdzad pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-21: gzhan la phan par bzhed pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-23: de ni pha dang de ni ma //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-24: legs par gsungs pa'i tshig gcig po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-25: ston pa gang zhig ston mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-26: de ni 'gro gzhan lam shes shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-27: lus can rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-28: legs par gsungs pa'i tshig la ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-29: brgya byin rin thang ma mchis te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-30: gang zhig nor gyis mi rnyed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-31: zhi ba'i tshig de rnyed pa lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413a-32: nor rdzas thun mong spyod par mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-0: chos dag gi ni blo mi @413b 'phel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-1: mi yi nor rdzas zad 'gyur gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-2: chos kyi nor rdzas rnams mi zad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-3: skye ba'i tshe rabs stong dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-4: chos gcig rjes su 'gro bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-5: gom pa gcig tu 'gro byed kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-7: rgyal po chom rkun chu rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-8: mi rnams kyi ni nor rdzas 'phrog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-9: chos kyi nor ni de rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-10: nam yang dbrog bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-11: de ltar brgya byin de la lha de rnams kyis mngon par mchod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-12: mchod nas kyang de nas yang brgya byin gyi mdun du 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-13: brgya byin gyis kyang snying gi las gya nom pa de dag byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-14: lha'i bde ba de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-16: bdag med pa bstan cing sprul pa de yang mi snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-17: de nas yang lha yid mya ngan las 'das pa ris mthun par spyod pa'i gnas de dag nyid du phyin pa de thams cad ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-18: yid du 'ong ba so so yang dag par myong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-19: bde ba 'grub pa'i las de dag zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-21: gtugs par ma gyur pa de srid dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-22: de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:413b-23: shi nas kyang las sngar bstan pa de dang rgyu mthun par de dag phal cher ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-0: gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag chos bzang po dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug par @414a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-2: rtag tu dgon par gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-3: rtag tu 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba yin no /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-4: de dag chos thos nas kyang rab tu 'byung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-5: kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ba nas dgra bcom pa'i bar du 'gyur bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-6: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-7: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-8: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas 'khor na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-9: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-10: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-11: skyes bu dam pa chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-12: drang po drang po'i rang bzhin can gzhan la gnod pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-13: rtag tu las kyi 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid la lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-14: tshul khrims thams cad du yongs su dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-15: rtag par shin tu dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-16: g-yo sgyu rnam par spangs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-17: gser btsom ltar kun nas skyon med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414a-19: yang dag par lta bas sngon 'dren pa tshul khrims gtsang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-0: 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba gang gis sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams @414b dag byas pas skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-2: dgon pa dag na dge slong mang po bdud kyi 'ching ba rtag tu gcod par 'dod pa rnams bsam gtan byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-3: de dag tsha bas gdungs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-5: skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la sha kha ra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-8: rnga ma'i bsil yab yu ba can sbyin par byed pa de lta bu ni sbyin pa byin pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-9: srog gcod pa spangs pa rnam pa gang yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-10: 'di la khyim la sten pa gang gis 'byor pa dang ldan pa dag gi don du 'di ltar de dag rtsed mo byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-11: sten pa pos khu byug gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-12: rma bya tshal na 'dris pa de dag de nas bzung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-14: 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i bya de dag zong gis blus nas thar bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-15: de dag kyang slar tshal gyi nang nyid du dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-16: de na gnas la de nas yang 'tsho bar byed cing bde ba dag la nye bar spyod du 'jug pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-17: de lta bu ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-18: ji ltar na ma byin par len pa dag las ldog pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-19: ji ltar na ma byin pa len pa yongs su spong ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:414b-20: 'di la las kyi 'bras bu chung ngu la 'jigs par lta ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-0: rnam pa de lta bu gzhan gang yang rung ba @415a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-1: dag tu tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa sdom brtson can gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir so shing ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-2: sbrang rtsi'i chur sbyar ba de dag des spong bar byed cing rgu sems dang ldan par gyur nas len par mi byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-3: rnam pa de lta bu ni ma byin par len pa las ldog pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-4: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nang du lha 'khor na gnas pa zhes bya ba de rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-5: der skyes nas 'dod pa thams cad 'byor te; sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-6: nye ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-7: padma'i rdzing rnams kyi nang na bung ba'i tshogs sgra 'byin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-9: ngang pa sgra skad 'byin pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-10: tshal rnams kyi nang na yang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pas brgyan pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-11: lteng ka rnams kyi nang na yang bee d'urya sngon po bdag 'phro lta bu'i chus shin tu gang ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-12: ri'i rtse mo rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rdo rab tu gsal la gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415a-15: aanda rnyil gyi ri'i phug rnams kyi nang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-0: bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnam par 'byin pa rnams kyi nang na rtse bar byed @415b do; ;de dag gi kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-1: sgro gshog kyang rin po che sna bdun ltar 'dug pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-2: sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin cing nyams dga' ba rnams rna khung du sgra 'byin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-3: phan tshun mthun pa rnam pa du ma snyan par 'byin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-4: de dag thams cad rnar snyan par 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-6: nye ba'i tshal de dag nyid sgra 'byin pa lta bur 'byin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-7: tshal dang; nye ba'i tshal de dag kha cig na kun nas sgra di ri rir 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-8: shin tu nyams dga' ba'ang yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-9: tshal de rnams kyi nang na zas kyi tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-10: skom gyi tshogs kun las shin tu zhim pa rab tu 'bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-11: lha de rnams kyang rab tu dga' ba skyed na mi gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-12: rnam pa de lta bu'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-13: nye ba'i tshal de rnams kyi nang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-16: lus la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa rnams lan brgya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-18: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-19: de dag gi nang na las bzang po legs par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-21: gzi brjid mchog dang ldan pa bde ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-22: dga' mgur spyod par byed la 'dod pa rnam pa thams cad myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:415b-23: de bde ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i myos pas myos pa mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-1: rnams kyis lha de yongs su bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-3: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-4: de ltar de dag de bzhin du dga' zhing rtse la dga' mgur spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-5: 'di snyam sems te bdag cag bee d'urya'i nor bus lan kan bres pa'i tshal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-6: kun nas nor bu'i shing ljon pa bkra ba sna tshogs su phye ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin las kun tu gang ba rnams su 'dong bar bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-7: tshal de na lha rab tu dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-9: lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba rnams sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-10: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-11: tshal de'i nang na chu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rdzing yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-12: shin tu nyams dga' la chu rab tu dang ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-13: de'i 'gram na lha de rnams rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-15: de nas lha'i bu gsar du skyes pa de lha de rnams dang lhan cig rdzing de nyid kyi drung du 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-16: de nas lha de rnams kyis kyang de rig nas rgod cing rtse la 'gros 'chos pas lha de dag ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-17: de'i rdzing chu gnas pa dag na phan tshun grogs su gyur pa dag dang dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-18: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416a-19: rdzing de la yang mthu 'di lta bu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-0: ji ltar 'dod pa dang chu'i rnam pa ji tsam du 'dod pa @416b rnam pa de tsam du de 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-1: gal te 'dod na de chang mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-3: ro gsal zhing shin tu zhim la bung ba'i tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-4: 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-5: bdud rtsi dang mthun par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-8: dri shin tu zhim po dang ldan pa chu gnas pa'i rdzing de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-9: bdud rtsi shin tu zhim pa shin tu 'jam pa mdog zla ba lta bus kun tu gang ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-11: 'di ltar rdzing 'di shing ljon pas gang bar gyur cig snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-12: de shing ljon pa yon tan mchog dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-13: shing ljon pa dril bu g-yer kha'i drva bas gtibs shing lo ma las rol mo 'byung ba rnams kyis de bzhin du gang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-14: rlung gi shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i shing ljon pa de rnams las sil snyan yan lag dang ldan pa'i rnam pa ji snyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-15: rnam pa de snyed kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-16: de nas yang lha de rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-17: 'di ltar bdag cag rdzing de dag gi nang du 'jug par bya'o snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-18: lha de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu der 'jug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:416b-19: de dag zhugs pa dang nang du chu 'byung bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-0: nang du zhugs pa rnams kyis rdzing de nyid kyi nang na nor bu'i lan kan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing lo ma rnams @417a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-1: kyis khebs pa'i gzhal med khang la la ni bee d'urya las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-2: la la ni gser las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-3: la la ni dngul las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-4: la la ni shel las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-5: la la ni aanda rnyil las byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-6: la la ni 'dren mar byas pa dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-8: tshal de rnams kyi nang na thags su ma btags pa'i stan khra bo shin tu yid du 'ong ba; bsam pa bzhin du sdug pa'i mal stan sna tshogs bting ba'i steng na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-11: lha'i bu mo'i tshogs de rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-12: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-13: de rnams sa phyogs der yang dga' zhing shin tu sdug pa rnam pa du ma /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-14: 'dod pa'i yon tan ngoms mi myong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-16: phrag dog gi skyon rnams kyis skyo ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-17: shin tu snying du sdug cing yon tan dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-18: phan tshun grogs su gyur pa rnams dang dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-19: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-20: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis lhan cig dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-21: de dag kyang de nas langs nas tshal shin tu sdug pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417a-22: tshal de yang bya mad ta din da sgra snyan pa mang po 'byin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-0: 'bab chu'i ngos kun tu gang ba bya khri snyed sgra ca co 'byin pas kun @417b nas yongs su gang zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-1: sgra snyan pa'i ca cos kun tu snyan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-2: tshal gang na shing ljon pa nyi ma'i 'od ltar rnam par gsal ba'i tshal yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-3: bya'i tshogs kun nas lang long 'phur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-4: 'bab chu 'bum snyed kyis brgyan pa de na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-5: lha rang gi 'od dang ldan pa de rnams lha mo dag dang lhan cig lha'i yon tan sna tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-6: mi shes pa rnams kyi dga' ba'i nang na mchog 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-8: bud med la dga' ba zhes bya la; zhags pa des bcings pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni 'khor ba na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-9: lha de dag de rnams dang lhan cig phan tshun dga' ba rab tu mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pas yun ring du shin tu dga' bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-10: ri rab kyi rtse mo mad ta ka ta ma zhes bya ba ga la ba der /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-11: lha mo rang gi 'od dang ldan pa byad gzugs che zhing bzang la rgyan sdug gu thogs pa 'brang ba rnams dang lhan cig gzhal med khang gi nang du zhugs nas nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:417b-12: nam mkha'i dkyil du zhugs pa gos rlung gis bud pa de rnams ri rab kyi rtse mo mad ta ka ta ma der gzhal med khang gi dga' spyod byed du 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-1: khang gi dbyibs sdug pa lha'i padma'i rdzing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-2: lteng kas mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-3: rin po che sna bdun gyi ri'i zo ma gsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-4: thags su ma btags pa'i rdzas kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-5: kun nas mchog tu legs pa dang ldan pa ma da ta ka ta ma de'i gnas dpe med cing shin tu mtho la brtsegs pa dag de rnams kyis mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-6: de rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-8: de ltar de dag rtse ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-9: re zhig na glo bur du de dag thams cad kyi gzi 'bar la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-10: nyi ma'i mdog dang mthun pa'i 'od kyi rnam pa de lta bu zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-11: de nas yang ji ltar lha rnams shin tu dngangs la khas bub tu gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-12: mig btsums nas lhung ba yon tan 'bum dang ldan pa'i 'dod lta bu zhig byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-13: 'di ltar 'od kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu sngon nam yang ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-14: 'od de'ang yud tsam zhig thal gyis byung nas nub ste; ji ltar dzambu gling na skar mda' ltung ba yud tsam zhig tal gyis byung nas nub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-15: sems can dag kyang shin tu dngangs par gyur pa de ltar lha de rnams kyis 'od de byung ba mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-16: lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig dngags par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418a-17: de nas yang yun ring zhig lon pa dang dbugs 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-0: dbugs byung ba de dag @418b thams cad yud tsam gyis ngo mtshar cher skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-1: gang gis bdag cag thams cad dngangs la de nas yang 'od de nyid mi snang bar gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i 'od de ci zhig snyam mo; ;ngo mtshar cher skyes pa de dag lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-2: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-3: ngo mtshar skyes shing dngangs pa de dag brgya byin ga la gnas pa der dong nas de dag gis brgya byin mngon par mthong ba dang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-4: kun nas yongs su bskor te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-5: de nas brgya byin gyis mdun na 'don pa'i lha gang yin pa de rnams rtse bar byed pa dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-7: padma'i phreng ba sna tshogs thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-8: bzhin 'dzum la nor bus lto sngo bsangs su 'dug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-9: mdog gser btso ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi mdun na rtse bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-11: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-12: de nas 'khor na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de rnams ni dga' bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-13: dga' mgur spyod par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-14: brgya byin la mngon par bstod par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-17: lha gzhan la tshig cung zad kyang smra bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:418b-18: de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis 'khor na gnas pa de rnams la 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-4: de nas 'khor na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis brgya byin la 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-6: bdag cag gis gang sngon gar yang ma mthong ba mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-7: sngon ma thos pa thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-8: de nas brgya byin gyis de dag la 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-9: 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis ngo mtshar zhig mthong ba de ci yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-10: de nas 'khor na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis brgya byin la 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-12: 'di ni bdag cag skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du ri'i rtse mo mad ta ka ta mar mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-13: bdag cag rnams kyis nam mkha' las ji tsam du gang gis ri'i rtse mo de rab tu 'bar ba lta bu'i 'od kyi rnam pa de lta bu byung ba zhig mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-14: de la bdag cag ngo mtshar skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-17: de nas brgya byin gyis de thos nas yud tsam zhig bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-18: lha de rnams la 'di skad smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-20: res 'ga' 'od de lta bu 'byung ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-21: bdag gis 'di'i ngo mtshar gnyis pa de thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-22: gang gi tshe bdag gis ngo mtshar dang po de thos pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-23: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar pa de ci lags zhes zhus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das la de skad ces zhus pa dang bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-0: khyod ni ngan song gi sgo bcad pa @419b yin pas 'jigs par ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-1: 'khor bar gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-3: mi rtag pa zhes bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-4: gang yin pa de ngas khyod la bshad kyi nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-5: lha 'thab bral zhes bya ba dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-6: de dag gi drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi bong skyed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-9: longs spyod rnams 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-10: de dag gang gi tshe las yongs su zad pa dang de nas ltung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-11: de dag dpag tshang 'bum phrag du ma dag nas ltung ba na 'od de chung dur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-12: ji ltar mar me zad pa'i dus su 'od chung zhing mi gsal bar 'gyur ba de ltar de nam mkha' la 'chi ba'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-13: 'od de rnam pa de lta bur chung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-15: gang gi 'od rab tu gsal ba de dag ni brjod par mi nus shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-16: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyis blta bar yang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-18: rtogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-20: de ltar 'thab bral gyi lha'i 'od gang yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-21: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhas gang yang blta bar yang mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-22: de ni gzhan gyi las kyi 'bras bu sum 'gyur du 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:419b-23: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gzhan gyi nyes 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-0: de dag bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las de skad thos @420a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-1: pa 'di dag khyod la bstan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-3: de'i tshe skyo ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-4: lha de 'chi ba na nam mkha' de dpag tshad 'bum phrag du ma dag nas 'od 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag lha khyod kyis mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-5: de la 'jigs par ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-6: de nas brgya byin gyis de'i tshe 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-7: ji lta ji ltar bde chen dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-8: ji lta ji ltar longs spyod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-9: de lta de ltar sdug bsngal che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-10: nges par mthar ni ltung bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-11: las dang mthun par 'bras bu ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-12: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-13: las kyis lhag par khyad 'jug la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-15: ji ltar gong nas gong dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-16: las rnams kyi ni 'brel pa mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-17: de ltar gong nas gong dag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-20: las ni nges par gnas pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-21: skye las mchog nyid lus dang mdog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-23: las zad nas ni ltung 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-24: 'di dag thams cad nges par ltung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-25: sa bon nges par tshig pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-26: nam yang skye ba yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-27: mar me rtag tu skad cig ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-28: sems kyang skad cig 'brel par mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-29: rgyu ste sems dang mthun par ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-30: las kyang de bzhin skad cig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420a-31: mi rtag las las gang skyes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-0: de ni skye 'jig @420b chos can yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-1: zag dang bcas pa'i bde ba de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-2: rtag tu sngon med phyis mi 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-3: skye med 'jigs med bdag nyid gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-4: nyon mongs las grol de bde'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-5: gang zhig thob nas 'khor ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-6: yul las gnod med nges par 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-7: gang zhig srid bral 'dod med la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-8: srid pa'i skyon las rnam grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-9: lus can gyi ni bde ba de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-10: pha rol gnas pa'i skyob pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-11: cung zad zag bcas bde ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-12: de dag thams cad skad cig dgongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-13: gang zhig de las rnam grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-14: de dag thams cad brtan par bde //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-16: 'khor na gnas pa'i lha de rnams la de kho na nyid ston par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-17: bstan nas yang de rnams dbugs phyung ste rang gi gnas su gtong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-18: chos 'di skad kyang bstan te; 'di ltar dus thams cad du bag yod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-19: de nas lha de rnams kyang kha cig rang gi gnas der dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-20: de nas yang yul gyi dbang du gyur pa rnams sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-21: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-22: sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis snyan par byas pa'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-23: gnas rnams na ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:420b-24: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-0: de phyis las de zad nas @421a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-1: lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-2: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-4: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-5: gal te kha cig mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skye bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-6: las de dang rgyu mthun par de rtag par mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-8: skye bo thams cad dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-11: rigs btsun zhing che bar skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-12: skyes phan chad mchog tu bde la blta na sdug par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-13: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-14: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas mtho bar spyod pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-16: las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-17: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-18: chos dang ldan zhing chos kyis rjes su lta ba rtag tu las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag par lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421a-19: rtag tu yang dag pa'i lta bar sngon du 'dren pa gang gis nor gyi sbyin pa byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-0: bsod nams dag @421b byas pas skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-2: tshul khrims phyogs gcig bsrungs la tshul khrims kha cig srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-3: de'i 'og tu tshul khrims thams cad srung ba'i dge 'dun lam du zhugs pa dag la lham mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-4: snod spyad dag sbyin par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-6: ma byin par len pa dag spangs pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-10: skra 'phyang bas 'brog dgon pa dag tu mi gsad pa'i phyir bzung ba de dag thar bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-11: 'brog dgon pa dag tu chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom pa'i nor rdzas khyer te 'ongs pa de dag rgyal por gyur gyis kyang ma byin par len pa'i 'jigs pas rgyal po'i skal ba len par mi byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-12: de ltar 'di ni ma byin par len pa spong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-13: ji ltar na srog gcod pa spong ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-14: 'di ni 'di ltar de rgyal por gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-15: nyes byed byed pa gzhan gyis bzung ste phul ba de yang de las kyi 'bras bu la 'jigs nas gsod par mi byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-16: de ni lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas mtho bar spyod pa zhes bya bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:421b-17: der skyes nas kyang de'i las kyi mtha' legs par byas shing spyad pas lha mo sum stong dag de'i rim gro byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-3: lag na sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-4: lag na mkho ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-5: lag na rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs thogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-6: glu dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bstod cing lha de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-7: des kyang de rnams mthong nas lha mo de rnams ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do; ;de rnams kyang shin tu gus pas de'i drung du 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-8: de ltar phan tshun snying du sdug pa de dag thams cad skyed mos tshal rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-9: skyed mos tshal rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba de'ang kun nas bee d'urya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-11: gser gyi shing ljon pas ni brgyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-14: padma'i tshal gyis mdzes par byas shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-15: chu bo du ma brgya snyed ni legs par 'bab /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-16: dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni gtibs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-17: kun nas bya'i rigs du ma lding zhing sgra snyan pa'i rnam pa mang po stong snyed ni 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-18: skyed mos tshal de lha'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis ni khyab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-20: tshal de phan tshun mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-21: tshal de'i dbus na rtse ba'i ri zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun gyi ri yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422a-22: de na yang rin po che'i ri dvags rnam pa du ma yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-0: de dag 'di lta bur mdzes @422b pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-2: rtsib logs ni padma r'a ga'i mdog ltar dmar la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-6: rva ni shel lta bu yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-7: kha cig ni mdog mthun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-8: lus thams cad dngul gyi mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-9: de bzhin du gser gyi mdog tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-10: de ltar tshal de na ri dvags rgyu ba rnams kyi lus kyi rnam pa dag gis kun nas mdzes pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-11: lha'i tshogs de rnams dang lhan cig spyod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-12: ri dvags de rnams kyang lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig glu len par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-13: ji ltar glu len pa de ltar lha mo de rnams kyang shin tu mthun zhing snyan la mchog tu yid du 'thad pa'i glu len no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-14: de ni lha de rnams yun ring du rnam pa du ma dga' bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-15: 'bab chu 'bab pa gzhan ga la ba der lhan cig rgyu bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-16: ri rab kyi rtse mo chu sman ljongs zhes bya ba der shing rta rnam pa sna tshogs la zhon pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-17: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas glu dbyangs nye bar len zhing 'dod pa dam pa dang ldan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-18: shin tu dga' ba skyes pa legs pa mchog dang ldan pa rnams 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-19: der phyin nas kyang chu klung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:422b-21: chu bo sman ljongs kyi ri rab kyi rtse mo der yang dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-0: padma'i rdzing gi nang rnams rol mo'i sgra rnar grag cing shin tu rgyags @423a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-5: lha mo'i tshogs phan tshun mthun pa rnams kyis gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-9: padma'i phreng bas mgo dkris pa dag dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-10: las legs par byas pas bsgyur ba rnams de'i stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-12: lha dang mthun pa bde ba dpe med pas rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-13: der 'di ni phyogs gcig bstan par zad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-14: thams cad ni mi kun gyis brjod par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-15: 'di ltar lha'i bde ba de brjod par mi nus shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-16: 'di lha'i bde ba de ni gzhan dang mi 'dra ba dpe med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-17: las legs par byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-18: ris mthun pa'i dbang gis sten pa dag bde ba du ma myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-19: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' ba de rnams ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-21: gtugs par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-22: de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-23: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-25: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang na skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423a-26: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-0: de las de dang rgyu mthun par rtag tu mchog tu bde bar 'gyur @423b zhing dben pa na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-1: ri khrod na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-5: blon po chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-6: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-7: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas gzi brjid mchog ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-8: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-9: de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas ji ltar gnas pa brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-11: blo gros rgya che ba gang gis sbyin pa byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-13: tshul khrims rnam pa bdun yang bsrungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-14: sdig pa'i grogs po dang tom col du mi 'dre /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-15: sdig pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims mi bsrung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-16: bsod nams kyang ji lta ba bzhin du byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-17: gcig kho nar 'bad cing yid drang ba'i rang bzhin can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-18: mdog gser sbyangs pa dang mthun pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-19: tshul khrims rnam pa du bsrungs zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-22: ma byin par len pa dag spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-23: 'di la g-yul chen por zhugs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-24: gang drung du 'ongs pa'i sdom pa'i 'dzem pas de srog kyang btang nas gsod par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-25: de ltar srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:423b-26: ji ltar na ma byin pa len pa spangs pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-1: ni ri'i rtse mo'ang rnyil bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-3: sems can thams cad gzhan gyi nor rdzas 'phrog pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-5: srog chad la thug gis kyang sdom pa blangs pa'i 'dzem pas ma byin par len par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-6: ji ltar na sbyin pa gtong ba zhing gang la zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-7: 'di ni sangs rgyas mchod cing chos mnyan pa'i don du sems bzang po bsgoms pa'i yid yang dag pa'i lta ba sngon du 'gro ba'i blos mar me 'bul bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-8: de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-9: gzi brjid mchog gi lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-10: der skyes nas kyang gzi brjid kyi phreng ba can byad gzugs che la shin tu sdug pa de las legs par byas pa des rgyu dang mthun par 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-11: rna bas sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yang dang yang du thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-12: snas kyang me tog man d'a ra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-15: rin po che sna bdun gyi dri yang dang yang du bsnom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-16: lces kyang bdud rtsi'i ro zhim po lha'i chang rgyun du 'thung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-17: mig gis kyang ri sul gyi ngos sna tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424a-18: rin po che sna bdun gyi gzugs dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-0: lus kyis kyang lha'i reg bya @424b shin tu dri zhim pa'i thags su ma btags pa'i gos rnams gyon la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-2: autpa la'i lo ma me tog phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-3: byug pa sna tshogs dag la reg par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-4: de ltar de las legs par byas pa dag gi 'bras bu la spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-5: lha mo stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba de gser btsom lta bu'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-7: dril bu g-yer kha'i sgra drag tu 'khrol ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-8: dngul gyi lcug ma'i tshogs rlung gis bskyod pa'i nang na bde ba mchog rnams myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-9: lha dag glu dbyangs len pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-13: glu snyan pa dang 'brel pa dag thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-14: shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa lha'i phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-15: gos gyon pa gser rnam pa du mas gang ba'i ri sul rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-17: ri bo'i rtse mo bee d'urya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-21: rin po che mthon ka chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-22: shel las grub pa rnams kyang mthong ngo ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-23: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-24: bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-25: ri'i rtse mo me long lta bur gyur pa de dag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-26: gcig gi gzugs brnyan gcig gi nang du snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:424b-28: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de'ang ri me long lta bu de rnams kyi nang na lan brgya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-1: brnyan de rnams la bdag nyid lta bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-2: bltas nas kyang brgya 'gyur du rab tu dga' ba skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-3: lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin du dga' ba skye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-5: 'di ltar bdag cag byad gzugs che zhing bzang ba dang ldan par rtag par shin tu bde ba rnams sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa rnyed nas rtse bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-6: lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bskyed pa'i bde ba la nye bar spyod par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-7: de ltar yid g-yengs pa de dag ri nas ri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-9: sred pa'i dug gis myos pa'i mi ltar yid rtag tu ma bsdams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-10: bag med pas nyams pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-11: lha mo rnams dang lhan cig ri'i rgyal po de la rgyu bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-12: bza' btung bdud rtsi'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi myos pa phan tshun dga' ba'i dbang du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-14: phan tshun snying 'brel pa dag tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-15: nags tshal bya sna tshogs sgra di ri ri 'byin pa rnam pa du ma rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-16: de lta rtag par rgyu ba cha byad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-18: gos gyon pa mgo la me tog phreng ba btags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-19: rgyan phreng 'phyang ba de dag dpag bsam gyi shing gi tshal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425a-20: dpag bsam gyi shing gi tshal rnams kyi nang na rgyu bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-0: de ltar yongs @425b su rgyu ba na shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa de dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-1: res 'ga' chu bo chang chu ltar 'bab pa zhes bya bar autpa la dmar po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-3: me tog ku mu das khebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-6: dur pas mdzes pa der 'jug par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-7: chu bo'i 'gram de dag na lha phan tshun grogs su gyur pa de rnams chang 'thung bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-8: bya blta na sdug pa rnams dang yang lhan cig rtse bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-9: de nas srid pas myos pa'i lha de rnams kyang yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-10: yang du chang 'thung pa nyid kyis brgya 'gyur du mdangs 'bar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-11: yul lnga'i yam sreg shing las byung ba'i srid pa'i mes bsreg par byas kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-12: 'dod pa'i srid pas gdungs pa ngoms mi myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-13: kun nas 'dod pa'i zhags pas bcings pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-14: rgyal po la gnod pa byed skyed [?] pa'i mi btson rar bcug pa lta bu de rnams lha'i 'jig rten 'bum phrag du ma mthong ba nyams dga' ba na rtag tu rgyu bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-15: chang chu ltar 'bab pa'i ngogs de dag na rtse ba'i lha de rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-16: bya rtag par rab tu myos shing snyed shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de rnams padma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:425b-17: autpa la'i tshal de dag na dga' bar byed do; ;chu dmar po la spyod pa zhes bya ba phan tshun grogs su gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-0: sgro gshog rin po che sna bdun las grub pa lta bur rang gi 'od dang ldan pa de rnams kyis lha rab tu myos pa @426a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-1: de rnams mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-2: 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-3: lha rnams rtag par rab tu dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-4: bdag cag rtag par rab tu dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-5: lha rnams dang ni bya rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-6: bye brag dag ni mi dmigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-7: de dag chos spyod ma mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-8: nam yang thar pa spyod pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-9: gal te der gyur lha rnams dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-10: bya gyur de rnams mtshungs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-11: gang zhig bag med rnam grol zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-12: gang zhig chos la rtag tu dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-13: 'jig rten na ni lha de dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-14: bag yod gnas pa dam pas ma byin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-15: gal te lha rnams rtse dga' dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-16: gal te bdag cag rtse dga' na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-17: lha dang mkha' la rgyu ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-18: bye brag yod par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-19: las rnams kyi ni bye brag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-20: skye ba'i chos dag bye brag 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-21: chos ma yin par ltung ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-22: gar yang skye ba legs mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-24: mthar ni zad par mi rig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-25: lha de dang ni blo rmongs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-26: bya rnams dang ni rtag tu mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-27: skye sdug rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-28: 'chi ba nyid kyi sdug bsngal dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-29: sdug dang bral bar bcas pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-30: sdug bsngal 'di dag brgyud pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-31: dri med chos kyi spyod yul la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-32: gang zhig de ltar blo gnas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-33: 'jig rten na ni lha de dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426a-34: bag yod gnas pa dam pas mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-0: gang zhig skye @426b ba'i rgyu las byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-1: sdug bsngal yin par legs rig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-2: 'dod pa phan med byed rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-3: lha de dag ni chags mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-5: mang po rnams dang bral ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-6: gang zhig 'khor bar skyo mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-7: lha de dag ni bya dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-8: bag med de nyid gzigs pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-9: chang 'thung cung zad tha gir gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-12: bag med nyams pa'i mi dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-14: de bas chang gi bag med pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-15: rnam pa kun gyis khyad par che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-16: chang zhim gyis ni nyin gcig tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-17: lus can rnams ni bag med byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-18: bskal pa bye bar 'khyam pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-19: bag med byang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-20: bag med pa dang bral ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-22: gang zhig bag med dbang du song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-23: mi de srid par rtag tu 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-24: phan par byed pa mi yis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-25: bag med pa dag spang bar gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-26: 'di ltar nyon mongs bag med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-27: sangs rgyas kyis ni mi zad bsgrags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-28: 'di ltar sems yang bya dag kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-29: bag med pa la mi dga' na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-30: ci phyir lha rnams bag med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-31: de ni khyad par spong mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:426b-32: de ltar legs par byas pas bskul bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-0: lha rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir de khong du chud par bya ba'i don du bya gang yin pa de dag pha ma ltar @427a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-1: 'doms par byed kyang bag med pas sems phrogs pa'i lha de rnams bdag la phan par ston pa 'dzin par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-2: de nas yang rtse ba la gnas pa'i lha shin tu skyid par gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-3: rtag tu yid rab tu dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-6: yid chags su rung ba sna tshogs dang chas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-7: tshal gzhan ma ta la zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-8: de nas tshal ma ta lar phyin nas lha phan tshun grogs su gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-9: shin tu skyid cing yid rab tu dga' ba de rnams rin po che sna bdun gyi lcug ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-10: lo ma phan tshun 'brel cing me tog gi snye ma 'phyang la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-11: bung ba 'bum snyed 'khod pa'i nang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-12: rin po che sna bdun gyi tshal rnams kyi nang na rang gi lha mo rnam pa du mas gang ba rnams dang lhan cig glu dbyangs shin tu snyan pa gang gi tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-13: nye ba'i tshal thams cad glu len pa lta bu'i brag ca'i sgras dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-14: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-15: glu dbyangs len pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-17: bya rnams kyang sgra 'byin pa rnam pa de lta bur snyan cing mthun pa'i sgra de dag nyid gcig tu 'dus te 'byung ba des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427a-18: ri rab shin tu nyams dga' ba de yang rnas 'thad pa'i glu dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-0: mthong na dga' ba des yang nyis 'gyur @427b du dga' bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-1: de la lha rnams lha mo'i tshogs byad gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-4: g-yer bag can dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i tshogs la nye bar spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-8: de rnams gnas de dag na ji srid du 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-9: sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-11: gtugs par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-14: zad par gyur na de phyis lha'i ris 'dod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-15: bde ba'i tshogs du ma de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-16: shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-18: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro; ;gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na de las de dang rgyu mthun par shin tu bde bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-19: yid rtse bar dga' ba dag thams cad mgu zhing rab tu dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-22: de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-23: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:427b-24: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas gzi phreng 'bar ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-1: dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-2: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-3: dge zhing legs pa'i skyes bu gang gis lha'i nang du nges par skye bar 'gyur ba'i bsod nams dag byas pas 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-7: gzhan la gnod pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-9: sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-10: yang dag pa'i lta bas sngon du 'dren pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-13: dge 'dun la rtag tu sems gus par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-14: rtag tu yid brlan pa gang gis bsod nams byas pas 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-15: de rnam pa du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-16: 'di ni dge 'dun gyi gnas khang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-17: mchod rten nyams pa bcos te; gnas khang ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-18: mchod rten gang yin pa de dag brtan par byed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-19: de bzhin du rtsig rmang 'chos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-20: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-22: dge 'dun gyi nor rdzas la me shor na srog la mi lta bar me'i nang du zhugs te zhi bar byas nas me de las thar par byed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-23: de bzhin du mi dag la mes sreg pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428a-24: sems can la brtse ba'i snying rjes thar par byed pa rnam pa de lta bu ni bsod nams byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-0: ma byin par len pa dag las log pa rnam pa @428b du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-1: gang zhig lam du zhugs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-5: gzhan de dang mthun pa lhung ba gang yin pa dag lam du rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-7: kye; 'di su'i yin zhes de sgrogs par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-8: de gal te la la zhig gis 'di ni bdag gi yin no zhes smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-9: de yang rang gi yin par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-10: de la sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-11: ji ste su'ang 'dod pa med la su'ang smra ba med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-12: 'di ltar 'di ni bdag gis zhag bdun gyi bar du bcangs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-13: de nas yang yul phyogs de na 'dug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-15: blon po chen po dag la sbran nas 'phrog par mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-17: de'i tshe chos dang mi ldan pas 'phrog par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-18: de dag la sbran par mi bya zhing phyis sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-20: dge 'dun dag la dbul bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-21: de bzhin du bstab par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-22: de lta bu ni ma byin par len pa mi byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-23: srog gcod pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-24: 'di ni lam du zhugs nas 'gro ba'i lam dag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-25: srin bu ma ko ta ka dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-27: sdig sbrul ngag gis khebs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-28: sems can la snying brtse bas de dag gi steng du 'gro bar mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-29: las kyi 'bras bu'i de kho na la lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:428b-33: don gyi 'bras bu mang po dag kyang dang du blangs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-2: de lta bu ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-3: sdom pa ma spangs pa'i mi de ni lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas gzi phreng 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-4: der skyes nas kyang shin tu bde ba la rten cing bde ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-5: rang gis byas pa'i las la spyod pa de'i bde ba gang yin pa de dag ni brjod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-6: phyogs 'ga' zhig brjod na 'di ltar gnas de ni kun nas 'od 'bar ba yin te; de'i khyab par nyi ma'i 'od dang mthun la mthong ba mthun yang 'od de mi bzod pa ma yin pa de ltar de'i las bde ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i mthus 'bar ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-7: de na rang gi 'od dang ldan pa de dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-8: lha mo 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-12: aanda rnyil gyi gzhal med khang bzang po rnams kyi nang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-13: 'dod pa du ma la sems gtad pa rnams dga' bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-15: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-16: de shing ljon pa rtag tu me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429a-18: rtag tu bya'i tshogs sgra snyan par byin pas mdzes par byas pa'i tshal gyi nang dag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-0: mig gis bsten pa'i yul nyams dga' ba @429b dag mthong zhing thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-1: de ltar de tshal gyi nang mig btsums pa dang phye ba lta bu zhas bya ba shing ljon pa de dag mig btsums pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-2: phye ba lta bu mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-4: stobs shin tu che ba des rnam pa de lta bu'i tshal gyi nang rnams na dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-6: lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-8: snyid ltad mos g-yengs pa dag tshal glu dbyangs len pa'i kun dga'i ra ba zhes bya ba der 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-9: de'i phyi bzhin du'ang lha 'bum phrag du ma ri rab kyi gshong dag na sil snyan dang; sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 'byin cing 'dod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-10: phan tshun brag ca 'byung ba'i sgra 'byin pa da dag ri rab kyi nang gi khrod nas kun nas glu dbyangs 'gyur ba lta bur byed cing 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-11: de ltar de 'gro ba na lha gzhan tshal dang /
