K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-12: nye ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag sgra shin tu snyan zhing yid 'phrog pa de thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-13: brgya byin gnyis pa lta bu gzhan 'di su zhig yin snyam nas 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-14: shin tu mgu ba des de mngon par mthong nas yid ngo mtshar cher skyes pa de'i drung du rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:429b-15: lha phan tshun dga' ba skyes pa de rnams kyis de mngon par mthong nas khyed tshur shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-1: cag thams cad pas lus shin tu che la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-2: brgya byin lta bu gzhan zhig bdag cag gi gnas 'dir byung ngo zhes brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-3: de nas lha gzhan dag kyang rings par lha de dag ga la ba der dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-4: lha rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas bkur sti byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-9: rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-10: de la mchod pa byas pa'i yid kyis tshal rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod byed du 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-12: lha mo'i tshogs rab tu dga' ba rnams rgod cing bro rdung bzhin du de nas yang snying bsnyen bkur bya ba la zhugs pa de dag slar log ste de nyid la lta bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-13: de nas des kyang de rnams mngon par mthong nas yid rab tu dga' bas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-15: khyed rnams kyis bdag drangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-16: khyed kyis bdag gi mdun du dga' ba 'di lta bur sbyar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-18: de nas lha de rnams kyis gsar du skyes pa'i lha de la 'di ltar bdag cag 'di rnams ni tshal rab tu dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba lha'i mchog tu nyams dga'i tshal der bdag cag 'dong bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430a-19: der 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lhag par spyad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-0: de nas lha des sngon ma mthong ba'i tshal @430b der yang yid ltad mo la zhugs par yang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-1: yang rings par gyur pa'i yid kyis tshal rab tu dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-2: de nas tshal de rgyang ring po zhig na nyi ma'i tshal lta bu kun nas 'od zer bzang pos rab tu 'bar ba lta bur mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-3: de nas lha gsar du skyes pa des tshal de mngon par mthong nas yang dang yang mchog tu dga' ba skyes par gyur pa'i yid kyis tshal de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-4: de nas dga' ba rnam pa du ma yod pa chal bzhi dag dang mthun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-5: legs par 'byung ba'i tshal der phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-6: bya 'bum snyed rnam par sgra sil li li 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-7: kha cig ni sgra 'byin par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-9: kha cig gis ni rnam pa du mar yongs su bskor nas yid rab tu dga' bas sgra 'byin par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-10: de ltar tshal de rnams na sgra 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-11: yang phyogs gzhan zhig na ri sul rnam pa sna tshogs yod par gser gyi rdo leb rnam pa du ma la chu 'bab pas phog pa'i chu sgra de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-14: ka randa pa dag chu 'gram rnams na sgra 'byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-15: chu bo de rnams kyi bya dag de ltar rnam pa du mar sgra 'byin pa thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-16: de nas de dag gis kyang chu 'bab pa'i sgra mngon par brtags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:430b-17: chu 'gram de dag na lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-1: ba'i lha de dag dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-3: dga' mgur spyod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-5: nye ba'i tshal dag na yang mchog tu bde ba myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-6: de nas yang 'dod pa lnga las byung ba'i bde ba myong bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-7: yang dpag bsam gyi shing gi drung du rgyug par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-8: shing de dag kyang mngon par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-9: kha cig ni zla ba'i 'od ltar lhan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-10: kha cig ni nyi ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-11: shing de rnams kyi drung dag tu'ang lha de lha rnams kyis bskor nas dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-13: yul lnga'i bde ba rnam pa du ma myong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-14: 'dod pa'i bde ba gang brjod par yang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-15: de dpag bsam gyi shing gi tshal der yang bde ba rnam pa mang po du ma myong nas padma'i tshal bya ngang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-17: ka randa pas brgyan pa ga la ba der brgya byin bzhin du mchog tu dga' ba'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i lha de'ang yid rab tu dga' bas 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-18: de nas der yang lha'i 'dod pa'i bde ba spyad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-19: ri'i rtse mo mtho brtsegs zhes bya ba'i ri bo'i rtse mo ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431a-22: 'dzum zhing sgeg par lha dang lha mo grogs su gyur pa phan tshun yid gcugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-0: gcig la gcig @431b gnod pa mi byed cing snying du sdug pa rnams shin tu bde ba myong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-1: ri bo'i rtse mo mtho brtsegs zhes bya ba rtse mo sna tshogs pa de la 'dzegs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-2: yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-5: lteng ka sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-6: lha'i padma'i tshal dang ldan zhing des kyang brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-7: padma'i tshal de na yang padma mang pos mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-8: bya'i tshogs 'bum phrag du ma lding ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-9: shin tu bde ba dang ldan zhing yid shin tu bde la mchog tu dge ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-10: legs pa mchog gis shin tu 'bar ba rnams mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-11: lha de rnams dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-13: bung ba sbrang rtsi 'byung ba'i tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-14: dpag bsam gyi shing gi tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-15: bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin par byed pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-17: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-18: ri bo'i rtse mo mtho brtsegs ri zom sna tshogs yod pa de na las legs par byas pa de der yang yun ring du rtses na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-19: de nas yang lha de rnams dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod byed du rang gi gnas de nyid la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-20: gsar du skyes pa'i yid ltad mo la zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:431b-21: lha phyi bzhin 'brang ba stong snyed kyis bskor cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-0: thams cad du'ang de dag nyid kyis yongs su bskor ba rnams brgya byin blta ba'i phyir lha'i @432a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-1: 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-2: de nas rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-3: rin po che'i khang bzang lan kan sna tshogs kyis bskor ba sngar bstan pa dang mthun pa chos bzang du phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-4: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha de mngon par mthong nas rim gro byas shing 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-6: da ltar legs par gnas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-7: de ni zad nas lha yul nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-8: khyod ni log par ltung bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-9: las kyis nyams te ltung ba dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-10: gang dang gang du skye 'gyur gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-11: de ni phyis ni gdung med par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-12: khyod kyis de ltar bya ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-13: bde la sems ni chags gyur cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-14: bag med pa yis nyams gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-15: ma byas bdud kyi dbang gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-16: lha rnams sems can dmyal bar 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-17: gcig gis ltung ba mthong nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-18: skye bo ji ste yid mi 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-19: bdag kyang ltung ba 'di dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-20: rnam pa kun tu ltung du dogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-21: gang zhig ring nas 'jigs mthong ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-22: sgrub pa dag la 'bad byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-23: de ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-24: gnod dang bral te 'jigs pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-25: gang zhig ring nas bag med pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-26: blo ngan 'jigs par mi sems pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-27: phyi nas nyon mongs byung tshe de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432a-28: phyi nas gdung bas sreg par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-0: lha yul nas @432b ni nges par go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-1: kun nas dngos po lhung par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-2: 'dod pa'i dbang gyur de rig na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-3: 'di la nam yang ltung ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-4: sems can 'dod pas bslus pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-5: 'dod pas rnam par rmongs pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-6: 'dod pa'i zhags pas drangs gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-7: de dag rtag tu dmyal bar ltung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-8: rtag tu nyon mongs 'di rig nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-9: bdag la phan par byed pa'i yid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-10: shin tu dul ba'i yid kyis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-11: lha rnams gdung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-12: yid kyi dug dang 'dod shugs kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-13: rnam pa kun tu zin pa gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-14: 'chi bdag dbang gyur rmongs pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-15: skye bo 'dod pa'i me yis nyams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-17: mdza' bshes rtsa lag gnyen 'dun dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-18: 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal gang byung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-19: de ni bshad par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-20: de ni 'chi bar nye gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-21: ri bo bzhin du ltung ba na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-22: bzlog par mi nus stobs ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-23: mi rnams kyis ni 'dren par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-24: sdug pa dang ni 'di gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-25: rnam pa kun tu'ang 'bral bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-26: de nas rig nas lha mchog gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-27: bag med rnams la chags ma byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-28: dbang po rtag tu 'dod rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-29: 'dir ni nam yang ngoms mi myong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-30: ji ltar mer ni mar blugs bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-32: 'di ltar sgo rnams sna tshogs kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:432b-34: mi rnams rtag tu sems dmyal dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-3: mi mkhas skye bo nyon mongs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-4: de ni rig nas sred bral te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-6: brtan po bcing las nges grol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-7: mya ngan bral zhing gnod dang bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-8: gang zhig sred pa'i dbang mi 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-9: de ni rtag tu bde bar 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-10: gang dag gnas skabs thams cad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-11: ye shes la ni yid nye ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-12: mkhas pa de ni skye ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-13: sdug bsngal zhags pas de mi 'ching //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-14: gang dag yid la mtshan ma med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-15: gang dag sred pas yid byung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-16: de ni dgon pa'i dri ma bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-17: bde ba 'byung ba'i mchog cig thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-18: gang dag sdug bsngal mi skyo zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-19: gang dag bde la chags mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-20: bde sdug las ni grol ba de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-22: byams pa dang ni snying rje yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-23: mi rnams rtag tu sems ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-24: rgyu 'bras de nyid shes pa de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-25: sdug bsngal zhags pas nges par 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-26: gang dag kun tu rtog pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-27: yid mi dga' ste skyon spangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-28: de dag khyod kyi 'jigs las grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-31: lang tsho la yang rtag tu dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-33: bzhi 'di dag ni rtag tu gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-34: lha yul nas ni lhung ba de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433a-35: mi bzad khad kyis mngon du 'ong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-0: de ni bsams @433b te bag med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-1: khyod kyis nam yang brten mi bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-2: rmongs pa gang zhig thabs med pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-3: bde ba rtag tu tshol byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-4: bye ma rnams las 'bru mar ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-5: de ni rtag tu rnyed mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-6: bag med rtag tu dga' ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-7: de la bde ba'i skal ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-8: sdug bsngal shing gi drung gcig po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-9: shin tu mi bzang bag med yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-10: chos dang chos min nges pa nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-11: 'di ste bdag gis khyod la bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-12: khyod kyi yid kyis de zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-13: khyod ni gdung bar ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-14: rmongs pa gang zhig bla ma'i tshig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-15: phan pa nyid ni 'dzin mi byed; ;phyis de nyon mongs 'byung ba'i tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-16: rang gi sems kyis gdungs par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-17: bye ba ther 'bum stong phrag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-18: sa ya dang ni dung phyur dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-19: grangs med pa yi lha rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-20: bag med pa yis rnam par bslus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-21: nges par mi rtag me yis su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-22: bskal mthar ri mchog 'di sreg na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-23: dbu ba chu shing lta bu yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-24: lha rnams gang zhig smos ci dgos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-25: 'du byas skye dang g-yo ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-26: de ni srid par cung zad med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-27: gang zhig rtag pa'am bde 'gyur ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-28: de yi gnas ni yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-29: ji ltar bag med pa yis 'phrogs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-30: gsar byung lha de la ni thabs du mas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-31: brgya byin des ni de skad phan btags kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-32: de ltar tshig gcig tsam yang ma zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:433b-33: de nas brgya byin gyis de rig nas mi smra bar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-1: kyang brgya byin de la spyi bos phyag bcal te sil snyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-3: glu dbyangs sna tshogs la yid chags pa'i lha 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-4: lha de rnams nyid dang lhan cig rang gi gnas ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-8: padma'i tshal rnams kyis brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-9: lha'i rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa shin tu nyams dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-10: 'bab chu 'bum snyed kyis brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-11: bya sgra 'byin pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-12: de lha rnams kyis mchod cing bde ba du ma dag myong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-13: ri'i gsab gseb de dag na rin po che'i 'od kyi phreng ba lang long 'bar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-14: shin tu bde ba rnam pa du ma dag mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-15: skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-16: bag med pa rnam pa du mas yid phrogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-17: 'dod pa la sems chags pa rnams 'dod pa'i mes bsregs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-18: yid 'byung ba'i rten dbang po lnga las byung ba'i me lce lnga po des sreg par byed kyang mi rig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434a-20: bshes gnyen gyi gzugs can dgra ma rungs pa de dang yang lhan cig dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-0: de ltar lha de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad par ma gyur @434b pa de srid du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-1: lha de rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-3: dga' mgur spyod par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-4: dug gi chu bos ded par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-5: de dag zad nas las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-7: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-8: gal te brgya la las legs par byas pa gzhan zhig gis mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na; de las de dang rgyu mthun par rtag tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-9: byad gzugs bzang po dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-10: yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i rigs su skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-11: skye po thams cad kyis bkur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-12: tshe gcig gi bar du rgyal po yang gnang chen byed par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-13: de nas dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-14: lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-15: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-16: der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-17: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-18: dge ba sems bzang po dang ldan pa rgyu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-19: 'bras bu la shin tu yid ches pa gang gis tshul khrims rnam pa bdun bsrungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-20: sems can la snying rjes brlan pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:434b-21: sdig pa'i grogs po dang mi 'dre ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-0: mi dge ba spyod pa dang lhan cig smra @435a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-2: dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu dad pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-3: yid zhi zhing yid shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa blo ma g-yengs shing ma 'dres par gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-4: ya mtshan can 'dod nas rigs nas rigs su mi 'gro ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-5: sems can thams cad la snyan par smra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-8: bla ma rnams la rim gror byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-9: dam pa'i chos nyan cing lta ba'i ngang tshul can du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-11: tshul khrims ci nus su bsrung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-12: de lam du 'gro ba na gzhan gyi rtsva tsam yang rku sems dag gis len par mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-14: srog chags dun dhu bha rnams la'ang lta zhing rtog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-15: 'di ltar bdag gis de dag gsad par mi bya'o snyam nas gang gi phyir srog chags thams cad kyis gces chen dam pa ni srog yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-16: gzhi de yid la rtse gcig tu byas nas srog chags rnams la rab tu 'bad de srung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-17: ji ltar na srog gcod pa spangs pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-18: kha zas kyi bde bar bya ba'i don du gal te sha'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-19: kha zas gzhan zhig blangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435a-20: gang gis de'i srog chad de gzhan du 'gyur ba de'ang tsha ba'i rkyen nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-0: yun ring du lon pa'i rkyen gyis srin bus gang la srin bu de dag de nas phyung na ni gor ma chag par 'chi bar 'gyur bas @435b bdag ni shi yang sla yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-1: srog chags 'di dag ni 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing srog chags rnams kyi srog chad par ma gyur cig snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-2: de bdag nyid kyi srog yongs su gtong bar byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-3: kha zas de dag las srin bu 'byin par mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-4: de ltar skyes bu dam pa de kha na ma tho ba rdul tsam la yang 'jigs par lta zhing rgyu tshol ba lhur byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-5: ji ltar nam byin par len pa spangs pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-6: de ltar skyes bu dge ba sems can thams cad la phan pa lhur byed pa de gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyi don du yongs su bzung ba de las ma byin par len par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-9: grong rdal dag la gdab par bsdobs pa'i ba lang gi lci ba'i thal ba tsam yang len par mi byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-10: de ltar ma byin par len pa shin tu phra mo'ang spong bar byed la tshul khrims ma 'dres pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-11: ma rnogs pa sdig pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-12: skyon med pa la spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-13: de de ltar spyod spyod pa las lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang ma 'dres pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:435b-14: der skyes nas kyang shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-0: lus nyi ma bas lhag la rang gi 'od dang ldan pa'i lha de las legs par byas shing byas pa bsags pa so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bus lha'i bde ba du ma dag @436a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-4: lha 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba de rin po che sna bdun gyi tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-5: nags tshal bsten par bya ba rnams kyi nang na lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig dga' bar byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-6: de ltar shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa yongs su spyod pa de res 'ga' tshal ro brgya mchog gis bsten pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-7: des de mngon par mthong nas lhag par dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-8: lha de rnams kyis mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-10: gang gi tshal 'di tshal gzhan dag pas lhag par mdzes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-18: sa rnam par phye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-20: ri dvags las khyad par 'phags pa'i rgyu gang yin zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-21: sngon gyi lha gzhan zhig gis tshig de thos nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-22: 'di ltar bdag cag gis gzhan dang gzhan dag las 'di skad ces thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-23: 'di ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nga las nu zhes bya ba gling bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436a-24: gling bar rnams su lo 'bum phrag du mar spyod kyang 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-0: 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med pa de rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lam na 'khor los drangs @436b nas lha'i 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-1: de mi'i bgrang ba'i tshul gyis lo 'bum phrag du mar nye bar 'tsho yang 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-2: de gar yang 'dod pas chog mi shes nas lha'i 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-3: brgya byin gyi stan gyi phyed la 'dug kyang 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-4: de gang gi tshe skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du 'gro la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-5: de 'dug pa'i dga' sbyong byed du tshal 'dir 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-6: tshal 'di ni yon tan du ma dang ldan zhing bsten pa du ma dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-7: rgyu des na yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i tshal 'di ni da dung du lhag par nyams dga' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-8: rgyal po nga las nu brgya byin gyi stan la 'dug pa de yang rang gis byas pa'i las zad pa dang lha'i gnas de nas lhung ngo zhes bdag cag gis gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-10: gzhan du na bdag cag gis tshal 'di mngon sum du mthong ba ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-11: de ltar tshal 'di ni da dung du 'di ltar shin tu 'byor pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-12: de nas lha de rnams kyis tshig de thos pa dang ngo mtshar dang bral ba rab tu dga' ba'i yid sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-14: dga' mgur spyod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:436b-15: 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga po du ma dang ldan pa'i yid kyis tshal der 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-0: de ltar 'gro ba na de'i bya shin @437a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-1: tu rtse ba zhes bya ba las legs par byas pas bskul ba des lha de la 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-2: de yi rgyu ste sred pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-3: 'dod pa rnams la ngoms mi myong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-4: sred pas ngoms pa skyed byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-5: yid nyid ngoms par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-7: skye bo kun gyis shes par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-8: de bas de yi lan bya ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-9: thabs rnams kun gyis mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-10: shin tu dus ni ring nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-11: bde ba du ma dag spyad nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-12: nges par lhung bar 'gyur bas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-13: de lta bas na chos la 'bod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-14: chos gcig kho na skyabs kyi mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-15: chos gcig kho na rten gyi mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-18: chos spyod chos la spyod byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-19: chos nyid la ni sten byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-20: de ni bde las bde 'gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-21: sdug bsngal rjes su mthong mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-22: chos ma yin par spyod pa'i mi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-23: gang tshe chos min sten byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-24: sems can dmyal bar de rtag tu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-25: yang dang yang du sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-26: ji tsam gnas rnams bstan pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-27: de tsam brgya byin lha yul la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-28: brgya byin gnas ni gzhan med de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-29: 'di ltar de dag nges pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-30: sum cu rtsa gsum kun nas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-31: gang na lha rnams 'chi med dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-32: log par ltung ba'i las med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-33: de ni phyogs 'ga' yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437a-34: rgyu rnams du mar 'gro ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-0: @437b snying po nges pa sna tshogs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-1: brgya byin chos ni ston byed kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-2: lha rnams sten par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-3: mkhas pa las ni koo shi ka /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-4: mdzod yin phyir na lus yin la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-5: padma la ni dga' bas na; ;sdig pa'ang rnam par spong bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-6: de ni chos rnams rtag tu 'chad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-7: lha rnams kyi ni pha 'dra yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-8: bag med pa yis sems 'khrugs shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-9: rmongs pa de dag 'dzin mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-10: de ltar lha de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-11: bya rnams kyis brjod pa thos par gyur du zin kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-12: ngo bo nyid kyis bag med pas kun nas phrogs pa'i sems yin pa'i phyir skyo ba skye bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-13: des de dag rnams la rtsi bgrang yang ma byas par slar nyid kyang de ltar ba'i yul gyi bde ba rnams kyis dga' bar byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-14: gzhan mthong ba ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-15: ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa so sor myong bar 'gyur ba'i legs par byas pa'i las de dag rnams zad par ma gyur pa'i dus de srid du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-16: lha'i rigs de dag rnams su 'dod pa'i yul lnga la dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-17: phyi nas ni lha'i 'jig rten de dag las 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-18: shi 'phos nas kyang ji ltar las kyi nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-20: dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:437b-21: gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mthun par gyur pa mi rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-0: de rtag tu yang mchog tu @438a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-2: mchog tu dge legs dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-3: longs spyod mchog dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-4: shin tu gzugs bzang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-5: skye bo rnams thams cad byams par yang las de'i rgyu mthun pas 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-7: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis la kun tu lta bar byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-8: sa gcig gi phyogs kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-9: sum cu rtsa bzhi par gyur pa ni des mthong ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-10: ji srid du lha dang bcas pa'i sa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gsum po de dag tsam dang ldan pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-11: 'di dag rnams kyi sa gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-12: brgya byin yang de snyed cig la nus pa dang ldan pa yin zhing de tsam la stobs dang ldan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-13: de dag las dga' bar 'gyur ba gzhan ni med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-14: 'di sa dang por lha'i rigs 'di dag rnams la kun tu lta bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-16: 'bras bu cha 'dra bar rjes su 'brel bar las kyi 'bras bu mthong ba dang yang dag par ldan pa des rnams thams cad so so so la'ang kun tu bltas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-17: 'khor ba la kun nas yid 'byung bar 'gyur te; 'chi 'pho dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-19: sdug pa rnams dang rnam par 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438a-20: mi mthun pa rnams dang kun tu phrad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-0: 'chi ba rnams kyi ngam grog @438b tu gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-1: shin tu nyam nga ba'i 'jigs pa du ma rnams la nges par zhugs pa yin par mngon du legs par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-2: rnam pa gcig la'ang sdug bsngal gyi chu bo dum rnams yin zhing sreg bzhin pa rnams kun nas mngon par mthong bas nges par skyo ba skye ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-4: bdag cag gi 'jig rten ni shin tu nyam thag pa la zhugs nas bgrod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-9: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'i ngam grog rnams su bying bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-10: 'on kyang kun tu rtogs pa'ang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-11: 'khor ba las ni nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i thabs kyang yod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-16: yongs su mi 'gyur bar gyur pa yang cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-17: byis pa rnams ni phal cher rmongs pa'i phyir na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-18: kun tu rig pa'ang ma yin pas lus kyi don du nyes par spyad pa mang po rnams rab tu 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-19: 'on kyang lus ni rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-20: nyes par spyod pa'i las de dag rnams ni phyi bzhin kho nar rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-21: de nas de'i tshe na dge slong des tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa ji ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-22: mal cha stan sogs bsnyen bkur gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-23: ma lus bcom par gyur pa yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:438b-24: bdag gir byed mkhan bdag lus las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-2: byas pa chud gzon mi bzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-3: rtag par glags ni tshol byed pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-4: lus po dgra bo'i don du ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-5: mkhas rnams sdig pa ga la byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-6: nang gi tshang dang don med pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-7: mang po rnams ni rtag 'byed cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-8: mi gtsang phung por gyur pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-9: lus shes mngon par brjod pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-10: 'chi ba nye bar gnas pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-11: de nyid dpyod pa por rig bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-12: gson pa skad cig las gong du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-14: skad cig re rer lus 'di ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-15: rnying par 'gyur zhing slar ldog med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-16: de lta na yang sems med pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-17: byis pa lang tsho'i rgyags pas bslus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-18: nor stong rgyags pa dregs pa yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-19: bdag la phan pa mi rnams byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-20: de ni 'chi bar nyer phyogs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-21: de bzhin de yang sdig pas sreg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-22: gang la rtag par sbyin gtong dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-23: nyer longs spyod pa'i sems med pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-24: nor de 'jungs pas yongs bsrungs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-25: de dag chud ni 'dza' ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-26: gang zhig dam pa'i sems kyis za //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-27: bla ma rnams la'ang sbyin byed pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-28: nor de rnams ni mdzes par mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-29: bzlog pa rnams ni rtsva dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-30: sbyin pa dri ma med sbyin na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-32: nor de nyam chung rnams kyi stobs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-33: dmus long rnams la mig bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439a-34: tshul khrims rnam bdun bzang po ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-0: go @439b 'phang slu ba med pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-1: tshul khrims kyis ni bsrungs gyur pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-2: skyes bu lha yi nang du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-3: mchog tu rgya che'i shes ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-4: rtag tu nyon mongs 'joms la dga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-5: des na 'chi ba kun bcad nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-7: srid mtsho shin tu 'jigs chen la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-8: de ltar sa zam de dag mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-9: bzhon pa de dag la zhon pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-10: sems ldan pha rol pha rol sgrol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-13: shes rab rnams kyi 'bras bu mngon par shes par 'gyur ba de kho na nyid mthong ba dang ldan pa rab tu 'gro bar 'dod pa'i dge slong des /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-14: de dag rnams legs par mngon par mthong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-15: ji ltar dge slong des gzhan bco brgyad pa 'di la kun tu gnas nas 'khor ba rnams thams cad nges par yid 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-16: mya ngan las 'das pa la spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-17: bdud kyi yul la 'dod par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-18: gzhi de dag rnams rig par gyur nas kyang sa bla ba'i lha rnams kyis bar snang la rgyu ba'i lha rnams la mngon du shes par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-19: de dag rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa bzhi po rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-20: de dag gis kyang rgyal chen rigs bzhi pa rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-21: de dag gi rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:439b-22: de dag rnams kyis kyang 'thab bral ba rnams la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-0: de ltar ji srid du 'od gsal ba rnams @440a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-1: kyi bar du kun tu rig par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-2: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi sa rnams rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-5: las kyi 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i 'thab bral ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-6: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams gang yin pa don rtag tu rgyu dang 'bras bu las 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-8: dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-9: spro ba mi ldog pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams la kun tu lta ba ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi steng gi lha gzi brjid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-13: tshe tshad kyis lhag par gnas pa rnams su yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-14: ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams las sngon gyi thabs kyis ches khyad par du 'phags par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-15: las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-16: ches bla lhag pa ni 'thab bral ba zhes bya ba yin par des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-17: de ltar yang tshul khrims rnam pa sna tshogs kyis der skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440a-20: 'dod pa log par g-yem pa rnam par spangs shing legs par bsgoms la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-0: 'phags pa'i skye bo thams cad dgyes pa rtag tu @440b tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa dang ldan pas de'i rjes thogs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i rtsa lag tu gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-1: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i zam par gyur pa'i tshul khrims kyi zam pa de la zhon pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-2: srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu sgrol ba'i rnal 'byor pa de kho na nyid sems pa po rang gi tshul khrims rnam pa bdun dang ldan pa'i dman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-4: khyad du 'phags pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-6: chos kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'thab bral gyi lha rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-8: ri'i rgyal po ri rab lhun po'i drung na 'thab bral gyi lha rnams ji tsam gyis 'phang du mtho ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-10: gzi brjid ci lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-11: mtho ba'i gnas kyis khyad par ci lta bus rab tu gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-12: 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis rnams kyang ci tsam zhig yod pa'ang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-13: ci ltar srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-14: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-15: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa rnam par spong ba bsten cing bsgoms la lan mang du byas shing gzhan rnams la'ang bsten cing bkod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:440b-17: gzhan la phan pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis gnas de 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-0: de'i 'phang du mtho ba la kun tu lta bar byed pa na ji ltar drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis lhag pa'i dpag tshad stong phrag @441a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-1: brgyar mtho bar 'jug pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-2: 'thab bral ni lhun po las nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis mtho ba de dag gis ji snyed cig yod pa des ji lta ba bzhin du sa rnams mthong ba ni sa rnams kyang nyi shu rtsa bdun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-3: dpag tshad stong phrag lngar 'thab bral de nam mkha' la kun tu gnas te sprin bzhin du nye 'khor rlung gis 'degs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-4: ji ltar sa 'di 'degs pa rtsa ba nas rlung gis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-7: de kho na bzhin du rlung 'khrigs pa zhes bya bas phyogs gcig nas gang gis 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi phung po sprin dang 'dra bar 'degs pa'i sa nyi shu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-9: rab kyi shugs kyi bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-10: rgyun gnas na rnam par rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-13: rab tu rnam par 'dres pa'i khor yug na rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-19: yang dag par ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-23: bde ba rab tu 'phel ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-24: ri'i tshogs na rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-25: rnam pa sna tshogs par rnam par bkra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-26: zla ba mthong bar 'dod pa'i tshad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441a-27: khor yug la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-0: bsam gtan @441b sgra'i bya bas dben pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-3: tshogs pa rgyu ba na rnam par rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-4: rang gi yul bar rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-5: rang gi lus kyi rgyags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-6: nga rgyal rtags kyi gzi brjid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-7: skyed mos tshal gyi mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-8: nags tshal gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-9: sa nyi shu rtsa bdun po de dag go ///
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-10: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-11: bam po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-12: de rnams su 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag mu su lun dha zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed pa ni ji ltar rgyal chen rigs bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-13: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi brgya byin yin pa de ltar mu su lun dha 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-14: chos la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa brgya byin pas stong 'gyur gyi chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-16: bde bas mtho ba de'i lus kyi tshad ni dpag tshad lnga pa 'od kyi rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-17: brgya byin ni rgyang grags gcig yin par 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-18: 'thab bral ba rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa rgyal po mu su lun dha ni koo shi ka las khyad par du 'phags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-19: de'i lus gcig gi lus kyi yan lag de'ang brgya byin stong gis kyang bsgrun du med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:441b-20: rgyu'i khyad par gyis 'bras bu yang khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-0: de ltar gyur pa yang 'dir ji lta bar dge slong gis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bsnyad @442a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-1: pa; ji ltar khu ru chung ba'i gru //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-2: 'phyo zhing gting du mi nub pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-3: de bzhin sdig chung skyes bu ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-4: steng nas gting du 'byin pa min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-5: ji ltar ljon shing brten 'gyur ltar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-7: de ltar dge slong de 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi las dang 'bras bu'i rgyu rkyen gyis bde ba thob pa'i bya ba la rnam par lta bar byed pa ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams ni ri chen po bzhir ji lta bar des mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-8: ri thams cad kyang dpag tshad stong phrag bcu pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-9: de la ri rnams kyi ming ni 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-13: rab tu dang ba chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-14: bar yangs pa zhes bya ba dang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-15: ri chen po de rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-16: sa gzhan gyi ri ni ma gtogs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-17: ri rnams kyang rnam pa du mar kha dog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-18: dbyibs du ma las yon tan du ma'i bdag nyid chen po 'dzin pa'i ri stong phrag du ma lha'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-19: ldan pa nye 'khor 'thab bral ba'i lhas kun tu gang ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-20: de las nyi shu rtsa bdun po rnams la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ris gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-25: shing brgya stong phrag du mas khyab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442a-29: ro du mar bya ba phun sum tshogs pa ljon shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-0: @442b padma'i mche'u rnam pa du ma gang gi khyad par gyi sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-4: nye ba'i nags de dag de bzhin du cung zad kyang khyad par med pa ni ji ltar mi'i shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-8: nye ba'i nags kyi dga' ba de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi dga' ba'ang khyad par med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-9: 'thab bral ba rnams dang gang cung zad khyad par gyi rgyu ni rgyu 'bras mang ba nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-10: de ni legs par byas pa'i bsod nams du ma'i rgyu mthun pa'i las de'i 'bras bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-11: gang yang dge ba'i las kyi sprul pa de ni brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-12: las sna tshogs kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba rgyu gang gis nges par ston pa'ang de sems can thams cad kyis brjod par nus pa'ang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-13: rgyu'i ming yang med pa'i las rnams las byung ba de sems can thams cad kyis brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-14: gang gi phyir las rnams kyi rgyu'i tshad kyi ming med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-15: gang gis skal ba mtshungs par gyur pa lha'i rdzas dang yang dag par rab tu ldan par gyur pa de rnams kyi brgya stong gi phyogs gcig phal cher bdag gis 'dir brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:442b-16: rgyu gang gis tshul khrims mi slu ba yin pa'i go skabs kyi 'bras bu de ci nas kyang bstan par bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-0: rgyu gang gis phyir na tshul khrims @443a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-1: spyod pa de dag rab tu spro ba skyed pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-2: gang yang ye shes dang ldan pa de dag bcu 'gyur gyis rab tu spro bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-3: rgyu gang gis tshul khrims dang shes rab dag khyad chen po yod pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-4: tshul khrims kyis ni lhar skye la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-5: shes rab kyis ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-6: de ltar tshul khrims kyi yon tan brjod na shes rab can rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-7: tshul khrims gang la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu 'byung na shes rab kyis bdag cag la cir yang 'gyur ro zhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-8: gzhan yang rab tu spro ba bskyed pas shes rab rtsom pa'i rtsol ba byed la byas pas kyang srid pa la chags pa'i bsngags par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-9: gzhan yang rgyu mtshan gzhan gyis kyang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-10: ji ltar gang la rnam pa 'di lta bur yun ring du gnas pa gnod pa nyung ba rnams la yang rnam par 'jig pa 'byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-11: gang yang mi rnams brgyal ba'i 'dod pa ni nyes dmigs dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-13: g-yo ba nye bar 'tshe ba thun mong ba rgya chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-16: rgyal po'i chad pa la sogs pa'i rgud pa du ma thabs ma yin pa'i gzhir gyur pa la lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443a-17: des na rgyu 'dis kyang mtho ris kyi gtam mngon par brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-1: gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams 'di ltar rgyu gzhan ni ci'ang med kyi dbang phyug gis sprul pa'o snyam du sems pa de dag gis sprul pa 'gag par bya ba'i don du 'bras bu bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-2: rgyu med par skye bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu ni yod pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-3: gzhan gyi bka' drin gyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-4: rgyu 'bras dag 'dod rgyal ba ma yin gyi 'dra ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-5: gzhan gyi rgyu gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-6: legs par byas pa'i las rgyur gyur pas dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba ni med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-7: mdzes pa ma yin pa'i las rgyur gyur pas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba ni med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-8: des na de ltar rgyu 'bras kyi gzhir gyur pas ni sbyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-12: des pa la gnas pa'i ngo bo las rnams kyi mtho ris kyi gtam 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-13: gnyis dag gi gtam bya bar mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-18: de las 'di ni de'i phyogs gcig gi las rnams kyi dpe brjod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:443b-21: 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa shes pa de 'thab bral ba rnams kyi sa la kun tu lta bar byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-0: des thos pa las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis @444a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-1: 'thab bral ba rnams kyis rab kyi shugs zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-2: der las gang gis sems can skye ba'ang des thos pa las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis mthong ba ni ji ltar skyes bu dam pa gang gis tshul khrims la spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-3: kha na ma tho ba cung zad tsam la'ang 'jigs par lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-5: drang po'i rang bzhin can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-7: gzhan gdung bar mi byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-8: yang dag pa'i lta ba can yang dag pa'i lta ba sngon du btang bas rtag tu yang rmongs pa ma yin pa'i blos mi rtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-11: bdag med par 'jig rten 'di la lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-14: dge 'dun rnams rjes su dran pa la zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-16: ma byin par len pa srung bar gyur pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-17: 'dod pa log par g-yem pa'ang mi ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444a-18: yid las byas nas byung ba ni ji ltar gzhan dang ldan pas kun tu ldan nas 'khrig pas rtag tu mngon par zhen cing kun nas rab tu 'jug pa 'di ni 'dod pa la log par g-yem par brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-0: skyes bu dam pa des de ltar thos nas gal te gzhan dang ldan pas kun nas ldan pa mthong na de la mi @444b sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-3: yang gang dag gis sems shing kun tu rab tu rtog par byed pa de dag kyang rab tu 'gog par byed cing de dag la yang las kyi 'bras bu nye bar ston par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-5: des dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur bas ma byed cig ces de ltar las dang 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid ston pa po gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa gzhan gyis mi bkri ba de ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi 'thab bral gyi lha las 'thab bral gyi sa rab kyi shugs kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-6: der skyes pa ni legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la spyad pa 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-7: de der skyes pa na lha dang lha mo brgya stong gis yongs su bskor nas skyes pa tsam nyid na de bzhin du glu len par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-8: ji ltar legs par gnyid log par rngas legs par slong bar byed pa de bzhin du de skyes pa tsam nyid na rdzus te skyes pa de ltar glu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-9: rnga sgra yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa kun nas bsgrags pas dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-11: brjod pa'i tshad dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-12: snyan par gyur pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-13: dge legs dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-14: zab pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:444b-15: skyes bu thams cad dga' bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-1: phrag brgyad cur rnam par nyams pa med par kun tu sgrogs pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-2: chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-3: kun nas ma 'dres pa dang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-4: shin tu bar yang legs par byas pa'i las spyad pa po rnam pa de lta bu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i glus sad par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-5: de'i rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od dpag tshad lngar khyab ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-6: sngon po ser po dmar po dkar po 'ja' tshon gyi kha dog lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-7: de langs pa tsam nyid na 'od de 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-8: de yang ji ltar rang gi cha byad kyis nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-10: de langs pa na lha brgya stong gis yongs su bskor te rab tu dga' bas gzi brjid kyi nags zhes bya bar der 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-12: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba 'thab bral ba de la'ang me tog gi rigs mi rnyings pa 'di dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-14: mig gi bdud rtsi'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-17: drir bcas pa thos na dga' ba 'di dag gang gi nus par 'gyur ba 'di ni yul phyogs gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-18: gang du de'i ming gzung bar byas pa'i yul de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-19: der me tog gis nam mkha' las dri 'byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-20: zla ba las lhag pa'i kha dog zhes bya ba'i me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445a-21: thams cad du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i me tog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-0: de dag rnams ni shing gi 'dab @445b ma la me tog de rnams skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-1: de bos pa na me tog de rnams phyi bzhin kho nar 'ong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-2: gang la lha de rnams kyi 'dod pas 'gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-3: zhon pa'i bzhon pa rnams ni ljon shing gi bzhon pa la zhon te me tog gi khyim nang na gnas nas gang du 'dod pa der lha rnams nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-4: ji ltar gzhal yas khang nas kun tu rgyu ba'i lha de ltar 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams me tog gi khyim la gnas nas 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-5: 'jig rten ma lus pa mig btsum tsam la 'od 'bar ba dang bcas par gyur par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-7: bar med par 'brel ba'i khyim dga' ba zhes bya ba'i shing gang dag gi nang yang de bzhin du dga' ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-8: gang la nang du lha rnams rjes su zhugs nas dga' bar byed pa'i nags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-10: rdzing bu dang nye ba'i nags de dag thams cad las ches khyad par du dga' bar gyur pa'i ljon shing gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-11: gang dag la gzi brjid 'di dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-12: gal te lha rnams 'dod par gyur na 'thab bral gyi sa de thams cad kyi dpal rnams thams cad gnas der 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:445b-13: shing de dag gi gzi brjid kyis de'ang ljon shing la dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-0: lha de rnams yan lag brgyad pa'i rnga skad mtshungs pa med pas ljon shing de dag rnams la dga' bar byed pa na @446a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-1: yang dri 'byung zhes bya ba'i shing gang dag la mthu 'di dag yod pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-2: lha rnams kyis mngon par 'dod par gyur pa'i dri'i rnam pa de srid kho na'i dri can du shing de 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-3: me tog gi khyim dga' ba zhes bya ba'i shing gang la nang gi khyim dang ldan par lha rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-6: rdzing bur dga' bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-7: de ni sngon po ser po dmar po'i mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-8: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-9: kha dog phun sum tshogs pa de la gang gi tshe lha de 'jug par byed pa de'i tshe shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-10: me tog gang dag rnams kha dog thams cad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-12: de'i kha dog tu lha 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-13: de thams cad mi 'gyur ba'i gos can du mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-14: shing dang me tog rnams kyi mthus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-15: nam mkha' la rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i shing gang gis mig btsum tsam la nam mkha' la dpag tshad brgya stong du 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-16: 'dod pas 'gro ba nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i gzi brjid can rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-17: de ltar gsar du skyes pa'i lha de lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-18: lha mo brgya stong gis yongs su bskor nas rnam pa du ma'i phreng ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446a-20: byug pa'i dpal gyis shin tu brgyan pas shing la kun tu 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-0: de'i mdun na de'i tshe na lha mo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gos rin po che rnam pa du ma 'bar @446b ba; rab tu dga' ba ches lhag pa'i lus can rnams mdun na gar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-3: glu'i sgra sna tshogs pas dpag tshad stong phrag du ma gang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-4: de yang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la spyad pa dang ldan pas de dag rnams kyis blo ni de ltar rnam par snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-5: gang yang cung zad tsam gyis 'dra ba dang sngar mthong ba rnams dper byas par zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-6: ji ltar zla ba'i phyi na skar ma rnams 'gro ba de lta bu las brgya stong gis lha 'di mdzes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-7: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-11: glu mkhan dang bcas pas gang na nags de yod pa der 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-12: nags de'i nye 'khor na bya brgya stong gis kun tu gang ba 'bab chu dang rdzing bu du mas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-14: nyi ma brgya stong bas lhag par gsal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-15: gang la de ltar cung zad tsam 'dra ba'i sgo nas dper brjod byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-16: ji ltar mi rnams na nags mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-19: rdzing bu 'jug ngogs mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i nags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:446b-20: nye ba'i nags rnams kyi khyad par gyi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-0: yang de bzhin du gang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i nags kyis kyang gang yang @447a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-1: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-2: nye ba'i nags kyi dga' bar gyur pa gang yin pa de'i khyad par gyi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do; ;de ltar gong nas gong gi khyad par gyi rim pas dge ba'i las dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-3: mi dge ba'i las rnams las gong nas gong gi dga' ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-4: dge ba dang yang dag par rab tu ldan pa'i sems rtse gcig pas las gzhan mi byed par mthong zhing dge la legs pas rigs pa grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi shes rab kyis kyang phyogs gcig kyang brjod par bya mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-6: mi rtog pa'i yul gyi yul rtogs pa ma yin pa 'di mi rnams thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-7: de bzhin du dbang po dang bcas pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams thams cad kyis lo stong phrag brgyar yang mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis bde ba'i phyogs gcig tsam yang brjod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-9: 'di dag rnams thams cad ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-10: mthong ba'i yang ma yin pa'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-11: gang la dper brjod du byas pa ni nam yang mthong ba yang ma yin la cung zad kyang thos pa yang ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447a-12: phyogs gcig tsam 'dir bsngags pa brjod pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-0: dge ba'i chos @447b la brtson pa'i don du bsngags pa brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-1: dge ba'i chos byas shing bsags pa myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dga' ba dang bde ba thams cad kyi yang phyogs gcig tsam mthong la phyogs gcig pu zhig bsngags par zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-2: ji ltar mkhas shing thams cad la byang ba'i ri mo mkhan nam ri mo mkhan gyi slob mas kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-4: yang na nyi ma bris la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-5: des de'i 'od bri bar bya mi nus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-8: 'ong ba'i spyod pa yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-9: gzi brjid ma yin la 'jam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-10: gdug pa yang ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-11: zla ba'i rnam pa tsam 'ba' zhig mngon par bris par zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-12: de bzhin du 'dri yang 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi bsngags pa'ang brjod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-13: dga' ba'ang brjod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-20: yul gyi bde ba rnams kyang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-23: lha mo dang mnyam par bgrod pa'i bde ba'ang ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-24: cung zad mngon par brjod pa tsam zhig 'dir byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-25: 'dra ba ni cung zad tsam zhig kyang ma byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:447b-26: slar yang lha de skyed mos tshal de dag nyid kyi ltad mo rnam pa du mar dga' ba 'dod pa du ma dang ldan pa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'jug ngogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448a-0: @448a *// skyed mos tshal du ma dang ldan pa'i sa'i cha rnams la rjes su ltar 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448a-1: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rnam par chags pa'i yid can gnas pa med pa'i shugs kyis g-yo ba'i kun tu rtog pa'i chu rlabs kyis bskyod pa'i srid pa'i chu bos khyer bar gyur pas thams cad las mthong na dga' bar gyur pa ni lha'i rigs der rjes su mthong ba la nags de ni 'dod pa'i yon tan du ma phun sum tshogs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448a-6: 'khris shing gi khang bus gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448a-7: sgra du ma 'byin pa'i bya brgya stong gis kun tu gang ba der nye bar 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448a-8: nye bar song nas kyang nye 'khor de na sngar ma mthong ba'i mchog tu phun sum tshogs pa de dang phrad nas kyang de'i lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongs su bskor nas chu klung gi gle'i mu tig gi phye ma'i bye ma la gser dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448a-10: ainda n'i la'i mdog dang mtshungs pa'i sgro can gyi byas gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448a-11: chu klung chen po'i ngos na rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ljon shing gis gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448a-12: chu klung gi 'gram gyi gad pa dga' ba rab kyi mchog tu skyid pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas dga' zhing rtse bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448b-0: zhabs 'bring du ma yang byed pas dus shin tu ring bar de de na dga' bar byas nas gang na @448b rin po che'i 'gram zhes bya ba'i nags yod pa der skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448b-1: des nags de mthong ba las gzhi'i cha ni rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gang la rin po che'i rang bzhin du gyur pa thams cad dga' ba'i ri'i rtse mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448b-5: padma'i rdzing bu du ma dga' bar gyur pa la bung ba brgya stong gis nye bar mdzes par byas pas gzhi kun gyi cha shas ni mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa dang ri'i gseb dag mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448b-6: des legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i dbang po dang ldan pa de rin po che'i nye ba'i gnas la lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i dbus na rtse zhing dga' la kun tu spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448b-7: 'thab bral ba rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'i bde ba dge ba'i rtsa bas bskrun pa la nye bar longs spyod par rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang mthun par de'i 'bras bu rnams kyang rnam pa du mar de bzhin du 'gyur ro; ;de na yang rnam pa brgya stong du ma'i rnam par rtog pa'i bde ba thams cad las 'phags pa nyams su myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448b-9: de la'ang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyad nas gang na 'jug ngogs med pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'thab bral ba rnams kyi sa'i cha der 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:448b-10: de na yang dga' ba'i yon tan du ma phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bgrod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449a-1: pa sna tshogs pa'i lha'i glu mkhan gyi glu dang yang dag par ldan pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449a-2: gang yang brjod par mi nus pa ni sred pa dang ldan pa'i mes snying tshig pa rnams kun tu rtog pa'i shugs kyis kun tu 'khrul pa'i blo gar yang gnas pa med pas yul la gdung bar smig rgyu ba'i sems spre'u yis lha'i bde ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa bag med pas bud med lta ba la ched cher byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449a-3: rtag tu dga' ba du ma'i chu gang dag gis kyang rtag tu 'khor bar byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449a-4: 'thab bral gyi lha'i ris rnams kyi nye 'khor du rin po che'i padma phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba ni thun mong ba ma yin pa mchog tu dga' ba'i yul gyi bde ba rnam pa du ma gzhan gyi mthu stobs kyis dbrog tu med pas kyang dbang po rnams mi tshim mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449a-5: ji lta ji ltar dga' ba de lta de ltar yongs su smin la dga' bar gyur pa'i padma gang dag kho na bsams pa de lta de ltar nyid du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449a-6: legs par byas pa las byas pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449a-7: de nas mu su lun dha 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449a-9: bdag lha 'di dag rnams dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la gnas par bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449b-0: de nas sems bskyed pa tsam nyid kyis 'thab bral ba'i lha'i mnga' bdag mu su lun dha lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su @449b bskor nas lha'i tshogs thams cad dang bcas pa nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449b-1: de nam mkha' la de ltar 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449b-3: lha de rnams de ltar cung zad kyang mi g-yo zhing mi brjod la lus kyi cha 'ga' zhig cung zad kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba'ang med par ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449b-4: de nas lha thams cad kyang padma la zhon nas nam mkha' la 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449b-5: rnga skad yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yongs su bskor nas gar dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449b-7: kun tu spyod pa dang ldan pa lha'i bde bas yongs su rgyas par 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas legs par gtad cing yang dag par ldan par gyur pa de ltar skyid par gyur pa'i lha padma'i 'dab ma dag la zhon nas 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449b-8: ji ltar yang dag pa'i gnas de ltar mnan la nem la bteg na 'phar bar gyur pa'i rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams la zhon nas gong ma gong ma'i 'dab ma rnams lhung ba de mdzes pa ni ji ltar mi rnams kyi yul na nang nub kyi thun mtshams kyi dus na thams cad zangs bzhin du nam mkha' shin tu rnam par snang ba la padma de'ang de ltar shin tu 'bar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:449b-9: lha de thams cad phan tshun du bde ba dang ldan pas gang na ku be ra'i tshogs kyi nags zhes bya ba'i nags na shin tu 'jam zhing mtho ba'i ri'i rtse mo der dga' ba rgyu ra 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-0: de nas ri de'i rtse mo la lha de dag gis @450a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-1: slebs nas rin po che bdun gyi 'bab chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-3: rdzing bu du mas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa padma'i nags yongs su rgyas par mdzes par gyur pa ni nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer bas ches lhag par gyur pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid can de na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-5: lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-6: rin po che'i rang bzhin du ma nyi ma dang mdog mtshungs pa'i shing gis nye bar mdzes par 'jam zhing mtho ba'i ri de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-7: padma der lha de dag rnams kyis phyin nas ri de'i nags na gar byed cing phan tshun du kun tu spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-8: de nas yang 'dab ma stong phrag brgya pa'i padma la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-9: de rnams padma de dag rnams la kun tu zhugs nas phyir yang 'jam zhing mtho ba'i ri de la 'dzeg go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-10: bde ba la spyad pa'i don du 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag mu su lun dha yang lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas nas gang na lha de dag rnams dga' mgur kun tu spyod pa der 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-11: lha de dag rnams kyis kyang de mngon du legs par mthong nas yid rab tu dga' bar gyur pa'i yid dang ldan pas gar byed par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-12: dgod par yang byed cing kun tu spyod par yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450a-13: 'thab bral gyi bdag po mu su lun dha de yang de ltar rab kyi mchog tu yid dga' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450b-0: lha rnams rang gi las dbang por gyur pa rang gi las kyi 'bras @450b bu'i skye gnas pa de las de dag rnams kyis lha dman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450b-2: khyad du 'phags pa dman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450b-8: khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450b-9: 'thab bral gyi lha thams cad pas dman pa'i bde ba gang yin pa de'ang bcu drug char bgrang ba'i rim pas kyang brgya byin la nam yang mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450b-10: re zhig brgya byin de nyid kyi bde ba'ang brjod par mi nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450b-11: ci yang brgya phrag sum 'gyur du las kyi mtha' la spyod pa'i 'thab bral ba rnams kyi rdzogs par nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450b-12: de nyid ni dge ba kun tu rgyas pa'i legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyi yang 'bras bu de 'ba' zhig de ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams rab tu dga' ba bskyed par bya ba'i don du 'thab bral gyi lha 'di rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i dga' ba rnam pa du ma'i sgo nas bsngags pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450b-13: srid pa 'ba' zhig mngon par zhen pas ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450b-15: 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag mu su lun dha rnam pa sna tshogs pa brgya stong du ma'i rnam par rtog par yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i dpe med pa'i bde ba padma 'di rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:450b-16: 'jam zhing mtho ba rin po che bdun gyi ri de la rnyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451a-0: 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag 'di ltar rjes su rnam par sems @451a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451a-3: bdag gang yang padma chen po 'di'i nang du 'jug par bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451a-4: bde ba'i mchog gis gnas par bya ba'i don du lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451a-5: btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang bcas pa rnams kyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451a-6: de nas 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag mu su lun dha lte ba la gnas pa tsam kho nas de'i legs par byas pa'i las kyis snying po de phyir zhing nyid du kha bye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451a-7: lte ba de'ang gang de'i lte ba de thams cad kyi nang du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451a-8: de nas lte ba de'i nye 'khor kun las gzhan du gyur pa'i bug pa byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451a-9: rnam pa de lta bu'i 'od rnams kyang padma chen po de'i lte ba las kun nas byung ba'i lha de dag rnams kyis rnam pa ji lta bu'i gzhan du sngar ma mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451a-11: nye 'khor du yang de dpag tshad brgya bas ches lhag pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba la 'od kha dog du ma 'bar ba lta bur snang ba'o; ;de nas lha de rnams dang 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag mu su lun dha yang gcig tu ngo mtshar ba'i ca co'i sgra kun tu 'byin pa ni 'od 'di dag rnams padma gang gi lte ba las byung bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451a-12: de nas 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag gis lha de dag rnams la 'di skad du bgros par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-0: padma chen po 'di'i 'od zer rnam pa @451b 'di lta bu kun nas byung zhing 'phro ba la ji lta ba bzhin du ltos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-2: ji lta ba bzhin du bdag cag gis mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-3: 'di dag mchog tu ngo mtshar che ba'i 'od byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-4: de nas yang 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag gis yang 'gro bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-5: ji ltar gang yang nyung du na bdag cag yul ljongs dang bcas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis padma chen po 'di'i nang gi lte ba dus ring du blta bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-6: de nas lha de dag rnams thams cad yid mthun par gyur pas de la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-7: ji ltar 'thab bral ba'i mnga' bdag gis gsungs pa de ltar bdag cag rnams kyis bya ba yin pas na de ltar bdag cag rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pa padma chen po 'di'i nang du lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-8: lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba mthun par bdag cag 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag dang bcas pa padma chen po 'di'i nang gang yin pa der 'jug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-9: de nas lha de dag rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-10: mu su lun dha de yang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-11: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rnams gang na lte ba yod pa der legs par song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-12: padma'i nang lta bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar ba'i don du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:451b-13: de nas snying po de'i bug pa der phyin nas bug pa de nyid du zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-0: ji ltar btso ma'i gser mchog gi mdog nyi ma'i 'od dang lhan cig tu phan tshun spros par @452a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-1: gyur pa nam mkha' la nyi ma'i zla dang ldan par gyur pa de bzhin du padma chen po de'i gzi brjid kyi khyad par mthong bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-2: lha de dag rnams kyis 'od zer de dag rnams ma bzod nas mig kun nas btsums par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-3: mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis nang du zhugs par yang gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-4: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od mtshungs pa med pa 'di ni gang yang bdag cag rnams kyis sngar nas yang mthong ma myong ngo zhes ca co'i sgra yang sgrogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-5: de nas yang lha de dag rnams ches rings par mu su lun dha dang por byas nas rjes su 'jug par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-6: mu su lun dha yang mchog tu rangs pa'i yid kyis yid tshim pa med pas lha de dag rnams dang padma'i nang du 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-7: de zhugs pa na mthong ba de'i nang na rin po che brgya stong du ma 'od rnam pa gsal bar byed pa'i skyed mos tshal brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-8: 'od dang ldan pa'i khang bzang brgya stong du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-9: 'od 'bar ba'i ljon shing brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-10: rin po che bdun gyi skyed shing gi nags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-11: nye ba'i nags brgya stong du mas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452a-13: dbyibs du ma dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya che ba brgya stong gi bya'i tshogs kyis kyang gang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-0: rtsed mo'i ri brgya phrag du ma @452b dang ldan pa; rdzing bu brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-1: gzhal med khang brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-2: 'bab chu brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-7: khrad khrod brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-8: ji skad du brjod pa'i dngos po thams cad kyang rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin las byas pa'i mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-10: tshad kyi rnam pa mngon par dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-11: ji ltar de yang 'thab bral gyi bdag po mu su lun dhas kyang sngar ma mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-12: 'thab bral gyi lha gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-13: de las padma gang gi nang gi mtshe'u rnams ni rab tu dang ba'i lha rdzas kyi chu yin la de dag gi 'gram rnams la la ni shel gyi rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-14: la la ni dngul gyi rdo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-16: 'ga' zhig ni gser btso ma'i rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-17: yang la la ni ainda n'i la'i rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-18: la la ni padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-19: 'ga' zhig ni chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar byas pa rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-20: de bzhin du gang yang padma'i rdzing bu de rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi padma rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par gyur pa rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-21: 'ga' zhig ni kha dog gcig pa'i padmas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:452b-22: 'ga' zhig ni rnam pa du ma'i mdog gi 'dab ma'i padmas nye bar mdzes pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-4: dkar po'i mdog gi mtsho las skyes pa'i padmas nye bar mdzes par byas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-5: de la gang 'dab ma sngon po de ni dri ma med pa'i ainda n'i la'i rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-6: gang ser po de ni gser gyi rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-7: gang dkar po de ni dngul gyi rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-8: gang dmar po de ni padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-9: de ltar padma chen po de'i nang na rnam pa du ma'i padma yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-10: de nas lha de rnams rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bung ba brgya stong gis yongs su gang ba'i padma der nye bar bzung nas gzhan yang gang na de dag dga' ba chen por gyur pa'i nags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-11: nye ba'i nags de dang legs par ldan pa gang yin pa'i dga' ba chen po der 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-12: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnga sgra sgrogs pa'i glu sgras rnar snyan pas yid tshim pa med par rab tu dga' ba'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-13: lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453a-14: ku co'i sgras yid tshim pa med pa de rnams kyis bgrod pa'i nags de ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya brgya stong gis dga' bar gyur pa'i sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453b-0: rin po che sna bdun gyis nye bar mdzes pa'i sa gzhi'i cha kun kyang mnan na nem zhing bteg na 'phar ba mchog tu 'jam pa de dag rnams la'ang rnam par @453b rgyu bar byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453b-1: thams cad nas kyang yid kun tu rangs shing dga' ba ni gong ma gong ma de dag rnams mthong ba na dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453b-2: phan tshun du grogs kyi bya ba dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453b-3: phan tshun du kun nas chags pa'i yid dang ldan pa dag gis kyang dga' bar yang 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453b-4: nye ba'i nags de la'ang dus shin tu yun ring du bag med par gnas pa'i phan tshun mchog tu kun dga' ba'i bag med par gnas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453b-6: gang na skyed mos tshal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin yod pa der 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453b-7: rnga skad yan lag lnga dang ldan pas sna tshogs pa'i rol mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453b-8: glus rab tu dga' ba dang ldan pa'i yid can rnams 'dod pa drug la rnam par chags pas lta ba la brkam par gyur pa rgyags pa la don gcig pas bag med par rnam par spyod par yang byed pa dang rtsa bar gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453b-9: kun tu spyod par yang gyur pa rnams kyis der nye bar phyin nas kyang 'od zer rnams mthong bar gyur pa ni ji ltar nyi ma'i phreng ba rnams gang yin pa de ltar 'od rnams yin par rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:453b-10: de srid kyi 'od zer 'bar ba nyid yin pa'i yul phyogs kyi nye 'khor na yon tan gzhan yang lha de dag gis mthong ba rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454a-1: dkar po rnams du ma nyid mthong ba'i yul phyogs de dag gis gzhi'i cha de dag rnams kun nas dga' ba de rnams la yang de rnam pa du mar mngon par dga' bar byas nas gang na rtsed mo'i ri yod pa der nye bar 'gro bar byed do //
