K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454a-2: slar yang yul gyi bde ba ngoms mi shes pas de dag rnams kyang rtsed mo'i ri rnams rin po che bdun gyi khams kyis rnam par brgyan pa la gnas du ma yod pa rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454a-3: de na'ang ljon shing brgya phrag du ma rnam par 'gyur ba dang ldan pa la bya'i tshang dga' bar gyur pa dang ldan pa 'bab chu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454a-9: sman ljongs dang; ri logs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454a-11: klung na ri dvags kyi tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454a-12: padma'i mtshe'us rnam par brgyan pa'i rtsed mo'i ri slebs nas 'phyos te lha rdzas kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bcas shing ldan par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454a-13: phan tshun lhan cig tu lha rdzas kyi cha byad du mas rnam par gsal ba dang bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454a-15: cha byad kyis mdzes pa'i lha'i bu mos yongs su bskor ba de la'ang dus shin tu yun ring por yul gyi bde ba ngoms mi shes pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-0: gang na @454b gzhal yas khang gi khang bu'i phreng ba yod pa der nye bar 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-1: khyad par du ngoms mi shes pa'i yul gyi bde ba la dga' bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-2: ngoms mi shes pa'i lha rdzas kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rnam pa du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-3: rnam par rtog pa du mas lha'i 'dod pa kun tu gsal bar byed pa srid pa'i mes legs par gsal bar byas pas rnam pa du mar dga' bar byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-5: lha mo rnams kyi tshogs kyis rnam pa du mar rab tu dga' bar byed pa ni 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag mu su lun dha dang bcas pa de dag rnams padma'i nang nyi ma brgya stong bas ches lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-6: mchog tu zhi zhing gdug pa dang bral ba de la phan tshun du dga' bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-7: mchog tu blta bar dga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-8: mchog tu dbang po lnga bde bar gnas par gyur pa rnams ni mchog tu dge ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-9: mchog tu mdzes pa; 'phags pa'i skye bo rnams shin tu dgyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-10: rnam par rtog pa du mas yul du ma'i bde ba rnams la nye bar longs spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:454b-11: phan tshun du 'dul bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-0: phan tshun du smra bar byed pa la zhugs pa'i yid can rnams phan tshun du gus par byed pa @455a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-1: legs par skyes pas ngoms pa med pa'i sems kyis de rnams de ltar padma 'di'i nang na dus yun ring por dga' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-2: de nas dus nam zhig na yul gyi bde bas ma ngoms par yang ci dga' bar gyur nas phyir byung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-3: snying po'i sgo de nyid nas ji lta ba'i nang du rjes su zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-4: de bzhin du phyir byung nas de mngon par mthong nas dus yun ring por phyir mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-5: yang de kho na nyid mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bya 'jam zhing mtho ba'i ri de'i steng na gnas pa des de mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa ni ji ltar /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-6: gzugs rnams skad cig 'di dag gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-7: na tshod de bzhin skad cig yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-8: de bzhin bde ba zad kyang ni; ;blo gros med pas go ba min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-9: dge ba'i mtshan nyid du ma de'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-10: skye ba 'di dag thams cad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-11: gang tshe dus kyi 'khor lo yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-12: rim par gshegs nas rnam par 'jig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-13: brgya phrag du ma'i mtshan nyid kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-14: ji ltar sngon gyi de nyid dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-15: de ltar skye ba 'di dag kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-16: 'chi bdag rgyal pos pham par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-17: rtag tu bde bas gnas pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-18: bag med yid can de dag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-20: rtsom pas bde ba 'joms byed yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455a-21: bde ba snang ba stobs dang shugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455b-0: @455b mthun pa rnam par 'bral byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455b-1: 'chi bdag rgyal po stobs ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455b-3: gang zhig nye bar 'ong ba po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:455b-4: de dag bag med ces bya rnams //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-2: yon tan du ma de srid dang ldan pa'i rnam pa de lta bu 'thab bral ba rnams kyi lha'i ris 'di rnams na rnam pa de lta bu las rdzas gzhan yod pa ni ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-3: ci ltar de'i nang du 'di ltar thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-4: ji ltar grags pa gser thub ces bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-6: skyes bu 'dul ba; kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-8: mi rnams kyi ston pa 'jig rten du byung bar gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-9: des bstan par gyur pa'i chos ni dang por dge ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-13: tshig 'bru bzang po 'ba' zhig pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-15: yongs su byang ba'i chos ston pa mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-19: 'di ni gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes de ltar rtogs par byed pa'i chos dang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-21: bar du dge ba bstan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-22: de'i gsung rab kyis dzambu'i gling gi yul ljongs stong phrag brgya'i skye bo rab tu mang po rnams kyis bden pa mthong bar 'gyur zhing khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnams la nye bar longs spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460a-23: rim gyis ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-0: de bzhin du bsam gtan @460b bzhi pa thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-1: bsam gtan gsum pa thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-2: ji srid du bsam gtan dang po thob pa'i bar du skyes bu'i mdzad pa dag mdzad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-3: skye bo lhag ma rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bcu la spyod pas chos par gyur pa'i yul ljongs pa bye ba phrag stong ni legs par byas pa'i las kyis mtha' la spyod pa la bkod nas gzigs pa gzhan gang zhig ni nga'i gdul byar gyur pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-4: des mi las shin tu 'das pa'i lha'i mig gis gzigs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-5: ji ltar 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi nang na nga'i gdul bya'i lha yod pa ni de dag gi mnga' bdag tu gyur pa ni so'u myo'i ming can de'i yang dge ba rnams ni nang du nub par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-6: bag med pas kyang bag med par gnas pa de dang nye bar gnas pa'i lha gzhan rnams las kyang gang dag dbang po yongs su smin pa rnams kyang bag med pas bag med par gnas par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-7: de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gser thub de 'jig rten 'dir bzhugs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-8: lha rnams la phan par bzhed pas dang mthun par mdzad pa'i don gyi phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-9: sdug bsngal zad pa'i don du dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:460b-10: bag med pas 'dre ba dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-0: zag pa zad pa stong phrag lngas yongs su bskor nas de 'thab bral na gnas pa rnams thams cad pas kyang mang @461a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-1: bas ches lhag pa nyid kyi 'od phal po che ches lhag par 'phro bar mdzad par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-2: de mngon par mthong nas kyang lha rnams gang dag gis nam yang thams cad mkhyen pa sngar ma mthong ba de dag rnams ches lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-3: sngar med pa'i lha nyid kyi gzugs 'di ni yon tan du mas lhag pa'i gzhan rnams dang 'dra ba ma yin pa'i gzugs 'dis ni lha'i 'jig rten 'di ma lus pa 'od 'dis kun tu bkang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-4: de dang thag nye bar song nas de thos pas kyang mngon par mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-5: lha de dag rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar ba skyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-6: gang yang de'i cha byad ni ji lta bu zhig 'dzin pa yin zhes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-7: gang dag rnams lha 'di dang bsnyen nas gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-8: de nas lha de dag rnams kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i padma'i rdzing bu spangs nas gang na bcom ldan 'das gser thub yod pa der blta bar bya ba'i don du nye bar 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag mngon par gzigs pa dang nam mkha' la 'phags nas bzhugs par gyur to; ;bzhugs nas kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461a-10: yon tan du ma'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-0: de yang lus @461b kyi stod nas chu 'bab pa rnams ni mdog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-2: dri phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de srid dang ldan pa'i khyad par gang dag gis lha'i chu gang yin pa rnams rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-3: lus kyi stod kyi nye 'khor dag nas rnam pa du mar rab tu 'bar bar byed pa'i kha dog du ma dang ldan pa'i mes khyab par gyur pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-8: leb rgan gyi mdog dang ldan pa rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-11: bcom ldan 'das des mdzad par gyur pa rnams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-13: gcig tu gyur nas brgya phrag rnams su 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-14: brgya stong du 'gyur zhing lha'i 'jig rten 'di ma lus par gang bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-16: bdag gi dngos po yang slar gcig tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'dir mdzad par gyur pa la ji ltar lha'i sa de dag rnams gang yin pa de'i phyag gcig gis bteg nas lag pa'i mthil du 'jog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-22: 'bab chu dang ldan pa'i lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'phen par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:461b-23: ji lta ji ltar mig gi yul las shin tu 'da' bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-1: bzhin du bshig nas slar legs par 'jog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-3: bcom ldan 'das de rdzu 'phrul chen po dag mdzad par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-4: de yang ri rnams gang dag las ches che ba'i tshad dang ldan pa de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba nas bteg nas nam mkha' la rnam par 'phen par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-6: nye ba'i nags dang bcas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-9: sman ljongs dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-10: lha'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa rnams kyis ji ltar gang du phyin pa'ang mi shes par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-11: phyir yang de kho na bzhin du 'bebs par byed na yang ci 'dir rkang pa'ang kun tu bskyod par gyur tam zhes de ltar tshogs pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-13: bcom ldan 'das 'dis rdzu 'phrul mdzad par gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-16: rnam par rtog pa du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-18: yon tan sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid kyi dngos po byed pa ni ri'i rtse mo rnams su mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-20: gzhan gyi nang du yang mthong la padma'i rdzing bu rnams kyi nang du'ang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-21: khang bzang gi phreng ba rnams la'ang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462a-22: ljon shing gi rtse mor yang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462b-1: mtshe'u rnams la yang mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462b-3: nye ba'i nags su yang mthong zhing thams cad du bsam gtan dang ldan par gyur pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462b-4: rnam pa du mar yang nam mkha' la gzims cha la longs spyod par mdzad cing phyir yang bzhugs par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462b-5: slar yang nam mkha' la 'chag pa la kun tu sbyor ba mdzad do; ;phyir yang bzhud par mdzad cing bzhugs par yang mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul 'di mdzad par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462b-8: gang dag gi khyad par gyis rnga skad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa 'di ji lta ba bzhin du mdzes pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa de srid kyi gsung dbyangs kyis chos rnams bstan par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462b-9: ci ltar mi'i rnga sgra'i khyad par gyis mi rnams kyi nang na bya rog gi sgra mi mdzes pa de ltar lha'i tshogs thams cad mi mdzes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462b-10: de thos nas kyang lha gang dag rnams glu'i myos pas rgyags pa de thams cad kyang legs par myos pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mdzad par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:462b-14: nam mkha' la lha'i bu mo dang; lha rnams rnam pa de srid dag sprul pa gang dag gi khyad par gyis 'thab bral gyi lha 'di dag rnams srin bu mo khyer dang 'dra ba tsam du'ang mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-6: nye ba'i nags rnams kyi bde ba'i khyad par can gyi sprul pa'i lha de rnams mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-7: bdag cag rang rnams rtsva dang 'dra bar shes par gyur nas spu du ma langs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-8: 'thab bral gyi lha rnams ngo tsha ba dang bcas par gyur cing kha nyen pa dang bcas par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-10: 'dod pas rgyags pa dang bral ba legs par skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-11: de ltar 'thab bral gyi lha de dag gi bcom ldan 'das des dbang po mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-12: mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-14: rgyu 'bras kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-15: chags pa med par mkhyen pa po 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-16: mchog tu thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas gang na so'u myo zhes bya ba 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag yod pa der yang cho 'phrul de dag rnams mdzad par gyur pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-17: de ltar so'u myo zhes bya ba'i 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag kyang mchog tu bag med par gyur pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad du nye bar bcom par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463a-18: dus de dag gi tshe na yang 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag so'u myo zhes bya ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463b-0: lha'i tshogs thams cad kyang padma chen po 'di @463b las byung ste gnas pa ni ji ltar 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag mu su lun dha khyod skyed mos tshal gyi ltad mo la 'gro ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis padma chen po de'i nang du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag rnams kyis ni so'u myo'i rgyags pa dang bral bar bya ba'i don du yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463b-2: padma chen po 'di'i nang du sprul pa 'di dag rnams gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ni 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag khyod kyis sngar ma mthong ba de dag rnams yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463b-8: spyod yul rnams dga' ba'i rnam par rtog pa du ma dang ldan pa de dag rnams ni so'u myo de'i bag med pa dang 'dre ba bral bar bya ba'i don du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463b-9: de nas padma chen po 'di'i nang du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463b-10: sprul pa thams cad kyang brjod nas gang na 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag so'u myo yod pa de'i padma de steng du brtol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463b-11: brtol nas steng du nges par byung ba'i padma'i 'dab ma bye ba phrag brgya stong pa la gnas par gyur pa de'i snying po 'di la ni bcom ldan 'das legs par bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:463b-12: 'dab ma rnams la yang nyan thos rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul byed pa rnams de dag la la ni nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-0: phyir yang padma'i nang du rjes @464a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-3: nyan thos gzhan dag rnams ni glang po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-4: rta'i rgyab tu zhon nas nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te 'byung ngo; ;gzhan yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-5: mchog tu dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i char gyi rgyun kun tu 'bebs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-6: nyan thos de dag rnams rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pa byed do; ;de nas 'thab bral rnams kyi mnga' bdag so'u myo yid rab tu dang ba dang ldan pa sngon legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis bskul bas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-7: 'di lta bu 'di dag rnams gang gi mthu stobs yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-8: gang dag gis khyad par gyis bdag cag rnams gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-9: mthu stobs kyis kyang cung zad kyang ma yin zhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-10: de nas gang du las byas pa lha'i spyan gyis kun nas gzigs pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-12: 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-15: bram ze'i rigs dang bcas pa'i skye dgu rnams kyi dang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464a-18: lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-0: thams cad gzigs pa 'dis 'jig rten 'di rnams @464b thams cad la chos ston par mdzad pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-7: yongs su dag pa ston par byed pa ni gcig tu nges par gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-10: 'di dag ni gzugs kun 'byung ba rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-12: 'di dag ni gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-13: 'di ni khyed rnams la ston par mdzad pa po yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-14: lha rnams kyi chos kyi don du dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-15: phan par bya ba'i don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-16: bde bar bya ba'i don du sku 'di 'thab bral gyi lha'i ris su byon pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-17: de nas gsungs pa de rnams la cung zad cig thos nas 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag so'u myos pa 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-18: bdag cag gi bla ma dag gis nye bar bsten par bgyi lags na ji ltar 'di'i mchod pa rnams bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-19: 'di mchod pa'i dbang du byas pa'i lo rgyus rnams kyang bdag cag gis mngon par mi 'tshal lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-20: de nas dge sbyong des so'u myo de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa la nye bar bsten par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-23: nye bar bsten pa na yang dbu rgyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:464b-24: rgyan rnams dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-1: par dul ba'i cha byad rnams kyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-2: dbang po rnams rab tu dang bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-3: yid mnyam par bzhag par gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-4: pus mo dag gis lha nga sa la so sor btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-5: mgo bos rgyal po bzhin du mngon par phyag 'tshol la chos gos phrag pa'i phyogs gcig tu byas te mgo bos kun nas btud pas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar gnas par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-6: dbang po legs par kha bye ba dang ldan pa'i lha de dag rnams thams cad kyis lhan cig tu dge sbyong de'i spyan snga nas kun tu spyod pa legs pa 'di dag rnams kyi don nye bar rnyed nas 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag lha brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing dbu rgyan dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-8: mdzes pa'i cha byad kun nas spangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-9: dbang po rnams shin tu dul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-10: legs par dul ba zhi bar gyur pa'i yid kyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-11: bcom ldan 'das gang padma chen po'i snying po la nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar gyur pa ni rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i zla ba lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465a-12: thams cad nas yongs su bskor bar gyur pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab lhun po lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465b-0: mtsho chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po chen po brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor @465b ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba dang 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465b-1: 'od zer rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i nyi ma dang 'dra ba de lta bur bcom ldan 'das de nyan thos kyi tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mchog tu mtshungs pa med pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i 'od rnam par 'phro bar gyur pas rnam par gsal bar padma'i snying po la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465b-2: de nas so'u myo 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der thal mo spyi bor sbyar ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465b-4: bag med pa dang ji lta ba bzhin du bral ba mchis lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465b-5: de nas steng na gnas pa'i so'u myo de la bcom ldan 'das gser thub kyi zab cing rgya che ba dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi khyad par gyis 'thab bral gyi 'jig rten de thams cad ji lta bar yongs su bkang bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465b-7: ngas ji lta ba bzhin du chos bshad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465b-13: 'ba' zhig pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:465b-15: yongs su byang ba tshangs par spyod pa legs par bshad par bya'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:471a-22: bag med pa rnams yang go bar mdzad do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:471b-10: mu su lun dha zhes bya ba'i gzugs su 'thab bral ba'i mnga' bdag 'byung ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-5: phyi mar lhar ni skye ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-11: de la yang yon tan bzhi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-13: zhe sdang bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-14: gal te brgya la zhig byas na yang de brtan par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-15: khro bas shin tu gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-16: lus zhig nas kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-17: tshigs su bcad pa'ang 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-18: sems gang dge ba dri med ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-19: zhe sdang gis ni gnod byed min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-20: brnab sems dri ma 'byung min te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-21: lha yi 'jig rten du yang skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-24: lha'i lam rnams las bcu gcig pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-27: 'bras bu la dang ba'i stobs skyed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-28: las kyi 'bras bu rnams la dad pa'i stobs skyed pa'i skyes bu rnams ni sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-29: kha na ma tho ba cung zad tsam rnams la yang 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-30: des legs par byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:476b-31: nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu yang kun nas rig par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-0: de legs par byas pa'i las la goms pa'i dbang @477a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-1: gis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-2: tshigs su bcad pa yang 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-3: gang gi las 'bras rnam smin shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-4: rtag tu phra mo legs mthong ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-5: 'di ni sdig pas gos min te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-9: mtho ris kyi lam gang dag la mngon par zhugs nas skyes bu lha rnams kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-11: dkon mchog gsum la rab tu dang ba phyin ci ma log pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-12: dkon mchog gsum la rab tu dang ba'i phyin ci ma log pa de ni yon tan brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa yin pa gang gi phyir na yon tan du ma dang ldan pa des kyang yon tan rnams zil gyis mnan nas rnam par rgyal bas gsal zhing mdzes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-14: skyes bu de dag rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-16: mi rnams kyi bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-17: lam bcu gnyis po 'dis skyes bu rnams sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-18: lha gang dag bag med pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa de dag rnams kyang mtho ris su 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-19: bag med pa la zhugs pa'i skyes bu rnams ni 'jig rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477a-20: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba rnams kyang mi thob pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-0: ji lta bu kho nar @477b sngon gyi drang srong gser thub des 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bdag po so'u myo de la chos bstan pa'i chos de nyid kho na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi yin pa yang ji lta ba bzhin du khyod kyi tshe ches rgan pa rnams kyi drung nas thos pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-1: 'di la yang tshigs su bcad par gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-2: dkon mchog gsum la rab dad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-5: sngon du nye bar mtho ris skye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-6: lam bcu gnyis po de dag rnams bar ma chad pas der rtag tu 'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no; ;de nas mu su lun dhas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas lha brgya stong phrag brgyad cu po rnams dang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to; ;de nas 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag mu su lun dhas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag rnams smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa khyod drin gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-9: ngan song 'jigs pa las bdag grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-10: lha ni 'di rnams thams cad kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-11: mgon po khyod kyis chos kyis bsgral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-12: srid pa'i btson ra rgya chen la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-13: lha dang bcas pa rab zhugs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-14: bder gshegs bstan pa gang la bdag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:477b-15: bdag gi skye ba deng 'bras bcas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-0: de skad ces smras nas mu su lun dha w'a ra n'a si nas @478a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-1: 'phags nas lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-2: de rnams gang na 'thab bral ba rnams kyi sa rnams yod pa der lha de thams cad nyid rab tu zhugs nas de rnams de re zhig gi tshe dga' mgur gyur pas kyang kun tu spyod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-3: ji srid du de dag rnams skye ba gcig gi dbang du byas pa'i tshe ma zad kyi bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-4: de zad nas phyis kyang gang gis sdig pa'i sgo rnams bcad pa'i mi rnams su de skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-5: skyes nas kyang mchog tu gzhon sha chags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-7: lang tsho phul du phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-8: 'byor cing yang yul ljongs la dbang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-9: gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin pa de dag rnams ni tshe 'phos nas ji ltar chos rnams kyis nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba dmyal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-12: de dag rnams nas 'phos nas gal te yang mi rnams dang skal ba mtshungs pa mir skyes na yang de rnams de bzhin du gzhon sha can du 'gyur zhing rgyan dang cha lugs la mchog tu dga' bar yang 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-069-001:478a-13: de'i rgyu mthun pa'i las rnams kyis so ////
